# copyright_long:       Good News Translation<br><br>The Good News Translation, formerly called the Good News Bible or Today's English Version, was first published as a full Bible in 1976 by the American Bible Society as a common language Bible. It is a clear and simple modern translation that is faithful to the original Hebrew, Koine Greek and Aramaic texts. The GNT is a highly-trusted version.<br>After almost 200 years of ongoing ministry, American Bible Society invites people to experience the life-changing message of the Bible. Offering an increasing range of innovative ministries to address core life questions and struggles, the Bible Society partners with Christian churches and national Bible societies to share God’s Word both in the United States and around the globe. For more information, visit www.americanbible.org. To purchase a copy of this translation, visit www.bibles.com.
40001001	This is the list of the ancestors of Jesus Christ , a descendant of David , who was a descendant of Abraham .
40001017	So then , there were fourteen generations from Abraham to David , and fourteen from David to the exile in Babylon , and fourteen from then to the birth of the Messiah .
40001018	This was how the birth of Jesus Christ took place . His mother Mary was engaged to Joseph , but before they were married , she found out that she was going to have a baby by the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Joseph was a man who always did what was right , but he did not want to disgrace Mary publicly ; so he made plans to break the engagement privately .
40001020	While he was thinking about this , an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream and said , “ Joseph , descendant of David , do not be afraid to take Mary to be your wife . For it is by the Holy Spirit that she has conceived .
40001021	She will have a son , and you will name him Jesus—because he will save his people from their sins . ”
40001022	Now all this happened in order to make come true what the Lord had said through the prophet ,
40001023	“ A virgin will become pregnant and have a son , and he will be called Immanuel ” ( which means , “ God is with us ” ) .
40001024	So when Joseph woke up , he married Mary , as the angel of the Lord had told him to .
40001025	But he had no sexual relations with her before she gave birth to her son . And Joseph named him Jesus .
40002001	Jesus was born in the town of Bethlehem in Judea , during the time when Herod was king . Soon afterward , some men who studied the stars came from the East to Jerusalem
40002002	and asked , “ Where is the baby born to be the king of the Jews ? We saw his star when it came up in the east , and we have come to worship him . ”
40002003	When King Herod heard about this , he was very upset , and so was everyone else in Jerusalem .
40002004	He called together all the chief priests and the teachers of the Law and asked them , “ Where will the Messiah be born ? ”
40002005	“ In the town of Bethlehem in Judea , ” they answered . “ For this is what the prophet wrote :
40002006	‘ Bethlehem in the land of Judah , you are by no means the least of the leading cities of Judah ; for from you will come a leader who will guide my people Israel . ’ ”
40002007	So Herod called the visitors from the East to a secret meeting and found out from them the exact time the star had appeared .
40002008	Then he sent them to Bethlehem with these instructions : “ Go and make a careful search for the child ; and when you find him , let me know , so that I too may go and worship him . ”
40002011	They went into the house , and when they saw the child with his mother Mary , they knelt down and worshiped him . They brought out their gifts of gold , frankincense , and myrrh , and presented them to him .
40002012	Then they returned to their country by another road , since God had warned them in a dream not to go back to Herod .
40002013	After they had left , an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph and said , “ Herod will be looking for the child in order to kill him . So get up , take the child and his mother and escape to Egypt , and stay there until I tell you to leave . ”
40002014	Joseph got up , took the child and his mother , and left during the night for Egypt ,
40002015	where he stayed until Herod died . This was done to make come true what the Lord had said through the prophet , “ I called my Son out of Egypt . ”
40002016	When Herod realized that the visitors from the East had tricked him , he was furious . He gave orders to kill all the boys in Bethlehem and its neighborhood who were two years old and younger—this was done in accordance with what he had learned from the visitors about the time when the star had appeared .
40002017	In this way what the prophet Jeremiah had said came true :
40002018	“ A sound is heard in Ramah , the sound of bitter weeping . Rachel is crying for her children ; she refuses to be comforted , for they are dead . ”
40002019	After Herod died , an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt
40002020	and said , “ Get up , take the child and his mother , and go back to the land of Israel , because those who tried to kill the child are dead . ”
40002021	So Joseph got up , took the child and his mother , and went back to Israel .
40002022	But when Joseph heard that Archelaus had succeeded his father Herod as king of Judea , he was afraid to go there . He was given more instructions in a dream , so he went to the province of Galilee
40002023	and made his home in a town named Nazareth . And so what the prophets had said came true : “ He will be called a Nazarene . ”
40003001	At that time John the Baptist came to the desert of Judea and started preaching .
40003002	“ Turn away from your sins , ” he said , “ because the Kingdom of heaven is near ! ”
40003003	John was the man the prophet Isaiah was talking about when he said , “ Someone is shouting in the desert , ‘ Prepare a road for the Lord ; make a straight path for him to travel ! ’ ”
40003004	John's clothes were made of camel's hair ; he wore a leather belt around his waist , and his food was locusts and wild honey .
40003005	People came to him from Jerusalem , from the whole province of Judea , and from all over the country near the Jordan River .
40003006	They confessed their sins , and he baptized them in the Jordan .
40003007	When John saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to him to be baptized , he said to them , “ You snakes—who told you that you could escape from the punishment God is about to send ?
40003008	Do those things that will show that you have turned from your sins .
40003009	And don't think you can escape punishment by saying that Abraham is your ancestor . I tell you that God can take these rocks and make descendants for Abraham !
40003010	The ax is ready to cut down the trees at the roots ; every tree that does not bear good fruit will be cut down and thrown in the fire .
40003011	I baptize you with water to show that you have repented , but the one who will come after me will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire . He is much greater than I am ; and I am not good enough even to carry his sandals .
40003012	He has his winnowing shovel with him to thresh out all the grain . He will gather his wheat into his barn , but he will burn the chaff in a fire that never goes out . ”
40003013	At that time Jesus arrived from Galilee and came to John at the Jordan to be baptized by him .
40003014	But John tried to make him change his mind . “ I ought to be baptized by you , ” John said , “ and yet you have come to me ! ”
40003015	But Jesus answered him , “ Let it be so for now . For in this way we shall do all that God requires . ” So John agreed .
40003016	As soon as Jesus was baptized , he came up out of the water . Then heaven was opened to him , and he saw the Spirit of God coming down like a dove and lighting on him .
40003017	Then a voice said from heaven , “ This is my own dear Son , with whom I am pleased . ”
40004001	Then the Spirit led Jesus into the desert to be tempted by the Devil .
40004002	After spending forty days and nights without food , Jesus was hungry .
40004003	Then the Devil came to him and said , “ If you are God's Son , order these stones to turn into bread . ”
40004004	But Jesus answered , “ The scripture says , ‘ Human beings cannot live on bread alone , but need every word that God speaks . ’ ”
40004005	Then the Devil took Jesus to Jerusalem , the Holy City , set him on the highest point of the Temple ,
40004006	and said to him , “ If you are God's Son , throw yourself down , for the scripture says , ‘ God will give orders to his angels about you ; they will hold you up with their hands , so that not even your feet will be hurt on the stones . ’ ”
40004007	Jesus answered , “ But the scripture also says , ‘ Do not put the Lord your God to the test . ’ ”
40004008	Then the Devil took Jesus to a very high mountain and showed him all the kingdoms of the world in all their greatness .
40004009	“ All this I will give you , ” the Devil said , “ if you kneel down and worship me . ”
40004010	Then Jesus answered , “ Go away , Satan ! The scripture says , ‘ Worship the Lord your God and serve only him ! ’ ”
40004011	Then the Devil left Jesus ; and angels came and helped him .
40004012	When Jesus heard that John had been put in prison , he went away to Galilee .
40004013	He did not stay in Nazareth , but went to live in Capernaum , a town by Lake Galilee , in the territory of Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	This was done to make come true what the prophet Isaiah had said ,
40004015	“ Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali , on the road to the sea , on the other side of the Jordan , Galilee , land of the Gentiles !
40004016	The people who live in darkness will see a great light . On those who live in the dark land of death the light will shine . ”
40004017	From that time Jesus began to preach his message : “ Turn away from your sins , because the Kingdom of heaven is near ! ”
40004018	As Jesus walked along the shore of Lake Galilee , he saw two brothers who were fishermen , Simon ( called Peter ) and his brother Andrew , catching fish in the lake with a net .
40004019	Jesus said to them , “ Come with me , and I will teach you to catch people . ”
40004020	At once they left their nets and went with him .
40004021	He went on and saw two other brothers , James and John , the sons of Zebedee . They were in their boat with their father Zebedee , getting their nets ready . Jesus called them ,
40004022	and at once they left the boat and their father , and went with him .
40004023	Jesus went all over Galilee , teaching in the synagogues , preaching the Good News about the Kingdom , and healing people who had all kinds of disease and sickness .
40004024	The news about him spread through the whole country of Syria , so that people brought to him all those who were sick , suffering from all kinds of diseases and disorders : people with demons , and epileptics , and paralyzed people—and Jesus healed them all .
40004025	Large crowds followed him from Galilee and the Ten Towns , from Jerusalem , Judea , and the land on the other side of the Jordan .
40005001	Jesus saw the crowds and went up a hill , where he sat down . His disciples gathered around him ,
40005002	and he began to teach them :
40005003	“ Happy are those who know they are spiritually poor ; the Kingdom of heaven belongs to them !
40005004	“ Happy are those who mourn ; God will comfort them !
40005005	“ Happy are those who are humble ; they will receive what God has promised !
40005006	“ Happy are those whose greatest desire is to do what God requires ; God will satisfy them fully !
40005007	“ Happy are those who are merciful to others ; God will be merciful to them !
40005008	“ Happy are the pure in heart ; they will see God !
40005009	“ Happy are those who work for peace ; God will call them his children !
40005010	“ Happy are those who are persecuted because they do what God requires ; the Kingdom of heaven belongs to them !
40005011	“ Happy are you when people insult you and persecute you and tell all kinds of evil lies against you because you are my followers .
40005012	Be happy and glad , for a great reward is kept for you in heaven . This is how the prophets who lived before you were persecuted .
40005013	“ You are like salt for the whole human race . But if salt loses its saltiness , there is no way to make it salty again . It has become worthless , so it is thrown out and people trample on it .
40005014	“ You are like light for the whole world . A city built on a hill cannot be hid .
40005015	No one lights a lamp and puts it under a bowl ; instead it is put on the lampstand , where it gives light for everyone in the house .
40005016	In the same way your light must shine before people , so that they will see the good things you do and praise your Father in heaven .
40005017	“ Do not think that I have come to do away with the Law of Moses and the teachings of the prophets . I have not come to do away with them , but to make their teachings come true .
40005018	Remember that as long as heaven and earth last , not the least point nor the smallest detail of the Law will be done away with—not until the end of all things .
40005019	So then , whoever disobeys even the least important of the commandments and teaches others to do the same , will be least in the Kingdom of heaven . On the other hand , whoever obeys the Law and teaches others to do the same , will be great in the Kingdom of heaven .
40005020	I tell you , then , that you will be able to enter the Kingdom of heaven only if you are more faithful than the teachers of the Law and the Pharisees in doing what God requires .
40005021	“ You have heard that people were told in the past , ‘ Do not commit murder ; anyone who does will be brought to trial . ’
40005022	But now I tell you : if you are angry with your brother you will be brought to trial , if you call your brother ‘ You good-for-nothing ! ’ you will be brought before the Council , and if you call your brother a worthless fool you will be in danger of going to the fire of hell .
40005023	So if you are about to offer your gift to God at the altar and there you remember that your brother has something against you ,
40005024	leave your gift there in front of the altar , go at once and make peace with your brother , and then come back and offer your gift to God .
40005025	“ If someone brings a lawsuit against you and takes you to court , settle the dispute while there is time , before you get to court . Once you are there , you will be turned over to the judge , who will hand you over to the police , and you will be put in jail .
40005026	There you will stay , I tell you , until you pay the last penny of your fine .
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Do not commit adultery . ’
40005028	But now I tell you : anyone who looks at a woman and wants to possess her is guilty of committing adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	So if your right eye causes you to sin , take it out and throw it away ! It is much better for you to lose a part of your body than to have your whole body thrown into hell .
40005030	If your right hand causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away ! It is much better for you to lose one of your limbs than to have your whole body go off to hell .
40005031	“ It was also said , ‘ Anyone who divorces his wife must give her a written notice of divorce . ’
40005032	But now I tell you : if a man divorces his wife for any cause other than her unfaithfulness , then he is guilty of making her commit adultery if she marries again ; and the man who marries her commits adultery also .
40005033	“ You have also heard that people were told in the past , ‘ Do not break your promise , but do what you have vowed to the Lord to do . ’
40005034	But now I tell you : do not use any vow when you make a promise . Do not swear by heaven , for it is God's throne ;
40005035	nor by earth , for it is the resting place for his feet ; nor by Jerusalem , for it is the city of the great King .
40005036	Do not even swear by your head , because you cannot make a single hair white or black .
40005037	Just say ‘ Yes ’ or ‘ No ’ —anything else you say comes from the Evil One .
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	But now I tell you : do not take revenge on someone who wrongs you . If anyone slaps you on the right cheek , let him slap your left cheek too .
40005040	And if someone takes you to court to sue you for your shirt , let him have your coat as well .
40005041	And if one of the occupation troops forces you to carry his pack one mile , carry it two miles .
40005042	When someone asks you for something , give it to him ; when someone wants to borrow something , lend it to him .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ Love your friends , hate your enemies . ’
40005044	But now I tell you : love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you ,
40005045	so that you may become the children of your Father in heaven . For he makes his sun to shine on bad and good people alike , and gives rain to those who do good and to those who do evil .
40005046	Why should God reward you if you love only the people who love you ? Even the tax collectors do that !
40005047	And if you speak only to your friends , have you done anything out of the ordinary ? Even the pagans do that !
40005048	You must be perfect—just as your Father in heaven is perfect .
40006001	“ Make certain you do not perform your religious duties in public so that people will see what you do . If you do these things publicly , you will not have any reward from your Father in heaven .
40006002	“ So when you give something to a needy person , do not make a big show of it , as the hypocrites do in the houses of worship and on the streets . They do it so that people will praise them . I assure you , they have already been paid in full .
40006003	But when you help a needy person , do it in such a way that even your closest friend will not know about it .
40006004	Then it will be a private matter . And your Father , who sees what you do in private , will reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , do not be like the hypocrites ! They love to stand up and pray in the houses of worship and on the street corners , so that everyone will see them . I assure you , they have already been paid in full .
40006006	But when you pray , go to your room , close the door , and pray to your Father , who is unseen . And your Father , who sees what you do in private , will reward you .
40006007	“ When you pray , do not use a lot of meaningless words , as the pagans do , who think that their gods will hear them because their prayers are long .
40006008	Do not be like them . Your Father already knows what you need before you ask him .
40006009	This , then , is how you should pray : ‘ Our Father in heaven : May your holy name be honored ;
40006010	may your Kingdom come ; may your will be done on earth as it is in heaven .
40006011	Give us today the food we need .
40006012	Forgive us the wrongs we have done , as we forgive the wrongs that others have done to us .
40006013	Do not bring us to hard testing , but keep us safe from the Evil One . ’
40006014	“ If you forgive others the wrongs they have done to you , your Father in heaven will also forgive you .
40006015	But if you do not forgive others , then your Father will not forgive the wrongs you have done .
40006016	“ And when you fast , do not put on a sad face as the hypocrites do . They neglect their appearance so that everyone will see that they are fasting . I assure you , they have already been paid in full .
40006017	When you go without food , wash your face and comb your hair ,
40006018	so that others cannot know that you are fasting—only your Father , who is unseen , will know . And your Father , who sees what you do in private , will reward you .
40006019	“ Do not store up riches for yourselves here on earth , where moths and rust destroy , and robbers break in and steal .
40006020	Instead , store up riches for yourselves in heaven , where moths and rust cannot destroy , and robbers cannot break in and steal .
40006021	For your heart will always be where your riches are .
40006022	“ The eyes are like a lamp for the body . If your eyes are sound , your whole body will be full of light ;
40006023	but if your eyes are no good , your body will be in darkness . So if the light in you is darkness , how terribly dark it will be !
40006024	“ You cannot be a slave of two masters ; you will hate one and love the other ; you will be loyal to one and despise the other . You cannot serve both God and money .
40006025	“ This is why I tell you : do not be worried about the food and drink you need in order to stay alive , or about clothes for your body . After all , isn't life worth more than food ? And isn't the body worth more than clothes ?
40006026	Look at the birds : they do not plant seeds , gather a harvest and put it in barns ; yet your Father in heaven takes care of them ! Aren't you worth much more than birds ?
40006027	Can any of you live a bit longer by worrying about it ?
40006028	“ And why worry about clothes ? Look how the wild flowers grow : they do not work or make clothes for themselves .
40006029	But I tell you that not even King Solomon with all his wealth had clothes as beautiful as one of these flowers .
40006030	It is God who clothes the wild grass—grass that is here today and gone tomorrow , burned up in the oven . Won't he be all the more sure to clothe you ? What little faith you have !
40006031	“ So do not start worrying : ‘ Where will my food come from ? or my drink ? or my clothes ? ’
40006032	( These are the things the pagans are always concerned about . ) Your Father in heaven knows that you need all these things .
40006033	Instead , be concerned above everything else with the Kingdom of God and with what he requires of you , and he will provide you with all these other things .
40006034	So do not worry about tomorrow ; it will have enough worries of its own . There is no need to add to the troubles each day brings .
40007001	“ Do not judge others , so that God will not judge you ,
40007002	for God will judge you in the same way you judge others , and he will apply to you the same rules you apply to others .
40007003	Why , then , do you look at the speck in your brother's eye and pay no attention to the log in your own eye ?
40007004	How dare you say to your brother , ‘ Please , let me take that speck out of your eye , ’ when you have a log in your own eye ?
40007005	You hypocrite ! First take the log out of your own eye , and then you will be able to see clearly to take the speck out of your brother's eye .
40007006	“ Do not give what is holy to dogs—they will only turn and attack you . Do not throw your pearls in front of pigs—they will only trample them underfoot .
40007007	“ Ask , and you will receive ; seek , and you will find ; knock , and the door will be opened to you .
40007008	For everyone who asks will receive , and anyone who seeks will find , and the door will be opened to those who knock .
40007009	Would any of you who are fathers give your son a stone when he asks for bread ?
40007010	Or would you give him a snake when he asks for a fish ?
40007011	As bad as you are , you know how to give good things to your children . How much more , then , will your Father in heaven give good things to those who ask him !
40007012	“ Do for others what you want them to do for you : this is the meaning of the Law of Moses and of the teachings of the prophets .
40007013	“ Go in through the narrow gate , because the gate to hell is wide and the road that leads to it is easy , and there are many who travel it .
40007014	But the gate to life is narrow and the way that leads to it is hard , and there are few people who find it .
40007015	“ Be on your guard against false prophets ; they come to you looking like sheep on the outside , but on the inside they are really like wild wolves .
40007016	You will know them by what they do . Thorn bushes do not bear grapes , and briers do not bear figs .
40007017	A healthy tree bears good fruit , but a poor tree bears bad fruit .
40007018	A healthy tree cannot bear bad fruit , and a poor tree cannot bear good fruit .
40007019	And any tree that does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown in the fire .
40007020	So then , you will know the false prophets by what they do .
40007021	“ Not everyone who calls me ‘ Lord , Lord ’ will enter the Kingdom of heaven , but only those who do what my Father in heaven wants them to do .
40007022	When the Judgment Day comes , many will say to me , ‘ Lord , Lord ! In your name we spoke God's message , by your name we drove out many demons and performed many miracles ! ’
40007023	Then I will say to them , ‘ I never knew you . Get away from me , you wicked people ! ’
40007024	“ So then , anyone who hears these words of mine and obeys them is like a wise man who built his house on rock .
40007025	The rain poured down , the rivers flooded over , and the wind blew hard against that house . But it did not fall , because it was built on rock .
40007026	“ But anyone who hears these words of mine and does not obey them is like a foolish man who built his house on sand .
40007027	The rain poured down , the rivers flooded over , the wind blew hard against that house , and it fell . And what a terrible fall that was ! ”
40007028	When Jesus finished saying these things , the crowd was amazed at the way he taught .
40007029	He wasn't like the teachers of the Law ; instead , he taught with authority .
40008001	When Jesus came down from the hill , large crowds followed him .
40008002	Then a man suffering from a dreaded skin disease came to him , knelt down before him , and said , “ Sir , if you want to , you can make me clean . ”
40008003	Jesus reached out and touched him . “ I do want to , ” he answered . “ Be clean ! ” At once the man was healed of his disease .
40008004	Then Jesus said to him , “ Listen ! Don't tell anyone , but go straight to the priest and let him examine you ; then in order to prove to everyone that you are cured , offer the sacrifice that Moses ordered . ”
40008005	When Jesus entered Capernaum , a Roman officer met him and begged for help :
40008006	“ Sir , my servant is sick in bed at home , unable to move and suffering terribly . ”
40008007	“ I will go and make him well , ” Jesus said .
40008008	“ Oh no , sir , ” answered the officer . “ I do not deserve to have you come into my house . Just give the order , and my servant will get well .
40008009	I , too , am a man under the authority of superior officers , and I have soldiers under me . I order this one , ‘ Go ! ’ and he goes ; and I order that one , ‘ Come ! ’ and he comes ; and I order my slave , ‘ Do this ! ’ and he does it . ”
40008010	When Jesus heard this , he was surprised and said to the people following him , “ I tell you , I have never found anyone in Israel with faith like this .
40008011	I assure you that many will come from the east and the west and sit down with Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob at the feast in the Kingdom of heaven .
40008012	But those who should be in the Kingdom will be thrown out into the darkness , where they will cry and gnash their teeth . ”
40008013	Then Jesus said to the officer , “ Go home , and what you believe will be done for you . ” And the officer's servant was healed that very moment .
40008014	Jesus went to Peter's home , and there he saw Peter's mother-in-law sick in bed with a fever .
40008015	He touched her hand ; the fever left her , and she got up and began to wait on him .
40008016	When evening came , people brought to Jesus many who had demons in them . Jesus drove out the evil spirits with a word and healed all who were sick .
40008017	He did this to make come true what the prophet Isaiah had said , “ He himself took our sickness and carried away our diseases . ”
40008018	When Jesus noticed the crowd around him , he ordered his disciples to go to the other side of the lake .
40008019	A teacher of the Law came to him . “ Teacher , ” he said , “ I am ready to go with you wherever you go . ”
40008020	Jesus answered him , “ Foxes have holes , and birds have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to lie down and rest . ”
40008021	Another man , who was a disciple , said , “ Sir , first let me go back and bury my father . ”
40008022	“ Follow me , ” Jesus answered , “ and let the dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	Jesus got into a boat , and his disciples went with him .
40008024	Suddenly a fierce storm hit the lake , and the boat was in danger of sinking . But Jesus was asleep .
40008025	The disciples went to him and woke him up . “ Save us , Lord ! ” they said . “ We are about to die ! ”
40008026	“ Why are you so frightened ? ” Jesus answered . “ What little faith you have ! ” Then he got up and ordered the winds and the waves to stop , and there was a great calm .
40008027	Everyone was amazed . “ What kind of man is this ? ” they said . “ Even the winds and the waves obey him ! ”
40008028	When Jesus came to the territory of Gadara on the other side of the lake , he was met by two men who came out of the burial caves there . These men had demons in them and were so fierce that no one dared travel on that road .
40008029	At once they screamed , “ What do you want with us , you Son of God ? Have you come to punish us before the right time ? ”
40008030	Not far away there was a large herd of pigs feeding .
40008031	So the demons begged Jesus , “ If you are going to drive us out , send us into that herd of pigs . ”
40008032	“ Go , ” Jesus told them ; so they left and went off into the pigs . The whole herd rushed down the side of the cliff into the lake and was drowned .
40008033	The men who had been taking care of the pigs ran away and went into the town , where they told the whole story and what had happened to the men with the demons .
40008034	So everyone from the town went out to meet Jesus ; and when they saw him , they begged him to leave their territory .
40009001	Jesus got into the boat and went back across the lake to his own town ,
40009002	where some people brought to him a paralyzed man , lying on a bed . When Jesus saw how much faith they had , he said to the paralyzed man , “ Courage , my son ! Your sins are forgiven . ”
40009003	Then some teachers of the Law said to themselves , “ This man is speaking blasphemy ! ”
40009004	Jesus perceived what they were thinking , and so he said , “ Why are you thinking such evil things ?
40009005	Is it easier to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up and walk ’ ?
40009006	I will prove to you , then , that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” So he said to the paralyzed man , “ Get up , pick up your bed , and go home ! ”
40009007	The man got up and went home .
40009008	When the people saw it , they were afraid , and praised God for giving such authority to people .
40009009	Jesus left that place , and as he walked along , he saw a tax collector , named Matthew , sitting in his office . He said to him , “ Follow me . ” Matthew got up and followed him .
40009010	While Jesus was having a meal in Matthew's house , many tax collectors and other outcasts came and joined Jesus and his disciples at the table .
40009011	Some Pharisees saw this and asked his disciples , “ Why does your teacher eat with such people ? ”
40009012	Jesus heard them and answered , “ People who are well do not need a doctor , but only those who are sick .
40009013	Go and find out what is meant by the scripture that says : ‘ It is kindness that I want , not animal sacrifices . ’ I have not come to call respectable people , but outcasts . ”
40009014	Then the followers of John the Baptist came to Jesus , asking , “ Why is it that we and the Pharisees fast often , but your disciples don't fast at all ? ”
40009015	Jesus answered , “ Do you expect the guests at a wedding party to be sad as long as the bridegroom is with them ? Of course not ! But the day will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast .
40009016	“ No one patches up an old coat with a piece of new cloth , for the new patch will shrink and make an even bigger hole in the coat .
40009017	Nor does anyone pour new wine into used wineskins , for the skins will burst , the wine will pour out , and the skins will be ruined . Instead , new wine is poured into fresh wineskins , and both will keep in good condition . ”
40009018	While Jesus was saying this , a Jewish official came to him , knelt down before him , and said , “ My daughter has just died ; but come and place your hands on her , and she will live . ”
40009019	So Jesus got up and followed him , and his disciples went along with him .
40009020	A woman who had suffered from severe bleeding for twelve years came up behind Jesus and touched the edge of his cloak .
40009021	She said to herself , “ If only I touch his cloak , I will get well . ”
40009022	Jesus turned around and saw her , and said , “ Courage , my daughter ! Your faith has made you well . ” At that very moment the woman became well .
40009023	Then Jesus went into the official's house . When he saw the musicians for the funeral and the people all stirred up ,
40009024	he said , “ Get out , everybody ! The little girl is not dead—she is only sleeping ! ” Then they all started making fun of him .
40009025	But as soon as the people had been put out , Jesus went into the girl's room and took hold of her hand , and she got up .
40009026	The news about this spread all over that part of the country .
40009027	Jesus left that place , and as he walked along , two blind men started following him . “ Have mercy on us , Son of David ! ” they shouted .
40009028	When Jesus had gone indoors , the two blind men came to him , and he asked them , “ Do you believe that I can heal you ? ” “ Yes , sir ! ” they answered .
40009029	Then Jesus touched their eyes and said , “ Let it happen , then , just as you believe ! ” —
40009030	and their sight was restored . Jesus spoke sternly to them , “ Don't tell this to anyone ! ”
40009031	But they left and spread the news about Jesus all over that part of the country .
40009032	As the men were leaving , some people brought to Jesus a man who could not talk because he had a demon .
40009033	But as soon as the demon was driven out , the man started talking , and everyone was amazed . “ We have never seen anything like this in Israel ! ” they exclaimed .
40009034	But the Pharisees said , “ It is the chief of the demons who gives Jesus the power to drive out demons . ”
40009035	Jesus went around visiting all the towns and villages . He taught in the synagogues , preached the Good News about the Kingdom , and healed people with every kind of disease and sickness .
40009036	As he saw the crowds , his heart was filled with pity for them , because they were worried and helpless , like sheep without a shepherd .
40009037	So he said to his disciples , “ The harvest is large , but there are few workers to gather it in .
40009038	Pray to the owner of the harvest that he will send out workers to gather in his harvest . ”
40010001	Jesus called his twelve disciples together and gave them authority to drive out evil spirits and to heal every disease and every sickness .
40010002	These are the names of the twelve apostles : first , Simon ( called Peter ) and his brother Andrew ; James and his brother John , the sons of Zebedee ;
40010003	Philip and Bartholomew ; Thomas and Matthew , the tax collector ; James son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus ;
40010004	Simon the Patriot , and Judas Iscariot , who betrayed Jesus .
40010005	These twelve men were sent out by Jesus with the following instructions : “ Do not go to any Gentile territory or any Samaritan towns .
40010006	Instead , you are to go to the lost sheep of the people of Israel .
40010007	Go and preach , ‘ The Kingdom of heaven is near ! ’
40010008	Heal the sick , bring the dead back to life , heal those who suffer from dreaded skin diseases , and drive out demons . You have received without paying , so give without being paid .
40010009	Do not carry any gold , silver , or copper money in your pockets ;
40010010	do not carry a beggar's bag for the trip or an extra shirt or shoes or a walking stick . Workers should be given what they need .
40010011	“ When you come to a town or village , go in and look for someone who is willing to welcome you , and stay with him until you leave that place .
40010012	When you go into a house , say , ‘ Peace be with you . ’
40010013	If the people in that house welcome you , let your greeting of peace remain ; but if they do not welcome you , then take back your greeting .
40010014	And if some home or town will not welcome you or listen to you , then leave that place and shake the dust off your feet .
40010015	I assure you that on the Judgment Day God will show more mercy to the people of Sodom and Gomorrah than to the people of that town !
40010016	“ Listen ! I am sending you out just like sheep to a pack of wolves . You must be as cautious as snakes and as gentle as doves .
40010017	Watch out , for there will be those who will arrest you and take you to court , and they will whip you in the synagogues .
40010018	For my sake you will be brought to trial before rulers and kings , to tell the Good News to them and to the Gentiles .
40010019	When they bring you to trial , do not worry about what you are going to say or how you will say it ; when the time comes , you will be given what you will say .
40010020	For the words you will speak will not be yours ; they will come from the Spirit of your Father speaking through you .
40010021	“ People will hand over their own brothers to be put to death , and fathers will do the same to their children ; children will turn against their parents and have them put to death .
40010022	Everyone will hate you because of me . But whoever holds out to the end will be saved .
40010023	When they persecute you in one town , run away to another one . I assure you that you will not finish your work in all the towns of Israel before the Son of Man comes .
40010024	“ No pupil is greater than his teacher ; no slave is greater than his master .
40010025	So a pupil should be satisfied to become like his teacher , and a slave like his master . If the head of the family is called Beelzebul , the members of the family will be called even worse names !
40010026	“ So do not be afraid of people . Whatever is now covered up will be uncovered , and every secret will be made known .
40010027	What I am telling you in the dark you must repeat in broad daylight , and what you have heard in private you must announce from the housetops .
40010028	Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul ; rather be afraid of God , who can destroy both body and soul in hell .
40010029	For only a penny you can buy two sparrows , yet not one sparrow falls to the ground without your Father's consent .
40010030	As for you , even the hairs of your head have all been counted .
40010031	So do not be afraid ; you are worth much more than many sparrows !
40010032	“ Those who declare publicly that they belong to me , I will do the same for them before my Father in heaven .
40010033	But those who reject me publicly , I will reject before my Father in heaven .
40010034	“ Do not think that I have come to bring peace to the world . No , I did not come to bring peace , but a sword .
40010035	I came to set sons against their fathers , daughters against their mothers , daughters-in-law against their mothers-in-law ;
40010036	your worst enemies will be the members of your own family .
40010037	“ Those who love their father or mother more than me are not fit to be my disciples ; those who love their son or daughter more than me are not fit to be my disciples .
40010038	Those who do not take up their cross and follow in my steps are not fit to be my disciples .
40010039	Those who try to gain their own life will lose it ; but those who lose their life for my sake will gain it .
40010040	“ Whoever welcomes you welcomes me ; and whoever welcomes me welcomes the one who sent me .
40010041	Whoever welcomes God's messenger because he is God's messenger , will share in his reward . And whoever welcomes a good man because he is good , will share in his reward .
40010042	You can be sure that whoever gives even a drink of cold water to one of the least of these my followers because he is my follower , will certainly receive a reward . ”
40011001	When Jesus finished giving these instructions to his twelve disciples , he left that place and went off to teach and preach in the towns near there .
40011002	When John the Baptist heard in prison about the things that Christ was doing , he sent some of his disciples to him .
40011003	“ Tell us , ” they asked Jesus , “ are you the one John said was going to come , or should we expect someone else ? ”
40011004	Jesus answered , “ Go back and tell John what you are hearing and seeing :
40011005	the blind can see , the lame can walk , those who suffer from dreaded skin diseases are made clean , the deaf hear , the dead are brought back to life , and the Good News is preached to the poor .
40011006	How happy are those who have no doubts about me ! ”
40011007	While John's disciples were leaving , Jesus spoke about him to the crowds : “ When you went out to John in the desert , what did you expect to see ? A blade of grass bending in the wind ?
40011008	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed up in fancy clothes ? People who dress like that live in palaces !
40011009	Tell me , what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes indeed , but you saw much more than a prophet .
40011010	For John is the one of whom the scripture says : ‘ God said , I will send my messenger ahead of you to open the way for you . ’
40011011	I assure you that John the Baptist is greater than anyone who has ever lived . But the one who is least in the Kingdom of heaven is greater than John .
40011012	From the time John preached his message until this very day the Kingdom of heaven has suffered violent attacks , and violent men try to seize it .
40011013	Until the time of John all the prophets and the Law of Moses spoke about the Kingdom ;
40011014	and if you are willing to believe their message , John is Elijah , whose coming was predicted .
40011015	Listen , then , if you have ears !
40011016	“ Now , to what can I compare the people of this day ? They are like children sitting in the marketplace . One group shouts to the other ,
40011017	‘ We played wedding music for you , but you wouldn't dance ! We sang funeral songs , but you wouldn't cry ! ’
40011018	When John came , he fasted and drank no wine , and everyone said , ‘ He has a demon in him ! ’
40011019	When the Son of Man came , he ate and drank , and everyone said , ‘ Look at this man ! He is a glutton and wine drinker , a friend of tax collectors and other outcasts ! ’ God's wisdom , however , is shown to be true by its results . ”
40011020	The people in the towns where Jesus had performed most of his miracles did not turn from their sins , so he reproached those towns .
40011021	“ How terrible it will be for you , Chorazin ! How terrible for you too , Bethsaida ! If the miracles which were performed in you had been performed in Tyre and Sidon , the people there would have long ago put on sackcloth and sprinkled ashes on themselves , to show that they had turned from their sins !
40011022	I assure you that on the Judgment Day God will show more mercy to the people of Tyre and Sidon than to you !
40011023	And as for you , Capernaum ! Did you want to lift yourself up to heaven ? You will be thrown down to hell ! If the miracles which were performed in you had been performed in Sodom , it would still be in existence today !
40011024	You can be sure that on the Judgment Day God will show more mercy to Sodom than to you ! ”
40011025	At that time Jesus said , “ Father , Lord of heaven and earth ! I thank you because you have shown to the unlearned what you have hidden from the wise and learned .
40011026	Yes , Father , this was how you were pleased to have it happen .
40011027	“ My Father has given me all things . No one knows the Son except the Father , and no one knows the Father except the Son and those to whom the Son chooses to reveal him .
40011028	“ Come to me , all of you who are tired from carrying heavy loads , and I will give you rest .
40011029	Take my yoke and put it on you , and learn from me , because I am gentle and humble in spirit ; and you will find rest .
40011030	For the yoke I will give you is easy , and the load I will put on you is light . ”
40012001	Not long afterward Jesus was walking through some wheat fields on a Sabbath . His disciples were hungry , so they began to pick heads of wheat and eat the grain .
40012002	When the Pharisees saw this , they said to Jesus , “ Look , it is against our Law for your disciples to do this on the Sabbath ! ”
40012003	Jesus answered , “ Have you never read what David did that time when he and his men were hungry ?
40012004	He went into the house of God , and he and his men ate the bread offered to God , even though it was against the Law for them to eat it—only the priests were allowed to eat that bread .
40012005	Or have you not read in the Law of Moses that every Sabbath the priests in the Temple actually break the Sabbath law , yet they are not guilty ?
40012006	I tell you that there is something here greater than the Temple .
40012007	The scripture says , ‘ It is kindness that I want , not animal sacrifices . ’ If you really knew what this means , you would not condemn people who are not guilty ;
40012008	for the Son of Man is Lord of the Sabbath . ”
40012009	Jesus left that place and went to a synagogue ,
40012010	where there was a man who had a paralyzed hand . Some people were there who wanted to accuse Jesus of doing wrong , so they asked him , “ Is it against our Law to heal on the Sabbath ? ”
40012011	Jesus answered , “ What if one of you has a sheep and it falls into a deep hole on the Sabbath ? Will you not take hold of it and lift it out ?
40012012	And a human being is worth much more than a sheep ! So then , our Law does allow us to help someone on the Sabbath . ”
40012013	Then he said to the man with the paralyzed hand , “ Stretch out your hand . ” He stretched it out , and it became well again , just like the other one .
40012014	Then the Pharisees left and made plans to kill Jesus .
40012015	When Jesus heard about the plot against him , he went away from that place ; and large crowds followed him . He healed all the sick
40012016	and gave them orders not to tell others about him .
40012017	He did this so as to make come true what God had said through the prophet Isaiah :
40012018	“ Here is my servant , whom I have chosen , the one I love , and with whom I am pleased . I will send my Spirit upon him , and he will announce my judgment to the nations .
40012019	He will not argue or shout , or make loud speeches in the streets .
40012020	He will not break off a bent reed , nor put out a flickering lamp . He will persist until he causes justice to triumph ,
40012021	and on him all peoples will put their hope . ”
40012022	Then some people brought to Jesus a man who was blind and could not talk because he had a demon . Jesus healed the man , so that he was able to talk and see .
40012023	The crowds were all amazed at what Jesus had done . “ Could he be the Son of David ? ” they asked .
40012024	When the Pharisees heard this , they replied , “ He drives out demons only because their ruler Beelzebul gives him power to do so . ”
40012025	Jesus knew what they were thinking , and so he said to them , “ Any country that divides itself into groups which fight each other will not last very long . And any town or family that divides itself into groups which fight each other will fall apart .
40012026	So if one group is fighting another in Satan's kingdom , this means that it is already divided into groups and will soon fall apart !
40012027	You say that I drive out demons because Beelzebul gives me the power to do so . Well , then , who gives your followers the power to drive them out ? What your own followers do proves that you are wrong !
40012028	No , it is not Beelzebul , but God's Spirit , who gives me the power to drive out demons , which proves that the Kingdom of God has already come upon you .
40012029	“ No one can break into a strong man's house and take away his belongings unless he first ties up the strong man ; then he can plunder his house .
40012030	“ Anyone who is not for me is really against me ; anyone who does not help me gather is really scattering .
40012031	For this reason I tell you : people can be forgiven any sin and any evil thing they say ; but whoever says evil things against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
40012032	Anyone who says something against the Son of Man can be forgiven ; but whoever says something against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven—now or ever .
40012033	“ To have good fruit you must have a healthy tree ; if you have a poor tree , you will have bad fruit . A tree is known by the kind of fruit it bears .
40012034	You snakes—how can you say good things when you are evil ? For the mouth speaks what the heart is full of .
40012035	A good person brings good things out of a treasure of good things ; a bad person brings bad things out of a treasure of bad things .
40012036	“ You can be sure that on the Judgment Day you will have to give account of every useless word you have ever spoken .
40012037	Your words will be used to judge you—to declare you either innocent or guilty . ”
40012038	Then some teachers of the Law and some Pharisees spoke up . “ Teacher , ” they said , “ we want to see you perform a miracle . ”
40012039	“ How evil and godless are the people of this day ! ” Jesus exclaimed . “ You ask me for a miracle ? No ! The only miracle you will be given is the miracle of the prophet Jonah .
40012040	In the same way that Jonah spent three days and nights in the big fish , so will the Son of Man spend three days and nights in the depths of the earth .
40012041	On the Judgment Day the people of Nineveh will stand up and accuse you , because they turned from their sins when they heard Jonah preach ; and I tell you that there is something here greater than Jonah !
40012042	On the Judgment Day the Queen of Sheba will stand up and accuse you , because she traveled all the way from her country to listen to King Solomon's wise teaching ; and I assure you that there is something here greater than Solomon !
40012043	“ When an evil spirit goes out of a person , it travels over dry country looking for a place to rest . If it can't find one ,
40012044	it says to itself , ‘ I will go back to my house . ’ So it goes back and finds the house empty , clean , and all fixed up .
40012045	Then it goes out and brings along seven other spirits even worse than itself , and they come and live there . So when it is all over , that person is in worse shape than at the beginning . This is what will happen to the evil people of this day . ”
40012046	Jesus was still talking to the people when his mother and brothers arrived . They stood outside , asking to speak with him .
40012047	So one of the people there said to him , “ Look , your mother and brothers are standing outside , and they want to speak with you . ”
40012048	Jesus answered , “ Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? ”
40012049	Then he pointed to his disciples and said , “ Look ! Here are my mother and my brothers !
40012050	Whoever does what my Father in heaven wants is my brother , my sister , and my mother . ”
40013001	That same day Jesus left the house and went to the lakeside , where he sat down to teach .
40013002	The crowd that gathered around him was so large that he got into a boat and sat in it , while the crowd stood on the shore .
40013003	He used parables to tell them many things . “ Once there was a man who went out to sow grain .
40013004	As he scattered the seed in the field , some of it fell along the path , and the birds came and ate it up .
40013005	Some of it fell on rocky ground , where there was little soil . The seeds soon sprouted , because the soil wasn't deep .
40013006	But when the sun came up , it burned the young plants ; and because the roots had not grown deep enough , the plants soon dried up .
40013007	Some of the seed fell among thorn bushes , which grew up and choked the plants .
40013008	But some seeds fell in good soil , and the plants bore grain : some had one hundred grains , others sixty , and others thirty . ”
40013009	And Jesus concluded , “ Listen , then , if you have ears ! ”
40013010	Then the disciples came to Jesus and asked him , “ Why do you use parables when you talk to the people ? ”
40013011	Jesus answered , “ The knowledge about the secrets of the Kingdom of heaven has been given to you , but not to them .
40013012	For the person who has something will be given more , so that he will have more than enough ; but the person who has nothing will have taken away from him even the little he has .
40013013	The reason I use parables in talking to them is that they look , but do not see , and they listen , but do not hear or understand .
40013014	So the prophecy of Isaiah applies to them : ‘ This people will listen and listen , but not understand ; they will look and look , but not see ,
40013015	because their minds are dull , and they have stopped up their ears and have closed their eyes . Otherwise , their eyes would see , their ears would hear , their minds would understand , and they would turn to me , says God , and I would heal them . ’
40013016	“ As for you , how fortunate you are ! Your eyes see and your ears hear .
40013017	I assure you that many prophets and many of God's people wanted very much to see what you see , but they could not , and to hear what you hear , but they did not .
40013018	“ Listen , then , and learn what the parable of the sower means .
40013019	Those who hear the message about the Kingdom but do not understand it are like the seeds that fell along the path . The Evil One comes and snatches away what was sown in them .
40013020	The seeds that fell on rocky ground stand for those who receive the message gladly as soon as they hear it .
40013021	But it does not sink deep into them , and they don't last long . So when trouble or persecution comes because of the message , they give up at once .
40013022	The seeds that fell among thorn bushes stand for those who hear the message ; but the worries about this life and the love for riches choke the message , and they don't bear fruit .
40013023	And the seeds sown in the good soil stand for those who hear the message and understand it : they bear fruit , some as much as one hundred , others sixty , and others thirty . ”
40013024	Jesus told them another parable : “ The Kingdom of heaven is like this . A man sowed good seed in his field .
40013025	One night , when everyone was asleep , an enemy came and sowed weeds among the wheat and went away .
40013026	When the plants grew and the heads of grain began to form , then the weeds showed up .
40013027	The man's servants came to him and said , ‘ Sir , it was good seed you sowed in your field ; where did the weeds come from ? ’
40013028	‘ It was some enemy who did this , ’ he answered . ‘ Do you want us to go and pull up the weeds ? ’ they asked him .
40013029	‘ No , ’ he answered , ‘ because as you gather the weeds you might pull up some of the wheat along with them .
40013030	Let the wheat and the weeds both grow together until harvest . Then I will tell the harvest workers to pull up the weeds first , tie them in bundles and burn them , and then to gather in the wheat and put it in my barn . ’ ”
40013031	Jesus told them another parable : “ The Kingdom of heaven is like this . A man takes a mustard seed and sows it in his field .
40013032	It is the smallest of all seeds , but when it grows up , it is the biggest of all plants . It becomes a tree , so that birds come and make their nests in its branches . ”
40013033	Jesus told them still another parable : “ The Kingdom of heaven is like this . A woman takes some yeast and mixes it with a bushel of flour until the whole batch of dough rises . ”
40013034	Jesus used parables to tell all these things to the crowds ; he would not say a thing to them without using a parable .
40013035	He did this to make come true what the prophet had said , “ I will use parables when I speak to them ; I will tell them things unknown since the creation of the world . ”
40013036	When Jesus had left the crowd and gone indoors , his disciples came to him and said , “ Tell us what the parable about the weeds in the field means . ”
40013037	Jesus answered , “ The man who sowed the good seed is the Son of Man ;
40013038	the field is the world ; the good seed is the people who belong to the Kingdom ; the weeds are the people who belong to the Evil One ;
40013039	and the enemy who sowed the weeds is the Devil . The harvest is the end of the age , and the harvest workers are angels .
40013040	Just as the weeds are gathered up and burned in the fire , so the same thing will happen at the end of the age :
40013041	the Son of Man will send out his angels to gather up out of his Kingdom all those who cause people to sin and all others who do evil things ,
40013042	and they will throw them into the fiery furnace , where they will cry and gnash their teeth .
40013043	Then God's people will shine like the sun in their Father's Kingdom . Listen , then , if you have ears !
40013044	“ The Kingdom of heaven is like this . A man happens to find a treasure hidden in a field . He covers it up again , and is so happy that he goes and sells everything he has , and then goes back and buys that field .
40013045	“ Also , the Kingdom of heaven is like this . A man is looking for fine pearls ,
40013046	and when he finds one that is unusually fine , he goes and sells everything he has , and buys that pearl .
40013047	“ Also , the Kingdom of heaven is like this . Some fishermen throw their net out in the lake and catch all kinds of fish .
40013048	When the net is full , they pull it to shore and sit down to divide the fish : the good ones go into the buckets , the worthless ones are thrown away .
40013049	It will be like this at the end of the age : the angels will go out and gather up the evil people from among the good
40013050	and will throw them into the fiery furnace , where they will cry and gnash their teeth .
40013051	“ Do you understand these things ? ” Jesus asked them . “ Yes , ” they answered .
40013052	So he replied , “ This means , then , that every teacher of the Law who becomes a disciple in the Kingdom of heaven is like a homeowner who takes new and old things out of his storage room . ”
40013053	When Jesus finished telling these parables , he left that place
40013054	and went back to his hometown . He taught in the synagogue , and those who heard him were amazed . “ Where did he get such wisdom ? ” they asked . “ And what about his miracles ?
40013055	Isn't he the carpenter's son ? Isn't Mary his mother , and aren't James , Joseph , Simon , and Judas his brothers ?
40013056	Aren't all his sisters living here ? Where did he get all this ? ”
40013057	And so they rejected him . Jesus said to them , “ A prophet is respected everywhere except in his hometown and by his own family . ”
40013058	Because they did not have faith , he did not perform many miracles there .
40014001	At that time Herod , the ruler of Galilee , heard about Jesus .
40014002	“ He is really John the Baptist , who has come back to life , ” he told his officials . “ That is why he has this power to perform miracles . ”
40014003	For Herod had earlier ordered John's arrest , and he had him tied up and put in prison . He had done this because of Herodias , his brother Philip's wife .
40014004	For some time John the Baptist had told Herod , “ It isn't right for you to be married to Herodias ! ”
40014005	Herod wanted to kill him , but he was afraid of the Jewish people , because they considered John to be a prophet .
40014006	On Herod's birthday the daughter of Herodias danced in front of the whole group . Herod was so pleased
40014007	that he promised her , “ I swear that I will give you anything you ask for ! ”
40014008	At her mother's suggestion she asked him , “ Give me here and now the head of John the Baptist on a plate ! ”
40014009	The king was sad , but because of the promise he had made in front of all his guests he gave orders that her wish be granted .
40014010	So he had John beheaded in prison .
40014011	The head was brought in on a plate and given to the girl , who took it to her mother .
40014012	John's disciples came , carried away his body , and buried it ; then they went and told Jesus .
40014013	When Jesus heard the news about John , he left there in a boat and went to a lonely place by himself . The people heard about it , and so they left their towns and followed him by land .
40014014	Jesus got out of the boat , and when he saw the large crowd , his heart was filled with pity for them , and he healed their sick .
40014015	That evening his disciples came to him and said , “ It is already very late , and this is a lonely place . Send the people away and let them go to the villages to buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	“ They don't have to leave , ” answered Jesus . “ You yourselves give them something to eat ! ”
40014017	“ All we have here are five loaves and two fish , ” they replied .
40014018	“ Then bring them here to me , ” Jesus said .
40014019	He ordered the people to sit down on the grass ; then he took the five loaves and the two fish , looked up to heaven , and gave thanks to God . He broke the loaves and gave them to the disciples , and the disciples gave them to the people .
40014020	Everyone ate and had enough . Then the disciples took up twelve baskets full of what was left over .
40014021	The number of men who ate was about five thousand , not counting the women and children .
40014022	Then Jesus made the disciples get into the boat and go on ahead to the other side of the lake , while he sent the people away .
40014023	After sending the people away , he went up a hill by himself to pray . When evening came , Jesus was there alone ;
40014024	and by this time the boat was far out in the lake , tossed about by the waves , because the wind was blowing against it .
40014025	Between three and six o'clock in the morning Jesus came to the disciples , walking on the water .
40014026	When they saw him walking on the water , they were terrified . “ It's a ghost ! ” they said , and screamed with fear .
40014027	Jesus spoke to them at once . “ Courage ! ” he said . “ It is I . Don't be afraid ! ”
40014028	Then Peter spoke up . “ Lord , if it is really you , order me to come out on the water to you . ”
40014029	“ Come ! ” answered Jesus . So Peter got out of the boat and started walking on the water to Jesus .
40014030	But when he noticed the strong wind , he was afraid and started to sink down in the water . “ Save me , Lord ! ” he cried .
40014031	At once Jesus reached out and grabbed hold of him and said , “ What little faith you have ! Why did you doubt ? ”
40014032	They both got into the boat , and the wind died down .
40014033	Then the disciples in the boat worshiped Jesus . “ Truly you are the Son of God ! ” they exclaimed .
40014034	They crossed the lake and came to land at Gennesaret ,
40014035	where the people recognized Jesus . So they sent for the sick people in all the surrounding country and brought them to Jesus .
40014036	They begged him to let the sick at least touch the edge of his cloak ; and all who touched it were made well .
40015001	Then some Pharisees and teachers of the Law came from Jerusalem to Jesus and asked him ,
40015002	“ Why is it that your disciples disobey the teaching handed down by our ancestors ? They don't wash their hands in the proper way before they eat ! ”
40015003	Jesus answered , “ And why do you disobey God's command and follow your own teaching ?
40015004	For God said , ‘ Respect your father and your mother , ’ and ‘ If you curse your father or your mother , you are to be put to death . ’
40015005	But you teach that if people have something they could use to help their father or mother , but say , ‘ This belongs to God , ’
40015006	they do not need to honor their father . In this way you disregard God's command , in order to follow your own teaching .
40015007	You hypocrites ! How right Isaiah was when he prophesied about you !
40015008	‘ These people , says God , honor me with their words , but their heart is really far away from me .
40015009	It is no use for them to worship me , because they teach human rules as though they were my laws ! ’ ”
40015010	Then Jesus called the crowd to him and said to them , “ Listen and understand !
40015011	It is not what goes into your mouth that makes you ritually unclean ; rather , what comes out of it makes you unclean . ”
40015012	Then the disciples came to him and said , “ Do you know that the Pharisees had their feelings hurt by what you said ? ”
40015013	“ Every plant which my Father in heaven did not plant will be pulled up , ” answered Jesus .
40015014	“ Don't worry about them ! They are blind leaders of the blind ; and when one blind man leads another , both fall into a ditch . ”
40015015	Peter spoke up , “ Explain this saying to us . ”
40015016	Jesus said to them , “ You are still no more intelligent than the others .
40015017	Don't you understand ? Anything that goes into your mouth goes into your stomach and then on out of your body .
40015018	But the things that come out of the mouth come from the heart , and these are the things that make you ritually unclean .
40015019	For from your heart come the evil ideas which lead you to kill , commit adultery , and do other immoral things ; to rob , lie , and slander others .
40015020	These are the things that make you unclean . But to eat without washing your hands as they say you should—this doesn't make you unclean . ”
40015021	Jesus left that place and went off to the territory near the cities of Tyre and Sidon .
40015022	A Canaanite woman who lived in that region came to him . “ Son of David ! ” she cried out . “ Have mercy on me , sir ! My daughter has a demon and is in a terrible condition . ”
40015023	But Jesus did not say a word to her . His disciples came to him and begged him , “ Send her away ! She is following us and making all this noise ! ”
40015024	Then Jesus replied , “ I have been sent only to the lost sheep of the people of Israel . ”
40015025	At this the woman came and fell at his feet . “ Help me , sir ! ” she said .
40015026	Jesus answered , “ It isn't right to take the children's food and throw it to the dogs . ”
40015027	“ That's true , sir , ” she answered , “ but even the dogs eat the leftovers that fall from their masters' table . ”
40015028	So Jesus answered her , “ You are a woman of great faith ! What you want will be done for you . ” And at that very moment her daughter was healed .
40015029	Jesus left there and went along by Lake Galilee . He climbed a hill and sat down .
40015030	Large crowds came to him , bringing with them the lame , the blind , the crippled , the dumb , and many other sick people , whom they placed at Jesus' feet ; and he healed them .
40015031	The people were amazed as they saw the dumb speaking , the crippled made whole , the lame walking , and the blind seeing ; and they praised the God of Israel .
40015032	Jesus called his disciples to him and said , “ I feel sorry for these people , because they have been with me for three days and now have nothing to eat . I don't want to send them away without feeding them , for they might faint on their way home . ”
40015033	The disciples asked him , “ Where will we find enough food in this desert to feed this crowd ? ”
40015034	“ How much bread do you have ? ” Jesus asked . “ Seven loaves , ” they answered , “ and a few small fish . ”
40015035	So Jesus ordered the crowd to sit down on the ground .
40015036	Then he took the seven loaves and the fish , gave thanks to God , broke them , and gave them to the disciples ; and the disciples gave them to the people .
40015037	They all ate and had enough . Then the disciples took up seven baskets full of pieces left over .
40015038	The number of men who ate was four thousand , not counting the women and children .
40015039	Then Jesus sent the people away , got into a boat , and went to the territory of Magadan .
40016001	Some Pharisees and Sadducees who came to Jesus wanted to trap him , so they asked him to perform a miracle for them , to show that God approved of him .
40016002	But Jesus answered , “ When the sun is setting , you say , ‘ We are going to have fine weather , because the sky is red . ’
40016003	And early in the morning you say , ‘ It is going to rain , because the sky is red and dark . ’ You can predict the weather by looking at the sky , but you cannot interpret the signs concerning these times !
40016004	How evil and godless are the people of this day ! You ask me for a miracle ? No ! The only miracle you will be given is the miracle of Jonah . ” So he left them and went away .
40016005	When the disciples crossed over to the other side of the lake , they forgot to take any bread .
40016006	Jesus said to them , “ Take care ; be on your guard against the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees . ”
40016007	They started discussing among themselves , “ He says this because we didn't bring any bread . ”
40016008	Jesus knew what they were saying , so he asked them , “ Why are you discussing among yourselves about not having any bread ? What little faith you have !
40016009	Don't you understand yet ? Don't you remember when I broke the five loaves for the five thousand men ? How many baskets did you fill ?
40016010	And what about the seven loaves for the four thousand men ? How many baskets did you fill ?
40016011	How is it that you don't understand that I was not talking to you about bread ? Guard yourselves from the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees ! ”
40016012	Then the disciples understood that he was not warning them to guard themselves from the yeast used in bread but from the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees .
40016013	Jesus went to the territory near the town of Caesarea Philippi , where he asked his disciples , “ Who do people say the Son of Man is ? ”
40016014	“ Some say John the Baptist , ” they answered . “ Others say Elijah , while others say Jeremiah or some other prophet . ”
40016015	“ What about you ? ” he asked them . “ Who do you say I am ? ”
40016016	Simon Peter answered , “ You are the Messiah , the Son of the living God . ”
40016017	“ Good for you , Simon son of John ! ” answered Jesus . “ For this truth did not come to you from any human being , but it was given to you directly by my Father in heaven .
40016018	And so I tell you , Peter : you are a rock , and on this rock foundation I will build my church , and not even death will ever be able to overcome it .

40016020	Then Jesus ordered his disciples not to tell anyone that he was the Messiah .
40016021	From that time on Jesus began to say plainly to his disciples , “ I must go to Jerusalem and suffer much from the elders , the chief priests , and the teachers of the Law . I will be put to death , but three days later I will be raised to life . ”
40016022	Peter took him aside and began to rebuke him . “ God forbid it , Lord ! ” he said . “ That must never happen to you ! ”
40016023	Jesus turned around and said to Peter , “ Get away from me , Satan ! You are an obstacle in my way , because these thoughts of yours don't come from God , but from human nature . ”
40016024	Then Jesus said to his disciples , “ If any of you want to come with me , you must forget yourself , carry your cross , and follow me .
40016025	For if you want to save your own life , you will lose it ; but if you lose your life for my sake , you will find it .
40016026	Will you gain anything if you win the whole world but lose your life ? Of course not ! There is nothing you can give to regain your life .
40016027	For the Son of Man is about to come in the glory of his Father with his angels , and then he will reward each one according to his deeds .
40016028	I assure you that there are some here who will not die until they have seen the Son of Man come as King . ”
40017001	Six days later Jesus took with him Peter and the brothers James and John and led them up a high mountain where they were alone .
40017002	As they looked on , a change came over Jesus : his face was shining like the sun , and his clothes were dazzling white .
40017003	Then the three disciples saw Moses and Elijah talking with Jesus .
40017004	So Peter spoke up and said to Jesus , “ Lord , how good it is that we are here ! If you wish , I will make three tents here , one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
40017005	While he was talking , a shining cloud came over them , and a voice from the cloud said , “ This is my own dear Son , with whom I am pleased—listen to him ! ”
40017006	When the disciples heard the voice , they were so terrified that they threw themselves face downward on the ground .
40017007	Jesus came to them and touched them . “ Get up , ” he said . “ Don't be afraid ! ”
40017008	So they looked up and saw no one there but Jesus .
40017009	As they came down the mountain , Jesus ordered them , “ Don't tell anyone about this vision you have seen until the Son of Man has been raised from death . ”

40017011	“ Elijah is indeed coming first , ” answered Jesus , “ and he will get everything ready .
40017012	But I tell you that Elijah has already come and people did not recognize him , but treated him just as they pleased . In the same way they will also mistreat the Son of Man . ”

40017015	and said , “ Sir , have mercy on my son ! He is an epileptic and has such terrible attacks that he often falls in the fire or into water .

40017022	When the disciples all came together in Galilee , Jesus said to them , “ The Son of Man is about to be handed over to those
40017023	who will kill him ; but three days later he will be raised to life . ” The disciples became very sad .
40017024	When Jesus and his disciples came to Capernaum , the collectors of the Temple tax came to Peter and asked , “ Does your teacher pay the Temple tax ? ”
40017025	“ Of course , ” Peter answered . When Peter went into the house , Jesus spoke up first , “ Simon , what is your opinion ? Who pays duties or taxes to the kings of this world ? The citizens of the country or the foreigners ? ”
40017026	“ The foreigners , ” answered Peter . “ Well , then , ” replied Jesus , “ that means that the citizens don't have to pay .
40017027	But we don't want to offend these people . So go to the lake and drop in a line . Pull up the first fish you hook , and in its mouth you will find a coin worth enough for my Temple tax and yours . Take it and pay them our taxes . ”
40018001	At that time the disciples came to Jesus , asking , “ Who is the greatest in the Kingdom of heaven ? ”
40018002	So Jesus called a child to come and stand in front of them ,
40018003	and said , “ I assure you that unless you change and become like children , you will never enter the Kingdom of heaven .
40018004	The greatest in the Kingdom of heaven is the one who humbles himself and becomes like this child .
40018005	And whoever welcomes in my name one such child as this , welcomes me .
40018006	“ If anyone should cause one of these little ones to lose his faith in me , it would be better for that person to have a large millstone tied around his neck and be drowned in the deep sea .
40018007	How terrible for the world that there are things that make people lose their faith ! Such things will always happen—but how terrible for the one who causes them !
40018008	“ If your hand or your foot makes you lose your faith , cut it off and throw it away ! It is better for you to enter life without a hand or a foot than to keep both hands and both feet and be thrown into the eternal fire .
40018009	And if your eye makes you lose your faith , take it out and throw it away ! It is better for you to enter life with only one eye than to keep both eyes and be thrown into the fire of hell .
40018010	“ See that you don't despise any of these little ones . Their angels in heaven , I tell you , are always in the presence of my Father in heaven .
40018012	“ What do you think a man does who has one hundred sheep and one of them gets lost ? He will leave the other ninety-nine grazing on the hillside and go and look for the lost sheep .
40018013	When he finds it , I tell you , he feels far happier over this one sheep than over the ninety-nine that did not get lost .
40018014	In just the same way your Father in heaven does not want any of these little ones to be lost .
40018015	“ If your brother sins against you , go to him and show him his fault . But do it privately , just between yourselves . If he listens to you , you have won your brother back .
40018016	But if he will not listen to you , take one or two other persons with you , so that ‘ every accusation may be upheld by the testimony of two or more witnesses , ’ as the scripture says .
40018017	And if he will not listen to them , then tell the whole thing to the church . Finally , if he will not listen to the church , treat him as though he were a pagan or a tax collector .
40018018	“ And so I tell all of you : what you prohibit on earth will be prohibited in heaven , and what you permit on earth will be permitted in heaven .
