40018020	For where two or three come together in my name , I am there with them . ”
40018021	Then Peter came to Jesus and asked , “ Lord , if my brother keeps on sinning against me , how many times do I have to forgive him ? Seven times ? ”
40018022	“ No , not seven times , ” answered Jesus , “ but seventy times seven ,
40018023	because the Kingdom of heaven is like this . Once there was a king who decided to check on his servants' accounts .
40018024	He had just begun to do so when one of them was brought in who owed him millions of dollars .
40018025	The servant did not have enough to pay his debt , so the king ordered him to be sold as a slave , with his wife and his children and all that he had , in order to pay the debt .
40018026	The servant fell on his knees before the king . ‘ Be patient with me , ’ he begged , ‘ and I will pay you everything ! ’
40018027	The king felt sorry for him , so he forgave him the debt and let him go .
40018028	“ Then the man went out and met one of his fellow servants who owed him a few dollars . He grabbed him and started choking him . ‘ Pay back what you owe me ! ’ he said .
40018029	His fellow servant fell down and begged him , ‘ Be patient with me , and I will pay you back ! ’
40018030	But he refused ; instead , he had him thrown into jail until he should pay the debt .
40018031	When the other servants saw what had happened , they were very upset and went to the king and told him everything .
40018032	So he called the servant in . ‘ You worthless slave ! ’ he said . ‘ I forgave you the whole amount you owed me , just because you asked me to .
40018033	You should have had mercy on your fellow servant , just as I had mercy on you . ’
40018034	The king was very angry , and he sent the servant to jail to be punished until he should pay back the whole amount . ”
40018035	And Jesus concluded , “ That is how my Father in heaven will treat every one of you unless you forgive your brother from your heart . ”
40019001	When Jesus finished saying these things , he left Galilee and went to the territory of Judea on the other side of the Jordan River .
40019002	Large crowds followed him , and he healed them there .
40019003	Some Pharisees came to him and tried to trap him by asking , “ Does our Law allow a man to divorce his wife for whatever reason he wishes ? ”
40019004	Jesus answered , “ Haven't you read the scripture that says that in the beginning the Creator made people male and female ?
40019005	And God said , ‘ For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and unite with his wife , and the two will become one . ’
40019006	So they are no longer two , but one . No human being must separate , then , what God has joined together . ”
40019007	The Pharisees asked him , “ Why , then , did Moses give the law for a man to hand his wife a divorce notice and send her away ? ”
40019008	Jesus answered , “ Moses gave you permission to divorce your wives because you are so hard to teach . But it was not like that at the time of creation .
40019009	I tell you , then , that any man who divorces his wife for any cause other than her unfaithfulness , commits adultery if he marries some other woman . ”
40019010	His disciples said to him , “ If this is how it is between a man and his wife , it is better not to marry . ”
40019011	Jesus answered , “ This teaching does not apply to everyone , but only to those to whom God has given it .
40019012	For there are different reasons why men cannot marry : some , because they were born that way ; others , because men made them that way ; and others do not marry for the sake of the Kingdom of heaven . Let him who can accept this teaching do so . ”
40019013	Some people brought children to Jesus for him to place his hands on them and to pray for them , but the disciples scolded the people .
40019014	Jesus said , “ Let the children come to me and do not stop them , because the Kingdom of heaven belongs to such as these . ”
40019015	He placed his hands on them and then went away .
40019016	Once a man came to Jesus . “ Teacher , ” he asked , “ what good thing must I do to receive eternal life ? ”
40019017	“ Why do you ask me concerning what is good ? ” answered Jesus . “ There is only One who is good . Keep the commandments if you want to enter life . ”

40019019	respect your father and your mother ; and love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
40019020	“ I have obeyed all these commandments , ” the young man replied . “ What else do I need to do ? ”
40019021	Jesus said to him , “ If you want to be perfect , go and sell all you have and give the money to the poor , and you will have riches in heaven ; then come and follow me . ”
40019022	When the young man heard this , he went away sad , because he was very rich .

40019025	When the disciples heard this , they were completely amazed . “ Who , then , can be saved ? ” they asked .
40019026	Jesus looked straight at them and answered , “ This is impossible for human beings , but for God everything is possible . ”
40019027	Then Peter spoke up . “ Look , ” he said , “ we have left everything and followed you . What will we have ? ”
40019028	Jesus said to them , “ You can be sure that when the Son of Man sits on his glorious throne in the New Age , then you twelve followers of mine will also sit on thrones , to rule the twelve tribes of Israel .
40019029	And everyone who has left houses or brothers or sisters or father or mother or children or fields for my sake , will receive a hundred times more and will be given eternal life .
40019030	But many who now are first will be last , and many who now are last will be first .
40020001	“ The Kingdom of heaven is like this . Once there was a man who went out early in the morning to hire some men to work in his vineyard .
40020002	He agreed to pay them the regular wage , a silver coin a day , and sent them to work in his vineyard .
40020003	He went out again to the marketplace at nine o'clock and saw some men standing there doing nothing ,
40020004	so he told them , ‘ You also go and work in the vineyard , and I will pay you a fair wage . ’
40020005	So they went . Then at twelve o'clock and again at three o'clock he did the same thing .
40020006	It was nearly five o'clock when he went to the marketplace and saw some other men still standing there . ‘ Why are you wasting the whole day here doing nothing ? ’ he asked them .
40020007	‘ No one hired us , ’ they answered . ‘ Well , then , you go and work in the vineyard , ’ he told them .
40020008	“ When evening came , the owner told his foreman , ‘ Call the workers and pay them their wages , starting with those who were hired last and ending with those who were hired first . ’
40020009	The men who had begun to work at five o'clock were paid a silver coin each .
40020010	So when the men who were the first to be hired came to be paid , they thought they would get more ; but they too were given a silver coin each .
40020011	They took their money and started grumbling against the employer .
40020012	‘ These men who were hired last worked only one hour , ’ they said , ‘ while we put up with a whole day's work in the hot sun—yet you paid them the same as you paid us ! ’
40020013	‘ Listen , friend , ’ the owner answered one of them , ‘ I have not cheated you . After all , you agreed to do a day's work for one silver coin .
40020014	Now take your pay and go home . I want to give this man who was hired last as much as I gave you .
40020015	Don't I have the right to do as I wish with my own money ? Or are you jealous because I am generous ? ’ ”
40020016	And Jesus concluded , “ So those who are last will be first , and those who are first will be last . ”

40021001	As Jesus and his disciples approached Jerusalem , they came to Bethphage at the Mount of Olives . There Jesus sent two of the disciples on ahead

40021019	He saw a fig tree by the side of the road and went to it , but found nothing on it except leaves . So he said to the tree , “ You will never again bear fruit ! ” At once the fig tree dried up .

40021028	“ Now , what do you think ? There was once a man who had two sons . He went to the older one and said , ‘ Son , go and work in the vineyard today . ’
40021029	‘ I don't want to , ’ he answered , but later he changed his mind and went .
40021030	Then the father went to the other son and said the same thing . ‘ Yes , sir , ’ he answered , but he did not go .
40021031	Which one of the two did what his father wanted ? ” “ The older one , ” they answered . So Jesus said to them , “ I tell you : the tax collectors and the prostitutes are going into the Kingdom of God ahead of you .
40021032	For John the Baptist came to you showing you the right path to take , and you would not believe him ; but the tax collectors and the prostitutes believed him . Even when you saw this , you did not later change your minds and believe him .
40021033	“ Listen to another parable , ” Jesus said . “ There was once a landowner who planted a vineyard , put a fence around it , dug a hole for the wine press , and built a watchtower . Then he rented the vineyard to tenants and left home on a trip .
40021034	When the time came to gather the grapes , he sent his slaves to the tenants to receive his share of the harvest .
40021035	The tenants grabbed his slaves , beat one , killed another , and stoned another .
40021036	Again the man sent other slaves , more than the first time , and the tenants treated them the same way .
40021037	Last of all he sent his son to them . ‘ Surely they will respect my son , ’ he said .
40021038	But when the tenants saw the son , they said to themselves , ‘ This is the owner's son . Come on , let's kill him , and we will get his property ! ’
40021039	So they grabbed him , threw him out of the vineyard , and killed him .
40021040	“ Now , when the owner of the vineyard comes , what will he do to those tenants ? ” Jesus asked .
40021041	“ He will certainly kill those evil men , ” they answered , “ and rent the vineyard out to other tenants , who will give him his share of the harvest at the right time . ”
40021042	Jesus said to them , “ Haven't you ever read what the Scriptures say ? ‘ The stone which the builders rejected as worthless turned out to be the most important of all . This was done by the Lord ; what a wonderful sight it is ! ’
40021043	“ And so I tell you , ” added Jesus , “ the Kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce the proper fruits . ”
40021045	The chief priests and the Pharisees heard Jesus' parables and knew that he was talking about them ,
40021046	so they tried to arrest him . But they were afraid of the crowds , who considered Jesus to be a prophet .
40022001	Jesus again used parables in talking to the people .
40022002	“ The Kingdom of heaven is like this . Once there was a king who prepared a wedding feast for his son .
40022003	He sent his servants to tell the invited guests to come to the feast , but they did not want to come .
40022004	So he sent other servants with this message for the guests : ‘ My feast is ready now ; my steers and prize calves have been butchered , and everything is ready . Come to the wedding feast ! ’
40022005	But the invited guests paid no attention and went about their business : one went to his farm , another to his store ,
40022006	while others grabbed the servants , beat them , and killed them .
40022007	The king was very angry ; so he sent his soldiers , who killed those murderers and burned down their city .
40022008	Then he called his servants and said to them , ‘ My wedding feast is ready , but the people I invited did not deserve it .
40022009	Now go to the main streets and invite to the feast as many people as you find . ’
40022010	So the servants went out into the streets and gathered all the people they could find , good and bad alike ; and the wedding hall was filled with people .
40022011	“ The king went in to look at the guests and saw a man who was not wearing wedding clothes .

40022014	And Jesus concluded , “ Many are invited , but few are chosen . ”
40022015	The Pharisees went off and made a plan to trap Jesus with questions .

40022022	When they heard this , they were amazed ; and they left him and went away .
40022023	That same day some Sadducees came to Jesus and claimed that people will not rise from death .
40022024	“ Teacher , ” they said , “ Moses said that if a man who has no children dies , his brother must marry the widow so that they can have children who will be considered the dead man's children .
40022025	Now , there were seven brothers who used to live here . The oldest got married and died without having children , so he left his widow to his brother .
40022026	The same thing happened to the second brother , to the third , and finally to all seven .
40022027	Last of all , the woman died .
40022028	Now , on the day when the dead rise to life , whose wife will she be ? All of them had married her . ”

40022033	When the crowds heard this , they were amazed at his teaching .

40022035	and one of them , a teacher of the Law , tried to trap him with a question .

40022038	This is the greatest and the most important commandment .
40022039	The second most important commandment is like it : ‘ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’
40022040	The whole Law of Moses and the teachings of the prophets depend on these two commandments . ”
40022041	When some Pharisees gathered together , Jesus asked them ,

40023001	Then Jesus spoke to the crowds and to his disciples .
40023002	“ The teachers of the Law and the Pharisees are the authorized interpreters of Moses' Law .
40023003	So you must obey and follow everything they tell you to do ; do not , however , imitate their actions , because they don't practice what they preach .
40023004	They tie onto people's backs loads that are heavy and hard to carry , yet they aren't willing even to lift a finger to help them carry those loads .
40023005	They do everything so that people will see them . Look at the straps with scripture verses on them which they wear on their foreheads and arms , and notice how large they are ! Notice also how long are the tassels on their cloaks !
40023006	They love the best places at feasts and the reserved seats in the synagogues ;

40023013	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the Law and Pharisees ! You hypocrites ! You lock the door to the Kingdom of heaven in people's faces , but you yourselves don't go in , nor do you allow in those who are trying to enter !

40023017	Blind fools ! Which is more important , the gold or the Temple which makes the gold holy ?
40023018	You also teach , ‘ If someone swears by the altar , he isn't bound by his vow ; but if he swears by the gift on the altar , he is bound . ’
40023019	How blind you are ! Which is the more important , the gift or the altar which makes the gift holy ?
40023020	So then , when a person swears by the altar , he is swearing by it and by all the gifts on it ;
40023021	and when he swears by the Temple , he is swearing by it and by God , who lives there ;
40023022	and when someone swears by heaven , he is swearing by God's throne and by him who sits on it .
40023023	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the Law and Pharisees ! You hypocrites ! You give to God one tenth even of the seasoning herbs , such as mint , dill , and cumin , but you neglect to obey the really important teachings of the Law , such as justice and mercy and honesty . 40023024	Blind guides ! You strain a fly out of your drink , but swallow a camel !
40023025	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the Law and Pharisees ! You hypocrites ! You clean the outside of your cup and plate , while the inside is full of what you have gotten by violence and selfishness .

40023027	“ How terrible for you , teachers of the Law and Pharisees ! You hypocrites ! You are like whitewashed tombs , which look fine on the outside but are full of bones and decaying corpses on the inside .

40023030	and you claim that if you had lived during the time of your ancestors , you would not have done what they did and killed the prophets .
40023031	So you actually admit that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets !
40023032	Go on , then , and finish up what your ancestors started !
40023033	You snakes and children of snakes ! How do you expect to escape from being condemned to hell ?
40023034	And so I tell you that I will send you prophets and wise men and teachers ; you will kill some of them , crucify others , and whip others in the synagogues and chase them from town to town .
40023035	As a result , the punishment for the murder of all innocent people will fall on you , from the murder of innocent Abel to the murder of Zechariah son of Berechiah , whom you murdered between the Temple and the altar .

40023038	And so your Temple will be abandoned and empty .

40026045	Then he returned to the disciples and said , “ Are you still sleeping and resting ? Look ! The hour has come for the Son of Man to be handed over to the power of sinners .
40026046	Get up , let us go . Look , here is the man who is betraying me ! ”
40026047	Jesus was still speaking when Judas , one of the twelve disciples , arrived . With him was a large crowd armed with swords and clubs and sent by the chief priests and the elders .
40026048	The traitor had given the crowd a signal : “ The man I kiss is the one you want . Arrest him ! ”
40026049	Judas went straight to Jesus and said , “ Peace be with you , Teacher , ” and kissed him .
40026050	Jesus answered , “ Be quick about it , friend ! ” Then they came up , arrested Jesus , and held him tight .
40026051	One of those who were with Jesus drew his sword and struck at the High Priest's slave , cutting off his ear .
40026052	“ Put your sword back in its place , ” Jesus said to him . “ All who take the sword will die by the sword .
40026053	Don't you know that I could call on my Father for help , and at once he would send me more than twelve armies of angels ?
40026054	But in that case , how could the Scriptures come true which say that this is what must happen ? ”
40026055	Then Jesus spoke to the crowd , “ Did you have to come with swords and clubs to capture me , as though I were an outlaw ? Every day I sat down and taught in the Temple , and you did not arrest me .
40026056	But all this has happened in order to make come true what the prophets wrote in the Scriptures . ” Then all the disciples left him and ran away .
40026057	Those who had arrested Jesus took him to the house of Caiaphas , the High Priest , where the teachers of the Law and the elders had gathered together .
40026058	Peter followed from a distance , as far as the courtyard of the High Priest's house . He went into the courtyard and sat down with the guards to see how it would all come out .
40026059	The chief priests and the whole Council tried to find some false evidence against Jesus to put him to death ;
40026060	but they could not find any , even though many people came forward and told lies about him . Finally two men stepped up
40026061	and said , “ This man said , ‘ I am able to tear down God's Temple and three days later build it back up . ’ ”
40026062	The High Priest stood up and said to Jesus , “ Have you no answer to give to this accusation against you ? ”
40026063	But Jesus kept quiet . Again the High Priest spoke to him , “ In the name of the living God I now put you under oath : tell us if you are the Messiah , the Son of God . ”
40026064	Jesus answered him , “ So you say . But I tell all of you : from this time on you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right side of the Almighty and coming on the clouds of heaven ! ”
40026065	At this the High Priest tore his clothes and said , “ Blasphemy ! We don't need any more witnesses ! You have just heard his blasphemy !
40026066	What do you think ? ” They answered , “ He is guilty and must die . ”
40026067	Then they spat in his face and beat him ; and those who slapped him
40026068	said , “ Prophesy for us , Messiah ! Guess who hit you ! ”
40026069	Peter was sitting outside in the courtyard when one of the High Priest's servant women came to him and said , “ You , too , were with Jesus of Galilee . ”
40026070	But he denied it in front of them all . “ I don't know what you are talking about , ” he answered ,
40026071	and went on out to the entrance of the courtyard . Another servant woman saw him and said to the men there , “ He was with Jesus of Nazareth . ”
40026072	Again Peter denied it and answered , “ I swear that I don't know that man ! ”
40026073	After a little while the men standing there came to Peter . “ Of course you are one of them , ” they said . “ After all , the way you speak gives you away ! ”
40026074	Then Peter said , “ I swear that I am telling the truth ! May God punish me if I am not ! I do not know that man ! ” Just then a rooster crowed ,
40026075	and Peter remembered what Jesus had told him : “ Before the rooster crows , you will say three times that you do not know me . ” He went out and wept bitterly .
40027001	Early in the morning all the chief priests and the elders made their plans against Jesus to put him to death .
40027002	They put him in chains , led him off , and handed him over to Pilate , the Roman governor .
40027003	When Judas , the traitor , learned that Jesus had been condemned , he repented and took back the thirty silver coins to the chief priests and the elders .
40027004	“ I have sinned by betraying an innocent man to death ! ” he said . “ What do we care about that ? ” they answered . “ That is your business ! ”
40027005	Judas threw the coins down in the Temple and left ; then he went off and hanged himself .
40027006	The chief priests picked up the coins and said , “ This is blood money , and it is against our Law to put it in the Temple treasury . ”
40027007	After reaching an agreement about it , they used the money to buy Potter's Field , as a cemetery for foreigners .
40027008	That is why that field is called “ Field of Blood ” to this very day .
40027009	Then what the prophet Jeremiah had said came true : “ They took the thirty silver coins , the amount the people of Israel had agreed to pay for him ,
40027010	and used the money to buy the potter's field , as the Lord had commanded me . ”
40027011	Jesus stood before the Roman governor , who questioned him . “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” he asked . “ So you say , ” answered Jesus .
40027012	But he said nothing in response to the accusations of the chief priests and elders .
40027013	So Pilate said to him , “ Don't you hear all these things they accuse you of ? ”
40027014	But Jesus refused to answer a single word , with the result that the Governor was greatly surprised .
40027015	At every Passover Festival the Roman governor was in the habit of setting free any one prisoner the crowd asked for .
40027016	At that time there was a well-known prisoner named Jesus Barabbas .
40027017	So when the crowd gathered , Pilate asked them , “ Which one do you want me to set free for you ? Jesus Barabbas or Jesus called the Messiah ? ”
40027018	He knew very well that the Jewish authorities had handed Jesus over to him because they were jealous .
40027019	While Pilate was sitting in the judgment hall , his wife sent him a message : “ Have nothing to do with that innocent man , because in a dream last night I suffered much on account of him . ”
40027020	The chief priests and the elders persuaded the crowd to ask Pilate to set Barabbas free and have Jesus put to death .
40027021	But Pilate asked the crowd , “ Which one of these two do you want me to set free for you ? ” “ Barabbas ! ” they answered .
40027022	“ What , then , shall I do with Jesus called the Messiah ? ” Pilate asked them . “ Crucify him ! ” they all answered .
40027023	But Pilate asked , “ What crime has he committed ? ” Then they started shouting at the top of their voices : “ Crucify him ! ”
40027024	When Pilate saw that it was no use to go on , but that a riot might break out , he took some water , washed his hands in front of the crowd , and said , “ I am not responsible for the death of this man ! This is your doing ! ”
40027025	The whole crowd answered , “ Let the responsibility for his death fall on us and on our children ! ”
40027026	Then Pilate set Barabbas free for them ; and after he had Jesus whipped , he handed him over to be crucified .
40027027	Then Pilate's soldiers took Jesus into the governor's palace , and the whole company gathered around him .
40027028	They stripped off his clothes and put a scarlet robe on him .
40027029	Then they made a crown out of thorny branches and placed it on his head , and put a stick in his right hand ; then they knelt before him and made fun of him . “ Long live the King of the Jews ! ” they said .
40027030	They spat on him , and took the stick and hit him over the head .
40027031	When they had finished making fun of him , they took the robe off and put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him out to crucify him .
40027032	As they were going out , they met a man from Cyrene named Simon , and the soldiers forced him to carry Jesus' cross .
40027033	They came to a place called Golgotha , which means , “ The Place of the Skull . ”
40027034	There they offered Jesus wine mixed with a bitter substance ; but after tasting it , he would not drink it .
40027035	They crucified him and then divided his clothes among them by throwing dice .
40027036	After that they sat there and watched him .
40027037	Above his head they put the written notice of the accusation against him : “ This is Jesus , the King of the Jews . ”
40027038	Then they crucified two bandits with Jesus , one on his right and the other on his left .
40027039	People passing by shook their heads and hurled insults at Jesus :
40027040	“ You were going to tear down the Temple and build it back up in three days ! Save yourself if you are God's Son ! Come on down from the cross ! ”
40027041	In the same way the chief priests and the teachers of the Law and the elders made fun of him :
40027042	“ He saved others , but he cannot save himself ! Isn't he the king of Israel ? If he will come down off the cross now , we will believe in him !
40027043	He trusts in God and claims to be God's Son . Well , then , let us see if God wants to save him now ! ”
40027044	Even the bandits who had been crucified with him insulted him in the same way .
40027045	At noon the whole country was covered with darkness , which lasted for three hours .
40027046	At about three o'clock Jesus cried out with a loud shout , “ Eli , Eli , lema sabachthani ? ” which means , “ My God , my God , why did you abandon me ? ”
40027047	Some of the people standing there heard him and said , “ He is calling for Elijah ! ”
40027048	One of them ran up at once , took a sponge , soaked it in cheap wine , put it on the end of a stick , and tried to make him drink it .
40027049	But the others said , “ Wait , let us see if Elijah is coming to save him ! ”
40027050	Jesus again gave a loud cry and breathed his last .
40027051	Then the curtain hanging in the Temple was torn in two from top to bottom . The earth shook , the rocks split apart ,
40027052	the graves broke open , and many of God's people who had died were raised to life .
40027053	They left the graves , and after Jesus rose from death , they went into the Holy City , where many people saw them .
40027054	When the army officer and the soldiers with him who were watching Jesus saw the earthquake and everything else that happened , they were terrified and said , “ He really was the Son of God ! ”
40027055	There were many women there , looking on from a distance , who had followed Jesus from Galilee and helped him .
40027056	Among them were Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James and Joseph , and the wife of Zebedee .
40027057	When it was evening , a rich man from Arimathea arrived ; his name was Joseph , and he also was a disciple of Jesus .
40027058	He went into the presence of Pilate and asked for the body of Jesus . Pilate gave orders for the body to be given to Joseph .
40027059	So Joseph took it , wrapped it in a new linen sheet ,
40027060	and placed it in his own tomb , which he had just recently dug out of solid rock . Then he rolled a large stone across the entrance to the tomb and went away .
40027061	Mary Magdalene and the other Mary were sitting there , facing the tomb .
40027062	The next day , which was a Sabbath , the chief priests and the Pharisees met with Pilate
40027063	and said , “ Sir , we remember that while that liar was still alive he said , ‘ I will be raised to life three days later . ’
40027064	Give orders , then , for his tomb to be carefully guarded until the third day , so that his disciples will not be able to go and steal the body , and then tell the people that he was raised from death . This last lie would be even worse than the first one . ”
40027065	“ Take a guard , ” Pilate told them ; “ go and make the tomb as secure as you can . ”
40027066	So they left and made the tomb secure by putting a seal on the stone and leaving the guard on watch .
40028001	After the Sabbath , as Sunday morning was dawning , Mary Magdalene and the other Mary went to look at the tomb .
40028002	Suddenly there was a violent earthquake ; an angel of the Lord came down from heaven , rolled the stone away , and sat on it .
40028003	His appearance was like lightning , and his clothes were white as snow .
40028004	The guards were so afraid that they trembled and became like dead men .
40028005	The angel spoke to the women . “ You must not be afraid , ” he said . “ I know you are looking for Jesus , who was crucified .
40028006	He is not here ; he has been raised , just as he said . Come here and see the place where he was lying .

40028008	So they left the tomb in a hurry , afraid and yet filled with joy , and ran to tell his disciples .
40028009	Suddenly Jesus met them and said , “ Peace be with you . ” They came up to him , took hold of his feet , and worshiped him .
40028010	“ Do not be afraid , ” Jesus said to them . “ Go and tell my brothers to go to Galilee , and there they will see me . ”
40028011	While the women went on their way , some of the soldiers guarding the tomb went back to the city and told the chief priests everything that had happened .

40028015	The guards took the money and did what they were told to do . And so that is the report spread around by the Jews to this very day .

40028020	and teach them to obey everything I have commanded you . And I will be with you always , to the end of the age . ”
41001001	This is the Good News about Jesus Christ , the Son of God .
41001002	It began as the prophet Isaiah had written : “ God said , ‘ I will send my messenger ahead of you to open the way for you . ’
41001003	Someone is shouting in the desert , ‘ Get the road ready for the Lord ; make a straight path for him to travel ! ’ ”
41001004	So John appeared in the desert , baptizing and preaching . “ Turn away from your sins and be baptized , ” he told the people , “ and God will forgive your sins . ”
41001005	Many people from the province of Judea and the city of Jerusalem went out to hear John . They confessed their sins , and he baptized them in the Jordan River .
41001006	John wore clothes made of camel's hair , with a leather belt around his waist , and his food was locusts and wild honey .
41001007	He announced to the people , “ The man who will come after me is much greater than I am . I am not good enough even to bend down and untie his sandals .

41001026	The evil spirit shook the man hard , gave a loud scream , and came out of him .
41001027	The people were all so amazed that they started saying to one another , “ What is this ? Is it some kind of new teaching ? This man has authority to give orders to the evil spirits , and they obey him ! ”
41001028	And so the news about Jesus spread quickly everywhere in the province of Galilee .
41001029	Jesus and his disciples , including James and John , left the synagogue and went straight to the home of Simon and Andrew .
41001030	Simon's mother-in-law was sick in bed with a fever , and as soon as Jesus arrived , he was told about her .
41001031	He went to her , took her by the hand , and helped her up . The fever left her , and she began to wait on them .
41001032	After the sun had set and evening had come , people brought to Jesus all the sick and those who had demons .
41001033	All the people of the town gathered in front of the house .
41001034	Jesus healed many who were sick with all kinds of diseases and drove out many demons . He would not let the demons say anything , because they knew who he was .

41001036	But Simon and his companions went out searching for him ,

41001039	So he traveled all over Galilee , preaching in the synagogues and driving out demons .
41001040	A man suffering from a dreaded skin disease came to Jesus , knelt down , and begged him for help . “ If you want to , ” he said , “ you can make me clean . ”
41001041	Jesus was filled with pity , and reached out and touched him . “ I do want to , ” he answered . “ Be clean ! ”
41001042	At once the disease left the man , and he was clean .
41001043	Then Jesus spoke sternly to him and sent him away at once ,
41001044	after saying to him , “ Listen , don't tell anyone about this . But go straight to the priest and let him examine you ; then in order to prove to everyone that you are cured , offer the sacrifice that Moses ordered . ”
41001045	But the man went away and began to spread the news everywhere . Indeed , he talked so much that Jesus could not go into a town publicly . Instead , he stayed out in lonely places , and people came to him from everywhere .
41002001	A few days later Jesus went back to Capernaum , and the news spread that he was at home .
41002002	So many people came together that there was no room left , not even out in front of the door . Jesus was preaching the message to them
41002003	when four men arrived , carrying a paralyzed man to Jesus .
41002004	Because of the crowd , however , they could not get the man to him . So they made a hole in the roof right above the place where Jesus was . When they had made an opening , they let the man down , lying on his mat .
41002005	Seeing how much faith they had , Jesus said to the paralyzed man , “ My son , your sins are forgiven . ”
41002006	Some teachers of the Law who were sitting there thought to themselves ,
41002007	“ How does he dare talk like this ? This is blasphemy ! God is the only one who can forgive sins ! ”
41002008	At once Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he said to them , “ Why do you think such things ?
41002009	Is it easier to say to this paralyzed man , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up , pick up your mat , and walk ’ ?
41002010	I will prove to you , then , that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” So he said to the paralyzed man ,
41002011	“ I tell you , get up , pick up your mat , and go home ! ”
41002012	While they all watched , the man got up , picked up his mat , and hurried away . They were all completely amazed and praised God , saying , “ We have never seen anything like this ! ”
41002013	Jesus went back again to the shore of Lake Galilee . A crowd came to him , and he started teaching them .

41002016	Some teachers of the Law , who were Pharisees , saw that Jesus was eating with these outcasts and tax collectors , so they asked his disciples , “ Why does he eat with such people ? ”
41002017	Jesus heard them and answered , “ People who are well do not need a doctor , but only those who are sick . I have not come to call respectable people , but outcasts . ”
41002018	On one occasion the followers of John the Baptist and the Pharisees were fasting . Some people came to Jesus and asked him , “ Why is it that the disciples of John the Baptist and the disciples of the Pharisees fast , but yours do not ? ”
41002019	Jesus answered , “ Do you expect the guests at a wedding party to go without food ? Of course not ! As long as the bridegroom is with them , they will not do that .
41002020	But the day will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast .
41002021	“ No one uses a piece of new cloth to patch up an old coat , because the new patch will shrink and tear off some of the old cloth , making an even bigger hole .
41002022	Nor does anyone pour new wine into used wineskins , because the wine will burst the skins , and both the wine and the skins will be ruined . Instead , new wine must be poured into fresh wineskins . ”
41002023	Jesus was walking through some wheat fields on a Sabbath . As his disciples walked along with him , they began to pick the heads of wheat .

41002026	so he went into the house of God and ate the bread offered to God . This happened when Abiathar was the High Priest . According to our Law only the priests may eat this bread—but David ate it and even gave it to his men . ”
41002027	And Jesus concluded , “ The Sabbath was made for the good of human beings ; they were not made for the Sabbath .

41003001	Then Jesus went back to the synagogue , where there was a man who had a paralyzed hand .

41003025	If a family divides itself into groups which fight each other , that family will fall apart .
41003026	So if Satan's kingdom divides into groups , it cannot last , but will fall apart and come to an end .
41003027	“ No one can break into a strong man's house and take away his belongings unless he first ties up the strong man ; then he can plunder his house .

41003029	But whoever says evil things against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven , because he has committed an eternal sin . ” (

41003033	Jesus answered , “ Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? ”
