41004001	Again Jesus began to teach beside Lake Galilee . The crowd that gathered around him was so large that he got into a boat and sat in it . The boat was out in the water , and the crowd stood on the shore at the water's edge .
41004002	He used parables to teach them many things , saying to them :
41004003	“ Listen ! Once there was a man who went out to sow grain .
41004004	As he scattered the seed in the field , some of it fell along the path , and the birds came and ate it up .
41004005	Some of it fell on rocky ground , where there was little soil . The seeds soon sprouted , because the soil wasn't deep .
41004006	Then , when the sun came up , it burned the young plants ; and because the roots had not grown deep enough , the plants soon dried up .
41004007	Some of the seed fell among thorn bushes , which grew up and choked the plants , and they didn't bear grain .
41004008	But some seeds fell in good soil , and the plants sprouted , grew , and bore grain : some had thirty grains , others sixty , and others one hundred . ”
41004009	And Jesus concluded , “ Listen , then , if you have ears ! ”
41004010	When Jesus was alone , some of those who had heard him came to him with the twelve disciples and asked him to explain the parables .
41004011	“ You have been given the secret of the Kingdom of God , ” Jesus answered . “ But the others , who are on the outside , hear all things by means of parables ,
41004012	so that , ‘ They may look and look , yet not see ; they may listen and listen , yet not understand . For if they did , they would turn to God , and he would forgive them . ’ ”
41004013	Then Jesus asked them , “ Don't you understand this parable ? How , then , will you ever understand any parable ?
41004014	The sower sows God's message .
41004015	Some people are like the seeds that fall along the path ; as soon as they hear the message , Satan comes and takes it away .
41004016	Other people are like the seeds that fall on rocky ground . As soon as they hear the message , they receive it gladly .
41004017	But it does not sink deep into them , and they don't last long . So when trouble or persecution comes because of the message , they give up at once .
41004018	Other people are like the seeds sown among the thorn bushes . These are the ones who hear the message ,
41004019	but the worries about this life , the love for riches , and all other kinds of desires crowd in and choke the message , and they don't bear fruit .
41004020	But other people are like seeds sown in good soil . They hear the message , accept it , and bear fruit : some thirty , some sixty , and some one hundred . ”
41004021	Jesus continued , “ Does anyone ever bring in a lamp and put it under a bowl or under the bed ? Isn't it put on the lampstand ?
41004022	Whatever is hidden away will be brought out into the open , and whatever is covered up will be uncovered .
41004023	Listen , then , if you have ears ! ”
41004024	He also said to them , “ Pay attention to what you hear ! The same rules you use to judge others will be used by God to judge you—but with even greater severity .
41004025	Those who have something will be given more , and those who have nothing will have taken away from them even the little they have . ”
41004026	Jesus went on to say , “ The Kingdom of God is like this . A man scatters seed in his field .
41004027	He sleeps at night , is up and about during the day , and all the while the seeds are sprouting and growing . Yet he does not know how it happens .
41004028	The soil itself makes the plants grow and bear fruit ; first the tender stalk appears , then the head , and finally the head full of grain .
41004029	When the grain is ripe , the man starts cutting it with his sickle , because harvest time has come .
41004030	“ What shall we say the Kingdom of God is like ? ” asked Jesus . “ What parable shall we use to explain it ?
41004031	It is like this . A man takes a mustard seed , the smallest seed in the world , and plants it in the ground .
41004032	After a while it grows up and becomes the biggest of all plants . It puts out such large branches that the birds come and make their nests in its shade . ”
41004033	Jesus preached his message to the people , using many other parables like these ; he told them as much as they could understand .
41004034	He would not speak to them without using parables , but when he was alone with his disciples , he would explain everything to them .
41004035	On the evening of that same day Jesus said to his disciples , “ Let us go across to the other side of the lake . ”
41004036	So they left the crowd ; the disciples got into the boat in which Jesus was already sitting , and they took him with them . Other boats were there too .
41004037	Suddenly a strong wind blew up , and the waves began to spill over into the boat , so that it was about to fill with water .
41004038	Jesus was in the back of the boat , sleeping with his head on a pillow . The disciples woke him up and said , “ Teacher , don't you care that we are about to die ? ”
41004039	Jesus stood up and commanded the wind , “ Be quiet ! ” and he said to the waves , “ Be still ! ” The wind died down , and there was a great calm .
41004040	Then Jesus said to his disciples , “ Why are you frightened ? Do you still have no faith ? ”
41004041	But they were terribly afraid and began to say to one another , “ Who is this man ? Even the wind and the waves obey him ! ”
41005001	Jesus and his disciples arrived on the other side of Lake Galilee , in the territory of Gerasa .
41005002	As soon as Jesus got out of the boat , he was met by a man who came out of the burial caves there . This man had an evil spirit in him
41005003	and lived among the tombs . Nobody could keep him tied with chains any more ;
41005004	many times his feet and his hands had been tied , but every time he broke the chains and smashed the irons on his feet . He was too strong for anyone to control him .
41005005	Day and night he wandered among the tombs and through the hills , screaming and cutting himself with stones .
41005006	He was some distance away when he saw Jesus ; so he ran , fell on his knees before him ,
41005007	and screamed in a loud voice , “ Jesus , Son of the Most High God ! What do you want with me ? For God's sake , I beg you , don't punish me ! ” (
41005008	He said this because Jesus was saying , “ Evil spirit , come out of this man ! ” )
41005009	So Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” The man answered , “ My name is ‘ Mob ’ —there are so many of us ! ”
41005010	And he kept begging Jesus not to send the evil spirits out of that region .
41005011	There was a large herd of pigs near by , feeding on a hillside .
41005012	So the spirits begged Jesus , “ Send us to the pigs , and let us go into them . ”
41005013	He let them go , and the evil spirits went out of the man and entered the pigs . The whole herd—about two thousand pigs in all—rushed down the side of the cliff into the lake and was drowned .
41005014	The men who had been taking care of the pigs ran away and spread the news in the town and among the farms . People went out to see what had happened ,
41005015	and when they came to Jesus , they saw the man who used to have the mob of demons in him . He was sitting there , clothed and in his right mind ; and they were all afraid .
41005016	Those who had seen it told the people what had happened to the man with the demons , and about the pigs .
41005017	So they asked Jesus to leave their territory .
41005018	As Jesus was getting into the boat , the man who had had the demons begged him , “ Let me go with you ! ”
41005019	But Jesus would not let him . Instead , he told him , “ Go back home to your family and tell them how much the Lord has done for you and how kind he has been to you . ”
41005020	So the man left and went all through the Ten Towns , telling what Jesus had done for him . And all who heard it were amazed .
41005021	Jesus went back across to the other side of the lake . There at the lakeside a large crowd gathered around him .
41005022	Jairus , an official of the local synagogue , arrived , and when he saw Jesus , he threw himself down at his feet
41005023	and begged him earnestly , “ My little daughter is very sick . Please come and place your hands on her , so that she will get well and live ! ”
41005024	Then Jesus started off with him . So many people were going along with Jesus that they were crowding him from every side .
41005025	There was a woman who had suffered terribly from severe bleeding for twelve years ,
41005026	even though she had been treated by many doctors . She had spent all her money , but instead of getting better she got worse all the time .
41005027	She had heard about Jesus , so she came in the crowd behind him ,
41005028	saying to herself , “ If I just touch his clothes , I will get well . ”
41005029	She touched his cloak , and her bleeding stopped at once ; and she had the feeling inside herself that she was healed of her trouble .
41005030	At once Jesus knew that power had gone out of him , so he turned around in the crowd and asked , “ Who touched my clothes ? ”
41005031	His disciples answered , “ You see how the people are crowding you ; why do you ask who touched you ? ”
41005032	But Jesus kept looking around to see who had done it .
41005033	The woman realized what had happened to her , so she came , trembling with fear , knelt at his feet , and told him the whole truth .
41005034	Jesus said to her , “ My daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace , and be healed of your trouble . ”
41005035	While Jesus was saying this , some messengers came from Jairus' house and told him , “ Your daughter has died . Why bother the Teacher any longer ? ”
41005036	Jesus paid no attention to what they said , but told him , “ Don't be afraid , only believe . ”
41005037	Then he did not let anyone else go on with him except Peter and James and his brother John .
41005038	They arrived at Jairus' house , where Jesus saw the confusion and heard all the loud crying and wailing .
41005039	He went in and said to them , “ Why all this confusion ? Why are you crying ? The child is not dead—she is only sleeping ! ”
41005040	They started making fun of him , so he put them all out , took the child's father and mother and his three disciples , and went into the room where the child was lying .
41005041	He took her by the hand and said to her , “ Talitha , koum , ” which means , “ Little girl , I tell you to get up ! ”
41005042	She got up at once and started walking around . ( She was twelve years old . ) When this happened , they were completely amazed .
41005043	But Jesus gave them strict orders not to tell anyone , and he said , “ Give her something to eat . ”
41006001	Jesus left that place and went back to his hometown , followed by his disciples .
41006002	On the Sabbath he began to teach in the synagogue . Many people were there ; and when they heard him , they were all amazed . “ Where did he get all this ? ” they asked . “ What wisdom is this that has been given him ? How does he perform miracles ?
41006003	Isn't he the carpenter , the son of Mary , and the brother of James , Joseph , Judas , and Simon ? Aren't his sisters living here ? ” And so they rejected him .
41006004	Jesus said to them , “ Prophets are respected everywhere except in their own hometown and by their relatives and their family . ”
41006005	He was not able to perform any miracles there , except that he placed his hands on a few sick people and healed them .
41006006	He was greatly surprised , because the people did not have faith . Then Jesus went to the villages around there , teaching the people .
41006007	He called the twelve disciples together and sent them out two by two . He gave them authority over the evil spirits
41006008	and ordered them , “ Don't take anything with you on the trip except a walking stick—no bread , no beggar's bag , no money in your pockets .
41006009	Wear sandals , but don't carry an extra shirt . ”
41006010	He also told them , “ Wherever you are welcomed , stay in the same house until you leave that place .
41006011	If you come to a town where people do not welcome you or will not listen to you , leave it and shake the dust off your feet . That will be a warning to them ! ”
41006012	So they went out and preached that people should turn away from their sins .
41006013	They drove out many demons , and rubbed olive oil on many sick people and healed them .
41006014	Now King Herod heard about all this , because Jesus' reputation had spread everywhere . Some people were saying , “ John the Baptist has come back to life ! That is why he has this power to perform miracles . ”
41006015	Others , however , said , “ He is Elijah . ” Others said , “ He is a prophet , like one of the prophets of long ago . ”
41006016	When Herod heard it , he said , “ He is John the Baptist ! I had his head cut off , but he has come back to life ! ”
41006017	Herod himself had ordered John's arrest , and he had him tied up and put in prison . Herod did this because of Herodias , whom he had married , even though she was the wife of his brother Philip .
41006018	John the Baptist kept telling Herod , “ It isn't right for you to marry your brother's wife ! ”
41006019	So Herodias held a grudge against John and wanted to kill him , but she could not because of Herod .
41006020	Herod was afraid of John because he knew that John was a good and holy man , and so he kept him safe . He liked to listen to him , even though he became greatly disturbed every time he heard him .
41006021	Finally Herodias got her chance . It was on Herod's birthday , when he gave a feast for all the top government officials , the military chiefs , and the leading citizens of Galilee .
41006022	The daughter of Herodias came in and danced , and pleased Herod and his guests . So the king said to the girl , “ What would you like to have ? I will give you anything you want . ”
41006023	With many vows he said to her , “ I swear that I will give you anything you ask for , even as much as half my kingdom ! ”
41006024	So the girl went out and asked her mother , “ What shall I ask for ? ” “ The head of John the Baptist , ” she answered .
41006025	The girl hurried back at once to the king and demanded , “ I want you to give me here and now the head of John the Baptist on a plate ! ”
41006026	This made the king very sad , but he could not refuse her because of the vows he had made in front of all his guests .
41006027	So he sent off a guard at once with orders to bring John's head . The guard left , went to the prison , and cut John's head off ;
41006028	then he brought it on a plate and gave it to the girl , who gave it to her mother .
41006029	When John's disciples heard about this , they came and got his body , and buried it .
41006030	The apostles returned and met with Jesus , and told him all they had done and taught .
41006031	There were so many people coming and going that Jesus and his disciples didn't even have time to eat . So he said to them , “ Let us go off by ourselves to some place where we will be alone and you can rest a while . ”
41006032	So they started out in a boat by themselves to a lonely place .
41006033	Many people , however , saw them leave and knew at once who they were ; so they went from all the towns and ran ahead by land and arrived at the place ahead of Jesus and his disciples .
41006034	When Jesus got out of the boat , he saw this large crowd , and his heart was filled with pity for them , because they were like sheep without a shepherd . So he began to teach them many things .
41006035	When it was getting late , his disciples came to him and said , “ It is already very late , and this is a lonely place .
41006036	Send the people away , and let them go to the nearby farms and villages in order to buy themselves something to eat . ”
41006037	“ You yourselves give them something to eat , ” Jesus answered . They asked , “ Do you want us to go and spend two hundred silver coins on bread in order to feed them ? ”
41006038	So Jesus asked them , “ How much bread do you have ? Go and see . ” When they found out , they told him , “ Five loaves and also two fish . ”
41006039	Jesus then told his disciples to make all the people divide into groups and sit down on the green grass .
41006040	So the people sat down in rows , in groups of a hundred and groups of fifty .
41006041	Then Jesus took the five loaves and the two fish , looked up to heaven , and gave thanks to God . He broke the loaves and gave them to his disciples to distribute to the people . He also divided the two fish among them all .
41006042	Everyone ate and had enough .
41006043	Then the disciples took up twelve baskets full of what was left of the bread and the fish .
41006044	The number of men who were fed was five thousand .
41006045	At once Jesus made his disciples get into the boat and go ahead of him to Bethsaida , on the other side of the lake , while he sent the crowd away .
41006046	After saying good-bye to the people , he went away to a hill to pray .
41006047	When evening came , the boat was in the middle of the lake , while Jesus was alone on land .
41006048	He saw that his disciples were straining at the oars , because they were rowing against the wind ; so sometime between three and six o'clock in the morning , he came to them , walking on the water . He was going to pass them by ,
41006049	but they saw him walking on the water . “ It's a ghost ! ” they thought , and screamed .
41006050	They were all terrified when they saw him . Jesus spoke to them at once , “ Courage ! ” he said . “ It is I . Don't be afraid ! ”
41006051	Then he got into the boat with them , and the wind died down . The disciples were completely amazed ,
41006052	because they had not understood the real meaning of the feeding of the five thousand ; their minds could not grasp it .
41006053	They crossed the lake and came to land at Gennesaret , where they tied up the boat .
41006054	As they left the boat , people recognized Jesus at once .
41006055	So they ran throughout the whole region ; and wherever they heard he was , they brought to him the sick lying on their mats .
41006056	And everywhere Jesus went , to villages , towns , or farms , people would take their sick to the marketplaces and beg him to let the sick at least touch the edge of his cloak . And all who touched it were made well .
41007001	Some Pharisees and teachers of the Law who had come from Jerusalem gathered around Jesus .
41007002	They noticed that some of his disciples were eating their food with hands that were ritually unclean—that is , they had not washed them in the way the Pharisees said people should . (
41007003	For the Pharisees , as well as the rest of the Jews , follow the teaching they received from their ancestors : they do not eat unless they wash their hands in the proper way ;
41007004	nor do they eat anything that comes from the market unless they wash it first . And they follow many other rules which they have received , such as the proper way to wash cups , pots , copper bowls , and beds . )
41007005	So the Pharisees and the teachers of the Law asked Jesus , “ Why is it that your disciples do not follow the teaching handed down by our ancestors , but instead eat with ritually unclean hands ? ”
41007006	Jesus answered them , “ How right Isaiah was when he prophesied about you ! You are hypocrites , just as he wrote : ‘ These people , says God , honor me with their words , but their heart is really far away from me .
41007007	It is no use for them to worship me , because they teach human rules as though they were my laws ! ’
41007008	“ You put aside God's command and obey human teachings . ”
41007009	And Jesus continued , “ You have a clever way of rejecting God's law in order to uphold your own teaching .
41007010	For Moses commanded , ‘ Respect your father and your mother , ’ and , ‘ If you curse your father or your mother , you are to be put to death . ’
41007011	But you teach that if people have something they could use to help their father or mother , but say , ‘ This is Corban ’ ( which means , it belongs to God ) ,
41007012	they are excused from helping their father or mother .
41007013	In this way the teaching you pass on to others cancels out the word of God . And there are many other things like this that you do . ”
41007014	Then Jesus called the crowd to him once more and said to them , “ Listen to me , all of you , and understand .
41007015	There is nothing that goes into you from the outside which can make you ritually unclean . Rather , it is what comes out of you that makes you unclean . ”
41007017	When he left the crowd and went into the house , his disciples asked him to explain this saying .
41007018	“ You are no more intelligent than the others , ” Jesus said to them . “ Don't you understand ? Nothing that goes into you from the outside can really make you unclean ,
41007019	because it does not go into your heart but into your stomach and then goes on out of the body . ” ( In saying this , Jesus declared that all foods are fit to be eaten . )
41007020	And he went on to say , “ It is what comes out of you that makes you unclean .
41007021	For from the inside , from your heart , come the evil ideas which lead you to do immoral things , to rob , kill ,
41007022	commit adultery , be greedy , and do all sorts of evil things ; deceit , indecency , jealousy , slander , pride , and folly—
41007023	all these evil things come from inside you and make you unclean . ”
41007024	Then Jesus left and went away to the territory near the city of Tyre . He went into a house and did not want anyone to know he was there , but he could not stay hidden .
41007025	A woman , whose daughter had an evil spirit in her , heard about Jesus and came to him at once and fell at his feet .
41007026	The woman was a Gentile , born in the region of Phoenicia in Syria . She begged Jesus to drive the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	But Jesus answered , “ Let us first feed the children . It isn't right to take the children's food and throw it to the dogs . ”
41007028	“ Sir , ” she answered , “ even the dogs under the table eat the children's leftovers ! ”
41007029	So Jesus said to her , “ Because of that answer , go back home , where you will find that the demon has gone out of your daughter ! ”
41007030	She went home and found her child lying on the bed ; the demon had indeed gone out of her .
41007031	Jesus then left the neighborhood of Tyre and went on through Sidon to Lake Galilee , going by way of the territory of the Ten Towns .
41007032	Some people brought him a man who was deaf and could hardly speak , and they begged Jesus to place his hands on him .
41007033	So Jesus took him off alone , away from the crowd , put his fingers in the man's ears , spat , and touched the man's tongue .
41007034	Then Jesus looked up to heaven , gave a deep groan , and said to the man , “ Ephphatha , ” which means , “ Open up ! ”
41007035	At once the man was able to hear , his speech impediment was removed , and he began to talk without any trouble .
41007036	Then Jesus ordered the people not to speak of it to anyone ; but the more he ordered them not to , the more they told it .
41007037	And all who heard were completely amazed . “ How well he does everything ! ” they exclaimed . “ He even causes the deaf to hear and the dumb to speak ! ”
41008001	Not long afterward another large crowd came together . When the people had nothing left to eat , Jesus called the disciples to him and said ,
41008002	“ I feel sorry for these people , because they have been with me for three days and now have nothing to eat .
41008003	If I send them home without feeding them , they will faint as they go , because some of them have come a long way . ”
41008004	His disciples asked him , “ Where in this desert can anyone find enough food to feed all these people ? ”
41008005	“ How much bread do you have ? ” Jesus asked . “ Seven loaves , ” they answered .
41008006	He ordered the crowd to sit down on the ground . Then he took the seven loaves , gave thanks to God , broke them , and gave them to his disciples to distribute to the crowd ; and the disciples did so .
41008007	They also had a few small fish . Jesus gave thanks for these and told the disciples to distribute them too .
41008010	and at once got into a boat with his disciples and went to the district of Dalmanutha .
41008011	Some Pharisees came to Jesus and started to argue with him . They wanted to trap him , so they asked him to perform a miracle to show that God approved of him .
41008012	But Jesus gave a deep groan and said , “ Why do the people of this day ask for a miracle ? No , I tell you ! No such proof will be given to these people ! ”
41008013	He left them , got back into the boat , and started across to the other side of the lake .
41008014	The disciples had forgotten to bring enough bread and had only one loaf with them in the boat .
41008015	“ Take care , ” Jesus warned them , “ and be on your guard against the yeast of the Pharisees and the yeast of Herod . ”
41008016	They started discussing among themselves : “ He says this because we don't have any bread . ”
41008017	Jesus knew what they were saying , so he asked them , “ Why are you discussing about not having any bread ? Don't you know or understand yet ? Are your minds so dull ?
41008018	You have eyes—can't you see ? You have ears—can't you hear ? Don't you remember
41008019	when I broke the five loaves for the five thousand people ? How many baskets full of leftover pieces did you take up ? ” “ Twelve , ” they answered .
41008020	“ And when I broke the seven loaves for the four thousand people , ” asked Jesus , “ how many baskets full of leftover pieces did you take up ? ” “ Seven , ” they answered .
41008021	“ And you still don't understand ? ” he asked them .
41008022	They came to Bethsaida , where some people brought a blind man to Jesus and begged him to touch him .
41008023	Jesus took the blind man by the hand and led him out of the village . After spitting on the man's eyes , Jesus placed his hands on him and asked him , “ Can you see anything ? ”
41008024	The man looked up and said , “ Yes , I can see people , but they look like trees walking around . ”
41008025	Jesus again placed his hands on the man's eyes . This time the man looked intently , his eyesight returned , and he saw everything clearly .
41008026	Jesus then sent him home with the order , “ Don't go back into the village . ”
41008027	Then Jesus and his disciples went away to the villages near Caesarea Philippi . On the way he asked them , “ Tell me , who do people say I am ? ”
41008028	“ Some say that you are John the Baptist , ” they answered ; “ others say that you are Elijah , while others say that you are one of the prophets . ”
41008029	“ What about you ? ” he asked them . “ Who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are the Messiah . ”
41008030	Then Jesus ordered them , “ Do not tell anyone about me . ”
41008031	Then Jesus began to teach his disciples : “ The Son of Man must suffer much and be rejected by the elders , the chief priests , and the teachers of the Law . He will be put to death , but three days later he will rise to life . ”
41008032	He made this very clear to them . So Peter took him aside and began to rebuke him .
41008033	But Jesus turned around , looked at his disciples , and rebuked Peter . “ Get away from me , Satan , ” he said . “ Your thoughts don't come from God but from human nature ! ”
41008034	Then Jesus called the crowd and his disciples to him . “ If any of you want to come with me , ” he told them , “ you must forget yourself , carry your cross , and follow me .
41008035	For if you want to save your own life , you will lose it ; but if you lose your life for me and for the gospel , you will save it .
41008036	Do you gain anything if you win the whole world but lose your life ? Of course not !
41008037	There is nothing you can give to regain your life .
41008038	If you are ashamed of me and of my teaching in this godless and wicked day , then the Son of Man will be ashamed of you when he comes in the glory of his Father with the holy angels . ”
41009001	And he went on to say , “ I tell you , there are some here who will not die until they have seen the Kingdom of God come with power . ”
41009002	Six days later Jesus took with him Peter , James , and John , and led them up a high mountain , where they were alone . As they looked on , a change came over Jesus ,
41009003	and his clothes became shining white—whiter than anyone in the world could wash them .
41009004	Then the three disciples saw Elijah and Moses talking with Jesus .
41009005	Peter spoke up and said to Jesus , “ Teacher , how good it is that we are here ! We will make three tents , one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	He and the others were so frightened that he did not know what to say .
41009007	Then a cloud appeared and covered them with its shadow , and a voice came from the cloud , “ This is my own dear Son—listen to him ! ”
41009008	They took a quick look around but did not see anyone else ; only Jesus was with them .
41009009	As they came down the mountain , Jesus ordered them , “ Don't tell anyone what you have seen , until the Son of Man has risen from death . ”
41009010	They obeyed his order , but among themselves they started discussing the matter , “ What does this ‘ rising from death ’ mean ? ”
41009011	And they asked Jesus , “ Why do the teachers of the Law say that Elijah has to come first ? ”
41009012	His answer was , “ Elijah is indeed coming first in order to get everything ready . Yet why do the Scriptures say that the Son of Man will suffer much and be rejected ?
41009013	I tell you , however , that Elijah has already come and that people treated him just as they pleased , as the Scriptures say about him . ”
41009014	When they joined the rest of the disciples , they saw a large crowd around them and some teachers of the Law arguing with them .
41009015	When the people saw Jesus , they were greatly surprised , and ran to him and greeted him .
41009016	Jesus asked his disciples , “ What are you arguing with them about ? ”
41009017	A man in the crowd answered , “ Teacher , I brought my son to you , because he has an evil spirit in him and cannot talk .
41009018	Whenever the spirit attacks him , it throws him to the ground , and he foams at the mouth , grits his teeth , and becomes stiff all over . I asked your disciples to drive the spirit out , but they could not . ”
41009019	Jesus said to them , “ How unbelieving you people are ! How long must I stay with you ? How long do I have to put up with you ? Bring the boy to me ! ”
41009020	They brought him to Jesus . As soon as the spirit saw Jesus , it threw the boy into a fit , so that he fell on the ground and rolled around , foaming at the mouth .
41009021	“ How long has he been like this ? ” Jesus asked the father . “ Ever since he was a child , ” he replied .
41009022	“ Many times the evil spirit has tried to kill him by throwing him in the fire and into water . Have pity on us and help us , if you possibly can ! ”
41009023	“ Yes , ” said Jesus , “ if you yourself can ! Everything is possible for the person who has faith . ”
41009024	The father at once cried out , “ I do have faith , but not enough . Help me have more ! ”
41009025	Jesus noticed that the crowd was closing in on them , so he gave a command to the evil spirit . “ Deaf and dumb spirit , ” he said , “ I order you to come out of the boy and never go into him again ! ”
41009026	The spirit screamed , threw the boy into a bad fit , and came out . The boy looked like a corpse , and everyone said , “ He is dead ! ”
41009027	But Jesus took the boy by the hand and helped him rise , and he stood up .
41009028	After Jesus had gone indoors , his disciples asked him privately , “ Why couldn't we drive the spirit out ? ”
41009029	“ Only prayer can drive this kind out , ” answered Jesus ; “ nothing else can . ”
41009030	Jesus and his disciples left that place and went on through Galilee . Jesus did not want anyone to know where he was ,
41009031	because he was teaching his disciples : “ The Son of Man will be handed over to those who will kill him . Three days later , however , he will rise to life . ”
41009032	But they did not understand what this teaching meant , and they were afraid to ask him .
41009033	They came to Capernaum , and after going indoors Jesus asked his disciples , “ What were you arguing about on the road ? ”
41009034	But they would not answer him , because on the road they had been arguing among themselves about who was the greatest .
41009035	Jesus sat down , called the twelve disciples , and said to them , “ Whoever wants to be first must place himself last of all and be the servant of all . ”
41009036	Then he took a child and had him stand in front of them . He put his arms around him and said to them ,
41009037	“ Whoever welcomes in my name one of these children , welcomes me ; and whoever welcomes me , welcomes not only me but also the one who sent me . ”
41009038	John said to him , “ Teacher , we saw a man who was driving out demons in your name , and we told him to stop , because he doesn't belong to our group . ”
41009039	“ Do not try to stop him , ” Jesus told them , “ because no one who performs a miracle in my name will be able soon afterward to say evil things about me .
41009040	For whoever is not against us is for us .
41009041	I assure you that anyone who gives you a drink of water because you belong to me will certainly receive a reward .
41009042	“ If anyone should cause one of these little ones to lose faith in me , it would be better for that person to have a large millstone tied around the neck and be thrown into the sea .
41009043	So if your hand makes you lose your faith , cut it off ! It is better for you to enter life without a hand than to keep both hands and go off to hell , to the fire that never goes out .
41009045	And if your foot makes you lose your faith , cut it off ! It is better for you to enter life without a foot than to keep both feet and be thrown into hell .
41009047	And if your eye makes you lose your faith , take it out ! It is better for you to enter the Kingdom of God with only one eye than to keep both eyes and be thrown into hell .
41009048	There ‘ the worms that eat them never die , and the fire that burns them is never put out . ’
41009049	“ Everyone will be purified by fire as a sacrifice is purified by salt .
41009050	“ Salt is good ; but if it loses its saltiness , how can you make it salty again ? “ Have the salt of friendship among yourselves , and live in peace with one another . ”
41010001	Then Jesus left that place , went to the province of Judea , and crossed the Jordan River . Crowds came flocking to him again , and he taught them , as he always did .
41010002	Some Pharisees came to him and tried to trap him . “ Tell us , ” they asked , “ does our Law allow a man to divorce his wife ? ”
41010003	Jesus answered with a question , “ What law did Moses give you ? ”
41010004	Their answer was , “ Moses gave permission for a man to write a divorce notice and send his wife away . ”
41010005	Jesus said to them , “ Moses wrote this law for you because you are so hard to teach .
41010006	But in the beginning , at the time of creation , ‘ God made them male and female , ’ as the scripture says .
41010007	‘ And for this reason a man will leave his father and mother and unite with his wife ,
41010008	and the two will become one . ’ So they are no longer two , but one .
41010009	No human being must separate , then , what God has joined together . ”
41010010	When they went back into the house , the disciples asked Jesus about this matter .
41010011	He said to them , “ A man who divorces his wife and marries another woman commits adultery against his wife .
41010012	In the same way , a woman who divorces her husband and marries another man commits adultery . ”
41010013	Some people brought children to Jesus for him to place his hands on them , but the disciples scolded the people .
41010014	When Jesus noticed this , he was angry and said to his disciples , “ Let the children come to me , and do not stop them , because the Kingdom of God belongs to such as these .
41010015	I assure you that whoever does not receive the Kingdom of God like a child will never enter it . ”
41010016	Then he took the children in his arms , placed his hands on each of them , and blessed them .
41010017	As Jesus was starting on his way again , a man ran up , knelt before him , and asked him , “ Good Teacher , what must I do to receive eternal life ? ”
41010018	“ Why do you call me good ? ” Jesus asked him . “ No one is good except God alone .
41010019	You know the commandments : ‘ Do not commit murder ; do not commit adultery ; do not steal ; do not accuse anyone falsely ; do not cheat ; respect your father and your mother . ’ ”
41010020	“ Teacher , ” the man said , “ ever since I was young , I have obeyed all these commandments . ”
41010021	Jesus looked straight at him with love and said , “ You need only one thing . Go and sell all you have and give the money to the poor , and you will have riches in heaven ; then come and follow me . ”
41010022	When the man heard this , gloom spread over his face , and he went away sad , because he was very rich .
41010023	Jesus looked around at his disciples and said to them , “ How hard it will be for rich people to enter the Kingdom of God ! ”
41010024	The disciples were shocked at these words , but Jesus went on to say , “ My children , how hard it is to enter the Kingdom of God !
41010025	It is much harder for a rich person to enter the Kingdom of God than for a camel to go through the eye of a needle . ”
41010026	At this the disciples were completely amazed and asked one another , “ Who , then , can be saved ? ”
41010027	Jesus looked straight at them and answered , “ This is impossible for human beings but not for God ; everything is possible for God . ”
41010028	Then Peter spoke up , “ Look , we have left everything and followed you . ”
41010029	“ Yes , ” Jesus said to them , “ and I tell you that those who leave home or brothers or sisters or mother or father or children or fields for me and for the gospel ,
41010030	will receive much more in this present age . They will receive a hundred times more houses , brothers , sisters , mothers , children , and fields—and persecutions as well ; and in the age to come they will receive eternal life .
41010031	But many who are now first will be last , and many who are now last will be first . ”
41010032	Jesus and his disciples were now on the road going up to Jerusalem . Jesus was going ahead of the disciples , who were filled with alarm ; the people who followed behind were afraid . Once again Jesus took the twelve disciples aside and spoke of the things that were going to happen to him .
41010033	“ Listen , ” he told them , “ we are going up to Jerusalem where the Son of Man will be handed over to the chief priests and the teachers of the Law . They will condemn him to death and then hand him over to the Gentiles ,
41010034	who will make fun of him , spit on him , whip him , and kill him ; but three days later he will rise to life . ”
41010035	Then James and John , the sons of Zebedee , came to Jesus . “ Teacher , ” they said , “ there is something we want you to do for us . ”
41010036	“ What is it ? ” Jesus asked them .
41010037	They answered , “ When you sit on your throne in your glorious Kingdom , we want you to let us sit with you , one at your right and one at your left . ”
41010038	Jesus said to them , “ You don't know what you are asking for . Can you drink the cup of suffering that I must drink ? Can you be baptized in the way I must be baptized ? ”
41010039	“ We can , ” they answered . Jesus said to them , “ You will indeed drink the cup I must drink and be baptized in the way I must be baptized .
41010040	But I do not have the right to choose who will sit at my right and my left . It is God who will give these places to those for whom he has prepared them . ”
41010041	When the other ten disciples heard about it , they became angry with James and John .
41010042	So Jesus called them all together to him and said , “ You know that those who are considered rulers of the heathen have power over them , and the leaders have complete authority .
41010043	This , however , is not the way it is among you . If one of you wants to be great , you must be the servant of the rest ;
41010044	and if one of you wants to be first , you must be the slave of all .
41010045	For even the Son of Man did not come to be served ; he came to serve and to give his life to redeem many people . ”
41010046	They came to Jericho , and as Jesus was leaving with his disciples and a large crowd , a blind beggar named Bartimaeus son of Timaeus was sitting by the road .
41010047	When he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to shout , “ Jesus ! Son of David ! Have mercy on me ! ”
41010048	Many of the people scolded him and told him to be quiet . But he shouted even more loudly , “ Son of David , have mercy on me ! ”
41010049	Jesus stopped and said , “ Call him . ” So they called the blind man . “ Cheer up ! ” they said . “ Get up , he is calling you . ”
41010050	So he threw off his cloak , jumped up , and came to Jesus .
41010051	“ What do you want me to do for you ? ” Jesus asked him . “ Teacher , ” the blind man answered , “ I want to see again . ”
41010052	“ Go , ” Jesus told him , “ your faith has made you well . ” At once he was able to see and followed Jesus on the road .
41011001	As they approached Jerusalem , near the towns of Bethphage and Bethany , they came to the Mount of Olives . Jesus sent two of his disciples on ahead
41011002	with these instructions : “ Go to the village there ahead of you . As soon as you get there , you will find a colt tied up that has never been ridden . Untie it and bring it here .
41011003	And if someone asks you why you are doing that , say that the Master needs it and will send it back at once . ”
41011004	So they went and found a colt out in the street , tied to the door of a house . As they were untying it ,
41011005	some of the bystanders asked them , “ What are you doing , untying that colt ? ”
41011006	They answered just as Jesus had told them , and the crowd let them go .
41011007	They brought the colt to Jesus , threw their cloaks over the animal , and Jesus got on .
41011008	Many people spread their cloaks on the road , while others cut branches in the field and spread them on the road .
41011009	The people who were in front and those who followed behind began to shout , “ Praise God ! God bless him who comes in the name of the Lord !
41011010	God bless the coming kingdom of King David , our father ! Praise be to God ! ”
41011011	Jesus entered Jerusalem , went into the Temple , and looked around at everything . But since it was already late in the day , he went out to Bethany with the twelve disciples .
41011012	The next day , as they were coming back from Bethany , Jesus was hungry .
41011013	He saw in the distance a fig tree covered with leaves , so he went to see if he could find any figs on it . But when he came to it , he found only leaves , because it was not the right time for figs .
41011014	Jesus said to the fig tree , “ No one shall ever eat figs from you again ! ” And his disciples heard him .
41011015	When they arrived in Jerusalem , Jesus went to the Temple and began to drive out all those who were buying and selling . He overturned the tables of the moneychangers and the stools of those who sold pigeons ,
41011016	and he would not let anyone carry anything through the Temple courtyards .
41011017	He then taught the people : “ It is written in the Scriptures that God said , ‘ My Temple will be called a house of prayer for the people of all nations . ’ But you have turned it into a hideout for thieves ! ”
41011018	The chief priests and the teachers of the Law heard of this , so they began looking for some way to kill Jesus . They were afraid of him , because the whole crowd was amazed at his teaching .
41011019	When evening came , Jesus and his disciples left the city .
41011020	Early next morning , as they walked along the road , they saw the fig tree . It was dead all the way down to its roots .
41011021	Peter remembered what had happened and said to Jesus , “ Look , Teacher , the fig tree you cursed has died ! ”
41011022	Jesus answered them , “ Have faith in God .
41011023	I assure you that whoever tells this hill to get up and throw itself in the sea and does not doubt in his heart , but believes that what he says will happen , it will be done for him .
41011024	For this reason I tell you : When you pray and ask for something , believe that you have received it , and you will be given whatever you ask for .
41011025	And when you stand and pray , forgive anything you may have against anyone , so that your Father in heaven will forgive the wrongs you have done . ”
41011027	They arrived once again in Jerusalem . As Jesus was walking in the Temple , the chief priests , the teachers of the Law , and the elders came to him
41011028	and asked him , “ What right do you have to do these things ? Who gave you such right ? ”
41011029	Jesus answered them , “ I will ask you just one question , and if you give me an answer , I will tell you what right I have to do these things .
41011030	Tell me , where did John's right to baptize come from : was it from God or from human beings ? ”
41011031	They started to argue among themselves : “ What shall we say ? If we answer , ‘ From God , ’ he will say , ‘ Why , then , did you not believe John ? ’
41011032	But if we say , ‘ From human beings … ’ ” ( They were afraid of the people , because everyone was convinced that John had been a prophet . )
41011033	So their answer to Jesus was , “ We don't know . ” Jesus said to them , “ Neither will I tell you , then , by what right I do these things . ”
41012001	Then Jesus spoke to them in parables : “ Once there was a man who planted a vineyard , put a fence around it , dug a hole for the wine press , and built a watchtower . Then he rented the vineyard to tenants and left home on a trip .
41012002	When the time came to gather the grapes , he sent a slave to the tenants to receive from them his share of the harvest .
41012003	The tenants grabbed the slave , beat him , and sent him back without a thing .
41012004	Then the owner sent another slave ; the tenants beat him over the head and treated him shamefully .
41012005	The owner sent another slave , and they killed him ; and they treated many others the same way , beating some and killing others .
41012006	The only one left to send was the man's own dear son . Last of all , then , he sent his son to the tenants . ‘ I am sure they will respect my son , ’ he said .
41012007	But those tenants said to one another , ‘ This is the owner's son . Come on , let's kill him , and his property will be ours ! ’
41012008	So they grabbed the son and killed him and threw his body out of the vineyard .
41012009	“ What , then , will the owner of the vineyard do ? ” asked Jesus . “ He will come and kill those tenants and turn the vineyard over to others .
41012010	Surely you have read this scripture ? ‘ The stone which the builders rejected as worthless turned out to be the most important of all .
41012011	This was done by the Lord ; what a wonderful sight it is ! ’ ”
41012012	The Jewish leaders tried to arrest Jesus , because they knew that he had told this parable against them . But they were afraid of the crowd , so they left him and went away .
41012013	Some Pharisees and some members of Herod's party were sent to Jesus to trap him with questions .
41012014	They came to him and said , “ Teacher , we know that you tell the truth , without worrying about what people think . You pay no attention to anyone's status , but teach the truth about God's will for people . Tell us , is it against our Law to pay taxes to the Roman Emperor ? Should we pay them or not ? ”
41012015	But Jesus saw through their trick and answered , “ Why are you trying to trap me ? Bring a silver coin , and let me see it . ”
41012016	They brought him one , and he asked , “ Whose face and name are these ? ” “ The Emperor's , ” they answered .
41012017	So Jesus said , “ Well , then , pay to the Emperor what belongs to the Emperor , and pay to God what belongs to God . ” And they were amazed at Jesus .
41012018	Then some Sadducees , who say that people will not rise from death , came to Jesus and said ,
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses wrote this law for us : ‘ If a man dies and leaves a wife but no children , that man's brother must marry the widow so that they can have children who will be considered the dead man's children . ’
41012020	Once there were seven brothers ; the oldest got married and died without having children .
41012021	Then the second one married the woman , and he also died without having children . The same thing happened to the third brother ,
41012022	and then to the rest : all seven brothers married the woman and died without having children . Last of all , the woman died .
41012023	Now , when all the dead rise to life on the day of resurrection , whose wife will she be ? All seven of them had married her . ”
41012024	Jesus answered them , “ How wrong you are ! And do you know why ? It is because you don't know the Scriptures or God's power .
41012025	For when the dead rise to life , they will be like the angels in heaven and will not marry .
41012026	Now , as for the dead being raised : haven't you ever read in the Book of Moses the passage about the burning bush ? There it is written that God said to Moses , ‘ I am the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . ’
41012027	He is the God of the living , not of the dead . You are completely wrong ! ”
41012028	A teacher of the Law was there who heard the discussion . He saw that Jesus had given the Sadducees a good answer , so he came to him with a question : “ Which commandment is the most important of all ? ”
41012029	Jesus replied , “ The most important one is this : ‘ Listen , Israel ! The Lord our God is the only Lord .
41012030	Love the Lord your God with all your heart , with all your soul , with all your mind , and with all your strength . ’
41012031	The second most important commandment is this : ‘ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’ There is no other commandment more important than these two . ”
41012032	The teacher of the Law said to Jesus , “ Well done , Teacher ! It is true , as you say , that only the Lord is God and that there is no other god but he .
41012033	And you must love God with all your heart and with all your mind and with all your strength ; and you must love your neighbor as you love yourself . It is more important to obey these two commandments than to offer on the altar animals and other sacrifices to God . ”
41012034	Jesus noticed how wise his answer was , and so he told him , “ You are not far from the Kingdom of God . ” After this nobody dared to ask Jesus any more questions .
41012035	As Jesus was teaching in the Temple , he asked the question , “ How can the teachers of the Law say that the Messiah will be the descendant of David ?
41012036	The Holy Spirit inspired David to say : ‘ The Lord said to my Lord : Sit here at my right side until I put your enemies under your feet . ’ A large crowd was listening to Jesus gladly .
41012038	As he taught them , he said , “ Watch out for the teachers of the Law , who like to walk around in their long robes and be greeted with respect in the marketplace ,
41012039	who choose the reserved seats in the synagogues and the best places at feasts .
41012040	They take advantage of widows and rob them of their homes , and then make a show of saying long prayers . Their punishment will be all the worse ! ”
41012041	As Jesus sat near the Temple treasury , he watched the people as they dropped in their money . Many rich men dropped in a lot of money ;
41012042	then a poor widow came along and dropped in two little copper coins , worth about a penny .
41012043	He called his disciples together and said to them , “ I tell you that this poor widow put more in the offering box than all the others .
41012044	For the others put in what they had to spare of their riches ; but she , poor as she is , put in all she had—she gave all she had to live on . ”
41013001	As Jesus was leaving the Temple , one of his disciples said , “ Look , Teacher ! What wonderful stones and buildings ! ”
41013002	Jesus answered , “ You see these great buildings ? Not a single stone here will be left in its place ; every one of them will be thrown down . ”
41013003	Jesus was sitting on the Mount of Olives , across from the Temple , when Peter , James , John , and Andrew came to him in private .
41013004	“ Tell us when this will be , ” they said , “ and tell us what will happen to show that the time has come for all these things to take place . ”
41013005	Jesus said to them , “ Watch out , and don't let anyone fool you .
41013006	Many men , claiming to speak for me , will come and say , ‘ I am he ! ’ and they will fool many people .
41013007	And don't be troubled when you hear the noise of battles close by and news of battles far away . Such things must happen , but they do not mean that the end has come .
41013008	Countries will fight each other ; kingdoms will attack one another . There will be earthquakes everywhere , and there will be famines . These things are like the first pains of childbirth .
41013009	“ You yourselves must watch out . You will be arrested and taken to court . You will be beaten in the synagogues ; you will stand before rulers and kings for my sake to tell them the Good News .
41013010	But before the end comes , the gospel must be preached to all peoples .
41013011	And when you are arrested and taken to court , do not worry ahead of time about what you are going to say ; when the time comes , say whatever is then given to you . For the words you speak will not be yours ; they will come from the Holy Spirit .
41013012	Men will hand over their own brothers to be put to death , and fathers will do the same to their children . Children will turn against their parents and have them put to death .
41013013	Everyone will hate you because of me . But whoever holds out to the end will be saved .
41013014	“ You will see ‘ The Awful Horror ’ standing in the place where he should not be . ” ( Note to the reader : understand what this means ! ) “ Then those who are in Judea must run away to the hills .
41013015	Someone who is on the roof of a house must not lose time by going down into the house to get anything to take along .
41013016	Someone who is in the field must not go back to the house for a cloak .
41013017	How terrible it will be in those days for women who are pregnant and for mothers with little babies !
41013018	Pray to God that these things will not happen in the winter !
41013019	For the trouble of those days will be far worse than any the world has ever known from the very beginning when God created the world until the present time . Nor will there ever be anything like it again .
41013020	But the Lord has reduced the number of those days ; if he had not , nobody would survive . For the sake of his chosen people , however , he has reduced those days .
41013021	“ Then , if anyone says to you , ‘ Look , here is the Messiah ! ’ or , ‘ Look , there he is ! ’ —do not believe it .
41013022	For false Messiahs and false prophets will appear . They will perform miracles and wonders in order to deceive even God's chosen people , if possible .
41013023	Be on your guard ! I have told you everything ahead of time .
41013024	“ In the days after that time of trouble the sun will grow dark , the moon will no longer shine ,
41013025	the stars will fall from heaven , and the powers in space will be driven from their courses .
41013026	Then the Son of Man will appear , coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
41013027	He will send the angels out to the four corners of the earth to gather God's chosen people from one end of the world to the other .
41013028	“ Let the fig tree teach you a lesson . When its branches become green and tender and it starts putting out leaves , you know that summer is near .
41013029	In the same way , when you see these things happening , you will know that the time is near , ready to begin .
41013030	Remember that all these things will happen before the people now living have all died .
41013031	Heaven and earth will pass away , but my words will never pass away .
41013032	“ No one knows , however , when that day or hour will come—neither the angels in heaven , nor the Son ; only the Father knows .
41013033	Be on watch , be alert , for you do not know when the time will come .
41013034	It will be like a man who goes away from home on a trip and leaves his servants in charge , after giving to each one his own work to do and after telling the doorkeeper to keep watch .
41013035	Watch , then , because you do not know when the master of the house is coming—it might be in the evening or at midnight or before dawn or at sunrise .
41013036	If he comes suddenly , he must not find you asleep .
41013037	What I say to you , then , I say to all : Watch ! ”
41014001	It was now two days before the Festival of Passover and Unleavened Bread . The chief priests and the teachers of the Law were looking for a way to arrest Jesus secretly and put him to death .
41014002	“ We must not do it during the festival , ” they said , “ or the people might riot . ”
41014003	Jesus was in Bethany at the house of Simon , a man who had suffered from a dreaded skin disease . While Jesus was eating , a woman came in with an alabaster jar full of a very expensive perfume made of pure nard . She broke the jar and poured the perfume on Jesus' head .
41014004	Some of the people there became angry and said to one another , “ What was the use of wasting the perfume ?
41014005	It could have been sold for more than three hundred silver coins and the money given to the poor ! ” And they criticized her harshly .
41014006	But Jesus said , “ Leave her alone ! Why are you bothering her ? She has done a fine and beautiful thing for me .

41014008	She did what she could ; she poured perfume on my body to prepare it ahead of time for burial .
41014009	Now , I assure you that wherever the gospel is preached all over the world , what she has done will be told in memory of her . ”
41014010	Then Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve disciples , went off to the chief priests in order to betray Jesus to them .

41014028	But after I am raised to life , I will go to Galilee ahead of you . ”

41014031	Peter answered even more strongly , “ I will never say that , even if I have to die with you ! ” And all the other disciples said the same thing .
41014032	They came to a place called Gethsemane , and Jesus said to his disciples , “ Sit here while I pray . ”
41014033	He took Peter , James , and John with him . Distress and anguish came over him ,
41014034	and he said to them , “ The sorrow in my heart is so great that it almost crushes me . Stay here and keep watch . ”
41014035	He went a little farther on , threw himself on the ground , and prayed that , if possible , he might not have to go through that time of suffering .
41014036	“ Father , ” he prayed , “ my Father ! All things are possible for you . Take this cup of suffering away from me . Yet not what I want , but what you want . ”
41014037	Then he returned and found the three disciples asleep . He said to Peter , “ Simon , are you asleep ? Weren't you able to stay awake for even one hour ? ”
41014038	And he said to them , “ Keep watch , and pray that you will not fall into temptation . The spirit is willing , but the flesh is weak . ”
41014039	He went away once more and prayed , saying the same words .
41014040	Then he came back to the disciples and found them asleep ; they could not keep their eyes open . And they did not know what to say to him .
41014041	When he came back the third time , he said to them , “ Are you still sleeping and resting ? Enough ! The hour has come ! Look , the Son of Man is now being handed over to the power of sinners .
41014042	Get up , let us go . Look , here is the man who is betraying me ! ”
41014043	Jesus was still speaking when Judas , one of the twelve disciples , arrived . With him was a crowd armed with swords and clubs and sent by the chief priests , the teachers of the Law , and the elders .
41014044	The traitor had given the crowd a signal : “ The man I kiss is the one you want . Arrest him and take him away under guard . ”
41014045	As soon as Judas arrived , he went up to Jesus and said , “ Teacher ! ” and kissed him .
41014046	So they arrested Jesus and held him tight .
41014047	But one of those standing there drew his sword and struck at the High Priest's slave , cutting off his ear .
41014048	Then Jesus spoke up and said to them , “ Did you have to come with swords and clubs to capture me , as though I were an outlaw ?
41014049	Day after day I was with you teaching in the Temple , and you did not arrest me . But the Scriptures must come true . ”
41014050	Then all the disciples left him and ran away .
41014051	A certain young man , dressed only in a linen cloth , was following Jesus . They tried to arrest him ,
41014052	but he ran away naked , leaving the cloth behind .
41014053	Then Jesus was taken to the High Priest's house , where all the chief priests , the elders , and the teachers of the Law were gathering .
41014054	Peter followed from a distance and went into the courtyard of the High Priest's house . There he sat down with the guards , keeping himself warm by the fire .
41014055	The chief priests and the whole Council tried to find some evidence against Jesus in order to put him to death , but they could not find any .
41014056	Many witnesses told lies against Jesus , but their stories did not agree .
41014057	Then some men stood up and told this lie against Jesus :
41014058	“ We heard him say , ‘ I will tear down this Temple which men have made , and after three days I will build one that is not made by men . ’ ”
41014059	Not even they , however , could make their stories agree .
41014060	The High Priest stood up in front of them all and questioned Jesus , “ Have you no answer to the accusation they bring against you ? ”
41014061	But Jesus kept quiet and would not say a word . Again the High Priest questioned him , “ Are you the Messiah , the Son of the Blessed God ? ”
41014062	“ I am , ” answered Jesus , “ and you will all see the Son of Man seated at the right side of the Almighty and coming with the clouds of heaven ! ”
41014063	The High Priest tore his robes and said , “ We don't need any more witnesses !
41014064	You heard his blasphemy . What is your decision ? ” They all voted against him : he was guilty and should be put to death .
41014065	Some of them began to spit on Jesus , and they blindfolded him and hit him . “ Guess who hit you ! ” they said . And the guards took him and slapped him .
41014066	Peter was still down in the courtyard when one of the High Priest's servant women came by .
41014067	When she saw Peter warming himself , she looked straight at him and said , “ You , too , were with Jesus of Nazareth . ”
41014068	But he denied it . “ I don't know … I don't understand what you are talking about , ” he answered , and went out into the passageway . Just then a rooster crowed .
41014069	The servant woman saw him there and began to repeat to the bystanders , “ He is one of them ! ”
41014070	But Peter denied it again . A little while later the bystanders accused Peter again , “ You can't deny that you are one of them , because you , too , are from Galilee . ”
41014071	Then Peter said , “ I swear that I am telling the truth ! May God punish me if I am not ! I do not know the man you are talking about ! ”
41014072	Just then a rooster crowed a second time , and Peter remembered how Jesus had said to him , “ Before the rooster crows two times , you will say three times that you do not know me . ” And he broke down and cried .
41015001	Early in the morning the chief priests met hurriedly with the elders , the teachers of the Law , and the whole Council , and made their plans . They put Jesus in chains , led him away , and handed him over to Pilate .
41015002	Pilate questioned him , “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” Jesus answered , “ So you say . ”
41015003	The chief priests were accusing Jesus of many things ,
41015004	so Pilate questioned him again , “ Aren't you going to answer ? Listen to all their accusations ! ”
41015005	Again Jesus refused to say a word , and Pilate was amazed .
41015006	At every Passover Festival Pilate was in the habit of setting free any one prisoner the people asked for .
41015007	At that time a man named Barabbas was in prison with the rebels who had committed murder in the riot .
41015008	When the crowd gathered and began to ask Pilate for the usual favor ,
41015009	he asked them , “ Do you want me to set free for you the king of the Jews ? ”
41015010	He knew very well that the chief priests had handed Jesus over to him because they were jealous .
41015011	But the chief priests stirred up the crowd to ask , instead , that Pilate set Barabbas free for them .
41015012	Pilate spoke again to the crowd , “ What , then , do you want me to do with the one you call the king of the Jews ? ”
41015013	They shouted back , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015014	“ But what crime has he committed ? ” Pilate asked . They shouted all the louder , “ Crucify him ! ”
41015015	Pilate wanted to please the crowd , so he set Barabbas free for them . Then he had Jesus whipped and handed him over to be crucified .
41015016	The soldiers took Jesus inside to the courtyard of the governor's palace and called together the rest of the company .
41015017	They put a purple robe on Jesus , made a crown out of thorny branches , and put it on his head .
41015018	Then they began to salute him : “ Long live the King of the Jews ! ”
41015019	They beat him over the head with a stick , spat on him , fell on their knees , and bowed down to him .
41015020	When they had finished making fun of him , they took off the purple robe and put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him out to crucify him .
41015021	On the way they met a man named Simon , who was coming into the city from the country , and the soldiers forced him to carry Jesus' cross . ( Simon was from Cyrene and was the father of Alexander and Rufus . )
41015022	They took Jesus to a place called Golgotha , which means “ The Place of the Skull . ”
41015023	There they tried to give him wine mixed with a drug called myrrh , but Jesus would not drink it .
41015024	Then they crucified him and divided his clothes among themselves , throwing dice to see who would get which piece of clothing .
41015025	It was nine o'clock in the morning when they crucified him .
41015026	The notice of the accusation against him said : “ The King of the Jews . ”
41015027	They also crucified two bandits with Jesus , one on his right and the other on his left .
41015029	People passing by shook their heads and hurled insults at Jesus : “ Aha ! You were going to tear down the Temple and build it back up in three days !
41015030	Now come down from the cross and save yourself ! ”
41015031	In the same way the chief priests and the teachers of the Law made fun of Jesus , saying to one another , “ He saved others , but he cannot save himself !
41015032	Let us see the Messiah , the king of Israel , come down from the cross now , and we will believe in him ! ” And the two who were crucified with Jesus insulted him also .
41015033	At noon the whole country was covered with darkness , which lasted for three hours .
41015034	At three o'clock Jesus cried out with a loud shout , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema sabachthani ? ” which means , “ My God , my God , why did you abandon me ? ”
41015035	Some of the people there heard him and said , “ Listen , he is calling for Elijah ! ”
41015036	One of them ran up with a sponge , soaked it in cheap wine , and put it on the end of a stick . Then he held it up to Jesus' lips and said , “ Wait ! Let us see if Elijah is coming to bring him down from the cross ! ”
41015037	With a loud cry Jesus died .
41015038	The curtain hanging in the Temple was torn in two , from top to bottom .
41015039	The army officer who was standing there in front of the cross saw how Jesus had died . “ This man was really the Son of God ! ” he said .
41015040	Some women were there , looking on from a distance . Among them were Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of the younger James and of Joseph , and Salome .
41015041	They had followed Jesus while he was in Galilee and had helped him . Many other women who had come to Jerusalem with him were there also .
41015044	Pilate was surprised to hear that Jesus was already dead . He called the army officer and asked him if Jesus had been dead a long time .
41015045	After hearing the officer's report , Pilate told Joseph he could have the body .
41015046	Joseph bought a linen sheet , took the body down , wrapped it in the sheet , and placed it in a tomb which had been dug out of solid rock . Then he rolled a large stone across the entrance to the tomb .
41015047	Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joseph were watching and saw where the body of Jesus was placed .
41016001	After the Sabbath was over , Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James , and Salome bought spices to go and anoint the body of Jesus .
41016002	Very early on Sunday morning , at sunrise , they went to the tomb .
41016005	So they entered the tomb , where they saw a young man sitting at the right , wearing a white robe—and they were alarmed .
41016006	“ Don't be alarmed , ” he said . “ I know you are looking for Jesus of Nazareth , who was crucified . He is not here—he has been raised ! Look , here is the place where he was placed .
41016007	Now go and give this message to his disciples , including Peter : ‘ He is going to Galilee ahead of you ; there you will see him , just as he told you . ’ ”
41016008	So they went out and ran from the tomb , distressed and terrified . They said nothing to anyone , because they were afraid . [
41016009	The women went to Peter and his friends and gave them a brief account of all they had been told .
41016010	After this , Jesus himself sent out through his disciples from the east to the west the sacred and everliving message of eternal salvation . ]

41016013	They returned and told the others , but these would not believe it .

41016018	if they pick up snakes or drink any poison , they will not be harmed ; they will place their hands on sick people , and these will get well . ”
