42001001	Dear Theophilus : Many people have done their best to write a report of the things that have taken place among us .
42001002	They wrote what we have been told by those who saw these things from the beginning and who proclaimed the message .
42001003	And so , Your Excellency , because I have carefully studied all these matters from their beginning , I thought it would be good to write an orderly account for you .
42001004	I do this so that you will know the full truth about everything which you have been taught .
42001005	During the time when Herod was king of Judea , there was a priest named Zechariah , who belonged to the priestly order of Abijah . His wife's name was Elizabeth ; she also belonged to a priestly family .
42001006	They both lived good lives in God's sight and obeyed fully all the Lord's laws and commands .
42001007	They had no children because Elizabeth could not have any , and she and Zechariah were both very old .
42001008	One day Zechariah was doing his work as a priest in the Temple , taking his turn in the daily service .
42001009	According to the custom followed by the priests , he was chosen by lot to burn incense on the altar . So he went into the Temple of the Lord ,
42001010	while the crowd of people outside prayed during the hour when the incense was burned .
42001011	An angel of the Lord appeared to him , standing at the right side of the altar where the incense was burned .
42001012	When Zechariah saw him , he was alarmed and felt afraid .
42001013	But the angel said to him , “ Don't be afraid , Zechariah ! God has heard your prayer , and your wife Elizabeth will bear you a son . You are to name him John .
42001014	How glad and happy you will be , and how happy many others will be when he is born !
42001015	John will be great in the Lord's sight . He must not drink any wine or strong drink . From his very birth he will be filled with the Holy Spirit ,
42001016	and he will bring back many of the people of Israel to the Lord their God .
42001017	He will go ahead of the Lord , strong and mighty like the prophet Elijah . He will bring fathers and children together again ; he will turn disobedient people back to the way of thinking of the righteous ; he will get the Lord's people ready for him . ”
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ How shall I know if this is so ? I am an old man , and my wife is old also . ”
42001019	“ I am Gabriel , ” the angel answered . “ I stand in the presence of God , who sent me to speak to you and tell you this good news .
42001020	But you have not believed my message , which will come true at the right time . Because you have not believed , you will be unable to speak ; you will remain silent until the day my promise to you comes true . ”
42001021	In the meantime the people were waiting for Zechariah and wondering why he was spending such a long time in the Temple .
42001022	When he came out , he could not speak to them , and so they knew that he had seen a vision in the Temple . Unable to say a word , he made signs to them with his hands .
42001023	When his period of service in the Temple was over , Zechariah went back home .
42001024	Some time later his wife Elizabeth became pregnant and did not leave the house for five months .
42001025	“ Now at last the Lord has helped me , ” she said . “ He has taken away my public disgrace ! ”
42001026	In the sixth month of Elizabeth's pregnancy God sent the angel Gabriel to a town in Galilee named Nazareth .
42001027	He had a message for a young woman promised in marriage to a man named Joseph , who was a descendant of King David . Her name was Mary .
42001028	The angel came to her and said , “ Peace be with you ! The Lord is with you and has greatly blessed you ! ”
42001029	Mary was deeply troubled by the angel's message , and she wondered what his words meant .
42001030	The angel said to her , “ Don't be afraid , Mary ; God has been gracious to you .
42001031	You will become pregnant and give birth to a son , and you will name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be great and will be called the Son of the Most High God . The Lord God will make him a king , as his ancestor David was ,
42001033	and he will be the king of the descendants of Jacob forever ; his kingdom will never end ! ”
42001034	Mary said to the angel , “ I am a virgin . How , then , can this be ? ”
42001035	The angel answered , “ The Holy Spirit will come on you , and God's power will rest upon you . For this reason the holy child will be called the Son of God .
42001036	Remember your relative Elizabeth . It is said that she cannot have children , but she herself is now six months pregnant , even though she is very old .
42001037	For there is nothing that God cannot do . ”
42001038	“ I am the Lord's servant , ” said Mary ; “ may it happen to me as you have said . ” And the angel left her .
42001039	Soon afterward Mary got ready and hurried off to a town in the hill country of Judea .
42001040	She went into Zechariah's house and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard Mary's greeting , the baby moved within her . Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit
42001042	and said in a loud voice , “ You are the most blessed of all women , and blessed is the child you will bear !
42001043	Why should this great thing happen to me , that my Lord's mother comes to visit me ?
42001044	For as soon as I heard your greeting , the baby within me jumped with gladness .
42001045	How happy you are to believe that the Lord's message to you will come true ! ”
42001046	Mary said , “ My heart praises the Lord ;
42001047	my soul is glad because of God my Savior ,
42001048	for he has remembered me , his lowly servant ! From now on all people will call me happy ,
42001049	because of the great things the Mighty God has done for me . His name is holy ;
42001050	from one generation to another he shows mercy to those who honor him .
42001051	He has stretched out his mighty arm and scattered the proud with all their plans .
42001052	He has brought down mighty kings from their thrones , and lifted up the lowly .
42001053	He has filled the hungry with good things , and sent the rich away with empty hands .
42001054	He has kept the promise he made to our ancestors , and has come to the help of his servant Israel .
42001055	He has remembered to show mercy to Abraham and to all his descendants forever ! ”
42001056	Mary stayed about three months with Elizabeth and then went back home .
42001057	The time came for Elizabeth to have her baby , and she gave birth to a son .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard how wonderfully good the Lord had been to her , and they all rejoiced with her .
42001059	When the baby was a week old , they came to circumcise him , and they were going to name him Zechariah , after his father .
42001060	But his mother said , “ No ! His name is to be John . ”
42001061	They said to her , “ But you don't have any relative with that name ! ”
42001062	Then they made signs to his father , asking him what name he would like the boy to have .
42001063	Zechariah asked for a writing pad and wrote , “ His name is John . ” How surprised they all were !
42001064	At that moment Zechariah was able to speak again , and he started praising God .
42001065	The neighbors were all filled with fear , and the news about these things spread through all the hill country of Judea .
42001066	Everyone who heard of it thought about it and asked , “ What is this child going to be ? ” For it was plain that the Lord's power was upon him .
42001067	John's father Zechariah was filled with the Holy Spirit , and he spoke God's message :
42001068	“ Let us praise the Lord , the God of Israel ! He has come to the help of his people and has set them free .
42001069	He has provided for us a mighty Savior , a descendant of his servant David .
42001070	He promised through his holy prophets long ago
42001071	that he would save us from our enemies , from the power of all those who hate us .
42001072	He said he would show mercy to our ancestors and remember his sacred covenant .
42001075	so that we might be holy and righteous before him all the days of our life .
42001076	“ You , my child , will be called a prophet of the Most High God . You will go ahead of the Lord to prepare his road for him ,
42001077	to tell his people that they will be saved by having their sins forgiven .
42001078	Our God is merciful and tender . He will cause the bright dawn of salvation to rise on us
42001079	and to shine from heaven on all those who live in the dark shadow of death , to guide our steps into the path of peace . ”
42001080	The child grew and developed in body and spirit . He lived in the desert until the day when he appeared publicly to the people of Israel .
42002001	At that time Emperor Augustus ordered a census to be taken throughout the Roman Empire .
42002002	When this first census took place , Quirinius was the governor of Syria .
42002003	Everyone , then , went to register himself , each to his own hometown .
42002004	Joseph went from the town of Nazareth in Galilee to the town of Bethlehem in Judea , the birthplace of King David . Joseph went there because he was a descendant of David .
42002005	He went to register with Mary , who was promised in marriage to him . She was pregnant ,
42002006	and while they were in Bethlehem , the time came for her to have her baby .
42002007	She gave birth to her first son , wrapped him in cloths and laid him in a manger—there was no room for them to stay in the inn .
42002008	There were some shepherds in that part of the country who were spending the night in the fields , taking care of their flocks .
42002009	An angel of the Lord appeared to them , and the glory of the Lord shone over them . They were terribly afraid ,
42002010	but the angel said to them , “ Don't be afraid ! I am here with good news for you , which will bring great joy to all the people .
42002011	This very day in David's town your Savior was born—Christ the Lord !
42002012	And this is what will prove it to you : you will find a baby wrapped in cloths and lying in a manger . ”
42002013	Suddenly a great army of heaven's angels appeared with the angel , singing praises to God :
42002014	“ Glory to God in the highest heaven , and peace on earth to those with whom he is pleased ! ”
42002015	When the angels went away from them back into heaven , the shepherds said to one another , “ Let's go to Bethlehem and see this thing that has happened , which the Lord has told us . ”
42002016	So they hurried off and found Mary and Joseph and saw the baby lying in the manger .
42002017	When the shepherds saw him , they told them what the angel had said about the child .
42002018	All who heard it were amazed at what the shepherds said .
42002019	Mary remembered all these things and thought deeply about them .
42002020	The shepherds went back , singing praises to God for all they had heard and seen ; it had been just as the angel had told them .
42002021	A week later , when the time came for the baby to be circumcised , he was named Jesus , the name which the angel had given him before he had been conceived .
42002022	The time came for Joseph and Mary to perform the ceremony of purification , as the Law of Moses commanded . So they took the child to Jerusalem to present him to the Lord ,

42002025	At that time there was a man named Simeon living in Jerusalem . He was a good , God-fearing man and was waiting for Israel to be saved . The Holy Spirit was with him
42002026	and had assured him that he would not die before he had seen the Lord's promised Messiah .

42002030	With my own eyes I have seen your salvation ,

42002038	That very same hour she arrived and gave thanks to God and spoke about the child to all who were waiting for God to set Jerusalem free .

42002047	All who heard him were amazed at his intelligent answers .
42002048	His parents were astonished when they saw him , and his mother said to him , “ Son , why have you done this to us ? Your father and I have been terribly worried trying to find you . ”
42002049	He answered them , “ Why did you have to look for me ? Didn't you know that I had to be in my Father's house ? ”
42002050	But they did not understand his answer .
42002051	So Jesus went back with them to Nazareth , where he was obedient to them . His mother treasured all these things in her heart .

42003001	It was the fifteenth year of the rule of Emperor Tiberius ; Pontius Pilate was governor of Judea , Herod was ruler of Galilee , and his brother Philip was ruler of the territory of Iturea and Trachonitis ; Lysanias was ruler of Abilene ,
42003002	and Annas and Caiaphas were High Priests . At that time the word of God came to John son of Zechariah in the desert .
