42003037	the son of Methuselah , the son of Enoch , the son of Jared , the son of Mahalaleel , the son of Kenan ,
42003038	the son of Enosh , the son of Seth , the son of Adam , the son of God .
42004001	Jesus returned from the Jordan full of the Holy Spirit and was led by the Spirit into the desert ,
42004002	where he was tempted by the Devil for forty days . In all that time he ate nothing , so that he was hungry when it was over .
42004003	The Devil said to him , “ If you are God's Son , order this stone to turn into bread . ”
42004004	But Jesus answered , “ The scripture says , ‘ Human beings cannot live on bread alone . ’ ”
42004005	Then the Devil took him up and showed him in a second all the kingdoms of the world .
42004006	“ I will give you all this power and all this wealth , ” the Devil told him . “ It has all been handed over to me , and I can give it to anyone I choose .
42004007	All this will be yours , then , if you worship me . ”
42004008	Jesus answered , “ The scripture says , ‘ Worship the Lord your God and serve only him ! ’ ”
42004009	Then the Devil took him to Jerusalem and set him on the highest point of the Temple , and said to him , “ If you are God's Son , throw yourself down from here .
42004010	For the scripture says , ‘ God will order his angels to take good care of you . ’
42004011	It also says , ‘ They will hold you up with their hands so that not even your feet will be hurt on the stones . ’ ”
42004012	But Jesus answered , “ The scripture says , ‘ Do not put the Lord your God to the test . ’ ”
42004013	When the Devil finished tempting Jesus in every way , he left him for a while .
42004014	Then Jesus returned to Galilee , and the power of the Holy Spirit was with him . The news about him spread throughout all that territory .
42004015	He taught in the synagogues and was praised by everyone .
42004016	Then Jesus went to Nazareth , where he had been brought up , and on the Sabbath he went as usual to the synagogue . He stood up to read the Scriptures
42004017	and was handed the book of the prophet Isaiah . He unrolled the scroll and found the place where it is written ,
42004018	“ The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he has chosen me to bring good news to the poor . He has sent me to proclaim liberty to the captives and recovery of sight to the blind , to set free the oppressed
42004019	and announce that the time has come when the Lord will save his people . ”
42004020	Jesus rolled up the scroll , gave it back to the attendant , and sat down . All the people in the synagogue had their eyes fixed on him ,
42004021	as he said to them , “ This passage of scripture has come true today , as you heard it being read . ”
42004022	They were all well impressed with him and marveled at the eloquent words that he spoke . They said , “ Isn't he the son of Joseph ? ”
42004023	He said to them , “ I am sure that you will quote this proverb to me , ‘ Doctor , heal yourself . ’ You will also tell me to do here in my hometown the same things you heard were done in Capernaum .
42004024	I tell you this , ” Jesus added , “ prophets are never welcomed in their hometown .
42004025	Listen to me : it is true that there were many widows in Israel during the time of Elijah , when there was no rain for three and a half years and a severe famine spread throughout the whole land .
42004026	Yet Elijah was not sent to anyone in Israel , but only to a widow living in Zarephath in the territory of Sidon .
42004027	And there were many people suffering from a dreaded skin disease who lived in Israel during the time of the prophet Elisha ; yet not one of them was healed , but only Naaman the Syrian . ”
42004028	When the people in the synagogue heard this , they were filled with anger .
42004029	They rose up , dragged Jesus out of town , and took him to the top of the hill on which their town was built . They meant to throw him over the cliff ,
42004030	but he walked through the middle of the crowd and went his way .
42004031	Then Jesus went to Capernaum , a town in Galilee , where he taught the people on the Sabbath .
42004032	They were all amazed at the way he taught , because he spoke with authority .
42004033	In the synagogue was a man who had the spirit of an evil demon in him ; he screamed out in a loud voice ,
42004034	“ Ah ! What do you want with us , Jesus of Nazareth ? Are you here to destroy us ? I know who you are : you are God's holy messenger ! ”
42004035	Jesus ordered the spirit , “ Be quiet and come out of the man ! ” The demon threw the man down in front of them and went out of him without doing him any harm .
42004036	The people were all amazed and said to one another , “ What kind of words are these ? With authority and power this man gives orders to the evil spirits , and they come out ! ”
42004037	And the report about Jesus spread everywhere in that region .
42004038	Jesus left the synagogue and went to Simon's home . Simon's mother-in-law was sick with a high fever , and they spoke to Jesus about her .
42004039	He went and stood at her bedside and ordered the fever to leave her . The fever left her , and she got up at once and began to wait on them .
42004040	After sunset all who had friends who were sick with various diseases brought them to Jesus ; he placed his hands on every one of them and healed them all .
42004041	Demons also went out from many people , screaming , “ You are the Son of God ! ” Jesus gave the demons an order and would not let them speak , because they knew he was the Messiah .
42004042	At daybreak Jesus left the town and went off to a lonely place . The people started looking for him , and when they found him , they tried to keep him from leaving .
42004043	But he said to them , “ I must preach the Good News about the Kingdom of God in other towns also , because that is what God sent me to do . ”
42004044	So he preached in the synagogues throughout the country .
42005001	One day Jesus was standing on the shore of Lake Gennesaret while the people pushed their way up to him to listen to the word of God .
42005002	He saw two boats pulled up on the beach ; the fishermen had left them and were washing the nets .
42005003	Jesus got into one of the boats—it belonged to Simon—and asked him to push off a little from the shore . Jesus sat in the boat and taught the crowd .
42005004	When he finished speaking , he said to Simon , “ Push the boat out further to the deep water , and you and your partners let down your nets for a catch . ”
42005005	“ Master , ” Simon answered , “ we worked hard all night long and caught nothing . But if you say so , I will let down the nets . ”
42005006	They let them down and caught such a large number of fish that the nets were about to break .
42005007	So they motioned to their partners in the other boat to come and help them . They came and filled both boats so full of fish that the boats were about to sink .
42005008	When Simon Peter saw what had happened , he fell on his knees before Jesus and said , “ Go away from me , Lord ! I am a sinful man ! ”
42005009	He and the others with him were all amazed at the large number of fish they had caught .
42005010	The same was true of Simon's partners , James and John , the sons of Zebedee . Jesus said to Simon , “ Don't be afraid ; from now on you will be catching people . ”
42005011	They pulled the boats up on the beach , left everything , and followed Jesus .
42005012	Once Jesus was in a town where there was a man who was suffering from a dreaded skin disease . When he saw Jesus , he threw himself down and begged him , “ Sir , if you want to , you can make me clean ! ”
42005013	Jesus reached out and touched him . “ I do want to , ” he answered . “ Be clean ! ” At once the disease left the man .
42005014	Jesus ordered him , “ Don't tell anyone , but go straight to the priest and let him examine you ; then to prove to everyone that you are cured , offer the sacrifice as Moses ordered . ”
42005015	But the news about Jesus spread all the more widely , and crowds of people came to hear him and be healed from their diseases .
42005016	But he would go away to lonely places , where he prayed .
42005017	One day when Jesus was teaching , some Pharisees and teachers of the Law were sitting there who had come from every town in Galilee and Judea and from Jerusalem . The power of the Lord was present for Jesus to heal the sick .
42005018	Some men came carrying a paralyzed man on a bed , and they tried to carry him into the house and put him in front of Jesus .
42005019	Because of the crowd , however , they could find no way to take him in . So they carried him up on the roof , made an opening in the tiles , and let him down on his bed into the middle of the group in front of Jesus .
42005020	When Jesus saw how much faith they had , he said to the man , “ Your sins are forgiven , my friend . ”
42005021	The teachers of the Law and the Pharisees began to say to themselves , “ Who is this man who speaks such blasphemy ! God is the only one who can forgive sins ! ”
42005022	Jesus knew their thoughts and said to them , “ Why do you think such things ?
42005023	Is it easier to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven you , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up and walk ’ ?
42005024	I will prove to you , then , that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . ” So he said to the paralyzed man , “ I tell you , get up , pick up your bed , and go home ! ”
42005025	At once the man got up in front of them all , took the bed he had been lying on , and went home , praising God .
42005026	They were all completely amazed ! Full of fear , they praised God , saying , “ What marvelous things we have seen today ! ”
42005027	After this , Jesus went out and saw a tax collector named Levi , sitting in his office . Jesus said to him , “ Follow me . ”
42005028	Levi got up , left everything , and followed him .
42005029	Then Levi had a big feast in his house for Jesus , and among the guests was a large number of tax collectors and other people .
42005030	Some Pharisees and some teachers of the Law who belonged to their group complained to Jesus' disciples . “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and other outcasts ? ” they asked .
42005031	Jesus answered them , “ People who are well do not need a doctor , but only those who are sick .
42005032	I have not come to call respectable people to repent , but outcasts . ”
42005033	Some people said to Jesus , “ The disciples of John fast frequently and offer prayers , and the disciples of the Pharisees do the same ; but your disciples eat and drink . ”
42005034	Jesus answered , “ Do you think you can make the guests at a wedding party go without food as long as the bridegroom is with them ? Of course not !
42005035	But the day will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them , and then they will fast . ”
42005036	Jesus also told them this parable : “ You don't tear a piece off a new coat to patch up an old coat . If you do , you will have torn the new coat , and the piece of new cloth will not match the old .
42005037	Nor do you pour new wine into used wineskins , because the new wine will burst the skins , the wine will pour out , and the skins will be ruined .
42005038	Instead , new wine must be poured into fresh wineskins !
42005039	And you don't want new wine after drinking old wine . ‘ The old is better , ’ you say . ”
42006001	Jesus was walking through some wheat fields on a Sabbath . His disciples began to pick the heads of wheat , rub them in their hands , and eat the grain .
42006002	Some Pharisees asked , “ Why are you doing what our Law says you cannot do on the Sabbath ? ”
42006003	Jesus answered them , “ Haven't you read what David did when he and his men were hungry ?
42006004	He went into the house of God , took the bread offered to God , ate it , and gave it also to his men . Yet it is against our Law for anyone except the priests to eat that bread . ”
42006005	And Jesus concluded , “ The Son of Man is Lord of the Sabbath . ”
42006006	On another Sabbath Jesus went into a synagogue and taught . A man was there whose right hand was paralyzed .
42006007	Some teachers of the Law and some Pharisees wanted a reason to accuse Jesus of doing wrong , so they watched him closely to see if he would heal on the Sabbath .
42006008	But Jesus knew their thoughts and said to the man , “ Stand up and come here to the front . ” The man got up and stood there .
42006009	Then Jesus said to them , “ I ask you : What does our Law allow us to do on the Sabbath ? To help or to harm ? To save someone's life or destroy it ? ”
42006010	He looked around at them all ; then he said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” He did so , and his hand became well again .
42006011	They were filled with rage and began to discuss among themselves what they could do to Jesus .
42006012	At that time Jesus went up a hill to pray and spent the whole night there praying to God .
42006013	When day came , he called his disciples to him and chose twelve of them , whom he named apostles :
42006014	Simon ( whom he named Peter ) and his brother Andrew ; James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew and Thomas , James son of Alphaeus , and Simon ( who was called the Patriot ) ,
42006016	Judas son of James , and Judas Iscariot , who became the traitor .
42006017	When Jesus had come down from the hill with the apostles , he stood on a level place with a large number of his disciples . A large crowd of people was there from all over Judea and from Jerusalem and from the coast cities of Tyre and Sidon ;
42006018	they had come to hear him and to be healed of their diseases . Those who were troubled by evil spirits also came and were healed .
42006019	All the people tried to touch him , for power was going out from him and healing them all .
42006020	Jesus looked at his disciples and said , “ Happy are you poor ; the Kingdom of God is yours !
42006021	“ Happy are you who are hungry now ; you will be filled ! “ Happy are you who weep now ; you will laugh !
42006022	“ Happy are you when people hate you , reject you , insult you , and say that you are evil , all because of the Son of Man !
42006023	Be glad when that happens and dance for joy , because a great reward is kept for you in heaven . For their ancestors did the very same things to the prophets .
42006024	“ But how terrible for you who are rich now ; you have had your easy life !
42006025	“ How terrible for you who are full now ; you will go hungry ! “ How terrible for you who laugh now ; you will mourn and weep !
42006026	“ How terrible when all people speak well of you ; their ancestors said the very same things about the false prophets .
42006027	“ But I tell you who hear me : Love your enemies , do good to those who hate you ,
42006028	bless those who curse you , and pray for those who mistreat you .
42006029	If anyone hits you on one cheek , let him hit the other one too ; if someone takes your coat , let him have your shirt as well .
42006030	Give to everyone who asks you for something , and when someone takes what is yours , do not ask for it back .
42006031	Do for others just what you want them to do for you .
42006032	“ If you love only the people who love you , why should you receive a blessing ? Even sinners love those who love them !
42006033	And if you do good only to those who do good to you , why should you receive a blessing ? Even sinners do that !
42006034	And if you lend only to those from whom you hope to get it back , why should you receive a blessing ? Even sinners lend to sinners , to get back the same amount !
42006035	No ! Love your enemies and do good to them ; lend and expect nothing back . You will then have a great reward , and you will be children of the Most High God . For he is good to the ungrateful and the wicked .
42006036	Be merciful just as your Father is merciful .
42006037	“ Do not judge others , and God will not judge you ; do not condemn others , and God will not condemn you ; forgive others , and God will forgive you .
42006038	Give to others , and God will give to you . Indeed , you will receive a full measure , a generous helping , poured into your hands—all that you can hold . The measure you use for others is the one that God will use for you . ”
42006039	And Jesus told them this parable : “ One blind man cannot lead another one ; if he does , both will fall into a ditch .
42006040	No pupils are greater than their teacher ; but all pupils , when they have completed their training , will be like their teacher .
42006041	“ Why do you look at the speck in your brother's eye , but pay no attention to the log in your own eye ?
42006042	How can you say to your brother , ‘ Please , brother , let me take that speck out of your eye , ’ yet cannot even see the log in your own eye ? You hypocrite ! First take the log out of your own eye , and then you will be able to see clearly to take the speck out of your brother's eye .
42006043	“ A healthy tree does not bear bad fruit , nor does a poor tree bear good fruit .
42006044	Every tree is known by the fruit it bears ; you do not pick figs from thorn bushes or gather grapes from bramble bushes .
42006045	A good person brings good out of the treasure of good things in his heart ; a bad person brings bad out of his treasure of bad things . For the mouth speaks what the heart is full of .
42006046	“ Why do you call me , ‘ Lord , Lord , ’ and yet don't do what I tell you ?
42006047	Anyone who comes to me and listens to my words and obeys them—I will show you what he is like .
42006048	He is like a man who , in building his house , dug deep and laid the foundation on rock . The river flooded over and hit that house but could not shake it , because it was well built .
42006049	But anyone who hears my words and does not obey them is like a man who built his house without laying a foundation ; when the flood hit that house it fell at once—and what a terrible crash that was ! ”
42007001	When Jesus had finished saying all these things to the people , he went to Capernaum .
42007002	A Roman officer there had a servant who was very dear to him ; the man was sick and about to die .
42007003	When the officer heard about Jesus , he sent some Jewish elders to ask him to come and heal his servant .
42007004	They came to Jesus and begged him earnestly , “ This man really deserves your help .
42007005	He loves our people and he himself built a synagogue for us . ”
42007006	So Jesus went with them . He was not far from the house when the officer sent friends to tell him , “ Sir , don't trouble yourself . I do not deserve to have you come into my house ,
42007007	neither do I consider myself worthy to come to you in person . Just give the order , and my servant will get well .
42007008	I , too , am a man placed under the authority of superior officers , and I have soldiers under me . I order this one , ‘ Go ! ’ and he goes ; I order that one , ‘ Come ! ’ and he comes ; and I order my slave , ‘ Do this ! ’ and he does it . ”
42007009	Jesus was surprised when he heard this ; he turned around and said to the crowd following him , “ I tell you , I have never found faith like this , not even in Israel ! ”
42007010	The messengers went back to the officer's house and found his servant well .
42007011	Soon afterward Jesus went to a town named Nain , accompanied by his disciples and a large crowd .
42007012	Just as he arrived at the gate of the town , a funeral procession was coming out . The dead man was the only son of a woman who was a widow , and a large crowd from the town was with her .
42007013	When the Lord saw her , his heart was filled with pity for her , and he said to her , “ Don't cry . ”
42007014	Then he walked over and touched the coffin , and the men carrying it stopped . Jesus said , “ Young man ! Get up , I tell you ! ”
42007015	The dead man sat up and began to talk , and Jesus gave him back to his mother .
42007016	They all were filled with fear and praised God . “ A great prophet has appeared among us ! ” they said ; “ God has come to save his people ! ”
42007017	This news about Jesus went out through all the country and the surrounding territory .
42007018	When John's disciples told him about all these things , he called two of them
42007019	and sent them to the Lord to ask him , “ Are you the one John said was going to come , or should we expect someone else ? ”
42007020	When they came to Jesus , they said , “ John the Baptist sent us to ask if you are the one he said was going to come , or should we expect someone else ? ”
42007021	At that very time Jesus healed many people from their sicknesses , diseases , and evil spirits , and gave sight to many blind people .
42007022	He answered John's messengers , “ Go back and tell John what you have seen and heard : the blind can see , the lame can walk , those who suffer from dreaded skin diseases are made clean , the deaf can hear , the dead are raised to life , and the Good News is preached to the poor .
42007023	How happy are those who have no doubts about me ! ”
42007024	After John's messengers had left , Jesus began to speak about him to the crowds : “ When you went out to John in the desert , what did you expect to see ? A blade of grass bending in the wind ?
42007025	What did you go out to see ? A man dressed up in fancy clothes ? People who dress like that and live in luxury are found in palaces !
42007026	Tell me , what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes indeed , but you saw much more than a prophet .
42007027	For John is the one of whom the scripture says : ‘ God said , I will send my messenger ahead of you to open the way for you . ’
42007028	I tell you , ” Jesus added , “ John is greater than anyone who has ever lived . But the one who is least in the Kingdom of God is greater than John . ”
42007029	All the people heard him ; they and especially the tax collectors were the ones who had obeyed God's righteous demands and had been baptized by John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and the teachers of the Law rejected God's purpose for themselves and refused to be baptized by John .
42007031	Jesus continued , “ Now to what can I compare the people of this day ? What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace . One group shouts to the other , ‘ We played wedding music for you , but you wouldn't dance ! We sang funeral songs , but you wouldn't cry ! ’
42007033	John the Baptist came , and he fasted and drank no wine , and you said , ‘ He has a demon in him ! ’
42007034	The Son of Man came , and he ate and drank , and you said , ‘ Look at this man ! He is a glutton and wine drinker , a friend of tax collectors and other outcasts ! ’
42007035	God's wisdom , however , is shown to be true by all who accept it . ”
42007036	A Pharisee invited Jesus to have dinner with him , and Jesus went to his house and sat down to eat .
42007037	In that town was a woman who lived a sinful life . She heard that Jesus was eating in the Pharisee's house , so she brought an alabaster jar full of perfume
42007038	and stood behind Jesus , by his feet , crying and wetting his feet with her tears . Then she dried his feet with her hair , kissed them , and poured the perfume on them .
42007039	When the Pharisee saw this , he said to himself , “ If this man really were a prophet , he would know who this woman is who is touching him ; he would know what kind of sinful life she lives ! ”
42007040	Jesus spoke up and said to him , “ Simon , I have something to tell you . ” “ Yes , Teacher , ” he said , “ tell me . ”
42007041	“ There were two men who owed money to a moneylender , ” Jesus began . “ One owed him five hundred silver coins , and the other owed him fifty .
42007042	Neither of them could pay him back , so he canceled the debts of both . Which one , then , will love him more ? ”
42007043	“ I suppose , ” answered Simon , “ that it would be the one who was forgiven more . ” “ You are right , ” said Jesus .
42007044	Then he turned to the woman and said to Simon , “ Do you see this woman ? I came into your home , and you gave me no water for my feet , but she has washed my feet with her tears and dried them with her hair .
42007045	You did not welcome me with a kiss , but she has not stopped kissing my feet since I came .
42007046	You provided no olive oil for my head , but she has covered my feet with perfume .
42007047	I tell you , then , the great love she has shown proves that her many sins have been forgiven . But whoever has been forgiven little shows only a little love . ”
42007048	Then Jesus said to the woman , “ Your sins are forgiven . ”
42007049	The others sitting at the table began to say to themselves , “ Who is this , who even forgives sins ? ”
42007050	But Jesus said to the woman , “ Your faith has saved you ; go in peace . ”
42008001	Some time later Jesus traveled through towns and villages , preaching the Good News about the Kingdom of God . The twelve disciples went with him ,
42008002	and so did some women who had been healed of evil spirits and diseases : Mary ( who was called Magdalene ) , from whom seven demons had been driven out ;
42008003	Joanna , whose husband Chuza was an officer in Herod's court ; and Susanna , and many other women who used their own resources to help Jesus and his disciples .
42008004	People kept coming to Jesus from one town after another ; and when a great crowd gathered , Jesus told this parable :
42008005	“ Once there was a man who went out to sow grain . As he scattered the seed in the field , some of it fell along the path , where it was stepped on , and the birds ate it up .
42008006	Some of it fell on rocky ground , and when the plants sprouted , they dried up because the soil had no moisture .
42008007	Some of the seed fell among thorn bushes , which grew up with the plants and choked them .
42008008	And some seeds fell in good soil ; the plants grew and bore grain , one hundred grains each . ” And Jesus concluded , “ Listen , then , if you have ears ! ”
42008009	His disciples asked Jesus what this parable meant ,
42008010	and he answered , “ The knowledge of the secrets of the Kingdom of God has been given to you , but to the rest it comes by means of parables , so that they may look but not see , and listen but not understand .
42008011	“ This is what the parable means : the seed is the word of God .
42008012	The seeds that fell along the path stand for those who hear ; but the Devil comes and takes the message away from their hearts in order to keep them from believing and being saved .
42008013	The seeds that fell on rocky ground stand for those who hear the message and receive it gladly . But it does not sink deep into them ; they believe only for a while but when the time of testing comes , they fall away .
42008014	The seeds that fell among thorn bushes stand for those who hear ; but the worries and riches and pleasures of this life crowd in and choke them , and their fruit never ripens .
42008015	The seeds that fell in good soil stand for those who hear the message and retain it in a good and obedient heart , and they persist until they bear fruit .
42008016	“ No one lights a lamp and covers it with a bowl or puts it under a bed . Instead , it is put on the lampstand , so that people will see the light as they come in .
42008017	“ Whatever is hidden away will be brought out into the open , and whatever is covered up will be found and brought to light .
42008018	“ Be careful , then , how you listen ; because those who have something will be given more , but whoever has nothing will have taken away from them even the little they think they have . ”
42008019	Jesus' mother and brothers came to him , but were unable to join him because of the crowd .
42008020	Someone said to Jesus , “ Your mother and brothers are standing outside and want to see you . ”
42008021	Jesus said to them all , “ My mother and brothers are those who hear the word of God and obey it . ”
42008022	One day Jesus got into a boat with his disciples and said to them , “ Let us go across to the other side of the lake . ” So they started out .
42008023	As they were sailing , Jesus fell asleep . Suddenly a strong wind blew down on the lake , and the boat began to fill with water , so that they were all in great danger .
42008024	The disciples went to Jesus and woke him up , saying , “ Master , Master ! We are about to die ! ” Jesus got up and gave an order to the wind and to the stormy water ; they quieted down , and there was a great calm .
42008025	Then he said to the disciples , “ Where is your faith ? ” But they were amazed and afraid , and said to one another , “ Who is this man ? He gives orders to the winds and waves , and they obey him ! ”
42008026	Jesus and his disciples sailed on over to the territory of Gerasa , which is across the lake from Galilee .
42008027	As Jesus stepped ashore , he was met by a man from the town who had demons in him . For a long time this man had gone without clothes and would not stay at home , but spent his time in the burial caves .
42008028	When he saw Jesus , he gave a loud cry , threw himself down at his feet , and shouted , “ Jesus , Son of the Most High God ! What do you want with me ? I beg you , don't punish me ! ”
42008029	He said this because Jesus had ordered the evil spirit to go out of him . Many times it had seized him , and even though he was kept a prisoner , his hands and feet tied with chains , he would break the chains and be driven by the demon out into the desert .
42008030	Jesus asked him , “ What is your name ? ” “ My name is ‘ Mob , ’ ” he answered—because many demons had gone into him .
42008031	The demons begged Jesus not to send them into the abyss .
42008032	There was a large herd of pigs near by , feeding on a hillside . So the demons begged Jesus to let them go into the pigs , and he let them .
42008033	They went out of the man and into the pigs . The whole herd rushed down the side of the cliff into the lake and was drowned .
42008034	The men who had been taking care of the pigs saw what happened , so they ran off and spread the news in the town and among the farms .
42008035	People went out to see what had happened , and when they came to Jesus , they found the man from whom the demons had gone out sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed and in his right mind ; and they were all afraid .
42008036	Those who had seen it told the people how the man had been cured .
42008037	Then all the people from that territory asked Jesus to go away , because they were terribly afraid . So Jesus got into the boat and left .
42008038	The man from whom the demons had gone out begged Jesus , “ Let me go with you . ” But Jesus sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Go back home and tell what God has done for you . ” The man went through the town , telling what Jesus had done for him .
42008040	When Jesus returned to the other side of the lake , the people welcomed him , because they had all been waiting for him .
42008041	Then a man named Jairus arrived ; he was an official in the local synagogue . He threw himself down at Jesus' feet and begged him to go to his home ,
42008042	because his only daughter , who was twelve years old , was dying . As Jesus went along , the people were crowding him from every side .
42008043	Among them was a woman who had suffered from severe bleeding for twelve years ; she had spent all she had on doctors , but no one had been able to cure her .
42008044	She came up in the crowd behind Jesus and touched the edge of his cloak , and her bleeding stopped at once .
42008045	Jesus asked , “ Who touched me ? ” Everyone denied it , and Peter said , “ Master , the people are all around you and crowding in on you . ”
42008046	But Jesus said , “ Someone touched me , for I knew it when power went out of me . ”
42008047	The woman saw that she had been found out , so she came trembling and threw herself at Jesus' feet . There in front of everybody , she told him why she had touched him and how she had been healed at once .
42008048	Jesus said to her , “ My daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in peace . ”
42008049	While Jesus was saying this , a messenger came from the official's house . “ Your daughter has died , ” he told Jairus ; “ don't bother the Teacher any longer . ”
42008050	But Jesus heard it and said to Jairus , “ Don't be afraid ; only believe , and she will be well . ”
42008051	When he arrived at the house , he would not let anyone go in with him except Peter , John , and James , and the child's father and mother .
42008052	Everyone there was crying and mourning for the child . Jesus said , “ Don't cry ; the child is not dead—she is only sleeping ! ”
42008053	They all made fun of him , because they knew that she was dead .
42008054	But Jesus took her by the hand and called out , “ Get up , child ! ”
42008055	Her life returned , and she got up at once , and Jesus ordered them to give her something to eat .
42008056	Her parents were astounded , but Jesus commanded them not to tell anyone what had happened .
42009001	Jesus called the twelve disciples together and gave them power and authority to drive out all demons and to cure diseases .
42009002	Then he sent them out to preach the Kingdom of God and to heal the sick ,
42009003	after saying to them , “ Take nothing with you for the trip : no walking stick , no beggar's bag , no food , no money , not even an extra shirt .
42009004	Wherever you are welcomed , stay in the same house until you leave that town ;
42009005	wherever people don't welcome you , leave that town and shake the dust off your feet as a warning to them . ”
42009006	The disciples left and traveled through all the villages , preaching the Good News and healing people everywhere .
42009007	When Herod , the ruler of Galilee , heard about all the things that were happening , he was very confused , because some people were saying that John the Baptist had come back to life .
42009008	Others were saying that Elijah had appeared , and still others that one of the prophets of long ago had come back to life .
42009009	Herod said , “ I had John's head cut off ; but who is this man I hear these things about ? ” And he kept trying to see Jesus .
42009010	The apostles came back and told Jesus everything they had done . He took them with him , and they went off by themselves to a town named Bethsaida .
42009011	When the crowds heard about it , they followed him . He welcomed them , spoke to them about the Kingdom of God , and healed those who needed it .
42009012	When the sun was beginning to set , the twelve disciples came to him and said , “ Send the people away so that they can go to the villages and farms around here and find food and lodging , because this is a lonely place . ”
42009013	But Jesus said to them , “ You yourselves give them something to eat . ” They answered , “ All we have are five loaves and two fish . Do you want us to go and buy food for this whole crowd ? ”
42009014	( There were about five thousand men there . ) Jesus said to his disciples , “ Make the people sit down in groups of about fifty each . ”
42009015	After the disciples had done so ,
42009016	Jesus took the five loaves and two fish , looked up to heaven , thanked God for them , broke them , and gave them to the disciples to distribute to the people .
42009017	They all ate and had enough , and the disciples took up twelve baskets of what was left over .
42009018	One day when Jesus was praying alone , the disciples came to him . “ Who do the crowds say I am ? ” he asked them .
42009019	“ Some say that you are John the Baptist , ” they answered . “ Others say that you are Elijah , while others say that one of the prophets of long ago has come back to life . ”
42009020	“ What about you ? ” he asked them . “ Who do you say I am ? ” Peter answered , “ You are God's Messiah . ”
42009021	Then Jesus gave them strict orders not to tell this to anyone .
42009022	He also told them , “ The Son of Man must suffer much and be rejected by the elders , the chief priests , and the teachers of the Law . He will be put to death , but three days later he will be raised to life . ”
42009023	And he said to them all , “ If you want to come with me , you must forget yourself , take up your cross every day , and follow me .
42009024	For if you want to save your own life , you will lose it , but if you lose your life for my sake , you will save it .
42009025	Will you gain anything if you win the whole world but are yourself lost or defeated ? Of course not !
42009026	If you are ashamed of me and of my teaching , then the Son of Man will be ashamed of you when he comes in his glory and in the glory of the Father and of the holy angels .
42009027	I assure you that there are some here who will not die until they have seen the Kingdom of God . ”
42009028	About a week after he had said these things , Jesus took Peter , John , and James with him and went up a hill to pray .
42009029	While he was praying , his face changed its appearance , and his clothes became dazzling white .
42009030	Suddenly two men were there talking with him . They were Moses and Elijah ,
42009031	who appeared in heavenly glory and talked with Jesus about the way in which he would soon fulfill God's purpose by dying in Jerusalem .
42009032	Peter and his companions were sound asleep , but they woke up and saw Jesus' glory and the two men who were standing with him .
42009033	As the men were leaving Jesus , Peter said to him , “ Master , how good it is that we are here ! We will make three tents , one for you , one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ” ( He did not really know what he was saying . )
42009034	While he was still speaking , a cloud appeared and covered them with its shadow ; and the disciples were afraid as the cloud came over them .
42009035	A voice said from the cloud , “ This is my Son , whom I have chosen—listen to him ! ”
42009036	When the voice stopped , there was Jesus all alone . The disciples kept quiet about all this and told no one at that time anything they had seen .
42009037	The next day Jesus and the three disciples went down from the hill , and a large crowd met Jesus .
42009038	A man shouted from the crowd , “ Teacher ! I beg you , look at my son—my only son !
42009039	A spirit attacks him with a sudden shout and throws him into a fit , so that he foams at the mouth ; it keeps on hurting him and will hardly let him go !
42009040	I begged your disciples to drive it out , but they couldn't . ”
42009041	Jesus answered , “ How unbelieving and wrong you people are ! How long must I stay with you ? How long do I have to put up with you ? ” Then he said to the man , “ Bring your son here . ”
42009042	As the boy was coming , the demon knocked him to the ground and threw him into a fit . Jesus gave a command to the evil spirit , healed the boy , and gave him back to his father .
42009043	All the people were amazed at the mighty power of God . The people were still marveling at everything Jesus was doing , when he said to his disciples ,
42009044	“ Don't forget what I am about to tell you ! The Son of Man is going to be handed over to the power of human beings . ”
42009045	But the disciples did not know what this meant . It had been hidden from them so that they could not understand it , and they were afraid to ask him about the matter .
42009046	An argument broke out among the disciples as to which one of them was the greatest .
42009047	Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he took a child , stood him by his side ,
42009048	and said to them , “ Whoever welcomes this child in my name , welcomes me ; and whoever welcomes me , also welcomes the one who sent me . For the one who is least among you all is the greatest . ”
42009049	John spoke up , “ Master , we saw a man driving out demons in your name , and we told him to stop , because he doesn't belong to our group . ”
42009050	“ Do not try to stop him , ” Jesus said to him and to the other disciples , “ because whoever is not against you is for you . ”
42009051	As the time drew near when Jesus would be taken up to heaven , he made up his mind and set out on his way to Jerusalem .
42009052	He sent messengers ahead of him , who went into a village in Samaria to get everything ready for him .
42009053	But the people there would not receive him , because it was clear that he was on his way to Jerusalem .
42009054	When the disciples James and John saw this , they said , “ Lord , do you want us to call fire down from heaven to destroy them ? ”
42009055	Jesus turned and rebuked them .
42009056	Then Jesus and his disciples went on to another village .
42009057	As they went on their way , a man said to Jesus , “ I will follow you wherever you go . ”
42009058	Jesus said to him , “ Foxes have holes , and birds have nests , but the Son of Man has no place to lie down and rest . ”
42009059	He said to another man , “ Follow me . ” But that man said , “ Sir , first let me go back and bury my father . ”
42009060	Jesus answered , “ Let the dead bury their own dead . You go and proclaim the Kingdom of God . ”
42009061	Someone else said , “ I will follow you , sir ; but first let me go and say good-bye to my family . ”
42009062	Jesus said to him , “ Anyone who starts to plow and then keeps looking back is of no use for the Kingdom of God . ”
42010001	After this the Lord chose another seventy-two men and sent them out two by two , to go ahead of him to every town and place where he himself was about to go .
42010002	He said to them , “ There is a large harvest , but few workers to gather it in . Pray to the owner of the harvest that he will send out workers to gather in his harvest .
42010003	Go ! I am sending you like lambs among wolves .
42010004	Don't take a purse or a beggar's bag or shoes ; don't stop to greet anyone on the road .
42010005	Whenever you go into a house , first say , ‘ Peace be with this house . ’
42010006	If someone who is peace-loving lives there , let your greeting of peace remain on that person ; if not , take back your greeting of peace .
42010007	Stay in that same house , eating and drinking whatever they offer you , for workers should be given their pay . Don't move around from one house to another .
42010008	Whenever you go into a town and are made welcome , eat what is set before you ,
42010009	heal the sick in that town , and say to the people there , ‘ The Kingdom of God has come near you . ’
42010010	But whenever you go into a town and are not welcomed , go out in the streets and say ,
42010011	‘ Even the dust from your town that sticks to our feet we wipe off against you . But remember that the Kingdom of God has come near you ! ’
42010012	I assure you that on the Judgment Day God will show more mercy to Sodom than to that town !
42010013	“ How terrible it will be for you , Chorazin ! How terrible for you too , Bethsaida ! If the miracles which were performed in you had been performed in Tyre and Sidon , the people there would have long ago sat down , put on sackcloth , and sprinkled ashes on themselves , to show that they had turned from their sins !
42010014	God will show more mercy on the Judgment Day to Tyre and Sidon than to you .
42010015	And as for you , Capernaum ! Did you want to lift yourself up to heaven ? You will be thrown down to hell ! ”
42010016	Jesus said to his disciples , “ Whoever listens to you listens to me ; whoever rejects you rejects me ; and whoever rejects me rejects the one who sent me . ”
42010017	The seventy-two men came back in great joy . “ Lord , ” they said , “ even the demons obeyed us when we gave them a command in your name ! ”
42010018	Jesus answered them , “ I saw Satan fall like lightning from heaven .
42010019	Listen ! I have given you authority , so that you can walk on snakes and scorpions and overcome all the power of the Enemy , and nothing will hurt you .
42010020	But don't be glad because the evil spirits obey you ; rather be glad because your names are written in heaven . ”
42010021	At that time Jesus was filled with joy by the Holy Spirit and said , “ Father , Lord of heaven and earth ! I thank you because you have shown to the unlearned what you have hidden from the wise and learned . Yes , Father , this was how you were pleased to have it happen .
42010022	“ My Father has given me all things . No one knows who the Son is except the Father , and no one knows who the Father is except the Son and those to whom the Son chooses to reveal him . ”
42010023	Then Jesus turned to the disciples and said to them privately , “ How fortunate you are to see the things you see !
42010024	I tell you that many prophets and kings wanted to see what you see , but they could not , and to hear what you hear , but they did not . ”
42010025	A teacher of the Law came up and tried to trap Jesus . “ Teacher , ” he asked , “ what must I do to receive eternal life ? ”
42010026	Jesus answered him , “ What do the Scriptures say ? How do you interpret them ? ”
42010027	The man answered , “ ‘ Love the Lord your God with all your heart , with all your soul , with all your strength , and with all your mind ’ ; and ‘ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ’ ”
42010028	“ You are right , ” Jesus replied ; “ do this and you will live . ”
42010029	But the teacher of the Law wanted to justify himself , so he asked Jesus , “ Who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	Jesus answered , “ There was once a man who was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho when robbers attacked him , stripped him , and beat him up , leaving him half dead .
42010031	It so happened that a priest was going down that road ; but when he saw the man , he walked on by on the other side .
42010032	In the same way a Levite also came there , went over and looked at the man , and then walked on by on the other side .
42010033	But a Samaritan who was traveling that way came upon the man , and when he saw him , his heart was filled with pity .
42010034	He went over to him , poured oil and wine on his wounds and bandaged them ; then he put the man on his own animal and took him to an inn , where he took care of him .
42010035	The next day he took out two silver coins and gave them to the innkeeper . ‘ Take care of him , ’ he told the innkeeper , ‘ and when I come back this way , I will pay you whatever else you spend on him . ’ ”
42010036	And Jesus concluded , “ In your opinion , which one of these three acted like a neighbor toward the man attacked by the robbers ? ”
42010037	The teacher of the Law answered , “ The one who was kind to him . ” Jesus replied , “ You go , then , and do the same . ”
42010038	As Jesus and his disciples went on their way , he came to a village where a woman named Martha welcomed him in her home .
42010039	She had a sister named Mary , who sat down at the feet of the Lord and listened to his teaching .
42010040	Martha was upset over all the work she had to do , so she came and said , “ Lord , don't you care that my sister has left me to do all the work by myself ? Tell her to come and help me ! ”
42010041	The Lord answered her , “ Martha , Martha ! You are worried and troubled over so many things ,
42010042	but just one is needed . Mary has chosen the right thing , and it will not be taken away from her . ”
42011001	One day Jesus was praying in a certain place . When he had finished , one of his disciples said to him , “ Lord , teach us to pray , just as John taught his disciples . ”
42011002	Jesus said to them , “ When you pray , say this : ‘ Father : May your holy name be honored ; may your Kingdom come .
42011003	Give us day by day the food we need .
42011004	Forgive us our sins , for we forgive everyone who does us wrong . And do not bring us to hard testing . ’ ”
42011005	And Jesus said to his disciples , “ Suppose one of you should go to a friend's house at midnight and say , ‘ Friend , let me borrow three loaves of bread .
42011006	A friend of mine who is on a trip has just come to my house , and I don't have any food for him ! ’
42011007	And suppose your friend should answer from inside , ‘ Don't bother me ! The door is already locked , and my children and I are in bed . I can't get up and give you anything . ’
42011008	Well , what then ? I tell you that even if he will not get up and give you the bread because you are his friend , yet he will get up and give you everything you need because you are not ashamed to keep on asking .
42011009	And so I say to you : Ask , and you will receive ; seek , and you will find ; knock , and the door will be opened to you .
42011010	For those who ask will receive , and those who seek will find , and the door will be opened to anyone who knocks .
42011011	Would any of you who are fathers give your son a snake when he asks for fish ?
42011012	Or would you give him a scorpion when he asks for an egg ?
42011013	As bad as you are , you know how to give good things to your children . How much more , then , will the Father in heaven give the Holy Spirit to those who ask him ! ”
42011014	Jesus was driving out a demon that could not talk ; and when the demon went out , the man began to talk . The crowds were amazed ,
42011015	but some of the people said , “ It is Beelzebul , the chief of the demons , who gives him the power to drive them out . ”
42011016	Others wanted to trap Jesus , so they asked him to perform a miracle to show that God approved of him .
42011017	But Jesus knew what they were thinking , so he said to them , “ Any country that divides itself into groups which fight each other will not last very long ; a family divided against itself falls apart .
42011018	So if Satan's kingdom has groups fighting each other , how can it last ? You say that I drive out demons because Beelzebul gives me the power to do so .
42011019	If this is how I drive them out , how do your followers drive them out ? Your own followers prove that you are wrong !
42011020	No , it is rather by means of God's power that I drive out demons , and this proves that the Kingdom of God has already come to you .
42011021	“ When a strong man , with all his weapons ready , guards his own house , all his belongings are safe .
42011022	But when a stronger man attacks him and defeats him , he carries away all the weapons the owner was depending on and divides up what he stole .
42011023	“ Anyone who is not for me is really against me ; anyone who does not help me gather is really scattering .
42011024	“ When an evil spirit goes out of a person , it travels over dry country looking for a place to rest . If it can't find one , it says to itself , ‘ I will go back to my house . ’
42011025	So it goes back and finds the house clean and all fixed up .
42011026	Then it goes out and brings seven other spirits even worse than itself , and they come and live there . So when it is all over , that person is in worse shape than at the beginning . ”
42011027	When Jesus had said this , a woman spoke up from the crowd and said to him , “ How happy is the woman who bore you and nursed you ! ”
42011028	But Jesus answered , “ Rather , how happy are those who hear the word of God and obey it ! ”
42011029	As the people crowded around Jesus , he went on to say , “ How evil are the people of this day ! They ask for a miracle , but none will be given them except the miracle of Jonah .
42011030	In the same way that the prophet Jonah was a sign for the people of Nineveh , so the Son of Man will be a sign for the people of this day .
42011031	On the Judgment Day the Queen of Sheba will stand up and accuse the people of today , because she traveled all the way from her country to listen to King Solomon's wise teaching ; and there is something here , I tell you , greater than Solomon .
42011032	On the Judgment Day the people of Nineveh will stand up and accuse you , because they turned from their sins when they heard Jonah preach ; and I assure you that there is something here greater than Jonah !
42011033	“ No one lights a lamp and then hides it or puts it under a bowl ; instead , it is put on the lampstand , so that people may see the light as they come in .
42011034	Your eyes are like a lamp for the body . When your eyes are sound , your whole body is full of light ; but when your eyes are no good , your whole body will be in darkness .
42011035	Make certain , then , that the light in you is not darkness .
42011036	If your whole body is full of light , with no part of it in darkness , it will be bright all over , as when a lamp shines on you with its brightness . ”
42011037	When Jesus finished speaking , a Pharisee invited him to eat with him ; so he went in and sat down to eat .
42011038	The Pharisee was surprised when he noticed that Jesus had not washed before eating .
42011039	So the Lord said to him , “ Now then , you Pharisees clean the outside of your cup and plate , but inside you are full of violence and evil .
42011040	Fools ! Did not God , who made the outside , also make the inside ?
42011041	But give what is in your cups and plates to the poor , and everything will be ritually clean for you .
42011042	“ How terrible for you Pharisees ! You give to God one tenth of the seasoning herbs , such as mint and rue and all the other herbs , but you neglect justice and love for God . These you should practice , without neglecting the others .
42011043	“ How terrible for you Pharisees ! You love the reserved seats in the synagogues and to be greeted with respect in the marketplaces .
42011044	How terrible for you ! You are like unmarked graves which people walk on without knowing it . ”
42011045	One of the teachers of the Law said to him , “ Teacher , when you say this , you insult us too ! ”
42011046	Jesus answered , “ How terrible also for you teachers of the Law ! You put onto people's backs loads which are hard to carry , but you yourselves will not stretch out a finger to help them carry those loads .
42011047	How terrible for you ! You make fine tombs for the prophets—the very prophets your ancestors murdered .
42011048	You yourselves admit , then , that you approve of what your ancestors did ; they murdered the prophets , and you build their tombs .
42011049	For this reason the Wisdom of God said , ‘ I will send them prophets and messengers ; they will kill some of them and persecute others . ’
42011050	So the people of this time will be punished for the murder of all the prophets killed since the creation of the world ,
42011051	from the murder of Abel to the murder of Zechariah , who was killed between the altar and the Holy Place . Yes , I tell you , the people of this time will be punished for them all !
42011052	“ How terrible for you teachers of the Law ! You have kept the key that opens the door to the house of knowledge ; you yourselves will not go in , and you stop those who are trying to go in ! ”
42011053	When Jesus left that place , the teachers of the Law and the Pharisees began to criticize him bitterly and ask him questions about many things ,
42011054	trying to lay traps for him and catch him saying something wrong .
42012001	As thousands of people crowded together , so that they were stepping on each other , Jesus said first to his disciples , “ Be on guard against the yeast of the Pharisees—I mean their hypocrisy .
42012002	Whatever is covered up will be uncovered , and every secret will be made known .
42012003	So then , whatever you have said in the dark will be heard in broad daylight , and whatever you have whispered in private in a closed room will be shouted from the housetops .
42012004	“ I tell you , my friends , do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot afterward do anything worse .
42012005	I will show you whom to fear : fear God , who , after killing , has the authority to throw into hell . Believe me , he is the one you must fear !
42012006	“ Aren't five sparrows sold for two pennies ? Yet not one sparrow is forgotten by God .
42012007	Even the hairs of your head have all been counted . So do not be afraid ; you are worth much more than many sparrows !
42012008	“ I assure you that those who declare publicly that they belong to me , the Son of Man will do the same for them before the angels of God .
42012009	But those who reject me publicly , the Son of Man will also reject them before the angels of God .
42012010	“ Whoever says a word against the Son of Man can be forgiven ; but whoever says evil things against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven .
42012011	“ When they bring you to be tried in the synagogues or before governors or rulers , do not be worried about how you will defend yourself or what you will say .
42012012	For the Holy Spirit will teach you at that time what you should say . ”
42012013	A man in the crowd said to Jesus , “ Teacher , tell my brother to divide with me the property our father left us . ”
42012014	Jesus answered him , “ Friend , who gave me the right to judge or to divide the property between you two ? ”
42012015	And he went on to say to them all , “ Watch out and guard yourselves from every kind of greed ; because your true life is not made up of the things you own , no matter how rich you may be . ”
42012016	Then Jesus told them this parable : “ There was once a rich man who had land which bore good crops .
42012017	He began to think to himself , ‘ I don't have a place to keep all my crops . What can I do ?
42012018	This is what I will do , ’ he told himself ; ‘ I will tear down my barns and build bigger ones , where I will store the grain and all my other goods .
42012019	Then I will say to myself , Lucky man ! You have all the good things you need for many years . Take life easy , eat , drink , and enjoy yourself ! ’
42012020	But God said to him , ‘ You fool ! This very night you will have to give up your life ; then who will get all these things you have kept for yourself ? ’ ”
42012021	And Jesus concluded , “ This is how it is with those who pile up riches for themselves but are not rich in God's sight . ”
42012022	Then Jesus said to the disciples , “ And so I tell you not to worry about the food you need to stay alive or about the clothes you need for your body .
42012023	Life is much more important than food , and the body much more important than clothes .
42012024	Look at the crows : they don't plant seeds or gather a harvest ; they don't have storage rooms or barns ; God feeds them ! You are worth so much more than birds !
42012025	Can any of you live a bit longer by worrying about it ?
42012026	If you can't manage even such a small thing , why worry about the other things ?
42012027	Look how the wild flowers grow : they don't work or make clothes for themselves . But I tell you that not even King Solomon with all his wealth had clothes as beautiful as one of these flowers .
42012028	It is God who clothes the wild grass—grass that is here today and gone tomorrow , burned up in the oven . Won't he be all the more sure to clothe you ? What little faith you have !
42012029	“ So don't be all upset , always concerned about what you will eat and drink .
42012030	( For the pagans of this world are always concerned about all these things . ) Your Father knows that you need these things .
42012031	Instead , be concerned with his Kingdom , and he will provide you with these things .
42012032	“ Do not be afraid , little flock , for your Father is pleased to give you the Kingdom .
42012033	Sell all your belongings and give the money to the poor . Provide for yourselves purses that don't wear out , and save your riches in heaven , where they will never decrease , because no thief can get to them , and no moth can destroy them .
42012034	For your heart will always be where your riches are .
42012035	“ Be ready for whatever comes , dressed for action and with your lamps lit ,
42012036	like servants who are waiting for their master to come back from a wedding feast . When he comes and knocks , they will open the door for him at once .
42012037	How happy are those servants whose master finds them awake and ready when he returns ! I tell you , he will take off his coat , have them sit down , and will wait on them .
42012038	How happy they are if he finds them ready , even if he should come at midnight or even later !
42012039	And you can be sure that if the owner of a house knew the time when the thief would come , he would not let the thief break into his house .
42012040	And you , too , must be ready , because the Son of Man will come at an hour when you are not expecting him . ”
42012041	Peter said , “ Lord , does this parable apply to us , or do you mean it for everyone ? ”
42012042	The Lord answered , “ Who , then , is the faithful and wise servant ? He is the one that his master will put in charge , to run the household and give the other servants their share of the food at the proper time .
42012043	How happy that servant is if his master finds him doing this when he comes home !
42012044	Indeed , I tell you , the master will put that servant in charge of all his property .
42012045	But if that servant says to himself that his master is taking a long time to come back and if he begins to beat the other servants , both the men and the women , and eats and drinks and gets drunk ,
42012046	then the master will come back one day when the servant does not expect him and at a time he does not know . The master will cut him in pieces and make him share the fate of the disobedient .
42012047	“ The servant who knows what his master wants him to do , but does not get himself ready and do it , will be punished with a heavy whipping .
42012048	But the servant who does not know what his master wants , and yet does something for which he deserves a whipping , will be punished with a light whipping . Much is required from the person to whom much is given ; much more is required from the person to whom much more is given .
42012049	“ I came to set the earth on fire , and how I wish it were already kindled !
42012050	I have a baptism to receive , and how distressed I am until it is over !
42012051	Do you suppose that I came to bring peace to the world ? No , not peace , but division .
42012052	From now on a family of five will be divided , three against two and two against three .
42012053	Fathers will be against their sons , and sons against their fathers ; mothers will be against their daughters , and daughters against their mothers ; mothers-in-law will be against their daughters-in-law , and daughters-in-law against their mothers-in-law . ”
42012054	Jesus said also to the people , “ When you see a cloud coming up in the west , at once you say that it is going to rain—and it does .
42012055	And when you feel the south wind blowing , you say that it is going to get hot—and it does .
42012056	Hypocrites ! You can look at the earth and the sky and predict the weather ; why , then , don't you know the meaning of this present time ?
42012057	“ Why do you not judge for yourselves the right thing to do ?
42012058	If someone brings a lawsuit against you and takes you to court , do your best to settle the dispute before you get to court . If you don't , you will be dragged before the judge , who will hand you over to the police , and you will be put in jail .
42012059	There you will stay , I tell you , until you pay the last penny of your fine . ”
42013001	At that time some people were there who told Jesus about the Galileans whom Pilate had killed while they were offering sacrifices to God .
42013002	Jesus answered them , “ Because those Galileans were killed in that way , do you think it proves that they were worse sinners than all other Galileans ?
42013003	No indeed ! And I tell you that if you do not turn from your sins , you will all die as they did .
42013004	What about those eighteen people in Siloam who were killed when the tower fell on them ? Do you suppose this proves that they were worse than all the other people living in Jerusalem ?
42013005	No indeed ! And I tell you that if you do not turn from your sins , you will all die as they did . ”
42013006	Then Jesus told them this parable : “ There was once a man who had a fig tree growing in his vineyard . He went looking for figs on it but found none .
42013007	So he said to his gardener , ‘ Look , for three years I have been coming here looking for figs on this fig tree , and I haven't found any . Cut it down ! Why should it go on using up the soil ? ’
42013008	But the gardener answered , ‘ Leave it alone , sir , just one more year ; I will dig around it and put in some fertilizer .
42013009	Then if the tree bears figs next year , so much the better ; if not , then you can have it cut down . ’ ”
42013010	One Sabbath Jesus was teaching in a synagogue .
42013011	A woman there had an evil spirit that had kept her sick for eighteen years ; she was bent over and could not straighten up at all .
42013012	When Jesus saw her , he called out to her , “ Woman , you are free from your sickness ! ”
42013013	He placed his hands on her , and at once she straightened herself up and praised God .
42013014	The official of the synagogue was angry that Jesus had healed on the Sabbath , so he spoke up and said to the people , “ There are six days in which we should work ; so come during those days and be healed , but not on the Sabbath ! ”
42013015	The Lord answered him , “ You hypocrites ! Any one of you would untie your ox or your donkey from the stall and take it out to give it water on the Sabbath .
42013016	Now here is this descendant of Abraham whom Satan has kept in bonds for eighteen years ; should she not be released on the Sabbath ? ”
42013017	His answer made his enemies ashamed of themselves , while the people rejoiced over all the wonderful things that he did .
42013018	Jesus asked , “ What is the Kingdom of God like ? What shall I compare it with ?
42013019	It is like this . A man takes a mustard seed and plants it in his field . The plant grows and becomes a tree , and the birds make their nests in its branches . ”
42013020	Again Jesus asked , “ What shall I compare the Kingdom of God with ?
42013021	It is like this . A woman takes some yeast and mixes it with a bushel of flour until the whole batch of dough rises . ”
42013022	Jesus went through towns and villages , teaching the people and making his way toward Jerusalem .
42013023	Someone asked him , “ Sir , will just a few people be saved ? ” Jesus answered them ,
42013024	“ Do your best to go in through the narrow door ; because many people will surely try to go in but will not be able .
42013025	The master of the house will get up and close the door ; then when you stand outside and begin to knock on the door and say , ‘ Open the door for us , sir ! ’ he will answer you , ‘ I don't know where you come from ! ’
42013026	Then you will answer , ‘ We ate and drank with you ; you taught in our town ! ’
42013027	But he will say again , ‘ I don't know where you come from . Get away from me , all you wicked people ! ’
42013028	How you will cry and gnash your teeth when you see Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets in the Kingdom of God , while you are thrown out !
42013029	People will come from the east and the west , from the north and the south , and sit down at the feast in the Kingdom of God .
42013030	Then those who are now last will be first , and those who are now first will be last . ”
42013031	At that same time some Pharisees came to Jesus and said to him , “ You must get out of here and go somewhere else , because Herod wants to kill you . ”
42013032	Jesus answered them , “ Go and tell that fox : ‘ I am driving out demons and performing cures today and tomorrow , and on the third day I shall finish my work . ’

42013034	“ Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! You kill the prophets , you stone the messengers God has sent you ! How many times I wanted to put my arms around all your people , just as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings , but you would not let me !
42013035	And so your Temple will be abandoned . I assure you that you will not see me until the time comes when you say , ‘ God bless him who comes in the name of the Lord . ’ ”
42014001	One Sabbath Jesus went to eat a meal at the home of one of the leading Pharisees ; and people were watching Jesus closely .
42014002	A man whose legs and arms were swollen came to Jesus ,
42014003	and Jesus spoke up and asked the teachers of the Law and the Pharisees , “ Does our Law allow healing on the Sabbath or not ? ”
42014004	But they would not say a thing . Jesus took the man , healed him , and sent him away .
42014005	Then he said to them , “ If any one of you had a child or an ox that happened to fall in a well on a Sabbath , would you not pull it out at once on the Sabbath itself ? ”
42014006	But they were not able to answer him about this .
42014007	Jesus noticed how some of the guests were choosing the best places , so he told this parable to all of them :
42014008	“ When someone invites you to a wedding feast , do not sit down in the best place . It could happen that someone more important than you has been invited ,
42014009	and your host , who invited both of you , would have to come and say to you , ‘ Let him have this place . ’ Then you would be embarrassed and have to sit in the lowest place .
42014010	Instead , when you are invited , go and sit in the lowest place , so that your host will come to you and say , ‘ Come on up , my friend , to a better place . ’ This will bring you honor in the presence of all the other guests .
42014011	For those who make themselves great will be humbled , and those who humble themselves will be made great . ”
42014012	Then Jesus said to his host , “ When you give a lunch or a dinner , do not invite your friends or your brothers or your relatives or your rich neighbors—for they will invite you back , and in this way you will be paid for what you did .
42014013	When you give a feast , invite the poor , the crippled , the lame , and the blind ;
42014014	and you will be blessed , because they are not able to pay you back . God will repay you on the day the good people rise from death . ”
42014015	When one of the guests sitting at the table heard this , he said to Jesus , “ How happy are those who will sit down at the feast in the Kingdom of God ! ”
42014016	Jesus said to him , “ There was once a man who was giving a great feast to which he invited many people .
42014017	When it was time for the feast , he sent his servant to tell his guests , ‘ Come , everything is ready ! ’
42014018	But they all began , one after another , to make excuses . The first one told the servant , ‘ I have bought a field and must go and look at it ; please accept my apologies . ’
42014019	Another one said , ‘ I have bought five pairs of oxen and am on my way to try them out ; please accept my apologies . ’
42014020	Another one said , ‘ I have just gotten married , and for that reason I cannot come . ’
42014021	The servant went back and told all this to his master . The master was furious and said to his servant , ‘ Hurry out to the streets and alleys of the town , and bring back the poor , the crippled , the blind , and the lame . ’
42014022	Soon the servant said , ‘ Your order has been carried out , sir , but there is room for more . ’
42014023	So the master said to the servant , ‘ Go out to the country roads and lanes and make people come in , so that my house will be full .
42014024	I tell you all that none of those who were invited will taste my dinner ! ’ ”
42014025	Once when large crowds of people were going along with Jesus , he turned and said to them ,
42014026	“ Those who come to me cannot be my disciples unless they love me more than they love father and mother , wife and children , brothers and sisters , and themselves as well .
42014027	Those who do not carry their own cross and come after me cannot be my disciples .
42014028	If one of you is planning to build a tower , you sit down first and figure out what it will cost , to see if you have enough money to finish the job .
42014029	If you don't , you will not be able to finish the tower after laying the foundation ; and all who see what happened will make fun of you .
42014030	‘ You began to build but can't finish the job ! ’ they will say .
42014031	If a king goes out with ten thousand men to fight another king who comes against him with twenty thousand men , he will sit down first and decide if he is strong enough to face that other king .
42014032	If he isn't , he will send messengers to meet the other king to ask for terms of peace while he is still a long way off .
42014033	In the same way , ” concluded Jesus , “ none of you can be my disciple unless you give up everything you have .
42014034	“ Salt is good , but if it loses its saltiness , there is no way to make it salty again .
42014035	It is no good for the soil or for the manure pile ; it is thrown away . Listen , then , if you have ears ! ”
42015001	One day when many tax collectors and other outcasts came to listen to Jesus ,
42015002	the Pharisees and the teachers of the Law started grumbling , “ This man welcomes outcasts and even eats with them ! ”
42015003	So Jesus told them this parable :
42015004	“ Suppose one of you has a hundred sheep and loses one of them—what do you do ? You leave the other ninety-nine sheep in the pasture and go looking for the one that got lost until you find it .
42015005	When you find it , you are so happy that you put it on your shoulders
42015006	and carry it back home . Then you call your friends and neighbors together and say to them , ‘ I am so happy I found my lost sheep . Let us celebrate ! ’
42015007	In the same way , I tell you , there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents than over ninety-nine respectable people who do not need to repent .
42015008	“ Or suppose a woman who has ten silver coins loses one of them—what does she do ? She lights a lamp , sweeps her house , and looks carefully everywhere until she finds it .
42015009	When she finds it , she calls her friends and neighbors together , and says to them , ‘ I am so happy I found the coin I lost . Let us celebrate ! ’
42015010	In the same way , I tell you , the angels of God rejoice over one sinner who repents . ”
42015011	Jesus went on to say , “ There was once a man who had two sons .
42015012	The younger one said to him , ‘ Father , give me my share of the property now . ’ So the man divided his property between his two sons .
42015013	After a few days the younger son sold his part of the property and left home with the money . He went to a country far away , where he wasted his money in reckless living .
42015014	He spent everything he had . Then a severe famine spread over that country , and he was left without a thing .
42015015	So he went to work for one of the citizens of that country , who sent him out to his farm to take care of the pigs .
42015016	He wished he could fill himself with the bean pods the pigs ate , but no one gave him anything to eat .
42015017	At last he came to his senses and said , ‘ All my father's hired workers have more than they can eat , and here I am about to starve !
42015018	I will get up and go to my father and say , “ Father , I have sinned against God and against you .
42015019	I am no longer fit to be called your son ; treat me as one of your hired workers . ” ’
42015020	So he got up and started back to his father . “ He was still a long way from home when his father saw him ; his heart was filled with pity , and he ran , threw his arms around his son , and kissed him .
42015021	‘ Father , ’ the son said , ‘ I have sinned against God and against you . I am no longer fit to be called your son . ’
42015022	But the father called to his servants . ‘ Hurry ! ’ he said . ‘ Bring the best robe and put it on him . Put a ring on his finger and shoes on his feet .
42015023	Then go and get the prize calf and kill it , and let us celebrate with a feast !
42015024	For this son of mine was dead , but now he is alive ; he was lost , but now he has been found . ’ And so the feasting began .
42015025	“ In the meantime the older son was out in the field . On his way back , when he came close to the house , he heard the music and dancing .
42015026	So he called one of the servants and asked him , ‘ What's going on ? ’
42015027	‘ Your brother has come back home , ’ the servant answered , ‘ and your father has killed the prize calf , because he got him back safe and sound . ’
42015028	The older brother was so angry that he would not go into the house ; so his father came out and begged him to come in .
42015029	But he spoke back to his father , ‘ Look , all these years I have worked for you like a slave , and I have never disobeyed your orders . What have you given me ? Not even a goat for me to have a feast with my friends !
42015030	But this son of yours wasted all your property on prostitutes , and when he comes back home , you kill the prize calf for him ! ’
42015031	‘ My son , ’ the father answered , ‘ you are always here with me , and everything I have is yours .
42015032	But we had to celebrate and be happy , because your brother was dead , but now he is alive ; he was lost , but now he has been found . ’ ”
42016001	Jesus said to his disciples , “ There was once a rich man who had a servant who managed his property . The rich man was told that the manager was wasting his master's money ,
42016002	so he called him in and said , ‘ What is this I hear about you ? Turn in a complete account of your handling of my property , because you cannot be my manager any longer . ’
42016003	The servant said to himself , ‘ My master is going to dismiss me from my job . What shall I do ? I am not strong enough to dig ditches , and I am ashamed to beg .
42016004	Now I know what I will do ! Then when my job is gone , I shall have friends who will welcome me in their homes . ’
42016005	So he called in all the people who were in debt to his master . He asked the first one , ‘ How much do you owe my master ? ’
42016006	‘ One hundred barrels of olive oil , ’ he answered . ‘ Here is your account , ’ the manager told him ; ‘ sit down and write fifty . ’
42016007	Then he asked another one , ‘ And you—how much do you owe ? ’ ‘ A thousand bushels of wheat , ’ he answered . ‘ Here is your account , ’ the manager told him ; ‘ write eight hundred . ’
42016008	As a result the master of this dishonest manager praised him for doing such a shrewd thing ; because the people of this world are much more shrewd in handling their affairs than the people who belong to the light . ”
42016009	And Jesus went on to say , “ And so I tell you : make friends for yourselves with worldly wealth , so that when it gives out , you will be welcomed in the eternal home .
42016010	Whoever is faithful in small matters will be faithful in large ones ; whoever is dishonest in small matters will be dishonest in large ones .
42016011	If , then , you have not been faithful in handling worldly wealth , how can you be trusted with true wealth ?
42016012	And if you have not been faithful with what belongs to someone else , who will give you what belongs to you ?
42016013	“ No servant can be the slave of two masters ; such a slave will hate one and love the other or will be loyal to one and despise the other . You cannot serve both God and money . ”
42016014	When the Pharisees heard all this , they made fun of Jesus , because they loved money .

42016017	But it is easier for heaven and earth to disappear than for the smallest detail of the Law to be done away with .
42016018	“ Any man who divorces his wife and marries another woman commits adultery ; and the man who marries a divorced woman commits adultery .
42016019	“ There was once a rich man who dressed in the most expensive clothes and lived in great luxury every day .
42016020	There was also a poor man named Lazarus , covered with sores , who used to be brought to the rich man's door ,

42016022	The poor man died and was carried by the angels to sit beside Abraham at the feast in heaven . The rich man died and was buried ,
