42017001	Jesus said to his disciples , “ Things that make people fall into sin are bound to happen , but how terrible for the one who makes them happen !

42017007	“ Suppose one of you has a servant who is plowing or looking after the sheep . When he comes in from the field , do you tell him to hurry along and eat his meal ?

42017009	The servant does not deserve thanks for obeying orders , does he ?

42017011	As Jesus made his way to Jerusalem , he went along the border between Samaria and Galilee .

42019001	Jesus went on into Jericho and was passing through .

42019015	“ The man was made king and came back . At once he ordered his servants to appear before him , in order to find out how much they had earned .

42019019	To this one he said , ‘ You will be in charge of five cities . ’

42019025	But they said to him , ‘ Sir , he already has ten coins ! ’

42020001	One day when Jesus was in the Temple teaching the people and preaching the Good News , the chief priests and the teachers of the Law , together with the elders , came
42020002	and said to him , “ Tell us , what right do you have to do these things ? Who gave you such right ? ”

42020004	did John's right to baptize come from God or from human beings ? ”
42020005	They started to argue among themselves , “ What shall we say ? If we say , ‘ From God , ’ he will say , ‘ Why , then , did you not believe John ? ’
42020006	But if we say , ‘ From human beings , ’ this whole crowd here will stone us , because they are convinced that John was a prophet . ”
42020007	So they answered , “ We don't know where it came from . ”
42020008	And Jesus said to them , “ Neither will I tell you , then , by what right I do these things . ”
42020009	Then Jesus told the people this parable : “ There was once a man who planted a vineyard , rented it out to tenants , and then left home for a long time .

42020011	So he sent another slave ; but the tenants beat him also , treated him shamefully , and sent him back without a thing .
42020012	Then he sent a third slave ; the tenants wounded him , too , and threw him out .
42020013	Then the owner of the vineyard said , ‘ What shall I do ? I will send my own dear son ; surely they will respect him ! ’

42020021	These spies said to Jesus , “ Teacher , we know that what you say and teach is right . We know that you pay no attention to anyone's status , but teach the truth about God's will for people .

42020024	“ Show me a silver coin . Whose face and name are these on it ? ” “ The Emperor's , ” they answered .

42020027	Then some Sadducees , who say that people will not rise from death , came to Jesus and said ,

42020030	Then the second one married the woman ,
42020031	and then the third . The same thing happened to all seven—they died without having children .
42020032	Last of all , the woman died .
42020033	Now , on the day when the dead rise to life , whose wife will she be ? All seven of them had married her . ”

42024008	Then the women remembered his words ,

42024010	The women were Mary Magdalene , Joanna , and Mary the mother of James ; they and the other women with them told these things to the apostles .
42024011	But the apostles thought that what the women said was nonsense , and they did not believe them .
42024012	But Peter got up and ran to the tomb ; he bent down and saw the grave cloths but nothing else . Then he went back home amazed at what had happened .
42024013	On that same day two of Jesus' followers were going to a village named Emmaus , about seven miles from Jerusalem ,
42024014	and they were talking to each other about all the things that had happened .
42024015	As they talked and discussed , Jesus himself drew near and walked along with them ;
42024016	they saw him , but somehow did not recognize him .
42024017	Jesus said to them , “ What are you talking about to each other , as you walk along ? ” They stood still , with sad faces .
42024018	One of them , named Cleopas , asked him , “ Are you the only visitor in Jerusalem who doesn't know the things that have been happening there these last few days ? ”
42024019	“ What things ? ” he asked . “ The things that happened to Jesus of Nazareth , ” they answered . “ This man was a prophet and was considered by God and by all the people to be powerful in everything he said and did .
42024020	Our chief priests and rulers handed him over to be sentenced to death , and he was crucified .
42024021	And we had hoped that he would be the one who was going to set Israel free ! Besides all that , this is now the third day since it happened .
42024022	Some of the women of our group surprised us ; they went at dawn to the tomb ,
42024023	but could not find his body . They came back saying they had seen a vision of angels who told them that he is alive .
42024024	Some of our group went to the tomb and found it exactly as the women had said , but they did not see him . ”
42024025	Then Jesus said to them , “ How foolish you are , how slow you are to believe everything the prophets said !
42024026	Was it not necessary for the Messiah to suffer these things and then to enter his glory ? ”
42024027	And Jesus explained to them what was said about himself in all the Scriptures , beginning with the books of Moses and the writings of all the prophets .
42024028	As they came near the village to which they were going , Jesus acted as if he were going farther ;
42024029	but they held him back , saying , “ Stay with us ; the day is almost over and it is getting dark . ” So he went in to stay with them .
42024030	He sat down to eat with them , took the bread , and said the blessing ; then he broke the bread and gave it to them .
42024031	Then their eyes were opened and they recognized him , but he disappeared from their sight .
42024032	They said to each other , “ Wasn't it like a fire burning in us when he talked to us on the road and explained the Scriptures to us ? ”
42024033	They got up at once and went back to Jerusalem , where they found the eleven disciples gathered together with the others
42024034	and saying , “ The Lord is risen indeed ! He has appeared to Simon ! ”
42024035	The two then explained to them what had happened on the road , and how they had recognized the Lord when he broke the bread .
42024036	While the two were telling them this , suddenly the Lord himself stood among them and said to them , “ Peace be with you . ”
42024037	They were terrified , thinking that they were seeing a ghost .
42024038	But he said to them , “ Why are you alarmed ? Why are these doubts coming up in your minds ?
42024039	Look at my hands and my feet , and see that it is I myself . Feel me , and you will know , for a ghost doesn't have flesh and bones , as you can see I have . ”
42024040	He said this and showed them his hands and his feet .
42024041	They still could not believe , they were so full of joy and wonder ; so he asked them , “ Do you have anything here to eat ? ”
42024042	They gave him a piece of cooked fish ,
42024043	which he took and ate in their presence .
42024044	Then he said to them , “ These are the very things I told you about while I was still with you : everything written about me in the Law of Moses , the writings of the prophets , and the Psalms had to come true . ”
42024045	Then he opened their minds to understand the Scriptures ,
42024046	and said to them , “ This is what is written : the Messiah must suffer and must rise from death three days later ,
42024047	and in his name the message about repentance and the forgiveness of sins must be preached to all nations , beginning in Jerusalem .
42024048	You are witnesses of these things .
42024049	And I myself will send upon you what my Father has promised . But you must wait in the city until the power from above comes down upon you . ”
42024050	Then he led them out of the city as far as Bethany , where he raised his hands and blessed them .
42024051	As he was blessing them , he departed from them and was taken up into heaven .
42024052	They worshiped him and went back into Jerusalem , filled with great joy ,
42024053	and spent all their time in the Temple giving thanks to God .
43001001	In the beginning the Word already existed ; the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	From the very beginning the Word was with God .
43001003	Through him God made all things ; not one thing in all creation was made without him .
43001004	The Word was the source of life , and this life brought light to people .
43001005	The light shines in the darkness , and the darkness has never put it out .
43001006	God sent his messenger , a man named John ,
43001007	who came to tell people about the light , so that all should hear the message and believe .
43001008	He himself was not the light ; he came to tell about the light .
43001009	This was the real light—the light that comes into the world and shines on all people .
43001010	The Word was in the world , and though God made the world through him , yet the world did not recognize him .
43001011	He came to his own country , but his own people did not receive him .
43001012	Some , however , did receive him and believed in him ; so he gave them the right to become God's children .
43001013	They did not become God's children by natural means , that is , by being born as the children of a human father ; God himself was their Father .
43001014	The Word became a human being and , full of grace and truth , lived among us . We saw his glory , the glory which he received as the Father's only Son .
43001015	John spoke about him . He cried out , “ This is the one I was talking about when I said , ‘ He comes after me , but he is greater than I am , because he existed before I was born . ’ ”
43001016	Out of the fullness of his grace he has blessed us all , giving us one blessing after another .
43001017	God gave the Law through Moses , but grace and truth came through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has ever seen God . The only Son , who is the same as God and is at the Father's side , he has made him known .
43001019	The Jewish authorities in Jerusalem sent some priests and Levites to John to ask him , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	John did not refuse to answer , but spoke out openly and clearly , saying : “ I am not the Messiah . ”
43001021	“ Who are you , then ? ” they asked . “ Are you Elijah ? ” “ No , I am not , ” John answered . “ Are you the Prophet ? ” they asked . “ No , ” he replied .
43001022	“ Then tell us who you are , ” they said . “ We have to take an answer back to those who sent us . What do you say about yourself ? ”
43001023	John answered by quoting the prophet Isaiah : “ I am ‘ the voice of someone shouting in the desert : Make a straight path for the Lord to travel ! ’ ”
43001024	The messengers , who had been sent by the Pharisees ,
43001025	then asked John , “ If you are not the Messiah nor Elijah nor the Prophet , why do you baptize ? ”
43001026	John answered , “ I baptize with water , but among you stands the one you do not know .
43001027	He is coming after me , but I am not good enough even to untie his sandals . ”
43001028	All this happened in Bethany on the east side of the Jordan River , where John was baptizing .
43001029	The next day John saw Jesus coming to him , and said , “ There is the Lamb of God , who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is the one I was talking about when I said , ‘ A man is coming after me , but he is greater than I am , because he existed before I was born . ’
43001031	I did not know who he would be , but I came baptizing with water in order to make him known to the people of Israel . ”
43001032	And John gave this testimony : “ I saw the Spirit come down like a dove from heaven and stay on him .
43001033	I still did not know that he was the one , but God , who sent me to baptize with water , had said to me , ‘ You will see the Spirit come down and stay on a man ; he is the one who baptizes with the Holy Spirit . ’
43001034	I have seen it , ” said John , “ and I tell you that he is the Son of God . ”
43001035	The next day John was standing there again with two of his disciples ,
43001036	when he saw Jesus walking by . “ There is the Lamb of God ! ” he said .
43001037	The two disciples heard him say this and went with Jesus .
43001038	Jesus turned , saw them following him , and asked , “ What are you looking for ? ” They answered , “ Where do you live , Rabbi ? ” ( This word means “ Teacher . ” )
43001039	“ Come and see , ” he answered . ( It was then about four o'clock in the afternoon . ) So they went with him and saw where he lived , and spent the rest of that day with him .
43001040	One of them was Andrew , Simon Peter's brother .
43001041	At once he found his brother Simon and told him , “ We have found the Messiah . ” ( This word means “ Christ . ” )
43001042	Then he took Simon to Jesus . Jesus looked at him and said , “ Your name is Simon son of John , but you will be called Cephas . ” ( This is the same as Peter and means “ a rock . ” )
43001043	The next day Jesus decided to go to Galilee . He found Philip and said to him , “ Come with me ! ” (
43001044	Philip was from Bethsaida , the town where Andrew and Peter lived . )
43001045	Philip found Nathanael and told him , “ We have found the one whom Moses wrote about in the book of the Law and whom the prophets also wrote about . He is Jesus son of Joseph , from Nazareth . ”
43001046	“ Can anything good come from Nazareth ? ” Nathanael asked . “ Come and see , ” answered Philip .
43001047	When Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , he said about him , “ Here is a real Israelite ; there is nothing false in him ! ”
43001048	Nathanael asked him , “ How do you know me ? ” Jesus answered , “ I saw you when you were under the fig tree before Philip called you . ”
43001049	“ Teacher , ” answered Nathanael , “ you are the Son of God ! You are the King of Israel ! ”
43001050	Jesus said , “ Do you believe just because I told you I saw you when you were under the fig tree ? You will see much greater things than this ! ”
43001051	And he said to them , “ I am telling you the truth : you will see heaven open and God's angels going up and coming down on the Son of Man . ”
43002001	Two days later there was a wedding in the town of Cana in Galilee . Jesus' mother was there ,
43002002	and Jesus and his disciples had also been invited to the wedding .
43002003	When the wine had given out , Jesus' mother said to him , “ They are out of wine . ”
43002004	“ You must not tell me what to do , ” Jesus replied . “ My time has not yet come . ”
43002005	Jesus' mother then told the servants , “ Do whatever he tells you . ”
43002006	The Jews have rules about ritual washing , and for this purpose six stone water jars were there , each one large enough to hold between twenty and thirty gallons .
43002007	Jesus said to the servants , “ Fill these jars with water . ” They filled them to the brim ,
43002008	and then he told them , “ Now draw some water out and take it to the man in charge of the feast . ” They took him the water ,
43002009	which now had turned into wine , and he tasted it . He did not know where this wine had come from ( but , of course , the servants who had drawn out the water knew ) ; so he called the bridegroom
43002010	and said to him , “ Everyone else serves the best wine first , and after the guests have drunk a lot , he serves the ordinary wine . But you have kept the best wine until now ! ”
43002011	Jesus performed this first miracle in Cana in Galilee ; there he revealed his glory , and his disciples believed in him .
43002012	After this , Jesus and his mother , brothers , and disciples went to Capernaum and stayed there a few days .
43002013	It was almost time for the Passover Festival , so Jesus went to Jerusalem .
43002014	There in the Temple he found people selling cattle , sheep , and pigeons , and also the moneychangers sitting at their tables .
43002015	So he made a whip from cords and drove all the animals out of the Temple , both the sheep and the cattle ; he overturned the tables of the moneychangers and scattered their coins ;
43002016	and he ordered those who sold the pigeons , “ Take them out of here ! Stop making my Father's house a marketplace ! ”
43002017	His disciples remembered that the scripture says , “ My devotion to your house , O God , burns in me like a fire . ”
43002018	The Jewish authorities came back at him with a question , “ What miracle can you perform to show us that you have the right to do this ? ”
43002019	Jesus answered , “ Tear down this Temple , and in three days I will build it again . ”
43002020	“ Are you going to build it again in three days ? ” they asked him . “ It has taken forty-six years to build this Temple ! ”
43002021	But the temple Jesus was speaking about was his body .
43002022	So when he was raised from death , his disciples remembered that he had said this , and they believed the scripture and what Jesus had said .
43002023	While Jesus was in Jerusalem during the Passover Festival , many believed in him as they saw the miracles he performed .
43002024	But Jesus did not trust himself to them , because he knew them all .
43002025	There was no need for anyone to tell him about them , because he himself knew what was in their hearts .
43003001	There was a Jewish leader named Nicodemus , who belonged to the party of the Pharisees .
43003002	One night he went to Jesus and said to him , “ Rabbi , we know that you are a teacher sent by God . No one could perform the miracles you are doing unless God were with him . ”
43003003	Jesus answered , “ I am telling you the truth : no one can see the Kingdom of God without being born again . ”
43003004	“ How can a grown man be born again ? ” Nicodemus asked . “ He certainly cannot enter his mother's womb and be born a second time ! ”
43003005	“ I am telling you the truth , ” replied Jesus , “ that no one can enter the Kingdom of God without being born of water and the Spirit .
43003006	A person is born physically of human parents , but is born spiritually of the Spirit .
43003007	Do not be surprised because I tell you that you must all be born again .
43003008	The wind blows wherever it wishes ; you hear the sound it makes , but you do not know where it comes from or where it is going . It is like that with everyone who is born of the Spirit . ”
43003009	“ How can this be ? ” asked Nicodemus .
43003010	Jesus answered , “ You are a great teacher in Israel , and you don't know this ?
43003011	I am telling you the truth : we speak of what we know and report what we have seen , yet none of you is willing to accept our message .
43003012	You do not believe me when I tell you about the things of this world ; how will you ever believe me , then , when I tell you about the things of heaven ?
43003013	And no one has ever gone up to heaven except the Son of Man , who came down from heaven . ”
43003014	As Moses lifted up the bronze snake on a pole in the desert , in the same way the Son of Man must be lifted up ,
43003015	so that everyone who believes in him may have eternal life .
43003016	For God loved the world so much that he gave his only Son , so that everyone who believes in him may not die but have eternal life .
43003017	For God did not send his Son into the world to be its judge , but to be its savior .
43003018	Those who believe in the Son are not judged ; but those who do not believe have already been judged , because they have not believed in God's only Son .
43003019	This is how the judgment works : the light has come into the world , but people love the darkness rather than the light , because their deeds are evil .
43003020	Those who do evil things hate the light and will not come to the light , because they do not want their evil deeds to be shown up .
43003021	But those who do what is true come to the light in order that the light may show that what they did was in obedience to God .
43003022	After this , Jesus and his disciples went to the province of Judea , where he spent some time with them and baptized .
43003023	John also was baptizing in Aenon , not far from Salim , because there was plenty of water in that place . People were going to him , and he was baptizing them . (
43003024	This was before John had been put in prison . )
43003025	Some of John's disciples began arguing with a Jew about the matter of ritual washing .
43003026	So they went to John and told him , “ Teacher , you remember the man who was with you on the east side of the Jordan , the one you spoke about ? Well , he is baptizing now , and everyone is going to him ! ”
43003027	John answered , “ No one can have anything unless God gives it .
43003028	You yourselves are my witnesses that I said , ‘ I am not the Messiah , but I have been sent ahead of him . ’
43003029	The bridegroom is the one to whom the bride belongs ; but the bridegroom's friend , who stands by and listens , is glad when he hears the bridegroom's voice . This is how my own happiness is made complete .
43003030	He must become more important while I become less important . ”
43003031	He who comes from above is greater than all . He who is from the earth belongs to the earth and speaks about earthly matters , but he who comes from heaven is above all .
43003032	He tells what he has seen and heard , yet no one accepts his message .
43003033	But whoever accepts his message confirms by this that God is truthful .
43003034	The one whom God has sent speaks God's words , because God gives him the fullness of his Spirit .
43003035	The Father loves his Son and has put everything in his power .
43003036	Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life ; whoever disobeys the Son will not have life , but will remain under God's punishment .
43004001	The Pharisees heard that Jesus was winning and baptizing more disciples than John . (
43004002	Actually , Jesus himself did not baptize anyone ; only his disciples did . )
43004003	So when Jesus heard what was being said , he left Judea and went back to Galilee ;
43004004	on his way there he had to go through Samaria .
43004005	In Samaria he came to a town named Sychar , which was not far from the field that Jacob had given to his son Joseph .
43004006	Jacob's well was there , and Jesus , tired out by the trip , sat down by the well . It was about noon .
43004007	A Samaritan woman came to draw some water , and Jesus said to her , “ Give me a drink of water . ” (
43004008	His disciples had gone into town to buy food . )
43004009	The woman answered , “ You are a Jew , and I am a Samaritan—so how can you ask me for a drink ? ” ( Jews will not use the same cups and bowls that Samaritans use . )
43004010	Jesus answered , “ If you only knew what God gives and who it is that is asking you for a drink , you would ask him , and he would give you life-giving water . ”
43004011	“ Sir , ” the woman said , “ you don't have a bucket , and the well is deep . Where would you get that life-giving water ?
43004012	It was our ancestor Jacob who gave us this well ; he and his children and his flocks all drank from it . You don't claim to be greater than Jacob , do you ? ”
43004013	Jesus answered , “ Those who drink this water will get thirsty again ,
43004014	but those who drink the water that I will give them will never be thirsty again . The water that I will give them will become in them a spring which will provide them with life-giving water and give them eternal life . ”
43004015	“ Sir , ” the woman said , “ give me that water ! Then I will never be thirsty again , nor will I have to come here to draw water . ”
43004016	“ Go and call your husband , ” Jesus told her , “ and come back . ”
43004017	“ I don't have a husband , ” she answered . Jesus replied , “ You are right when you say you don't have a husband .
43004018	You have been married to five men , and the man you live with now is not really your husband . You have told me the truth . ”
43004019	“ I see you are a prophet , sir , ” the woman said .
43004020	“ My Samaritan ancestors worshiped God on this mountain , but you Jews say that Jerusalem is the place where we should worship God . ”
43004021	Jesus said to her , “ Believe me , woman , the time will come when people will not worship the Father either on this mountain or in Jerusalem .
43004022	You Samaritans do not really know whom you worship ; but we Jews know whom we worship , because it is from the Jews that salvation comes .
43004023	But the time is coming and is already here , when by the power of God's Spirit people will worship the Father as he really is , offering him the true worship that he wants .
43004024	God is Spirit , and only by the power of his Spirit can people worship him as he really is . ”
43004025	The woman said to him , “ I know that the Messiah will come , and when he comes , he will tell us everything . ”
43004026	Jesus answered , “ I am he , I who am talking with you . ”
43004027	At that moment Jesus' disciples returned , and they were greatly surprised to find him talking with a woman . But none of them said to her , “ What do you want ? ” or asked him , “ Why are you talking with her ? ”
43004028	Then the woman left her water jar , went back to the town , and said to the people there ,
43004029	“ Come and see the man who told me everything I have ever done . Could he be the Messiah ? ”
43004030	So they left the town and went to Jesus .
43004031	In the meantime the disciples were begging Jesus , “ Teacher , have something to eat ! ”
43004032	But he answered , “ I have food to eat that you know nothing about . ”
43004033	So the disciples started asking among themselves , “ Could somebody have brought him food ? ”
43004034	“ My food , ” Jesus said to them , “ is to obey the will of the one who sent me and to finish the work he gave me to do .
43004035	You have a saying , ‘ Four more months and then the harvest . ’ But I tell you , take a good look at the fields ; the crops are now ripe and ready to be harvested !
43004036	The one who reaps the harvest is being paid and gathers the crops for eternal life ; so the one who plants and the one who reaps will be glad together .
43004037	For the saying is true , ‘ Someone plants , someone else reaps . ’
43004038	I have sent you to reap a harvest in a field where you did not work ; others worked there , and you profit from their work . ”
43004039	Many of the Samaritans in that town believed in Jesus because the woman had said , “ He told me everything I have ever done . ”
43004040	So when the Samaritans came to him , they begged him to stay with them , and Jesus stayed there two days .
43004041	Many more believed because of his message ,
43004042	and they told the woman , “ We believe now , not because of what you said , but because we ourselves have heard him , and we know that he really is the Savior of the world . ”
43004043	After spending two days there , Jesus left and went to Galilee .
43004044	For he himself had said , “ Prophets are not respected in their own country . ”
43004045	When he arrived in Galilee , the people there welcomed him , because they had gone to the Passover Festival in Jerusalem and had seen everything that he had done during the festival .
43004046	Then Jesus went back to Cana in Galilee , where he had turned the water into wine . A government official was there whose son was sick in Capernaum .
43004047	When he heard that Jesus had come from Judea to Galilee , he went to him and asked him to go to Capernaum and heal his son , who was about to die .
43004048	Jesus said to him , “ None of you will ever believe unless you see miracles and wonders . ”
43004049	“ Sir , ” replied the official , “ come with me before my child dies . ”
43004050	Jesus said to him , “ Go ; your son will live ! ” The man believed Jesus' words and went .
43004051	On his way home his servants met him with the news , “ Your boy is going to live ! ”
43004052	He asked them what time it was when his son got better , and they answered , “ It was one o'clock yesterday afternoon when the fever left him . ”
43004053	Then the father remembered that it was at that very hour when Jesus had told him , “ Your son will live . ” So he and all his family believed .
43004054	This was the second miracle that Jesus performed after coming from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	After this , Jesus went to Jerusalem for a religious festival .
43005002	Near the Sheep Gate in Jerusalem there is a pool with five porches ; in Hebrew it is called Bethzatha .
43005003	A large crowd of sick people were lying on the porches—the blind , the lame , and the paralyzed .
43005005	A man was there who had been sick for thirty-eight years .
43005006	Jesus saw him lying there , and he knew that the man had been sick for such a long time ; so he asked him , “ Do you want to get well ? ”
43005007	The sick man answered , “ Sir , I don't have anyone here to put me in the pool when the water is stirred up ; while I am trying to get in , somebody else gets there first . ”
43005008	Jesus said to him , “ Get up , pick up your mat , and walk . ”
43005009	Immediately the man got well ; he picked up his mat and started walking . The day this happened was a Sabbath ,
43005010	so the Jewish authorities told the man who had been healed , “ This is a Sabbath , and it is against our Law for you to carry your mat . ”
43005011	He answered , “ The man who made me well told me to pick up my mat and walk . ”
43005012	They asked him , “ Who is the man who told you to do this ? ”
43005013	But the man who had been healed did not know who Jesus was , for there was a crowd in that place , and Jesus had slipped away .
43005014	Afterward , Jesus found him in the Temple and said , “ Listen , you are well now ; so stop sinning or something worse may happen to you . ”
43005015	Then the man left and told the Jewish authorities that it was Jesus who had healed him .
43005016	So they began to persecute Jesus , because he had done this healing on a Sabbath .
43005017	Jesus answered them , “ My Father is always working , and I too must work . ”
43005018	This saying made the Jewish authorities all the more determined to kill him ; not only had he broken the Sabbath law , but he had said that God was his own Father and in this way had made himself equal with God .
43005019	So Jesus answered them , “ I tell you the truth : the Son can do nothing on his own ; he does only what he sees his Father doing . What the Father does , the Son also does .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son and shows him all that he himself is doing . He will show him even greater things to do than this , and you will all be amazed .
43005021	Just as the Father raises the dead and gives them life , in the same way the Son gives life to those he wants to .
43005022	Nor does the Father himself judge anyone . He has given his Son the full right to judge ,
43005023	so that all will honor the Son in the same way as they honor the Father . Whoever does not honor the Son does not honor the Father who sent him .
43005024	“ I am telling you the truth : those who hear my words and believe in him who sent me have eternal life . They will not be judged , but have already passed from death to life .
43005025	I am telling you the truth : the time is coming—the time has already come—when the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God , and those who hear it will come to life .
43005026	Just as the Father is himself the source of life , in the same way he has made his Son to be the source of life .
43005027	And he has given the Son the right to judge , because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	Do not be surprised at this ; the time is coming when all the dead will hear his voice
43005029	and come out of their graves : those who have done good will rise and live , and those who have done evil will rise and be condemned .
43005030	“ I can do nothing on my own authority ; I judge only as God tells me , so my judgment is right , because I am not trying to do what I want , but only what he who sent me wants .
43005031	“ If I testify on my own behalf , what I say is not to be accepted as real proof .
43005032	But there is someone else who testifies on my behalf , and I know that what he says about me is true .
43005033	John is the one to whom you sent your messengers , and he spoke on behalf of the truth .
43005034	It is not that I must have a human witness ; I say this only in order that you may be saved .
43005035	John was like a lamp , burning and shining , and you were willing for a while to enjoy his light .
43005036	But I have a witness on my behalf which is even greater than the witness that John gave : what I do , that is , the deeds my Father gave me to do , these speak on my behalf and show that the Father has sent me .
43005037	And the Father , who sent me , also testifies on my behalf . You have never heard his voice or seen his face ,
43005038	and you do not keep his message in your hearts , for you do not believe in the one whom he sent .
43005039	You study the Scriptures , because you think that in them you will find eternal life . And these very Scriptures speak about me !
43005040	Yet you are not willing to come to me in order to have life .
43005041	“ I am not looking for human praise .
43005042	But I know what kind of people you are , and I know that you have no love for God in your hearts .
43005043	I have come with my Father's authority , but you have not received me ; when , however , someone comes with his own authority , you will receive him .
43005044	You like to receive praise from one another , but you do not try to win praise from the one who alone is God ; how , then , can you believe me ?
43005045	Do not think , however , that I am the one who will accuse you to my Father . Moses , in whom you have put your hope , is the very one who will accuse you .
43005046	If you had really believed Moses , you would have believed me , because he wrote about me .
43005047	But since you do not believe what he wrote , how can you believe what I say ? ”
43006001	After this , Jesus went across Lake Galilee ( or , Lake Tiberias , as it is also called ) .
43006002	A large crowd followed him , because they had seen his miracles of healing the sick .
43006003	Jesus went up a hill and sat down with his disciples .
43006004	The time for the Passover Festival was near .
43006005	Jesus looked around and saw that a large crowd was coming to him , so he asked Philip , “ Where can we buy enough food to feed all these people ? ” (
43006006	He said this to test Philip ; actually he already knew what he would do . )
43006007	Philip answered , “ For everyone to have even a little , it would take more than two hundred silver coins to buy enough bread . ”
43006008	Another one of his disciples , Andrew , who was Simon Peter's brother , said ,
43006009	“ There is a boy here who has five loaves of barley bread and two fish . But they will certainly not be enough for all these people . ”
43006010	“ Make the people sit down , ” Jesus told them . ( There was a lot of grass there . ) So all the people sat down ; there were about five thousand men .
43006011	Jesus took the bread , gave thanks to God , and distributed it to the people who were sitting there . He did the same with the fish , and they all had as much as they wanted .
43006012	When they were all full , he said to his disciples , “ Gather the pieces left over ; let us not waste a bit . ”
43006013	So they gathered them all and filled twelve baskets with the pieces left over from the five barley loaves which the people had eaten .
43006014	Seeing this miracle that Jesus had performed , the people there said , “ Surely this is the Prophet who was to come into the world ! ”
43006015	Jesus knew that they were about to come and seize him in order to make him king by force ; so he went off again to the hills by himself .
43006016	When evening came , Jesus' disciples went down to the lake ,
43006017	got into a boat , and went back across the lake toward Capernaum . Night came on , and Jesus still had not come to them .
43006018	By then a strong wind was blowing and stirring up the water .
43006019	The disciples had rowed about three or four miles when they saw Jesus walking on the water , coming near the boat , and they were terrified .
43006020	“ Don't be afraid , ” Jesus told them , “ it is I ! ”
43006021	Then they willingly took him into the boat , and immediately the boat reached land at the place they were heading for .
43006022	Next day the crowd which had stayed on the other side of the lake realized that there had been only one boat there . They knew that Jesus had not gone in it with his disciples , but that they had left without him .
43006023	Other boats , which were from Tiberias , came to shore near the place where the crowd had eaten the bread after the Lord had given thanks .
43006024	When the crowd saw that Jesus was not there , nor his disciples , they got into those boats and went to Capernaum , looking for him .
43006025	When the people found Jesus on the other side of the lake , they said to him , “ Teacher , when did you get here ? ”
43006026	Jesus answered , “ I am telling you the truth : you are looking for me because you ate the bread and had all you wanted , not because you understood my miracles .
43006027	Do not work for food that spoils ; instead , work for the food that lasts for eternal life . This is the food which the Son of Man will give you , because God , the Father , has put his mark of approval on him . ”
43006028	So they asked him , “ What can we do in order to do what God wants us to do ? ”
43006029	Jesus answered , “ What God wants you to do is to believe in the one he sent . ”
43006030	They replied , “ What miracle will you perform so that we may see it and believe you ? What will you do ?
43006031	Our ancestors ate manna in the desert , just as the scripture says , ‘ He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ’ ”
43006032	“ I am telling you the truth , ” Jesus said . “ What Moses gave you was not the bread from heaven ; it is my Father who gives you the real bread from heaven .
43006033	For the bread that God gives is he who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . ”
43006034	“ Sir , ” they asked him , “ give us this bread always . ”
43006035	“ I am the bread of life , ” Jesus told them . “ Those who come to me will never be hungry ; those who believe in me will never be thirsty .
43006036	Now , I told you that you have seen me but will not believe .
43006037	Everyone whom my Father gives me will come to me . I will never turn away anyone who comes to me ,
43006038	because I have come down from heaven to do not my own will but the will of him who sent me .
43006039	And it is the will of him who sent me that I should not lose any of all those he has given me , but that I should raise them all to life on the last day .
43006040	For what my Father wants is that all who see the Son and believe in him should have eternal life . And I will raise them to life on the last day . ”
43006041	The people started grumbling about him , because he said , “ I am the bread that came down from heaven . ”
43006042	So they said , “ This man is Jesus son of Joseph , isn't he ? We know his father and mother . How , then , does he now say he came down from heaven ? ”
43006043	Jesus answered , “ Stop grumbling among yourselves .
43006044	People cannot come to me unless the Father who sent me draws them to me ; and I will raise them to life on the last day .
43006045	The prophets wrote , ‘ Everyone will be taught by God . ’ Anyone who hears the Father and learns from him comes to me .
43006046	This does not mean that anyone has seen the Father ; he who is from God is the only one who has seen the Father .
43006047	I am telling you the truth : he who believes has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your ancestors ate manna in the desert , but they died .
43006050	But the bread that comes down from heaven is of such a kind that whoever eats it will not die .
43006051	I am the living bread that came down from heaven . If you eat this bread , you will live forever . The bread that I will give you is my flesh , which I give so that the world may live . ”
43006052	This started an angry argument among them . “ How can this man give us his flesh to eat ? ” they asked .
43006053	Jesus said to them , “ I am telling you the truth : if you do not eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood , you will not have life in yourselves .
43006054	Those who eat my flesh and drink my blood have eternal life , and I will raise them to life on the last day .
43006055	For my flesh is the real food ; my blood is the real drink .
43006056	Those who eat my flesh and drink my blood live in me , and I live in them .
43006057	The living Father sent me , and because of him I live also . In the same way whoever eats me will live because of me .
43006058	This , then , is the bread that came down from heaven ; it is not like the bread that your ancestors ate , but then later died . Those who eat this bread will live forever . ”
43006059	Jesus said this as he taught in the synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	Many of his followers heard this and said , “ This teaching is too hard . Who can listen to it ? ”
43006061	Without being told , Jesus knew that they were grumbling about this , so he said to them , “ Does this make you want to give up ?
43006062	Suppose , then , that you should see the Son of Man go back up to the place where he was before ?
43006063	What gives life is God's Spirit ; human power is of no use at all . The words I have spoken to you bring God's life-giving Spirit .
43006064	Yet some of you do not believe . ” ( Jesus knew from the very beginning who were the ones that would not believe and which one would betray him . )
43006065	And he added , “ This is the very reason I told you that no people can come to me unless the Father makes it possible for them to do so . ”
43006066	Because of this , many of Jesus' followers turned back and would not go with him any more .
43006067	So he asked the twelve disciples , “ And you—would you also like to leave ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter answered him , “ Lord , to whom would we go ? You have the words that give eternal life .
43006069	And now we believe and know that you are the Holy One who has come from God . ”
43006070	Jesus replied , “ I chose the twelve of you , didn't I ? Yet one of you is a devil ! ”
43006071	He was talking about Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot . For Judas , even though he was one of the twelve disciples , was going to betray him .
43007001	After this , Jesus traveled in Galilee ; he did not want to travel in Judea , because the Jewish authorities there were wanting to kill him .
43007002	The time for the Festival of Shelters was near ,
43007003	so Jesus' brothers said to him , “ Leave this place and go to Judea , so that your followers will see the things that you are doing .
43007004	People don't hide what they are doing if they want to be well known . Since you are doing these things , let the whole world know about you ! ” (
43007005	Not even his brothers believed in him . )
43007006	Jesus said to them , “ The right time for me has not yet come . Any time is right for you .
43007007	The world cannot hate you , but it hates me , because I keep telling it that its ways are bad .
43007008	You go on to the festival . I am not going to this festival , because the right time has not come for me . ”
43007009	He said this and then stayed on in Galilee .
43007010	After his brothers had gone to the festival , Jesus also went ; however , he did not go openly , but secretly .
43007011	The Jewish authorities were looking for him at the festival . “ Where is he ? ” they asked .
43007012	There was much whispering about him in the crowd . “ He is a good man , ” some people said . “ No , ” others said , “ he fools the people . ”
43007013	But no one talked about him openly , because they were afraid of the Jewish authorities .
43007014	The festival was nearly half over when Jesus went to the Temple and began teaching .
43007015	The Jewish authorities were greatly surprised and said , “ How does this man know so much when he has never been to school ? ”
43007016	Jesus answered , “ What I teach is not my own teaching , but it comes from God , who sent me .
43007017	Whoever is willing to do what God wants will know whether what I teach comes from God or whether I speak on my own authority .
43007018	Those who speak on their own authority are trying to gain glory for themselves . But he who wants glory for the one who sent him is honest , and there is nothing false in him .
43007019	Moses gave you the Law , didn't he ? But not one of you obeys the Law . Why are you trying to kill me ? ”
43007020	“ You have a demon in you ! ” the crowd answered . “ Who is trying to kill you ? ”
43007021	Jesus answered , “ I performed one miracle , and you were all surprised .
43007022	Moses ordered you to circumcise your sons ( although it was not Moses but your ancestors who started it ) , and so you circumcise a boy on the Sabbath .
43007023	If a boy is circumcised on the Sabbath so that Moses' Law is not broken , why are you angry with me because I made a man completely well on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Stop judging by external standards , and judge by true standards . ”
43007025	Some of the people of Jerusalem said , “ Isn't this the man the authorities are trying to kill ?
43007026	Look ! He is talking in public , and they say nothing against him ! Can it be that they really know that he is the Messiah ?
43007027	But when the Messiah comes , no one will know where he is from . And we all know where this man comes from . ”
43007028	As Jesus taught in the Temple , he said in a loud voice , “ Do you really know me and know where I am from ? I have not come on my own authority . He who sent me , however , is truthful . You do not know him ,
43007029	but I know him , because I come from him and he sent me . ”
43007030	Then they tried to seize him , but no one laid a hand on him , because his hour had not yet come .
43007031	But many in the crowd believed in him and said , “ When the Messiah comes , will he perform more miracles than this man has ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard the crowd whispering these things about Jesus , so they and the chief priests sent some guards to arrest him .
43007033	Jesus said , “ I shall be with you a little while longer , and then I shall go away to him who sent me .
43007034	You will look for me , but you will not find me , because you cannot go where I will be . ”
43007035	The Jewish authorities said among themselves , “ Where is he about to go so that we shall not find him ? Will he go to the Greek cities where our people live , and teach the Greeks ?
43007036	He says that we will look for him but will not find him , and that we cannot go where he will be . What does he mean ? ”
43007037	On the last and most important day of the festival Jesus stood up and said in a loud voice , “ Whoever is thirsty should come to me , and
43007038	whoever believes in me should drink . As the scripture says , ‘ Streams of life-giving water will pour out from his side . ’ ”
43007039	Jesus said this about the Spirit , which those who believed in him were going to receive . At that time the Spirit had not yet been given , because Jesus had not been raised to glory .
43007040	Some of the people in the crowd heard him say this and said , “ This man is really the Prophet ! ”
43007041	Others said , “ He is the Messiah ! ” But others said , “ The Messiah will not come from Galilee !
43007042	The scripture says that the Messiah will be a descendant of King David and will be born in Bethlehem , the town where David lived . ”
43007043	So there was a division in the crowd because of Jesus .
43007044	Some wanted to seize him , but no one laid a hand on him .
43007045	When the guards went back , the chief priests and Pharisees asked them , “ Why did you not bring him ? ”
43007046	The guards answered , “ Nobody has ever talked the way this man does ! ”
43007047	“ Did he fool you , too ? ” the Pharisees asked them .
43007048	“ Have you ever known one of the authorities or one Pharisee to believe in him ?
43007049	This crowd does not know the Law of Moses , so they are under God's curse ! ”
43007050	One of the Pharisees there was Nicodemus , the man who had gone to see Jesus before . He said to the others ,
43007051	“ According to our Law we cannot condemn people before hearing them and finding out what they have done . ”
43007052	“ Well , ” they answered , “ are you also from Galilee ? Study the Scriptures and you will learn that no prophet ever comes from Galilee . ”
43008001	Then everyone went home , but Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	Early the next morning he went back to the Temple . All the people gathered around him , and he sat down and began to teach them .
43008003	The teachers of the Law and the Pharisees brought in a woman who had been caught committing adultery , and they made her stand before them all .
43008004	“ Teacher , ” they said to Jesus , “ this woman was caught in the very act of committing adultery .
43008005	In our Law Moses commanded that such a woman must be stoned to death . Now , what do you say ? ”
43008006	They said this to trap Jesus , so that they could accuse him . But he bent over and wrote on the ground with his finger .
43008007	As they stood there asking him questions , he straightened up and said to them , “ Whichever one of you has committed no sin may throw the first stone at her . ”
43008008	Then he bent over again and wrote on the ground .
43008009	When they heard this , they all left , one by one , the older ones first . Jesus was left alone , with the woman still standing there .
43008010	He straightened up and said to her , “ Where are they ? Is there no one left to condemn you ? ”
43008011	“ No one , sir , ” she answered . “ Well , then , ” Jesus said , “ I do not condemn you either . Go , but do not sin again . ” ]
43008012	Jesus spoke to the Pharisees again . “ I am the light of the world , ” he said . “ Whoever follows me will have the light of life and will never walk in darkness . ”
43008013	The Pharisees said to him , “ Now you are testifying on your own behalf ; what you say proves nothing . ”
43008014	“ No , ” Jesus answered , “ even though I do testify on my own behalf , what I say is true , because I know where I came from and where I am going . You do not know where I came from or where I am going .
43008015	You make judgments in a purely human way ; I pass judgment on no one .
43008016	But if I were to do so , my judgment would be true , because I am not alone in this ; the Father who sent me is with me .
43008017	It is written in your Law that when two witnesses agree , what they say is true .
43008018	I testify on my own behalf , and the Father who sent me also testifies on my behalf . ”
43008019	“ Where is your father ? ” they asked him . “ You know neither me nor my Father , ” Jesus answered . “ If you knew me , you would know my Father also . ”
43008020	Jesus said all this as he taught in the Temple , in the room where the offering boxes were placed . And no one arrested him , because his hour had not come .
43008021	Again Jesus said to them , “ I will go away ; you will look for me , but you will die in your sins . You cannot go where I am going . ”
43008022	So the Jewish authorities said , “ He says that we cannot go where he is going . Does this mean that he will kill himself ? ”
43008023	Jesus answered , “ You belong to this world here below , but I come from above . You are from this world , but I am not from this world .
43008024	That is why I told you that you will die in your sins . And you will die in your sins if you do not believe that ‘ I Am Who I Am ’ . ”
43008025	“ Who are you ? ” they asked him . Jesus answered , “ What I have told you from the very beginning .
43008026	I have much to say about you , much to condemn you for . The one who sent me , however , is truthful , and I tell the world only what I have heard from him . ”
43008027	They did not understand that Jesus was talking to them about the Father .
43008028	So he said to them , “ When you lift up the Son of Man , you will know that ‘ I Am Who I Am ’ ; then you will know that I do nothing on my own authority , but I say only what the Father has instructed me to say .
43008029	And he who sent me is with me ; he has not left me alone , because I always do what pleases him . ”
43008030	Many who heard Jesus say these things believed in him .
43008031	So Jesus said to those who believed in him , “ If you obey my teaching , you are really my disciples ;
43008032	you will know the truth , and the truth will set you free . ”
43008033	“ We are the descendants of Abraham , ” they answered , “ and we have never been anybody's slaves . What do you mean , then , by saying , ‘ You will be free ’ ? ”
43008034	Jesus said to them , “ I am telling you the truth : everyone who sins is a slave of sin .
43008035	A slave does not belong to a family permanently , but a son belongs there forever .
43008036	If the Son sets you free , then you will be really free .
43008037	I know you are Abraham's descendants . Yet you are trying to kill me , because you will not accept my teaching .
43008038	I talk about what my Father has shown me , but you do what your father has told you . ”
43008039	They answered him , “ Our father is Abraham . ” “ If you really were Abraham's children , ” Jesus replied , “ you would do the same things that he did .
43008040	All I have ever done is to tell you the truth I heard from God , yet you are trying to kill me . Abraham did nothing like this !
43008041	You are doing what your father did . ” “ God himself is the only Father we have , ” they answered , “ and we are his true children . ”
43008042	Jesus said to them , “ If God really were your Father , you would love me , because I came from God and now I am here . I did not come on my own authority , but he sent me .
43008043	Why do you not understand what I say ? It is because you cannot bear to listen to my message .
43008044	You are the children of your father , the Devil , and you want to follow your father's desires . From the very beginning he was a murderer and has never been on the side of truth , because there is no truth in him . When he tells a lie , he is only doing what is natural to him , because he is a liar and the father of all lies .
43008045	But I tell the truth , and that is why you do not believe me .
43008046	Which one of you can prove that I am guilty of sin ? If I tell the truth , then why do you not believe me ?
43008047	He who comes from God listens to God's words . You , however , are not from God , and that is why you will not listen . ”
43008048	They asked Jesus , “ Were we not right in saying that you are a Samaritan and have a demon in you ? ”
43008049	“ I have no demon , ” Jesus answered . “ I honor my Father , but you dishonor me .
43008050	I am not seeking honor for myself . But there is one who is seeking it and who judges in my favor .
43008051	I am telling you the truth : whoever obeys my teaching will never die . ”
43008052	They said to him , “ Now we know for sure that you have a demon ! Abraham died , and the prophets died , yet you say that whoever obeys your teaching will never die .
43008053	Our father Abraham died ; you do not claim to be greater than Abraham , do you ? And the prophets also died . Who do you think you are ? ”
43008054	Jesus answered , “ If I were to honor myself , that honor would be worth nothing . The one who honors me is my Father—the very one you say is your God .
43008055	You have never known him , but I know him . If I were to say that I do not know him , I would be a liar like you . But I do know him , and I obey his word .
43008056	Your father Abraham rejoiced that he was to see the time of my coming ; he saw it and was glad . ”
43008057	They said to him , “ You are not even fifty years old—and you have seen Abraham ? ”
43008058	“ I am telling you the truth , ” Jesus replied . “ Before Abraham was born , ‘ I Am ’ . ”
43008059	Then they picked up stones to throw at him , but Jesus hid himself and left the Temple .
43009001	As Jesus was walking along , he saw a man who had been born blind .
43009002	His disciples asked him , “ Teacher , whose sin caused him to be born blind ? Was it his own or his parents' sin ? ”
43009003	Jesus answered , “ His blindness has nothing to do with his sins or his parents' sins . He is blind so that God's power might be seen at work in him .
43009004	As long as it is day , we must do the work of him who sent me ; night is coming when no one can work .
43009005	While I am in the world , I am the light for the world . ”
43009006	After he said this , Jesus spat on the ground and made some mud with the spittle ; he rubbed the mud on the man's eyes
43009007	and told him , “ Go and wash your face in the Pool of Siloam . ” ( This name means “ Sent . ” ) So the man went , washed his face , and came back seeing .
43009008	His neighbors , then , and the people who had seen him begging before this , asked , “ Isn't this the man who used to sit and beg ? ”
43009009	Some said , “ He is the one , ” but others said , “ No he isn't ; he just looks like him . ” So the man himself said , “ I am the man . ”
43009010	“ How is it that you can now see ? ” they asked him .
43009011	He answered , “ The man called Jesus made some mud , rubbed it on my eyes , and told me to go to Siloam and wash my face . So I went , and as soon as I washed , I could see . ”
43009012	“ Where is he ? ” they asked . “ I don't know , ” he answered .
43009013	Then they took to the Pharisees the man who had been blind .
43009014	The day that Jesus made the mud and cured him of his blindness was a Sabbath .
43009015	The Pharisees , then , asked the man again how he had received his sight . He told them , “ He put some mud on my eyes ; I washed my face , and now I can see . ”
43009016	Some of the Pharisees said , “ The man who did this cannot be from God , for he does not obey the Sabbath law . ” Others , however , said , “ How could a man who is a sinner perform such miracles as these ? ” And there was a division among them .
43009017	So the Pharisees asked the man once more , “ You say he cured you of your blindness—well , what do you say about him ? ” “ He is a prophet , ” the man answered .
43009018	The Jewish authorities , however , were not willing to believe that he had been blind and could now see , until they called his parents
43009019	and asked them , “ Is this your son ? You say that he was born blind ; how is it , then , that he can now see ? ”
43009020	His parents answered , “ We know that he is our son , and we know that he was born blind .
43009021	But we do not know how it is that he is now able to see , nor do we know who cured him of his blindness . Ask him ; he is old enough , and he can answer for himself ! ”
43009022	His parents said this because they were afraid of the Jewish authorities , who had already agreed that anyone who said he believed that Jesus was the Messiah would be expelled from the synagogue .
43009023	That is why his parents said , “ He is old enough ; ask him ! ”
43009024	A second time they called back the man who had been born blind , and said to him , “ Promise before God that you will tell the truth ! We know that this man who cured you is a sinner . ”
43009025	“ I do not know if he is a sinner or not , ” the man replied . “ One thing I do know : I was blind , and now I see . ”
43009026	“ What did he do to you ? ” they asked . “ How did he cure you of your blindness ? ”
43009027	“ I have already told you , ” he answered , “ and you would not listen . Why do you want to hear it again ? Maybe you , too , would like to be his disciples ? ”
43009028	They insulted him and said , “ You are that fellow's disciple ; but we are Moses' disciples .
43009029	We know that God spoke to Moses ; as for that fellow , however , we do not even know where he comes from ! ”
43009030	The man answered , “ What a strange thing that is ! You do not know where he comes from , but he cured me of my blindness !
43009031	We know that God does not listen to sinners ; he does listen to people who respect him and do what he wants them to do .
43009032	Since the beginning of the world nobody has ever heard of anyone giving sight to a person born blind .
43009033	Unless this man came from God , he would not be able to do a thing . ”
43009034	They answered , “ You were born and brought up in sin—and you are trying to teach us ? ” And they expelled him from the synagogue .
43009035	When Jesus heard what had happened , he found the man and asked him , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	The man answered , “ Tell me who he is , sir , so that I can believe in him ! ”
43009037	Jesus said to him , “ You have already seen him , and he is the one who is talking with you now . ”
43009038	“ I believe , Lord ! ” the man said , and knelt down before Jesus .
43009039	Jesus said , “ I came to this world to judge , so that the blind should see and those who see should become blind . ”
43009040	Some Pharisees who were there with him heard him say this and asked him , “ Surely you don't mean that we are blind , too ? ”
43009041	Jesus answered , “ If you were blind , then you would not be guilty ; but since you claim that you can see , this means that you are still guilty . ”
43010001	Jesus said , “ I am telling you the truth : the man who does not enter the sheep pen by the gate , but climbs in some other way , is a thief and a robber .
43010002	The man who goes in through the gate is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	The gatekeeper opens the gate for him ; the sheep hear his voice as he calls his own sheep by name , and he leads them out .
43010004	When he has brought them out , he goes ahead of them , and the sheep follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	They will not follow someone else ; instead , they will run away from such a person , because they do not know his voice . ”
43010006	Jesus told them this parable , but they did not understand what he meant .
43010007	So Jesus said again , “ I am telling you the truth : I am the gate for the sheep .
43010008	All others who came before me are thieves and robbers , but the sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	I am the gate . Those who come in by me will be saved ; they will come in and go out and find pasture .
43010010	The thief comes only in order to steal , kill , and destroy . I have come in order that you might have life—life in all its fullness .
43010011	“ I am the good shepherd , who is willing to die for the sheep .
43010012	When the hired man , who is not a shepherd and does not own the sheep , sees a wolf coming , he leaves the sheep and runs away ; so the wolf snatches the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	The hired man runs away because he is only a hired man and does not care about the sheep .
43010016	There are other sheep which belong to me that are not in this sheep pen . I must bring them , too ; they will listen to my voice , and they will become one flock with one shepherd .
43010017	“ The Father loves me because I am willing to give up my life , in order that I may receive it back again .
43010018	No one takes my life away from me . I give it up of my own free will . I have the right to give it up , and I have the right to take it back . This is what my Father has commanded me to do . ”
43010019	Again there was a division among the people because of these words .
43010020	Many of them were saying , “ He has a demon ! He is crazy ! Why do you listen to him ? ”
43010021	But others were saying , “ A man with a demon could not talk like this ! How could a demon give sight to blind people ? ”
43010022	It was winter , and the Festival of the Dedication of the Temple was being celebrated in Jerusalem .
43010023	Jesus was walking in Solomon's Porch in the Temple ,
43010024	when the people gathered around him and asked , “ How long are you going to keep us in suspense ? Tell us the plain truth : are you the Messiah ? ”
43010025	Jesus answered , “ I have already told you , but you would not believe me . The deeds I do by my Father's authority speak on my behalf ;
43010026	but you will not believe , for you are not my sheep .
43010027	My sheep listen to my voice ; I know them , and they follow me .
43010028	I give them eternal life , and they shall never die . No one can snatch them away from me .
43010029	What my Father has given me is greater than everything , and no one can snatch them away from the Father's care .
43010030	The Father and I are one . ”
43010031	Then the people again picked up stones to throw at him .
43010032	Jesus said to them , “ I have done many good deeds in your presence which the Father gave me to do ; for which one of these do you want to stone me ? ”
43010033	They answered , “ We do not want to stone you because of any good deeds , but because of your blasphemy ! You are only a man , but you are trying to make yourself God ! ”
43010034	Jesus answered , “ It is written in your own Law that God said , ‘ You are gods . ’
43010035	We know that what the scripture says is true forever ; and God called those people gods , the people to whom his message was given .
43010036	As for me , the Father chose me and sent me into the world . How , then , can you say that I blaspheme because I said that I am the Son of God ?
43010037	Do not believe me , then , if I am not doing the things my Father wants me to do .
43010038	But if I do them , even though you do not believe me , you should at least believe my deeds , in order that you may know once and for all that the Father is in me and that I am in the Father . ”
43010039	Once more they tried to seize Jesus , but he slipped out of their hands .
43010040	Jesus then went back again across the Jordan River to the place where John had been baptizing , and he stayed there .
43010041	Many people came to him . “ John performed no miracles , ” they said , “ but everything he said about this man was true . ”
43010042	And many people there believed in him .
43011001	A man named Lazarus , who lived in Bethany , became sick . Bethany was the town where Mary and her sister Martha lived . (
43011002	This Mary was the one who poured the perfume on the Lord's feet and wiped them with her hair ; it was her brother Lazarus who was sick . )
43011003	The sisters sent Jesus a message : “ Lord , your dear friend is sick . ”
43011004	When Jesus heard it , he said , “ The final result of this sickness will not be the death of Lazarus ; this has happened in order to bring glory to God , and it will be the means by which the Son of God will receive glory . ”
43011005	Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus .
43011006	Yet when he received the news that Lazarus was sick , he stayed where he was for two more days .
43011007	Then he said to the disciples , “ Let us go back to Judea . ”
43011008	“ Teacher , ” the disciples answered , “ just a short time ago the people there wanted to stone you ; and are you planning to go back ? ”
43011009	Jesus said , “ A day has twelve hours , doesn't it ? So those who walk in broad daylight do not stumble , for they see the light of this world .
43011010	But if they walk during the night they stumble , because they have no light . ”
43011011	Jesus said this and then added , “ Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep , but I will go and wake him up . ”
43011012	The disciples answered , “ If he is asleep , Lord , he will get well . ”
43011013	Jesus meant that Lazarus had died , but they thought he meant natural sleep .
43011014	So Jesus told them plainly , “ Lazarus is dead ,
43011015	but for your sake I am glad that I was not with him , so that you will believe . Let us go to him . ”
43011016	Thomas ( called the Twin ) said to his fellow disciples , “ Let us all go along with the Teacher , so that we may die with him ! ”
43011017	When Jesus arrived , he found that Lazarus had been buried four days before .
43011018	Bethany was less than two miles from Jerusalem ,
43011019	and many Judeans had come to see Martha and Mary to comfort them about their brother's death .
43011020	When Martha heard that Jesus was coming , she went out to meet him , but Mary stayed in the house .
43011021	Martha said to Jesus , “ If you had been here , Lord , my brother would not have died !
43011022	But I know that even now God will give you whatever you ask him for . ”
43011023	“ Your brother will rise to life , ” Jesus told her .
43011024	“ I know , ” she replied , “ that he will rise to life on the last day . ”
43011025	Jesus said to her , “ I am the resurrection and the life . Those who believe in me will live , even though they die ;
43011026	and those who live and believe in me will never die . Do you believe this ? ”
43011027	“ Yes , Lord ! ” she answered . “ I do believe that you are the Messiah , the Son of God , who was to come into the world . ”
43011028	After Martha said this , she went back and called her sister Mary privately . “ The Teacher is here , ” she told her , “ and is asking for you . ”
43011029	When Mary heard this , she got up and hurried out to meet him . (
43011030	Jesus had not yet arrived in the village , but was still in the place where Martha had met him . )
43011031	The people who were in the house with Mary comforting her followed her when they saw her get up and hurry out . They thought that she was going to the grave to weep there .
43011032	Mary arrived where Jesus was , and as soon as she saw him , she fell at his feet . “ Lord , ” she said , “ if you had been here , my brother would not have died ! ”
43011033	Jesus saw her weeping , and he saw how the people with her were weeping also ; his heart was touched , and he was deeply moved .
43011034	“ Where have you buried him ? ” he asked them . “ Come and see , Lord , ” they answered .
43011035	Jesus wept .
43011036	“ See how much he loved him ! ” the people said .
43011037	But some of them said , “ He gave sight to the blind man , didn't he ? Could he not have kept Lazarus from dying ? ”
43011038	Deeply moved once more , Jesus went to the tomb , which was a cave with a stone placed at the entrance .
43011039	“ Take the stone away ! ” Jesus ordered . Martha , the dead man's sister , answered , “ There will be a bad smell , Lord . He has been buried four days ! ”
43011040	Jesus said to her , “ Didn't I tell you that you would see God's glory if you believed ? ”
43011041	They took the stone away . Jesus looked up and said , “ I thank you , Father , that you listen to me .
43011042	I know that you always listen to me , but I say this for the sake of the people here , so that they will believe that you sent me . ”
43011043	After he had said this , he called out in a loud voice , “ Lazarus , come out ! ”
43011044	He came out , his hands and feet wrapped in grave cloths , and with a cloth around his face . “ Untie him , ” Jesus told them , “ and let him go . ”
43011045	Many of the people who had come to visit Mary saw what Jesus did , and they believed in him .
43011046	But some of them returned to the Pharisees and told them what Jesus had done .
43011047	So the Pharisees and the chief priests met with the Council and said , “ What shall we do ? Look at all the miracles this man is performing !
43011048	If we let him go on in this way , everyone will believe in him , and the Roman authorities will take action and destroy our Temple and our nation ! ”
43011049	One of them , named Caiaphas , who was High Priest that year , said , “ What fools you are !
43011050	Don't you realize that it is better for you to have one man die for the people , instead of having the whole nation destroyed ? ”
43011051	Actually , he did not say this of his own accord ; rather , as he was High Priest that year , he was prophesying that Jesus was going to die for the Jewish people ,
43011052	and not only for them , but also to bring together into one body all the scattered people of God .
43011053	From that day on the Jewish authorities made plans to kill Jesus .
43011054	So Jesus did not travel openly in Judea , but left and went to a place near the desert , to a town named Ephraim , where he stayed with the disciples .
43011055	The time for the Passover Festival was near , and many people went up from the country to Jerusalem to perform the ritual of purification before the festival .
43011056	They were looking for Jesus , and as they gathered in the Temple , they asked one another , “ What do you think ? Surely he will not come to the festival , will he ? ”
43011057	The chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that if anyone knew where Jesus was , he must report it , so that they could arrest him .
43012001	Six days before the Passover , Jesus went to Bethany , the home of Lazarus , the man he had raised from death .
43012002	They prepared a dinner for him there , which Martha helped serve ; Lazarus was one of those who were sitting at the table with Jesus .
43012003	Then Mary took a whole pint of a very expensive perfume made of pure nard , poured it on Jesus' feet , and wiped them with her hair . The sweet smell of the perfume filled the whole house .
43012004	One of Jesus' disciples , Judas Iscariot—the one who was going to betray him—said ,
43012005	“ Why wasn't this perfume sold for three hundred silver coins and the money given to the poor ? ”
43012006	He said this , not because he cared about the poor , but because he was a thief . He carried the money bag and would help himself from it .
43012007	But Jesus said , “ Leave her alone ! Let her keep what she has for the day of my burial .
43012008	You will always have poor people with you , but you will not always have me . ”
43012009	A large number of people heard that Jesus was in Bethany , so they went there , not only because of Jesus but also to see Lazarus , whom Jesus had raised from death .
43012010	So the chief priests made plans to kill Lazarus too ,
43012011	because on his account many Jews were rejecting them and believing in Jesus .
43012012	The next day the large crowd that had come to the Passover Festival heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem .
43012013	So they took branches of palm trees and went out to meet him , shouting , “ Praise God ! God bless him who comes in the name of the Lord ! God bless the King of Israel ! ”
43012014	Jesus found a donkey and rode on it , just as the scripture says ,
43012015	“ Do not be afraid , city of Zion ! Here comes your king , riding on a young donkey . ”
43012016	His disciples did not understand this at the time ; but when Jesus had been raised to glory , they remembered that the scripture said this about him and that they had done this for him .
43012017	The people who had been with Jesus when he called Lazarus out of the grave and raised him from death had reported what had happened .
43012018	That was why the crowd met him—because they heard that he had performed this miracle .
43012019	The Pharisees then said to one another , “ You see , we are not succeeding at all ! Look , the whole world is following him ! ”
43012020	Some Greeks were among those who had gone to Jerusalem to worship during the festival .
43012021	They went to Philip ( he was from Bethsaida in Galilee ) and said , “ Sir , we want to see Jesus . ”
43012022	Philip went and told Andrew , and the two of them went and told Jesus .
43012023	Jesus answered them , “ The hour has now come for the Son of Man to receive great glory .
43012024	I am telling you the truth : a grain of wheat remains no more than a single grain unless it is dropped into the ground and dies . If it does die , then it produces many grains .
43012025	Those who love their own life will lose it ; those who hate their own life in this world will keep it for life eternal .
43012026	Whoever wants to serve me must follow me , so that my servant will be with me where I am . And my Father will honor anyone who serves me .
43012027	“ Now my heart is troubled—and what shall I say ? Shall I say , ‘ Father , do not let this hour come upon me ’ ? But that is why I came—so that I might go through this hour of suffering .
43012028	Father , bring glory to your name ! ” Then a voice spoke from heaven , “ I have brought glory to it , and I will do so again . ”
43012029	The crowd standing there heard the voice , and some of them said it was thunder , while others said , “ An angel spoke to him ! ”
43012030	But Jesus said to them , “ It was not for my sake that this voice spoke , but for yours .
43012031	Now is the time for this world to be judged ; now the ruler of this world will be overthrown .
43012032	When I am lifted up from the earth , I will draw everyone to me . ” (
43012033	In saying this he indicated the kind of death he was going to suffer . )
43012034	The crowd answered , “ Our Law tells us that the Messiah will live forever . How , then , can you say that the Son of Man must be lifted up ? Who is this Son of Man ? ”
43012035	Jesus answered , “ The light will be among you a little longer . Continue on your way while you have the light , so that the darkness will not come upon you ; for the one who walks in the dark does not know where he is going .
43012036	Believe in the light , then , while you have it , so that you will be the people of the light . ” After Jesus said this , he went off and hid himself from them .
43012037	Even though he had performed all these miracles in their presence , they did not believe in him ,
43012038	so that what the prophet Isaiah had said might come true : “ Lord , who believed the message we told ? To whom did the Lord reveal his power ? ”
43012039	And so they were not able to believe , because Isaiah also said ,
43012040	“ God has blinded their eyes and closed their minds , so that their eyes would not see , and their minds would not understand , and they would not turn to me , says God , for me to heal them . ”
43012041	Isaiah said this because he saw Jesus' glory and spoke about him .
43012042	Even then , many Jewish authorities believed in Jesus ; but because of the Pharisees they did not talk about it openly , so as not to be expelled from the synagogue .
43012043	They loved human approval rather than the approval of God .
43012044	Jesus said in a loud voice , “ Whoever believes in me believes not only in me but also in him who sent me .
43012045	Whoever sees me sees also him who sent me .
43012046	I have come into the world as light , so that everyone who believes in me should not remain in the darkness .
43012047	If people hear my message and do not obey it , I will not judge them . I came , not to judge the world , but to save it .
43012048	Those who reject me and do not accept my message have one who will judge them . The words I have spoken will be their judge on the last day !
43012049	This is true , because I have not spoken on my own authority , but the Father who sent me has commanded me what I must say and speak .
43012050	And I know that his command brings eternal life . What I say , then , is what the Father has told me to say . ”
43013001	It was now the day before the Passover Festival . Jesus knew that the hour had come for him to leave this world and go to the Father . He had always loved those in the world who were his own , and he loved them to the very end .
43013002	Jesus and his disciples were at supper . The Devil had already put into the heart of Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot , the thought of betraying Jesus .
43013003	Jesus knew that the Father had given him complete power ; he knew that he had come from God and was going to God .
43013004	So he rose from the table , took off his outer garment , and tied a towel around his waist .
43013005	Then he poured some water into a washbasin and began to wash the disciples' feet and dry them with the towel around his waist .
43013006	He came to Simon Peter , who said to him , “ Are you going to wash my feet , Lord ? ”
