43013007	Jesus answered him , “ You do not understand now what I am doing , but you will understand later . ”
43013008	Peter declared , “ Never at any time will you wash my feet ! ” “ If I do not wash your feet , ” Jesus answered , “ you will no longer be my disciple . ”
43013009	Simon Peter answered , “ Lord , do not wash only my feet , then ! Wash my hands and head , too ! ”
43013010	Jesus said , “ Those who have taken a bath are completely clean and do not have to wash themselves , except for their feet . All of you are clean—all except one . ” (
43013011	Jesus already knew who was going to betray him ; that is why he said , “ All of you , except one , are clean . ” )
43013012	After Jesus had washed their feet , he put his outer garment back on and returned to his place at the table . “ Do you understand what I have just done to you ? ” he asked .
43013013	“ You call me Teacher and Lord , and it is right that you do so , because that is what I am .
43013014	I , your Lord and Teacher , have just washed your feet . You , then , should wash one another's feet .
43013015	I have set an example for you , so that you will do just what I have done for you .
43013016	I am telling you the truth : no slaves are greater than their master , and no messengers are greater than the one who sent them .
43013017	Now that you know this truth , how happy you will be if you put it into practice !
43013018	“ I am not talking about all of you ; I know those I have chosen . But the scripture must come true that says , ‘ The man who shared my food turned against me . ’
43013019	I tell you this now before it happens , so that when it does happen , you will believe that ‘ I Am Who I Am . ’
43013020	I am telling you the truth : whoever receives anyone I send receives me also ; and whoever receives me receives him who sent me . ”
43013021	After Jesus had said this , he was deeply troubled and declared openly , “ I am telling you the truth : one of you is going to betray me . ”
43013022	The disciples looked at one another , completely puzzled about whom he meant .
43013023	One of the disciples , the one whom Jesus loved , was sitting next to Jesus .
43013024	Simon Peter motioned to him and said , “ Ask him whom he is talking about . ”
43013025	So that disciple moved closer to Jesus' side and asked , “ Who is it , Lord ? ”
43013026	Jesus answered , “ I will dip some bread in the sauce and give it to him ; he is the man . ” So he took a piece of bread , dipped it , and gave it to Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot .
43013027	As soon as Judas took the bread , Satan entered into him . Jesus said to him , “ Hurry and do what you must ! ”
43013028	None of the others at the table understood why Jesus said this to him .
43013029	Since Judas was in charge of the money bag , some of the disciples thought that Jesus had told him to go and buy what they needed for the festival , or to give something to the poor .
43013030	Judas accepted the bread and went out at once . It was night .
43013031	After Judas had left , Jesus said , “ Now the Son of Man's glory is revealed ; now God's glory is revealed through him .
43013032	And if God's glory is revealed through him , then God will reveal the glory of the Son of Man in himself , and he will do so at once .
43013033	My children , I shall not be with you very much longer . You will look for me ; but I tell you now what I told the Jewish authorities , ‘ You cannot go where I am going . ’
43013034	And now I give you a new commandment : love one another . As I have loved you , so you must love one another .
43013035	If you have love for one another , then everyone will know that you are my disciples . ”
43013036	“ Where are you going , Lord ? ” Simon Peter asked him . “ You cannot follow me now where I am going , ” answered Jesus ; “ but later you will follow me . ”
43013037	“ Lord , why can't I follow you now ? ” asked Peter . “ I am ready to die for you ! ”
43013038	Jesus answered , “ Are you really ready to die for me ? I am telling you the truth : before the rooster crows you will say three times that you do not know me .
43014001	“ Do not be worried and upset , ” Jesus told them . “ Believe in God and believe also in me .
43014002	There are many rooms in my Father's house , and I am going to prepare a place for you . I would not tell you this if it were not so .
43014003	And after I go and prepare a place for you , I will come back and take you to myself , so that you will be where I am .
43014004	You know the way that leads to the place where I am going . ”
43014005	Thomas said to him , “ Lord , we do not know where you are going ; so how can we know the way to get there ? ”
43014006	Jesus answered him , “ I am the way , the truth , and the life ; no one goes to the Father except by me .
43014007	Now that you have known me , ” he said to them , “ you will know my Father also , and from now on you do know him and you have seen him . ”
43014008	Philip said to him , “ Lord , show us the Father ; that is all we need . ”
43014009	Jesus answered , “ For a long time I have been with you all ; yet you do not know me , Philip ? Whoever has seen me has seen the Father . Why , then , do you say , ‘ Show us the Father ’ ?
43014010	Do you not believe , Philip , that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? The words that I have spoken to you , ” Jesus said to his disciples , “ do not come from me . The Father , who remains in me , does his own work .
43014011	Believe me when I say that I am in the Father and the Father is in me . If not , believe because of the things I do .
43014012	I am telling you the truth : those who believe in me will do what I do—yes , they will do even greater things , because I am going to the Father .
43014013	And I will do whatever you ask for in my name , so that the Father's glory will be shown through the Son .
43014014	If you ask me for anything in my name , I will do it .
43014015	“ If you love me , you will obey my commandments .
43014016	I will ask the Father , and he will give you another Helper , who will stay with you forever .
43014017	He is the Spirit , who reveals the truth about God . The world cannot receive him , because it cannot see him or know him . But you know him , because he remains with you and is in you .
43014018	“ When I go , you will not be left all alone ; I will come back to you .
43014019	In a little while the world will see me no more , but you will see me ; and because I live , you also will live .
43014020	When that day comes , you will know that I am in my Father and that you are in me , just as I am in you .
43014021	“ Those who accept my commandments and obey them are the ones who love me . My Father will love those who love me ; I too will love them and reveal myself to them . ”
43014022	Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) said , “ Lord , how can it be that you will reveal yourself to us and not to the world ? ”
43014023	Jesus answered him , “ Those who love me will obey my teaching . My Father will love them , and my Father and I will come to them and live with them .
43014024	Those who do not love me do not obey my teaching . And the teaching you have heard is not mine , but comes from the Father , who sent me .
43014025	“ I have told you this while I am still with you .
43014026	The Helper , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will teach you everything and make you remember all that I have told you .
43014027	“ Peace is what I leave with you ; it is my own peace that I give you . I do not give it as the world does . Do not be worried and upset ; do not be afraid .
43014028	You heard me say to you , ‘ I am leaving , but I will come back to you . ’ If you loved me , you would be glad that I am going to the Father ; for he is greater than I .
43014029	I have told you this now before it all happens , so that when it does happen , you will believe .
43014030	I cannot talk with you much longer , because the ruler of this world is coming . He has no power over me ,
43014031	but the world must know that I love the Father ; that is why I do everything as he commands me . “ Come , let us go from this place .
43015001	“ I am the real vine , and my Father is the gardener .
43015002	He breaks off every branch in me that does not bear fruit , and he prunes every branch that does bear fruit , so that it will be clean and bear more fruit .
43015003	You have been made clean already by the teaching I have given you .
43015004	Remain united to me , and I will remain united to you . A branch cannot bear fruit by itself ; it can do so only if it remains in the vine . In the same way you cannot bear fruit unless you remain in me .
43015005	“ I am the vine , and you are the branches . Those who remain in me , and I in them , will bear much fruit ; for you can do nothing without me .
43015006	Those who do not remain in me are thrown out like a branch and dry up ; such branches are gathered up and thrown into the fire , where they are burned .
43015007	If you remain in me and my words remain in you , then you will ask for anything you wish , and you shall have it .
43015008	My Father's glory is shown by your bearing much fruit ; and in this way you become my disciples .
43015009	I love you just as the Father loves me ; remain in my love .
43015010	If you obey my commands , you will remain in my love , just as I have obeyed my Father's commands and remain in his love .
43015011	“ I have told you this so that my joy may be in you and that your joy may be complete .
43015012	My commandment is this : love one another , just as I love you .
43015013	The greatest love you can have for your friends is to give your life for them .
43015014	And you are my friends if you do what I command you .
43015015	I do not call you servants any longer , because servants do not know what their master is doing . Instead , I call you friends , because I have told you everything I heard from my Father .
43015016	You did not choose me ; I chose you and appointed you to go and bear much fruit , the kind of fruit that endures . And so the Father will give you whatever you ask of him in my name .
43015017	This , then , is what I command you : love one another .
43015018	“ If the world hates you , just remember that it has hated me first .
43015019	If you belonged to the world , then the world would love you as its own . But I chose you from this world , and you do not belong to it ; that is why the world hates you .
43015020	Remember what I told you : ‘ Slaves are not greater than their master . ’ If people persecuted me , they will persecute you too ; if they obeyed my teaching , they will obey yours too .
43015021	But they will do all this to you because you are mine ; for they do not know the one who sent me .
43015022	They would not have been guilty of sin if I had not come and spoken to them ; as it is , they no longer have any excuse for their sin .
43015023	Whoever hates me hates my Father also .
43015024	They would not have been guilty of sin if I had not done among them the things that no one else ever did ; as it is , they have seen what I did , and they hate both me and my Father .
43015025	This , however , was bound to happen so that what is written in their Law may come true : ‘ They hated me for no reason at all . ’
43015026	“ The Helper will come—the Spirit , who reveals the truth about God and who comes from the Father . I will send him to you from the Father , and he will speak about me .
43015027	And you , too , will speak about me , because you have been with me from the very beginning .
43016001	“ I have told you this , so that you will not give up your faith .
43016002	You will be expelled from the synagogues , and the time will come when those who kill you will think that by doing this they are serving God .
43016003	People will do these things to you because they have not known either the Father or me .
43016004	But I have told you this , so that when the time comes for them to do these things , you will remember what I told you . “ I did not tell you these things at the beginning , for I was with you .
43016005	But now I am going to him who sent me , yet none of you asks me where I am going .
43016006	And now that I have told you , your hearts are full of sadness .
43016007	But I am telling you the truth : it is better for you that I go away , because if I do not go , the Helper will not come to you . But if I do go away , then I will send him to you .
43016008	And when he comes , he will prove to the people of the world that they are wrong about sin and about what is right and about God's judgment .
43016009	They are wrong about sin , because they do not believe in me ;
43016010	they are wrong about what is right , because I am going to the Father and you will not see me any more ;
43016011	and they are wrong about judgment , because the ruler of this world has already been judged .
43016012	“ I have much more to tell you , but now it would be too much for you to bear .
43016013	When , however , the Spirit comes , who reveals the truth about God , he will lead you into all the truth . He will not speak on his own authority , but he will speak of what he hears and will tell you of things to come .
43016014	He will give me glory , because he will take what I say and tell it to you .
43016015	All that my Father has is mine ; that is why I said that the Spirit will take what I give him and tell it to you .
43016016	“ In a little while you will not see me any more , and then a little while later you will see me . ”
43016017	Some of his disciples asked among themselves , “ What does this mean ? He tells us that in a little while we will not see him , and then a little while later we will see him ; and he also says , ‘ It is because I am going to the Father . ’
43016018	What does this ‘ a little while ’ mean ? We don't know what he is talking about ! ”
43016019	Jesus knew that they wanted to question him , so he said to them , “ I said , ‘ In a little while you will not see me , and then a little while later you will see me . ’ Is this what you are asking about among yourselves ?
43016020	I am telling you the truth : you will cry and weep , but the world will be glad ; you will be sad , but your sadness will turn into gladness .
43016021	When a woman is about to give birth , she is sad because her hour of suffering has come ; but when the baby is born , she forgets her suffering , because she is happy that a baby has been born into the world .
43016022	That is how it is with you : now you are sad , but I will see you again , and your hearts will be filled with gladness , the kind of gladness that no one can take away from you .
43016023	“ When that day comes , you will not ask me for anything . I am telling you the truth : the Father will give you whatever you ask of him in my name .
43016024	Until now you have not asked for anything in my name ; ask and you will receive , so that your happiness may be complete .
43016025	“ I have used figures of speech to tell you these things . But the time will come when I will not use figures of speech , but will speak to you plainly about the Father .
43016026	When that day comes , you will ask him in my name ; and I do not say that I will ask him on your behalf ,
43016027	for the Father himself loves you . He loves you because you love me and have believed that I came from God .
43016028	I did come from the Father , and I came into the world ; and now I am leaving the world and going to the Father . ”
43016029	Then his disciples said to him , “ Now you are speaking plainly , without using figures of speech .
43016030	We know now that you know everything ; you do not need to have someone ask you questions . This makes us believe that you came from God . ”
43016031	Jesus answered them , “ Do you believe now ?
43016032	The time is coming , and is already here , when all of you will be scattered , each of you to your own home , and I will be left all alone . But I am not really alone , because the Father is with me .
43016033	I have told you this so that you will have peace by being united to me . The world will make you suffer . But be brave ! I have defeated the world ! ”
43017001	After Jesus finished saying this , he looked up to heaven and said , “ Father , the hour has come . Give glory to your Son , so that the Son may give glory to you .
43017002	For you gave him authority over all people , so that he might give eternal life to all those you gave him .
43017003	And eternal life means to know you , the only true God , and to know Jesus Christ , whom you sent .
43017004	I have shown your glory on earth ; I have finished the work you gave me to do .
43017005	Father ! Give me glory in your presence now , the same glory I had with you before the world was made .
43017006	“ I have made you known to those you gave me out of the world . They belonged to you , and you gave them to me . They have obeyed your word ,
43017007	and now they know that everything you gave me comes from you .
43017008	I gave them the message that you gave me , and they received it ; they know that it is true that I came from you , and they believe that you sent me .
43017009	“ I pray for them . I do not pray for the world but for those you gave me , for they belong to you .
43017010	All I have is yours , and all you have is mine ; and my glory is shown through them .
43017011	And now I am coming to you ; I am no longer in the world , but they are in the world . Holy Father ! Keep them safe by the power of your name , the name you gave me , so that they may be one just as you and I are one .
43017012	While I was with them , I kept them safe by the power of your name , the name you gave me . I protected them , and not one of them was lost , except the man who was bound to be lost—so that the scripture might come true .
43017013	And now I am coming to you , and I say these things in the world so that they might have my joy in their hearts in all its fullness .
43017014	I gave them your message , and the world hated them , because they do not belong to the world , just as I do not belong to the world .
43017015	I do not ask you to take them out of the world , but I do ask you to keep them safe from the Evil One .
43017016	Just as I do not belong to the world , they do not belong to the world .
43017017	Dedicate them to yourself by means of the truth ; your word is truth .
43017018	I sent them into the world , just as you sent me into the world .
43017019	And for their sake I dedicate myself to you , in order that they , too , may be truly dedicated to you .
43017020	“ I pray not only for them , but also for those who believe in me because of their message .
43017021	I pray that they may all be one . Father ! May they be in us , just as you are in me and I am in you . May they be one , so that the world will believe that you sent me .
43017022	I gave them the same glory you gave me , so that they may be one , just as you and I are one :
43017023	I in them and you in me , so that they may be completely one , in order that the world may know that you sent me and that you love them as you love me .
43017024	“ Father ! You have given them to me , and I want them to be with me where I am , so that they may see my glory , the glory you gave me ; for you loved me before the world was made .
43017025	Righteous Father ! The world does not know you , but I know you , and these know that you sent me .
43017026	I made you known to them , and I will continue to do so , in order that the love you have for me may be in them , and so that I also may be in them . ”
43018001	After Jesus had said this prayer , he left with his disciples and went across Kidron Brook . There was a garden in that place , and Jesus and his disciples went in .
43018002	Judas , the traitor , knew where it was , because many times Jesus had met there with his disciples .
43018003	So Judas went to the garden , taking with him a group of Roman soldiers , and some Temple guards sent by the chief priests and the Pharisees ; they were armed and carried lanterns and torches .
43018004	Jesus knew everything that was going to happen to him , so he stepped forward and asked them , “ Who is it you are looking for ? ”
43018005	“ Jesus of Nazareth , ” they answered . “ I am he , ” he said . Judas , the traitor , was standing there with them .
43018006	When Jesus said to them , “ I am he , ” they moved back and fell to the ground .
43018007	Again Jesus asked them , “ Who is it you are looking for ? ” “ Jesus of Nazareth , ” they said .
43018008	“ I have already told you that I am he , ” Jesus said . “ If , then , you are looking for me , let these others go . ” (
43018009	He said this so that what he had said might come true : “ Father , I have not lost even one of those you gave me . ” )
43018010	Simon Peter , who had a sword , drew it and struck the High Priest's slave , cutting off his right ear . The name of the slave was Malchus .
43018011	Jesus said to Peter , “ Put your sword back in its place ! Do you think that I will not drink the cup of suffering which my Father has given me ? ”
43018012	Then the Roman soldiers with their commanding officer and the Jewish guards arrested Jesus , tied him up ,
43018013	and took him first to Annas . He was the father-in-law of Caiaphas , who was High Priest that year .
43018014	It was Caiaphas who had advised the Jewish authorities that it was better that one man should die for all the people .
43018015	Simon Peter and another disciple followed Jesus . That other disciple was well known to the High Priest , so he went with Jesus into the courtyard of the High Priest's house ,
43018016	while Peter stayed outside by the gate . Then the other disciple went back out , spoke to the girl at the gate , and brought Peter inside .
43018017	The girl at the gate said to Peter , “ Aren't you also one of the disciples of that man ? ” “ No , I am not , ” answered Peter .
43018018	It was cold , so the servants and guards had built a charcoal fire and were standing around it , warming themselves . So Peter went over and stood with them , warming himself .
43018019	The High Priest questioned Jesus about his disciples and about his teaching .
43018020	Jesus answered , “ I have always spoken publicly to everyone ; all my teaching was done in the synagogues and in the Temple , where all the people come together . I have never said anything in secret .
43018021	Why , then , do you question me ? Question the people who heard me . Ask them what I told them—they know what I said . ”
43018022	When Jesus said this , one of the guards there slapped him and said , “ How dare you talk like that to the High Priest ! ”
43018023	Jesus answered him , “ If I have said anything wrong , tell everyone here what it was . But if I am right in what I have said , why do you hit me ? ”
43018024	Then Annas sent him , still tied up , to Caiaphas the High Priest .
43018025	Peter was still standing there keeping himself warm . So the others said to him , “ Aren't you also one of the disciples of that man ? ” But Peter denied it . “ No , I am not , ” he said .
43018026	One of the High Priest's slaves , a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off , spoke up . “ Didn't I see you with him in the garden ? ” he asked .
43018027	Again Peter said “ No ” —and at once a rooster crowed .
43018028	Early in the morning Jesus was taken from Caiaphas' house to the governor's palace . The Jewish authorities did not go inside the palace , for they wanted to keep themselves ritually clean , in order to be able to eat the Passover meal .
43018029	So Pilate went outside to them and asked , “ What do you accuse this man of ? ”
43018030	Their answer was , “ We would not have brought him to you if he had not committed a crime . ”
43018031	Pilate said to them , “ Then you yourselves take him and try him according to your own law . ” They replied , “ We are not allowed to put anyone to death . ” (
43018032	This happened in order to make come true what Jesus had said when he indicated the kind of death he would die . )
43018033	Pilate went back into the palace and called Jesus . “ Are you the king of the Jews ? ” he asked him .
43018034	Jesus answered , “ Does this question come from you or have others told you about me ? ”
43018035	Pilate replied , “ Do you think I am a Jew ? It was your own people and the chief priests who handed you over to me . What have you done ? ”
43018036	Jesus said , “ My kingdom does not belong to this world ; if my kingdom belonged to this world , my followers would fight to keep me from being handed over to the Jewish authorities . No , my kingdom does not belong here ! ”
43018037	So Pilate asked him , “ Are you a king , then ? ” Jesus answered , “ You say that I am a king . I was born and came into the world for this one purpose , to speak about the truth . Whoever belongs to the truth listens to me . ”
43018038	“ And what is truth ? ” Pilate asked . Then Pilate went back outside to the people and said to them , “ I cannot find any reason to condemn him .
43018039	But according to the custom you have , I always set free a prisoner for you during the Passover . Do you want me to set free for you the king of the Jews ? ”
43018040	They answered him with a shout , “ No , not him ! We want Barabbas ! ” ( Barabbas was a bandit . )
43019001	Then Pilate took Jesus and had him whipped .
43019002	The soldiers made a crown out of thorny branches and put it on his head ; then they put a purple robe on him
43019003	and came to him and said , “ Long live the King of the Jews ! ” And they went up and slapped him .
43019004	Pilate went back out once more and said to the crowd , “ Look , I will bring him out here to you to let you see that I cannot find any reason to condemn him . ”
43019005	So Jesus came out , wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . Pilate said to them , “ Look ! Here is the man ! ”
43019006	When the chief priests and the Temple guards saw him , they shouted , “ Crucify him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate said to them , “ You take him , then , and crucify him . I find no reason to condemn him . ”
43019007	The crowd answered back , “ We have a law that says he ought to die , because he claimed to be the Son of God . ”
43019008	When Pilate heard this , he was even more afraid .
43019009	He went back into the palace and asked Jesus , “ Where do you come from ? ” But Jesus did not answer .
43019010	Pilate said to him , “ You will not speak to me ? Remember , I have the authority to set you free and also to have you crucified . ”
43019011	Jesus answered , “ You have authority over me only because it was given to you by God . So the man who handed me over to you is guilty of a worse sin . ”
43019012	When Pilate heard this , he tried to find a way to set Jesus free . But the crowd shouted back , “ If you set him free , that means that you are not the Emperor's friend ! Anyone who claims to be a king is a rebel against the Emperor ! ”
43019013	When Pilate heard these words , he took Jesus outside and sat down on the judge's seat in the place called “ The Stone Pavement . ” ( In Hebrew the name is “ Gabbatha . ” )
43019014	It was then almost noon of the day before the Passover . Pilate said to the people , “ Here is your king ! ”
43019015	They shouted back , “ Kill him ! Kill him ! Crucify him ! ” Pilate asked them , “ Do you want me to crucify your king ? ” The chief priests answered , “ The only king we have is the Emperor ! ”
43019016	Then Pilate handed Jesus over to them to be crucified . So they took charge of Jesus .
43019017	He went out , carrying his cross , and came to “ The Place of the Skull , ” as it is called . ( In Hebrew it is called “ Golgotha . ” )
43019018	There they crucified him ; and they also crucified two other men , one on each side , with Jesus between them .
43019019	Pilate wrote a notice and had it put on the cross . “ Jesus of Nazareth , the King of the Jews , ” is what he wrote .
43019020	Many people read it , because the place where Jesus was crucified was not far from the city . The notice was written in Hebrew , Latin , and Greek .
43019021	The chief priests said to Pilate , “ Do not write ‘ The King of the Jews , ’ but rather , ‘ This man said , I am the King of the Jews . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate answered , “ What I have written stays written . ”
43019023	After the soldiers had crucified Jesus , they took his clothes and divided them into four parts , one part for each soldier . They also took the robe , which was made of one piece of woven cloth without any seams in it .
43019024	The soldiers said to one another , “ Let's not tear it ; let's throw dice to see who will get it . ” This happened in order to make the scripture come true : “ They divided my clothes among themselves and gambled for my robe . ”
43019025	Standing close to Jesus' cross were his mother , his mother's sister , Mary the wife of Clopas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	Jesus saw his mother and the disciple he loved standing there ; so he said to his mother , “ He is your son . ”
43019027	Then he said to the disciple , “ She is your mother . ” From that time the disciple took her to live in his home .
43019028	Jesus knew that by now everything had been completed ; and in order to make the scripture come true , he said , “ I am thirsty . ”
43019029	A bowl was there , full of cheap wine ; so a sponge was soaked in the wine , put on a stalk of hyssop , and lifted up to his lips .
43019030	Jesus drank the wine and said , “ It is finished ! ” Then he bowed his head and gave up his spirit .
43019031	Then the Jewish authorities asked Pilate to allow them to break the legs of the men who had been crucified , and to take the bodies down from the crosses . They requested this because it was Friday , and they did not want the bodies to stay on the crosses on the Sabbath , since the coming Sabbath was especially holy .
43019032	So the soldiers went and broke the legs of the first man and then of the other man who had been crucified with Jesus .
43019033	But when they came to Jesus , they saw that he was already dead , so they did not break his legs .
43019034	One of the soldiers , however , plunged his spear into Jesus' side , and at once blood and water poured out . (
43019035	The one who saw this happen has spoken of it , so that you also may believe . What he said is true , and he knows that he speaks the truth . )
43019036	This was done to make the scripture come true : “ Not one of his bones will be broken . ”
43019037	And there is another scripture that says , “ People will look at him whom they pierced . ”
43019038	After this , Joseph , who was from the town of Arimathea , asked Pilate if he could take Jesus' body . ( Joseph was a follower of Jesus , but in secret , because he was afraid of the Jewish authorities . ) Pilate told him he could have the body , so Joseph went and took it away .
43019039	Nicodemus , who at first had gone to see Jesus at night , went with Joseph , taking with him about one hundred pounds of spices , a mixture of myrrh and aloes .
43019040	The two men took Jesus' body and wrapped it in linen cloths with the spices according to the Jewish custom of preparing a body for burial .
43019041	There was a garden in the place where Jesus had been put to death , and in it there was a new tomb where no one had ever been buried .
43019042	Since it was the day before the Sabbath and because the tomb was close by , they placed Jesus' body there .
43020001	Early on Sunday morning , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene went to the tomb and saw that the stone had been taken away from the entrance .
43020002	She went running to Simon Peter and the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and told them , “ They have taken the Lord from the tomb , and we don't know where they have put him ! ”
43020003	Then Peter and the other disciple went to the tomb .
43020004	The two of them were running , but the other disciple ran faster than Peter and reached the tomb first .
43020005	He bent over and saw the linen cloths , but he did not go in .
43020006	Behind him came Simon Peter , and he went straight into the tomb . He saw the linen cloths lying there
43020007	and the cloth which had been around Jesus' head . It was not lying with the linen cloths but was rolled up by itself .
43020008	Then the other disciple , who had reached the tomb first , also went in ; he saw and believed . (
43020009	They still did not understand the scripture which said that he must rise from death . )
43020010	Then the disciples went back home .
43020011	Mary stood crying outside the tomb . While she was still crying , she bent over and looked in the tomb
43020012	and saw two angels there dressed in white , sitting where the body of Jesus had been , one at the head and the other at the feet .
43020013	“ Woman , why are you crying ? ” they asked her . She answered , “ They have taken my Lord away , and I do not know where they have put him ! ”
43020014	Then she turned around and saw Jesus standing there ; but she did not know that it was Jesus .
43020015	“ Woman , why are you crying ? ” Jesus asked her . “ Who is it that you are looking for ? ” She thought he was the gardener , so she said to him , “ If you took him away , sir , tell me where you have put him , and I will go and get him . ”
43020016	Jesus said to her , “ Mary ! ” She turned toward him and said in Hebrew , “ Rabboni ! ” ( This means “ Teacher . ” )
43020017	“ Do not hold on to me , ” Jesus told her , “ because I have not yet gone back up to the Father . But go to my brothers and tell them that I am returning to him who is my Father and their Father , my God and their God . ”
43020018	So Mary Magdalene went and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord and related to them what he had told her .
43020019	It was late that Sunday evening , and the disciples were gathered together behind locked doors , because they were afraid of the Jewish authorities . Then Jesus came and stood among them . “ Peace be with you , ” he said .
43020020	After saying this , he showed them his hands and his side . The disciples were filled with joy at seeing the Lord .
43020021	Jesus said to them again , “ Peace be with you . As the Father sent me , so I send you . ”
43020022	Then he breathed on them and said , “ Receive the Holy Spirit .
43020023	If you forgive people's sins , they are forgiven ; if you do not forgive them , they are not forgiven . ”
43020024	One of the twelve disciples , Thomas ( called the Twin ) , was not with them when Jesus came .
43020025	So the other disciples told him , “ We have seen the Lord ! ” Thomas said to them , “ Unless I see the scars of the nails in his hands and put my finger on those scars and my hand in his side , I will not believe . ”
43020026	A week later the disciples were together again indoors , and Thomas was with them . The doors were locked , but Jesus came and stood among them and said , “ Peace be with you . ”
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here , and look at my hands ; then reach out your hand and put it in my side . Stop your doubting , and believe ! ”
43020028	Thomas answered him , “ My Lord and my God ! ”
43020029	Jesus said to him , “ Do you believe because you see me ? How happy are those who believe without seeing me ! ”
43020030	In his disciples' presence Jesus performed many other miracles which are not written down in this book .
43020031	But these have been written in order that you may believe that Jesus is the Messiah , the Son of God , and that through your faith in him you may have life .
43021001	After this , Jesus appeared once more to his disciples at Lake Tiberias . This is how it happened .
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( called the Twin ) , Nathanael ( the one from Cana in Galilee ) , the sons of Zebedee , and two other disciples of Jesus were all together .
43021003	Simon Peter said to the others , “ I am going fishing . ” “ We will come with you , ” they told him . So they went out in a boat , but all that night they did not catch a thing .
43021004	As the sun was rising , Jesus stood at the water's edge , but the disciples did not know that it was Jesus .
43021005	Then he asked them , “ Young men , haven't you caught anything ? ” “ Not a thing , ” they answered .
43021006	He said to them , “ Throw your net out on the right side of the boat , and you will catch some . ” So they threw the net out and could not pull it back in , because they had caught so many fish .
43021007	The disciple whom Jesus loved said to Peter , “ It is the Lord ! ” When Peter heard that it was the Lord , he wrapped his outer garment around him ( for he had taken his clothes off ) and jumped into the water .
43021008	The other disciples came to shore in the boat , pulling the net full of fish . They were not very far from land , about a hundred yards away .
43021009	When they stepped ashore , they saw a charcoal fire there with fish on it and some bread .
43021010	Then Jesus said to them , “ Bring some of the fish you have just caught . ”
43021011	Simon Peter went aboard and dragged the net ashore full of big fish , a hundred and fifty-three in all ; even though there were so many , still the net did not tear .
43021012	Jesus said to them , “ Come and eat . ” None of the disciples dared ask him , “ Who are you ? ” because they knew it was the Lord .
43021013	So Jesus went over , took the bread , and gave it to them ; he did the same with the fish .
43021014	This , then , was the third time Jesus appeared to the disciples after he was raised from death .
43021015	After they had eaten , Jesus said to Simon Peter , “ Simon son of John , do you love me more than these others do ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” he answered , “ you know that I love you . ” Jesus said to him , “ Take care of my lambs . ”
43021016	A second time Jesus said to him , “ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” he answered , “ you know that I love you . ” Jesus said to him , “ Take care of my sheep . ”
43021017	A third time Jesus said , “ Simon son of John , do you love me ? ” Peter became sad because Jesus asked him the third time , “ Do you love me ? ” and so he said to him , “ Lord , you know everything ; you know that I love you ! ” Jesus said to him , “ Take care of my sheep .
43021018	I am telling you the truth : when you were young , you used to get ready and go anywhere you wanted to ; but when you are old , you will stretch out your hands and someone else will tie you up and take you where you don't want to go . ”
43021019	( In saying this , Jesus was indicating the way in which Peter would die and bring glory to God . ) Then Jesus said to him , “ Follow me ! ”
43021020	Peter turned around and saw behind him that other disciple , whom Jesus loved—the one who had leaned close to Jesus at the meal and had asked , “ Lord , who is going to betray you ? ”
43021021	When Peter saw him , he asked Jesus , “ Lord , what about this man ? ”
43021022	Jesus answered him , “ If I want him to live until I come , what is that to you ? Follow me ! ”
43021023	So a report spread among the followers of Jesus that this disciple would not die . But Jesus did not say he would not die ; he said , “ If I want him to live until I come , what is that to you ? ”
43021024	He is the disciple who spoke of these things , the one who also wrote them down ; and we know that what he said is true .
43021025	Now , there are many other things that Jesus did . If they were all written down one by one , I suppose that the whole world could not hold the books that would be written .
44001001	Dear Theophilus : In my first book I wrote about all the things that Jesus did and taught from the time he began his work
44001002	until the day he was taken up to heaven . Before he was taken up , he gave instructions by the power of the Holy Spirit to the men he had chosen as his apostles .
44001003	For forty days after his death he appeared to them many times in ways that proved beyond doubt that he was alive . They saw him , and he talked with them about the Kingdom of God .
44001004	And when they came together , he gave them this order : “ Do not leave Jerusalem , but wait for the gift I told you about , the gift my Father promised .
44001005	John baptized with water , but in a few days you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . ”
44001006	When the apostles met together with Jesus , they asked him , “ Lord , will you at this time give the Kingdom back to Israel ? ”
44001007	Jesus said to them , “ The times and occasions are set by my Father's own authority , and it is not for you to know when they will be .
44001008	But when the Holy Spirit comes upon you , you will be filled with power , and you will be witnesses for me in Jerusalem , in all of Judea and Samaria , and to the ends of the earth . ”
44001009	After saying this , he was taken up to heaven as they watched him , and a cloud hid him from their sight .
44001010	They still had their eyes fixed on the sky as he went away , when two men dressed in white suddenly stood beside them
44001011	and said , “ Galileans , why are you standing there looking up at the sky ? This Jesus , who was taken from you into heaven , will come back in the same way that you saw him go to heaven . ”
44001012	Then the apostles went back to Jerusalem from the Mount of Olives , which is about half a mile away from the city .
44001013	They entered the city and went up to the room where they were staying : Peter , John , James and Andrew , Philip and Thomas , Bartholomew and Matthew , James son of Alphaeus , Simon the Patriot , and Judas son of James .
44001014	They gathered frequently to pray as a group , together with the women and with Mary the mother of Jesus and with his brothers .
44001015	A few days later there was a meeting of the believers , about a hundred and twenty in all , and Peter stood up to speak .
44001016	“ My friends , ” he said , “ the scripture had to come true in which the Holy Spirit , speaking through David , made a prediction about Judas , who was the guide for those who arrested Jesus .
44001017	Judas was a member of our group , for he had been chosen to have a part in our work . ” (
44001018	With the money that Judas got for his evil act he bought a field , where he fell to his death ; he burst open and all his insides spilled out .
44001019	All the people living in Jerusalem heard about it , and so in their own language they call that field Akeldama , which means “ Field of Blood . ” )
44001020	“ For it is written in the book of Psalms , ‘ May his house become empty ; may no one live in it . ’ ‘ May someone else take his place of service . ’
44001023	So they proposed two men : Joseph , who was called Barsabbas ( also known as Justus ) , and Matthias .
44001024	Then they prayed , “ Lord , you know the thoughts of everyone , so show us which of these two you have chosen
44001025	to serve as an apostle in the place of Judas , who left to go to the place where he belongs . ”
44001026	Then they drew lots to choose between the two men , and the one chosen was Matthias , who was added to the group of eleven apostles .
44002001	When the day of Pentecost came , all the believers were gathered together in one place .
44002002	Suddenly there was a noise from the sky which sounded like a strong wind blowing , and it filled the whole house where they were sitting .
44002003	Then they saw what looked like tongues of fire which spread out and touched each person there .
44002004	They were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to talk in other languages , as the Spirit enabled them to speak .
44002005	There were Jews living in Jerusalem , religious people who had come from every country in the world .
44002006	When they heard this noise , a large crowd gathered . They were all excited , because all of them heard the believers talking in their own languages .
44002007	In amazement and wonder they exclaimed , “ These people who are talking like this are Galileans !
44002008	How is it , then , that all of us hear them speaking in our own native languages ?
44002009	We are from Parthia , Media , and Elam ; from Mesopotamia , Judea , and Cappadocia ; from Pontus and Asia ,
44002010	from Phrygia and Pamphylia , from Egypt and the regions of Libya near Cyrene . Some of us are from Rome ,
44002011	both Jews and Gentiles converted to Judaism , and some of us are from Crete and Arabia—yet all of us hear them speaking in our own languages about the great things that God has done ! ”
44002012	Amazed and confused , they kept asking each other , “ What does this mean ? ”
44002013	But others made fun of the believers , saying , “ These people are drunk ! ”
44002014	Then Peter stood up with the other eleven apostles and in a loud voice began to speak to the crowd : “ Fellow Jews and all of you who live in Jerusalem , listen to me and let me tell you what this means .
44002015	These people are not drunk , as you suppose ; it is only nine o'clock in the morning .
44002016	Instead , this is what the prophet Joel spoke about :
44002017	‘ This is what I will do in the last days , God says : I will pour out my Spirit on everyone . Your sons and daughters will proclaim my message ; your young men will see visions , and your old men will have dreams .
44002018	Yes , even on my servants , both men and women , I will pour out my Spirit in those days , and they will proclaim my message .
44002019	I will perform miracles in the sky above and wonders on the earth below . There will be blood , fire , and thick smoke ;
44002020	the sun will be darkened , and the moon will turn red as blood , before the great and glorious Day of the Lord comes .
44002021	And then , whoever calls out to the Lord for help will be saved . ’
44002022	“ Listen to these words , fellow Israelites ! Jesus of Nazareth was a man whose divine authority was clearly proven to you by all the miracles and wonders which God performed through him . You yourselves know this , for it happened here among you .
44002023	In accordance with his own plan God had already decided that Jesus would be handed over to you ; and you killed him by letting sinful men crucify him .
44002024	But God raised him from death , setting him free from its power , because it was impossible that death should hold him prisoner .
44002025	For David said about him , ‘ I saw the Lord before me at all times ; he is near me , and I will not be troubled .
44002026	And so I am filled with gladness , and my words are full of joy . And I , mortal though I am , will rest assured in hope ,
44002027	because you will not abandon me in the world of the dead ; you will not allow your faithful servant to rot in the grave .
44002028	You have shown me the paths that lead to life , and your presence will fill me with joy . ’
44002029	“ My friends , I must speak to you plainly about our famous ancestor King David . He died and was buried , and his grave is here with us to this very day .
44002030	He was a prophet , and he knew what God had promised him : God had made a vow that he would make one of David's descendants a king , just as David was .
44002031	David saw what God was going to do in the future , and so he spoke about the resurrection of the Messiah when he said , ‘ He was not abandoned in the world of the dead ; his body did not rot in the grave . ’ ‘ The Lord said to my Lord : Sit here at my right side
44002035	until I put your enemies as a footstool under your feet . ’
44002036	“ All the people of Israel , then , are to know for sure that this Jesus , whom you crucified , is the one that God has made Lord and Messiah ! ”
44002037	When the people heard this , they were deeply troubled and said to Peter and the other apostles , “ What shall we do , brothers ? ”
44002038	Peter said to them , “ Each one of you must turn away from your sins and be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ , so that your sins will be forgiven ; and you will receive God's gift , the Holy Spirit .
44002039	For God's promise was made to you and your children , and to all who are far away—all whom the Lord our God calls to himself . ”
44002040	Peter made his appeal to them and with many other words he urged them , saying , “ Save yourselves from the punishment coming on this wicked people ! ”
44002041	Many of them believed his message and were baptized , and about three thousand people were added to the group that day .
44002042	They spent their time in learning from the apostles , taking part in the fellowship , and sharing in the fellowship meals and the prayers .
44002043	Many miracles and wonders were being done through the apostles , and everyone was filled with awe .
44002044	All the believers continued together in close fellowship and shared their belongings with one another .
44002045	They would sell their property and possessions , and distribute the money among all , according to what each one needed .
44002046	Day after day they met as a group in the Temple , and they had their meals together in their homes , eating with glad and humble hearts ,
44002047	praising God , and enjoying the good will of all the people . And every day the Lord added to their group those who were being saved .
44003001	One day Peter and John went to the Temple at three o'clock in the afternoon , the hour for prayer .
44003002	There at the Beautiful Gate , as it was called , was a man who had been lame all his life . Every day he was carried to the gate to beg for money from the people who were going into the Temple .
44003003	When he saw Peter and John going in , he begged them to give him something .
44003004	They looked straight at him , and Peter said , “ Look at us ! ”
44003005	So he looked at them , expecting to get something from them .
44003006	But Peter said to him , “ I have no money at all , but I give you what I have : in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth I order you to get up and walk ! ”
44003007	Then he took him by his right hand and helped him up . At once the man's feet and ankles became strong ;
44003008	he jumped up , stood on his feet , and started walking around . Then he went into the Temple with them , walking and jumping and praising God .
44003009	The people there saw him walking and praising God ,
44003010	and when they recognized him as the beggar who had sat at the Beautiful Gate , they were all surprised and amazed at what had happened to him .
44003011	As the man held on to Peter and John in Solomon's Porch , as it was called , the people were amazed and ran to them .
44003012	When Peter saw the people , he said to them , “ Fellow Israelites , why are you surprised at this , and why do you stare at us ? Do you think that it was by means of our own power or godliness that we made this man walk ?
44003013	The God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob , the God of our ancestors , has given divine glory to his Servant Jesus . But you handed him over to the authorities , and you rejected him in Pilate's presence , even after Pilate had decided to set him free .
44003014	He was holy and good , but you rejected him , and instead you asked Pilate to do you the favor of turning loose a murderer .
44003015	You killed the one who leads to life , but God raised him from death—and we are witnesses to this .
44003016	It was the power of his name that gave strength to this lame man . What you see and know was done by faith in his name ; it was faith in Jesus that has made him well , as you can all see .
44003017	“ And now , my friends , I know that what you and your leaders did to Jesus was due to your ignorance .
44003018	God announced long ago through all the prophets that his Messiah had to suffer ; and he made it come true in this way .
44003019	Repent , then , and turn to God , so that he will forgive your sins . If you do ,
44003020	times of spiritual strength will come from the Lord , and he will send Jesus , who is the Messiah he has already chosen for you .
44003021	He must remain in heaven until the time comes for all things to be made new , as God announced through his holy prophets of long ago .
44003022	For Moses said , ‘ The Lord your God will send you a prophet , just as he sent me , and he will be one of your own people . You are to obey everything that he tells you to do .
44003023	Anyone who does not obey that prophet shall be separated from God's people and destroyed . ’
44003024	And all the prophets who had a message , including Samuel and those who came after him , also announced what has been happening these days .
44003025	The promises of God through his prophets are for you , and you share in the covenant which God made with your ancestors . As he said to Abraham , ‘ Through your descendants I will bless all the people on earth . ’
44003026	And so God chose his Servant and sent him to you first , to bless you by making every one of you turn away from your wicked ways . ”
44004001	Peter and John were still speaking to the people when some priests , the officer in charge of the Temple guards , and some Sadducees arrived .
44004002	They were annoyed because the two apostles were teaching the people that Jesus had risen from death , which proved that the dead will rise to life .
44004003	So they arrested them and put them in jail until the next day , since it was already late .
44004004	But many who heard the message believed ; and the number grew to about five thousand .
44004005	The next day the Jewish leaders , the elders , and the teachers of the Law gathered in Jerusalem .
44004006	They met with the High Priest Annas and with Caiaphas , John , Alexander , and the others who belonged to the High Priest's family .
44004007	They made the apostles stand before them and asked them , “ How did you do this ? What power do you have or whose name did you use ? ”
44004008	Peter , full of the Holy Spirit , answered them , “ Leaders of the people and elders :
44004009	if we are being questioned today about the good deed done to the lame man and how he was healed ,
44004010	then you should all know , and all the people of Israel should know , that this man stands here before you completely well through the power of the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth—whom you crucified and whom God raised from death .
44004011	Jesus is the one of whom the scripture says , ‘ The stone that you the builders despised turned out to be the most important of all . ’
44004013	The members of the Council were amazed to see how bold Peter and John were and to learn that they were ordinary men of no education . They realized then that they had been companions of Jesus .
44004014	But there was nothing that they could say , because they saw the man who had been healed standing there with Peter and John .
44004015	So they told them to leave the Council room , and then they started discussing among themselves .
44004016	“ What shall we do with these men ? ” they asked . “ Everyone in Jerusalem knows that this extraordinary miracle has been performed by them , and we cannot deny it .
44004017	But to keep this matter from spreading any further among the people , let us warn these men never again to speak to anyone in the name of Jesus . ”
44004018	So they called them back in and told them that under no condition were they to speak or to teach in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John answered them , “ You yourselves judge which is right in God's sight—to obey you or to obey God .
44004020	For we cannot stop speaking of what we ourselves have seen and heard . ”
44004021	So the Council warned them even more strongly and then set them free . They saw that it was impossible to punish them , because the people were all praising God for what had happened .
44004022	The man on whom this miracle of healing had been performed was over forty years old .
44004023	As soon as Peter and John were set free , they returned to their group and told them what the chief priests and the elders had said .
44004024	When the believers heard it , they all joined together in prayer to God : “ Master and Creator of heaven , earth , and sea , and all that is in them !
44004025	By means of the Holy Spirit you spoke through our ancestor David , your servant , when he said , ‘ Why were the Gentiles furious ; why did people make their useless plots ?
44004026	The kings of the earth prepared themselves , and the rulers met together against the Lord and his Messiah . ’
44004031	When they finished praying , the place where they were meeting was shaken . They were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to proclaim God's message with boldness .
44004032	The group of believers was one in mind and heart . None of them said that any of their belongings were their own , but they all shared with one another everything they had .
44004033	With great power the apostles gave witness to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus , and God poured rich blessings on them all .
44004034	There was no one in the group who was in need . Those who owned fields or houses would sell them , bring the money received from the sale ,
44004035	and turn it over to the apostles ; and the money was distributed according to the needs of the people .
44004036	And so it was that Joseph , a Levite born in Cyprus , whom the apostles called Barnabas ( which means “ One who Encourages ” ) ,
44004037	sold a field he owned , brought the money , and turned it over to the apostles .
44005001	But there was a man named Ananias , who with his wife Sapphira sold some property that belonged to them .
44005002	But with his wife's agreement he kept part of the money for himself and turned the rest over to the apostles .
44005003	Peter said to him , “ Ananias , why did you let Satan take control of you and make you lie to the Holy Spirit by keeping part of the money you received for the property ?
44005004	Before you sold the property , it belonged to you ; and after you sold it , the money was yours . Why , then , did you decide to do such a thing ? You have not lied to people—you have lied to God ! ”
44005005	As soon as Ananias heard this , he fell down dead ; and all who heard about it were terrified .
44005006	The young men came in , wrapped up his body , carried him out , and buried him .
44005007	About three hours later his wife , not knowing what had happened , came in .
44005008	Peter asked her , “ Tell me , was this the full amount you and your husband received for your property ? ” “ Yes , ” she answered , “ the full amount . ”
44005009	So Peter said to her , “ Why did you and your husband decide to put the Lord's Spirit to the test ? The men who buried your husband are at the door right now , and they will carry you out too ! ”
44005010	At once she fell down at his feet and died . The young men came in and saw that she was dead , so they carried her out and buried her beside her husband .
44005011	The whole church and all the others who heard of this were terrified .
44005012	Many miracles and wonders were being performed among the people by the apostles . All the believers met together in Solomon's Porch .
44005013	Nobody outside the group dared join them , even though the people spoke highly of them .
44005014	But more and more people were added to the group—a crowd of men and women who believed in the Lord .
44005015	As a result of what the apostles were doing , sick people were carried out into the streets and placed on beds and mats so that at least Peter's shadow might fall on some of them as he passed by .
44005016	And crowds of people came in from the towns around Jerusalem , bringing those who were sick or who had evil spirits in them ; and they were all healed .
44005017	Then the High Priest and all his companions , members of the local party of the Sadducees , became extremely jealous of the apostles ; so they decided to take action .
44005018	They arrested the apostles and put them in the public jail .
44005019	But that night an angel of the Lord opened the prison gates , led the apostles out , and said to them ,
44005020	“ Go and stand in the Temple , and tell the people all about this new life . ”
44005021	The apostles obeyed , and at dawn they entered the Temple and started teaching . The High Priest and his companions called together all the Jewish elders for a full meeting of the Council ; then they sent orders to the prison to have the apostles brought before them .
44005022	But when the officials arrived , they did not find the apostles in prison , so they returned to the Council and reported ,
44005023	“ When we arrived at the jail , we found it locked up tight and all the guards on watch at the gates ; but when we opened the gates , we found no one inside ! ”
44005024	When the chief priests and the officer in charge of the Temple guards heard this , they wondered what had happened to the apostles .
44005025	Then a man came in and said to them , “ Listen ! The men you put in prison are in the Temple teaching the people ! ”
44005026	So the officer went off with his men and brought the apostles back . They did not use force , however , because they were afraid that the people might stone them .
44005027	They brought the apostles in , made them stand before the Council , and the High Priest questioned them .
44005028	“ We gave you strict orders not to teach in the name of this man , ” he said ; “ but see what you have done ! You have spread your teaching all over Jerusalem , and you want to make us responsible for his death ! ”
44005029	Peter and the other apostles answered , “ We must obey God , not men .
44005030	The God of our ancestors raised Jesus from death , after you had killed him by nailing him to a cross .
44005031	God raised him to his right side as Leader and Savior , to give the people of Israel the opportunity to repent and have their sins forgiven .
44005032	We are witnesses to these things—we and the Holy Spirit , who is God's gift to those who obey him . ”
44005033	When the members of the Council heard this , they were so furious that they wanted to have the apostles put to death .
44005034	But one of them , a Pharisee named Gamaliel , who was a teacher of the Law and was highly respected by all the people , stood up in the Council . He ordered the apostles to be taken out for a while ,
44005035	and then he said to the Council , “ Fellow Israelites , be careful what you do to these men .
44005036	You remember that Theudas appeared some time ago , claiming to be somebody great , and about four hundred men joined him . But he was killed , all his followers were scattered , and his movement died out .
44005037	After that , Judas the Galilean appeared during the time of the census ; he drew a crowd after him , but he also was killed , and all his followers were scattered .
44005038	And so in this case , I tell you , do not take any action against these men . Leave them alone ! If what they have planned and done is of human origin , it will disappear ,
44005039	but if it comes from God , you cannot possibly defeat them . You could find yourselves fighting against God ! ” The Council followed Gamaliel's advice .
44005040	They called the apostles in , had them whipped , and ordered them never again to speak in the name of Jesus ; and then they set them free .
44005041	As the apostles left the Council , they were happy , because God had considered them worthy to suffer disgrace for the sake of Jesus .
44005042	And every day in the Temple and in people's homes they continued to teach and preach the Good News about Jesus the Messiah .
44006001	Some time later , as the number of disciples kept growing , there was a quarrel between the Greek-speaking Jews and the native Jews . The Greek-speaking Jews claimed that their widows were being neglected in the daily distribution of funds .
44006002	So the twelve apostles called the whole group of believers together and said , “ It is not right for us to neglect the preaching of God's word in order to handle finances .
44006003	So then , friends , choose seven men among you who are known to be full of the Holy Spirit and wisdom , and we will put them in charge of this matter .
44006004	We ourselves , then , will give our full time to prayer and the work of preaching . ”
44006005	The whole group was pleased with the apostles' proposal , so they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and the Holy Spirit , and Philip , Prochorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , and Nicolaus , a Gentile from Antioch who had earlier been converted to Judaism .
44006006	The group presented them to the apostles , who prayed and placed their hands on them .
44006007	And so the word of God continued to spread . The number of disciples in Jerusalem grew larger and larger , and a great number of priests accepted the faith .
44006008	Stephen , a man richly blessed by God and full of power , performed great miracles and wonders among the people .
44006009	But he was opposed by some men who were members of the synagogue of the Freedmen ( as it was called ) , which had Jews from Cyrene and Alexandria . They and other Jews from the provinces of Cilicia and Asia started arguing with Stephen .
44006010	But the Spirit gave Stephen such wisdom that when he spoke , they could not refute him .
44006011	So they bribed some men to say , “ We heard him speaking against Moses and against God ! ”
44006012	In this way they stirred up the people , the elders , and the teachers of the Law . They seized Stephen and took him before the Council .
44006013	Then they brought in some men to tell lies about him . “ This man , ” they said , “ is always talking against our sacred Temple and the Law of Moses .
44006014	We heard him say that this Jesus of Nazareth will tear down the Temple and change all the customs which have come down to us from Moses ! ”
44006015	All those sitting in the Council fixed their eyes on Stephen and saw that his face looked like the face of an angel .
44007001	The High Priest asked Stephen , “ Is this true ? ”
44007002	Stephen answered , “ Brothers and fathers , listen to me ! Before our ancestor Abraham had gone to live in Haran , the God of glory appeared to him in Mesopotamia
44007003	and said to him , ‘ Leave your family and country and go to the land that I will show you . ’
44007004	And so he left his country and went to live in Haran . After Abraham's father died , God made him move to this land where you now live .
44007005	God did not then give Abraham any part of it as his own , not even a square foot of ground , but God promised to give it to him , and that it would belong to him and to his descendants . At the time God made this promise , Abraham had no children .
44007006	This is what God said to him : ‘ Your descendants will live in a foreign country , where they will be slaves and will be badly treated for four hundred years .
44007007	But I will pass judgment on the people that they will serve , and afterward your descendants will come out of that country and will worship me in this place . ’
44007008	Then God gave to Abraham the ceremony of circumcision as a sign of the covenant . So Abraham circumcised Isaac a week after he was born ; Isaac circumcised his son Jacob , and Jacob circumcised his twelve sons , the famous ancestors of our race .
44007009	“ Jacob's sons became jealous of their brother Joseph and sold him to be a slave in Egypt . But God was with him
44007010	and brought him safely through all his troubles . When Joseph appeared before the king of Egypt , God gave him a pleasing manner and wisdom , and the king made Joseph governor over the country and the royal household .
44007011	Then there was a famine all over Egypt and Canaan , which caused much suffering . Our ancestors could not find any food ,
44007012	and when Jacob heard that there was grain in Egypt , he sent his sons , our ancestors , on their first visit there .
44007013	On the second visit Joseph made himself known to his brothers , and the king of Egypt came to know about Joseph's family .
44007014	So Joseph sent a message to his father Jacob , telling him and the whole family , seventy-five people in all , to come to Egypt .
44007015	Then Jacob went to Egypt , where he and his sons died .
44007016	Their bodies were taken to Shechem , where they were buried in the grave which Abraham had bought from the clan of Hamor for a sum of money .
44007017	“ When the time drew near for God to keep the promise he had made to Abraham , the number of our people in Egypt had grown much larger .
44007018	At last a king who did not know about Joseph began to rule in Egypt .
44007019	He tricked our ancestors and was cruel to them , forcing them to put their babies out of their homes , so that they would die .
44007020	It was at this time that Moses was born , a very beautiful child . He was cared for at home for three months ,
44007021	and when he was put out of his home , the king's daughter adopted him and brought him up as her own son .
44007022	He was taught all the wisdom of the Egyptians and became a great man in words and deeds .
44007023	“ When Moses was forty years old , he decided to find out how his fellow Israelites were being treated .
44007024	He saw one of them being mistreated by an Egyptian , so he went to his help and took revenge on the Egyptian by killing him . (
44007025	He thought that his own people would understand that God was going to use him to set them free , but they did not understand . )
44007026	The next day he saw two Israelites fighting , and he tried to make peace between them . ‘ Listen , men , ’ he said , ‘ you are fellow Israelites ; why are you fighting like this ? ’
44007027	But the one who was mistreating the other pushed Moses aside . ‘ Who made you ruler and judge over us ? ’ he asked .
44007028	‘ Do you want to kill me , just as you killed that Egyptian yesterday ? ’
44007029	When Moses heard this , he fled from Egypt and went to live in the land of Midian . There he had two sons .
44007030	“ After forty years had passed , an angel appeared to Moses in the flames of a burning bush in the desert near Mount Sinai .
44007031	Moses was amazed by what he saw , and went near the bush to get a better look . But he heard the Lord's voice :
44007032	‘ I am the God of your ancestors , the God of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob . ’ Moses trembled with fear and dared not look .
44007033	The Lord said to him , ‘ Take your sandals off , for the place where you are standing is holy ground .
44007034	I have seen the cruel suffering of my people in Egypt . I have heard their groans , and I have come down to set them free . Come now ; I will send you to Egypt . ’
44007035	“ Moses is the one who was rejected by the people of Israel . ‘ Who made you ruler and judge over us ? ’ they asked . He is the one whom God sent to rule the people and set them free with the help of the angel who appeared to him in the burning bush .
44007036	He led the people out of Egypt , performing miracles and wonders in Egypt and at the Red Sea and for forty years in the desert .
44007037	Moses is the one who said to the people of Israel , ‘ God will send you a prophet , just as he sent me , and he will be one of your own people . ’
44007038	He is the one who was with the people of Israel assembled in the desert ; he was there with our ancestors and with the angel who spoke to him on Mount Sinai , and he received God's living messages to pass on to us .
44007039	“ But our ancestors refused to obey him ; they pushed him aside and wished that they could go back to Egypt .
44007040	So they said to Aaron , ‘ Make us some gods who will lead us . We do not know what has happened to that man Moses , who brought us out of Egypt . ’
44007041	It was then that they made an idol in the shape of a bull , offered sacrifice to it , and had a feast in honor of what they themselves had made .
44007042	So God turned away from them and gave them over to worship the stars of heaven , as it is written in the book of the prophets : ‘ People of Israel ! It was not to me that you slaughtered and sacrificed animals for forty years in the desert .
44007043	It was the tent of the god Molech that you carried , and the image of Rephan , your star god ; they were idols that you had made to worship . And so I will send you into exile beyond Babylon . ’
44007044	“ Our ancestors had the Tent of God's presence with them in the desert . It had been made as God had told Moses to make it , according to the pattern that Moses had been shown .
44007045	Later on , our ancestors who received the tent from their fathers carried it with them when they went with Joshua and took over the land from the nations that God drove out as they advanced . And it stayed there until the time of David .
44007046	He won God's favor and asked God to allow him to provide a dwelling place for the God of Jacob .
44007047	But it was Solomon who built him a house .
44007048	“ But the Most High God does not live in houses built by human hands ; as the prophet says ,
44007049	‘ Heaven is my throne , says the Lord , and the earth is my footstool . What kind of house would you build for me ? Where is the place for me to live in ?
44007050	Did not I myself make all these things ? ’
44007051	“ How stubborn you are ! ” Stephen went on to say . “ How heathen your hearts , how deaf you are to God's message ! You are just like your ancestors : you too have always resisted the Holy Spirit !
44007052	Was there any prophet that your ancestors did not persecute ? They killed God's messengers , who long ago announced the coming of his righteous Servant . And now you have betrayed and murdered him .
44007053	You are the ones who received God's law , that was handed down by angels—yet you have not obeyed it ! ”
44007054	As the members of the Council listened to Stephen , they became furious and ground their teeth at him in anger .
44007055	But Stephen , full of the Holy Spirit , looked up to heaven and saw God's glory and Jesus standing at the right side of God .
44007056	“ Look ! ” he said . “ I see heaven opened and the Son of Man standing at the right side of God ! ”
44007057	With a loud cry the Council members covered their ears with their hands . Then they all rushed at him at once ,
44007058	threw him out of the city , and stoned him . The witnesses left their cloaks in the care of a young man named Saul .
44007059	They kept on stoning Stephen as he called out to the Lord , “ Lord Jesus , receive my spirit ! ”
44007060	He knelt down and cried out in a loud voice , “ Lord ! Do not remember this sin against them ! ” He said this and died .
44008001	And Saul approved of his murder . That very day the church in Jerusalem began to suffer cruel persecution . All the believers , except the apostles , were scattered throughout the provinces of Judea and Samaria .
44008002	Some devout men buried Stephen , mourning for him with loud cries .
44008003	But Saul tried to destroy the church ; going from house to house , he dragged out the believers , both men and women , and threw them into jail .
44008004	The believers who were scattered went everywhere , preaching the message .
44008005	Philip went to the principal city in Samaria and preached the Messiah to the people there .
44008006	The crowds paid close attention to what Philip said , as they listened to him and saw the miracles that he performed .
44008007	Evil spirits came out from many people with a loud cry , and many paralyzed and lame people were healed .
44008008	So there was great joy in that city .
44008009	A man named Simon lived there , who for some time had astounded the Samaritans with his magic . He claimed that he was someone great ,
44008010	and everyone in the city , from all classes of society , paid close attention to him . “ He is that power of God known as ‘ The Great Power , ’ ” they said .
44008011	They paid this attention to him because for such a long time he had astonished them with his magic .
44008012	But when they believed Philip's message about the good news of the Kingdom of God and about Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
44008013	Simon himself also believed ; and after being baptized , he stayed close to Philip and was astounded when he saw the great wonders and miracles that were being performed .
44008014	The apostles in Jerusalem heard that the people of Samaria had received the word of God , so they sent Peter and John to them .
44008015	When they arrived , they prayed for the believers that they might receive the Holy Spirit .
44008016	For the Holy Spirit had not yet come down on any of them ; they had only been baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus .
44008017	Then Peter and John placed their hands on them , and they received the Holy Spirit .
44008018	Simon saw that the Spirit had been given to the believers when the apostles placed their hands on them . So he offered money to Peter and John ,
44008019	and said , “ Give this power to me too , so that anyone I place my hands on will receive the Holy Spirit . ”
44008020	But Peter answered him , “ May you and your money go to hell , for thinking that you can buy God's gift with money !
44008021	You have no part or share in our work , because your heart is not right in God's sight .
44008022	Repent , then , of this evil plan of yours , and pray to the Lord that he will forgive you for thinking such a thing as this .
44008023	For I see that you are full of bitter envy and are a prisoner of sin . ”
44008024	Simon said to Peter and John , “ Please pray to the Lord for me , so that none of these things you spoke of will happen to me . ”
44008025	After they had given their testimony and proclaimed the Lord's message , Peter and John went back to Jerusalem . On their way they preached the Good News in many villages of Samaria .
44008026	An angel of the Lord said to Philip , “ Get ready and go south to the road that goes from Jerusalem to Gaza . ” ( This road is not used nowadays . )
44008029	The Holy Spirit said to Philip , “ Go over to that carriage and stay close to it . ”
44008030	Philip ran over and heard him reading from the book of the prophet Isaiah . He asked him , “ Do you understand what you are reading ? ”
44008031	The official replied , “ How can I understand unless someone explains it to me ? ” And he invited Philip to climb up and sit in the carriage with him .
44008032	The passage of scripture which he was reading was this : “ He was like a sheep that is taken to be slaughtered , like a lamb that makes no sound when its wool is cut off . He did not say a word .
44008033	He was humiliated , and justice was denied him . No one will be able to tell about his descendants , because his life on earth has come to an end . ”
44008034	The official asked Philip , “ Tell me , of whom is the prophet saying this ? Of himself or of someone else ? ”
44008035	Then Philip began to speak ; starting from this passage of scripture , he told him the Good News about Jesus .
44008036	As they traveled down the road , they came to a place where there was some water , and the official said , “ Here is some water . What is to keep me from being baptized ? ”
44008038	The official ordered the carriage to stop , and both Philip and the official went down into the water , and Philip baptized him .
44008039	When they came up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord took Philip away . The official did not see him again , but continued on his way , full of joy .
44008040	Philip found himself in Azotus ; he went on to Caesarea , and on the way he preached the Good News in every town .
44009001	In the meantime Saul kept up his violent threats of murder against the followers of the Lord . He went to the High Priest
44009002	and asked for letters of introduction to the synagogues in Damascus , so that if he should find there any followers of the Way of the Lord , he would be able to arrest them , both men and women , and bring them back to Jerusalem .
44009003	As Saul was coming near the city of Damascus , suddenly a light from the sky flashed around him .
