47008003	I can assure you that they gave as much as they could , and even more than they could . Of their own free will
47008004	they begged us and pleaded for the privilege of having a part in helping God's people in Judea .
47008005	It was more than we could have hoped for ! First they gave themselves to the Lord ; and then , by God's will they gave themselves to us as well .
47008006	So we urged Titus , who began this work , to continue it and help you complete this special service of love .
47008007	You are so rich in all you have : in faith , speech , and knowledge , in your eagerness to help and in your love for us . And so we want you to be generous also in this service of love .
47008008	I am not laying down any rules . But by showing how eager others are to help , I am trying to find out how real your own love is .
47008009	You know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ ; rich as he was , he made himself poor for your sake , in order to make you rich by means of his poverty .
47008010	My opinion is that it is better for you to finish now what you began last year . You were the first , not only to act , but also to be willing to act .
47008011	On with it , then , and finish the job ! Be as eager to finish it as you were to plan it , and do it with what you now have .
47008012	If you are eager to give , God will accept your gift on the basis of what you have to give , not on what you don't have .
47008015	As the scripture says , “ The one who gathered much did not have too much , and the one who gathered little did not have too little . ”
47008016	How we thank God for making Titus as eager as we are to help you !
47008017	Not only did he welcome our request ; he was so eager to help that of his own free will he decided to go to you .
47008018	With him we are sending the brother who is highly respected in all the churches for his work in preaching the gospel .
47008019	And besides that , he has been chosen and appointed by the churches to travel with us as we carry out this service of love for the sake of the Lord's glory and in order to show that we want to help .
47008020	We are being careful not to stir up any complaints about the way we handle this generous gift .
47008021	Our purpose is to do what is right , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of others .
47008022	So we are sending our brother with them ; we have tested him many times and found him always very eager to help . And now that he has so much confidence in you , he is all the more eager to help .
47008023	As for Titus , he is my partner and works with me to help you ; as for the other brothers who are going with him , they represent the churches and bring glory to Christ .
47008024	Show your love to them , so that all the churches will be sure of it and know that we are right in boasting about you .
47009001	There is really no need for me to write you about the help being sent to God's people in Judea .
47009002	I know that you are willing to help , and I have boasted of you to the people in Macedonia . “ The believers in Achaia , ” I said , “ have been ready to help since last year . ” Your eagerness has stirred up most of them .
47009003	Now I am sending these believers , so that our boasting about you in this matter may not turn out to be empty words . But , just as I said , you will be ready with your help .
47009004	However , if the people from Macedonia should come with me and find out that you are not ready , how ashamed we would be—not to speak of your shame—for feeling so sure of you !
47009005	So I thought it was necessary to urge these believers to go to you ahead of me and get ready in advance the gift you promised to make . Then it will be ready when I arrive , and it will show that you give because you want to , not because you have to .
47009006	Remember that the person who plants few seeds will have a small crop ; the one who plants many seeds will have a large crop .
47009007	You should each give , then , as you have decided , not with regret or out of a sense of duty ; for God loves the one who gives gladly .
47009008	And God is able to give you more than you need , so that you will always have all you need for yourselves and more than enough for every good cause .
47009009	As the scripture says , “ He gives generously to the needy ; his kindness lasts forever . ”
47010001	I , Paul , make a personal appeal to you—I who am said to be meek and mild when I am with you , but harsh with you when I am away . By the gentleness and kindness of Christ
47010002	I beg you not to force me to be harsh when I come ; for I am sure I can deal harshly with those who say that we act from worldly motives .
47010003	It is true that we live in the world , but we do not fight from worldly motives .
47010004	The weapons we use in our fight are not the world's weapons but God's powerful weapons , which we use to destroy strongholds . We destroy false arguments ;
47010005	we pull down every proud obstacle that is raised against the knowledge of God ; we take every thought captive and make it obey Christ .
47010006	And after you have proved your complete loyalty , we will be ready to punish any act of disloyalty .
47010007	You are looking at the outward appearance of things . Are there some there who reckon themselves to belong to Christ ? Well , let them think again about themselves , because we belong to Christ just as much as they do .
47010008	For I am not ashamed , even if I have boasted somewhat too much about the authority that the Lord has given us—authority to build you up , not to tear you down .
47010009	I do not want it to appear that I am trying to frighten you with my letters .
47010010	Someone will say , “ Paul's letters are severe and strong , but when he is with us in person , he is weak , and his words are nothing ! ”
47010011	Such a person must understand that there is no difference between what we write in our letters when we are away and what we will do when we are there with you .
47010012	Of course we would not dare classify ourselves or compare ourselves with those who rate themselves so highly . How stupid they are ! They make up their own standards to measure themselves by , and they judge themselves by their own standards !
47010013	As for us , however , our boasting will not go beyond certain limits ; it will stay within the limits of the work which God has set for us , and this includes our work among you .
47010014	And since you are within those limits , we were not going beyond them when we came to you , bringing the Good News about Christ .
47010015	So we do not boast about the work that others have done beyond the limits God set for us . Instead , we hope that your faith may grow and that we may be able to do a much greater work among you , always within the limits that God has set .
47010016	Then we can preach the Good News in other countries beyond you and shall not have to boast about work already done in someone else's field .
47010017	But as the scripture says , “ Whoever wants to boast must boast about what the Lord has done . ”
47010018	For it is when the Lord thinks well of us that we are really approved , and not when we think well of ourselves .
47011001	I wish you would tolerate me , even when I am a bit foolish . Please do !
47011002	I am jealous for you , just as God is ; you are like a pure virgin whom I have promised in marriage to one man only , Christ himself .
47011003	I am afraid that your minds will be corrupted and that you will abandon your full and pure devotion to Christ—in the same way that Eve was deceived by the snake's clever lies .
47011004	For you gladly tolerate anyone who comes to you and preaches a different Jesus , not the one we preached ; and you accept a spirit and a gospel completely different from the Spirit and the gospel you received from us !
47011005	I do not think that I am the least bit inferior to those very special so-called “ apostles ” of yours !
47011006	Perhaps I am an amateur in speaking , but certainly not in knowledge ; we have made this clear to you at all times and in all conditions .
47011007	I did not charge you a thing when I preached the Good News of God to you ; I humbled myself in order to make you important . Was that wrong of me ?
47011008	While I was working among you , I was paid by other churches . I was robbing them , so to speak , in order to help you .
47011009	And during the time I was with you I did not bother you for help when I needed money ; the believers who came from Macedonia brought me everything I needed . As in the past , so in the future : I will never be a burden to you !
47011010	By Christ's truth in me , I promise that this boast of mine will not be silenced anywhere in all of Achaia .
47011011	Do I say this because I don't love you ? God knows I love you !
47011012	I will go on doing what I am doing now , in order to keep those other “ apostles ” from having any reason for boasting and saying that they work in the same way that we do .
47011013	Those men are not true apostles—they are false apostles , who lie about their work and disguise themselves to look like real apostles of Christ .
47011014	Well , no wonder ! Even Satan can disguise himself to look like an angel of light !
47011015	So it is no great thing if his servants disguise themselves to look like servants of righteousness . In the end they will get exactly what their actions deserve .
47011016	I repeat : no one should think that I am a fool . But if you do , at least accept me as a fool , just so I will have a little to boast of .
47011017	Of course what I am saying now is not what the Lord would have me say ; in this matter of boasting I am really talking like a fool .
47011018	But since there are so many who boast for merely human reasons , I will do the same .
47011019	You yourselves are so wise , and so you gladly tolerate fools !
47011020	You tolerate anyone who orders you around or takes advantage of you or traps you or looks down on you or slaps you in the face .
47011021	I am ashamed to admit that we were too timid to do those things ! But if anyone dares to boast about something—I am talking like a fool—I will be just as daring .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they Abraham's descendants ? So am I .
47011023	Are they Christ's servants ? I sound like a madman—but I am a better servant than they are ! I have worked much harder , I have been in prison more times , I have been whipped much more , and I have been near death more often .
47011024	Five times I was given the thirty-nine lashes by the Jews ;
47011025	three times I was whipped by the Romans ; and once I was stoned . I have been in three shipwrecks , and once I spent twenty-four hours in the water .
47011026	In my many travels I have been in danger from floods and from robbers , in danger from my own people and from Gentiles ; there have been dangers in the cities , dangers in the wilds , dangers on the high seas , and dangers from false friends .
47011027	There has been work and toil ; often I have gone without sleep ; I have been hungry and thirsty ; I have often been without enough food , shelter , or clothing .
47011028	And not to mention other things , every day I am under the pressure of my concern for all the churches .
47011029	When someone is weak , then I feel weak too ; when someone is led into sin , I am filled with distress .
47011030	If I must boast , I will boast about things that show how weak I am .
47011031	The God and Father of the Lord Jesus—blessed be his name forever ! —knows that I am not lying .
47011032	When I was in Damascus , the governor under King Aretas placed guards at the city gates to arrest me .
47011033	But I was let down in a basket through an opening in the wall and escaped from him .
47012001	I have to boast , even though it doesn't do any good . But I will now talk about visions and revelations given me by the Lord .
47012002	I know a certain Christian man who fourteen years ago was snatched up to the highest heaven ( I do not know whether this actually happened or whether he had a vision—only God knows ) .
47012005	So I will boast about this man—but I will not boast about myself , except the things that show how weak I am .
47012006	If I wanted to boast , I would not be a fool , because I would be telling the truth . But I will not boast , because I do not want any of you to have a higher opinion of me than you have as a result of what you have seen me do and heard me say .
47012007	But to keep me from being puffed up with pride because of the many wonderful things I saw , I was given a painful physical ailment , which acts as Satan's messenger to beat me and keep me from being proud .
47012008	Three times I prayed to the Lord about this and asked him to take it away .
47012009	But his answer was : “ My grace is all you need , for my power is greatest when you are weak . ” I am most happy , then , to be proud of my weaknesses , in order to feel the protection of Christ's power over me .
47012010	I am content with weaknesses , insults , hardships , persecutions , and difficulties for Christ's sake . For when I am weak , then I am strong .
47012011	I am acting like a fool—but you have made me do it . You are the ones who ought to show your approval of me . For even if I am nothing , I am in no way inferior to those very special “ apostles ” of yours .
47012012	The many miracles and wonders that prove that I am an apostle were performed among you with much patience .
47012013	How were you treated any worse than the other churches , except that I did not bother you for financial help ? Please forgive me for being so unfair !
47012014	This is now the third time that I am ready to come to visit you—and I will not make any demands on you . It is you I want , not your money . After all , children should not have to provide for their parents , but parents should provide for their children .
47012015	I will be glad to spend all I have , and myself as well , in order to help you . Will you love me less because I love you so much ?
47012016	You will agree , then , that I was not a burden to you . But someone will say that I was tricky , and trapped you with lies .
47012017	How ? Did I take advantage of you through any of the messengers I sent ?
47012018	I begged Titus to go , and I sent the other believer with him . Would you say that Titus took advantage of you ? Do not he and I act from the very same motives and behave in the same way ?
47012019	Perhaps you think that all along we have been trying to defend ourselves before you . No ! We speak as Christ would have us speak in the presence of God , and everything we do , dear friends , is done to help you .
47012020	I am afraid that when I get there I will find you different from what I would like you to be and you will find me different from what you would like me to be . I am afraid that I will find quarreling and jealousy , hot tempers and selfishness , insults and gossip , pride and disorder .
47012021	I am afraid that the next time I come my God will humiliate me in your presence , and I shall weep over many who sinned in the past and have not repented of the immoral things they have done—their lust and their sexual sins .
47013001	This is now the third time that I am coming to visit you . “ Any accusation must be upheld by the evidence of two or more witnesses ” —as the scripture says .
47013002	I want to tell those of you who have sinned in the past , and all the others ; I said it before during my second visit to you , but I will say it again now that I am away : the next time I come nobody will escape punishment .
47013003	You will have all the proof you want that Christ speaks through me . When he deals with you , he is not weak ; instead , he shows his power among you .
47013004	For even though it was in weakness that he was put to death on the cross , it is by God's power that he lives . In union with him we also are weak ; but in our relations with you we shall share God's power in his life .
47013005	Put yourselves to the test and judge yourselves , to find out whether you are living in faith . Surely you know that Christ Jesus is in you ? —unless you have completely failed .
47013006	I trust you will know that we are not failures .
47013007	We pray to God that you will do no wrong—not in order to show that we are a success , but so that you may do what is right , even though we may seem to be failures .
47013008	For we cannot do a thing against the truth , but only for it .
47013009	We are glad when we are weak but you are strong . And so we also pray that you will become perfect .
47013010	That is why I write this while I am away from you ; it is so that when I arrive I will not have to deal harshly with you in using the authority that the Lord has given me—authority to build you up , not to tear you down .
47013011	And now , my friends , good-bye ! Strive for perfection ; listen to my appeals ; agree with one another ; live in peace . And the God of love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Greet one another with the kiss of peace . All of God's people send you their greetings .
47013013	
47013014	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , the love of God , and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all .
48001001	From Paul , whose call to be an apostle did not come from human beings or by human means , but from Jesus Christ and God the Father , who raised him from death .
48001002	All the believers who are here join me in sending greetings to the churches of Galatia :
48001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
48001004	In order to set us free from this present evil age , Christ gave himself for our sins , in obedience to the will of our God and Father .
48001005	To God be the glory forever and ever ! Amen .
48001006	I am surprised at you ! In no time at all you are deserting the one who called you by the grace of Christ , and are accepting another gospel .
48001007	Actually , there is no “ other gospel , ” but I say this because there are some people who are upsetting you and trying to change the gospel of Christ .
48001008	But even if we or an angel from heaven should preach to you a gospel that is different from the one we preached to you , may he be condemned to hell !
48001009	We have said it before , and now I say it again : if anyone preaches to you a gospel that is different from the one you accepted , may he be condemned to hell !
48001010	Does this sound as if I am trying to win human approval ? No indeed ! What I want is God's approval ! Am I trying to be popular with people ? If I were still trying to do so , I would not be a servant of Christ .
48001011	Let me tell you , my friends , that the gospel I preach is not of human origin .
48001012	I did not receive it from any human being , nor did anyone teach it to me . It was Jesus Christ himself who revealed it to me .
48001013	You have been told how I used to live when I was devoted to the Jewish religion , how I persecuted without mercy the church of God and did my best to destroy it .
48001014	I was ahead of most other Jews of my age in my practice of the Jewish religion , and was much more devoted to the traditions of our ancestors .
48001015	But God in his grace chose me even before I was born , and called me to serve him . And when he decided
48001016	to reveal his Son to me , so that I might preach the Good News about him to the Gentiles , I did not go to anyone for advice ,
48001017	nor did I go to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before me . Instead , I went at once to Arabia , and then I returned to Damascus .
48001018	It was three years later that I went to Jerusalem to obtain information from Peter , and I stayed with him for two weeks .
48001019	I did not see any other apostle except James , the Lord's brother .
48001020	What I write is true . God knows that I am not lying !
48001021	Afterward I went to places in Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	At that time the members of the churches in Judea did not know me personally .
48001023	They knew only what others were saying : “ The man who used to persecute us is now preaching the faith that he once tried to destroy ! ”
48001024	And so they praised God because of me .
48002001	Fourteen years later I went back to Jerusalem with Barnabas , taking Titus along with me .
48002002	I went because God revealed to me that I should go . In a private meeting with the leaders I explained the gospel message that I preach to the Gentiles . I did not want my work in the past or in the present to be a failure .
48002003	My companion Titus , even though he is Greek , was not forced to be circumcised ,
48002004	although some wanted it done . Pretending to be believers , these men slipped into our group as spies , in order to find out about the freedom we have through our union with Christ Jesus . They wanted to make slaves of us ,
48002005	but in order to keep the truth of the gospel safe for you , we did not give in to them for a minute .
48002006	But those who seemed to be the leaders—I say this because it makes no difference to me what they were ; God does not judge by outward appearances—those leaders , I say , made no new suggestions to me .
48002007	On the contrary , they saw that God had given me the task of preaching the gospel to the Gentiles , just as he had given Peter the task of preaching the gospel to the Jews .
48002008	For by God's power I was made an apostle to the Gentiles , just as Peter was made an apostle to the Jews .
48002009	James , Peter , and John , who seemed to be the leaders , recognized that God had given me this special task ; so they shook hands with Barnabas and me , as a sign that we were all partners . We agreed that Barnabas and I would work among the Gentiles and they among the Jews .
48002010	All they asked was that we should remember the needy in their group , which is the very thing I have been eager to do .
48002011	But when Peter came to Antioch , I opposed him in public , because he was clearly wrong .
48002012	Before some men who had been sent by James arrived there , Peter had been eating with the Gentile believers . But after these men arrived , he drew back and would not eat with the Gentiles , because he was afraid of those who were in favor of circumcising them .
48002013	The other Jewish believers also started acting like cowards along with Peter ; and even Barnabas was swept along by their cowardly action .
48002014	When I saw that they were not walking a straight path in line with the truth of the gospel , I said to Peter in front of them all , “ You are a Jew , yet you have been living like a Gentile , not like a Jew . How , then , can you try to force Gentiles to live like Jews ? ”
48002015	Indeed , we are Jews by birth and not “ Gentile sinners , ” as they are called .
48002016	Yet we know that a person is put right with God only through faith in Jesus Christ , never by doing what the Law requires . We , too , have believed in Christ Jesus in order to be put right with God through our faith in Christ , and not by doing what the Law requires . For no one is put right with God by doing what the Law requires .
48002017	If , then , as we try to be put right with God by our union with Christ , we are found to be sinners , as much as the Gentiles are—does this mean that Christ is serving the cause of sin ? By no means !
48002018	If I start to rebuild the system of Law that I tore down , then I show myself to be someone who breaks the Law .
48002019	So far as the Law is concerned , however , I am dead—killed by the Law itself—in order that I might live for God . I have been put to death with Christ on his cross ,
48002020	so that it is no longer I who live , but it is Christ who lives in me . This life that I live now , I live by faith in the Son of God , who loved me and gave his life for me .
48002021	I refuse to reject the grace of God . But if a person is put right with God through the Law , it means that Christ died for nothing !
48003001	You foolish Galatians ! Who put a spell on you ? Before your very eyes you had a clear description of the death of Jesus Christ on the cross !
48003002	Tell me this one thing : did you receive God's Spirit by doing what the Law requires or by hearing the gospel and believing it ?
48003003	How can you be so foolish ! You began by God's Spirit ; do you now want to finish by your own power ?
48003004	Did all your experience mean nothing at all ? Surely it meant something !
48003005	Does God give you the Spirit and work miracles among you because you do what the Law requires or because you hear the gospel and believe it ?
48003006	Consider the experience of Abraham ; as the scripture says , “ He believed God , and because of his faith God accepted him as righteous . ”
48003007	You should realize , then , that the real descendants of Abraham are the people who have faith .
48003008	The scripture predicted that God would put the Gentiles right with himself through faith . And so the scripture announced the Good News to Abraham : “ Through you God will bless all people . ”
48003009	Abraham believed and was blessed ; so all who believe are blessed as he was .
48003010	Those who depend on obeying the Law live under a curse . For the scripture says , “ Whoever does not always obey everything that is written in the book of the Law is under God's curse ! ”
48003011	Now , it is clear that no one is put right with God by means of the Law , because the scripture says , “ Only the person who is put right with God through faith shall live . ”
48003012	But the Law has nothing to do with faith . Instead , as the scripture says , “ Whoever does everything the Law requires will live . ”
48003013	But by becoming a curse for us Christ has redeemed us from the curse that the Law brings ; for the scripture says , “ Anyone who is hanged on a tree is under God's curse . ”
48003014	Christ did this in order that the blessing which God promised to Abraham might be given to the Gentiles by means of Christ Jesus , so that through faith we might receive the Spirit promised by God .
48003015	My friends , I am going to use an everyday example : when two people agree on a matter and sign an agreement , no one can break it or add anything to it .
48003016	Now , God made his promises to Abraham and to his descendant . The scripture does not use the plural “ descendants , ” meaning many people , but the singular “ descendant , ” meaning one person only , namely , Christ .
48003017	What I mean is that God made a covenant with Abraham and promised to keep it . The Law , which was given four hundred and thirty years later , cannot break that covenant and cancel God's promise .
48003018	For if God's gift depends on the Law , then it no longer depends on his promise . However , it was because of his promise that God gave that gift to Abraham .
48003019	What , then , was the purpose of the Law ? It was added in order to show what wrongdoing is , and it was meant to last until the coming of Abraham's descendant , to whom the promise was made . The Law was handed down by angels , with a man acting as a go-between .
48003020	But a go-between is not needed when only one person is involved ; and God is one .
48003021	Does this mean that the Law is against God's promises ? No , not at all ! For if human beings had received a law that could bring life , then everyone could be put right with God by obeying it .
48003022	But the scripture says that the whole world is under the power of sin ; and so the gift which is promised on the basis of faith in Jesus Christ is given to those who believe .
48003023	But before the time for faith came , the Law kept us all locked up as prisoners until this coming faith should be revealed .
48003024	And so the Law was in charge of us until Christ came , in order that we might then be put right with God through faith .
48003025	Now that the time for faith is here , the Law is no longer in charge of us .
48003026	It is through faith that all of you are God's children in union with Christ Jesus .
48003027	You were baptized into union with Christ , and now you are clothed , so to speak , with the life of Christ himself .
48003028	So there is no difference between Jews and Gentiles , between slaves and free people , between men and women ; you are all one in union with Christ Jesus .
48003029	If you belong to Christ , then you are the descendants of Abraham and will receive what God has promised .
48004001	But now to continue—the son who will receive his father's property is treated just like a slave while he is young , even though he really owns everything .
48004002	While he is young , there are men who take care of him and manage his affairs until the time set by his father .
48004003	In the same way , we too were slaves of the ruling spirits of the universe before we reached spiritual maturity .
48004004	But when the right time finally came , God sent his own Son . He came as the son of a human mother and lived under the Jewish Law ,
48004005	to redeem those who were under the Law , so that we might become God's children .
48004006	To show that you are his children , God sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts , the Spirit who cries out , “ Father , my Father . ”
48004007	So then , you are no longer a slave but a child . And since you are his child , God will give you all that he has for his children .
48004008	In the past you did not know God , and so you were slaves of beings who are not gods .
48004009	But now that you know God—or , I should say , now that God knows you—how is it that you want to turn back to those weak and pitiful ruling spirits ? Why do you want to become their slaves all over again ?
48004010	You pay special attention to certain days , months , seasons , and years .
48004011	I am worried about you ! Can it be that all my work for you has been for nothing ?
48004012	I beg you , my friends , be like me . After all , I am like you . You have not done me any wrong .
48004013	You remember why I preached the gospel to you the first time ; it was because I was sick .
48004014	But even though my physical condition was a great trial to you , you did not despise or reject me . Instead , you received me as you would an angel from heaven ; you received me as you would Christ Jesus .
48004015	You were so happy ! What has happened ? I myself can say that you would have taken out your own eyes , if you could , and given them to me .
48004016	Have I now become your enemy by telling you the truth ?
48004017	Those other people show a deep interest in you , but their intentions are not good . All they want is to separate you from me , so that you will have the same interest in them as they have in you .
48004018	Now , it is good to have such a deep interest if the purpose is good—this is true always , and not merely when I am with you .
48004019	My dear children ! Once again , just like a mother in childbirth , I feel the same kind of pain for you until Christ's nature is formed in you .
48004020	How I wish I were with you now , so that I could take a different attitude toward you . I am so worried about you !
48004021	Let me ask those of you who want to be subject to the Law : do you not hear what the Law says ?
48004022	It says that Abraham had two sons , one by a slave woman , the other by a free woman .
48004023	His son by the slave woman was born in the usual way , but his son by the free woman was born as a result of God's promise .
48004024	These things can be understood as a figure : the two women represent two covenants . The one whose children are born in slavery is Hagar , and she represents the covenant made at Mount Sinai .
48004025	Hagar , who stands for Mount Sinai in Arabia , is a figure of the present city of Jerusalem , in slavery with all its people .
48004026	But the heavenly Jerusalem is free , and she is our mother .
48004027	For the scripture says , “ Be happy , you childless woman ! Shout and cry with joy , you who never felt the pains of childbirth ! For the woman who was deserted will have more children than the woman whose husband never left her . ”
48004028	Now , you , my friends , are God's children as a result of his promise , just as Isaac was .
48004029	At that time the son who was born in the usual way persecuted the one who was born because of God's Spirit ; and it is the same now .
48004030	But what does the scripture say ? It says , “ Send the slave woman and her son away ; for the son of the slave woman will not have a part of the father's property along with the son of the free woman . ”
48004031	So then , my friends , we are not the children of a slave woman but of a free woman .
48005001	Freedom is what we have—Christ has set us free ! Stand , then , as free people , and do not allow yourselves to become slaves again .
48005002	Listen ! I , Paul , tell you that if you allow yourselves to be circumcised , it means that Christ is of no use to you at all .
48005003	Once more I warn any man who allows himself to be circumcised that he is obliged to obey the whole Law .
48005004	Those of you who try to be put right with God by obeying the Law have cut yourselves off from Christ . You are outside God's grace .
48005005	As for us , our hope is that God will put us right with him ; and this is what we wait for by the power of God's Spirit working through our faith .
48005006	For when we are in union with Christ Jesus , neither circumcision nor the lack of it makes any difference at all ; what matters is faith that works through love .
48005007	You were doing so well ! Who made you stop obeying the truth ? How did he persuade you ?
48005008	It was not done by God , who calls you .
48005009	“ It takes only a little yeast to make the whole batch of dough rise , ” as they say .
48005010	But I still feel confident about you . Our life in union with the Lord makes me confident that you will not take a different view and that whoever is upsetting you will be punished by God .
48005011	But as for me , my friends , if I continue to preach that circumcision is necessary , why am I still being persecuted ? If that were true , then my preaching about the cross of Christ would cause no trouble .
48005012	I wish that the people who are upsetting you would go all the way ; let them go on and castrate themselves !
48005013	As for you , my friends , you were called to be free . But do not let this freedom become an excuse for letting your physical desires control you . Instead , let love make you serve one another .
48005014	For the whole Law is summed up in one commandment : “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
48005015	But if you act like wild animals , hurting and harming each other , then watch out , or you will completely destroy one another .
48005016	What I say is this : let the Spirit direct your lives , and you will not satisfy the desires of the human nature .
48005017	For what our human nature wants is opposed to what the Spirit wants , and what the Spirit wants is opposed to what our human nature wants . These two are enemies , and this means that you cannot do what you want to do .
48005018	If the Spirit leads you , then you are not subject to the Law .
48005019	What human nature does is quite plain . It shows itself in immoral , filthy , and indecent actions ;
48005020	in worship of idols and witchcraft . People become enemies and they fight ; they become jealous , angry , and ambitious . They separate into parties and groups ;
48005021	they are envious , get drunk , have orgies , and do other things like these . I warn you now as I have before : those who do these things will not possess the Kingdom of God .
48005022	But the Spirit produces love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	humility , and self-control . There is no law against such things as these .
48005024	And those who belong to Christ Jesus have put to death their human nature with all its passions and desires .
48005025	The Spirit has given us life ; he must also control our lives .
48005026	We must not be proud or irritate one another or be jealous of one another .
48006001	My friends , if someone is caught in any kind of wrongdoing , those of you who are spiritual should set him right ; but you must do it in a gentle way . And keep an eye on yourselves , so that you will not be tempted , too .
48006002	Help carry one another's burdens , and in this way you will obey the law of Christ .
48006003	If you think you are something when you really are nothing , you are only deceiving yourself .
48006004	You should each judge your own conduct . If it is good , then you can be proud of what you yourself have done , without having to compare it with what someone else has done .
48006005	For each of you have to carry your own load .
48006006	If you are being taught the Christian message , you should share all the good things you have with your teacher .
48006007	Do not deceive yourselves ; no one makes a fool of God . You will reap exactly what you plant .
48006008	If you plant in the field of your natural desires , from it you will gather the harvest of death ; if you plant in the field of the Spirit , from the Spirit you will gather the harvest of eternal life .
48006009	So let us not become tired of doing good ; for if we do not give up , the time will come when we will reap the harvest .
48006010	So then , as often as we have the chance , we should do good to everyone , and especially to those who belong to our family in the faith .
48006011	See what big letters I make as I write to you now with my own hand !
48006012	The people who are trying to force you to be circumcised are the ones who want to show off and boast about external matters . They do it , however , only so that they may not be persecuted for the cross of Christ .
48006013	Even those who practice circumcision do not obey the Law ; they want you to be circumcised so that they can boast that you submitted to this physical ceremony .
48006014	As for me , however , I will boast only about the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ ; for by means of his cross the world is dead to me , and I am dead to the world .
48006015	It does not matter at all whether or not one is circumcised ; what does matter is being a new creature .
48006016	As for those who follow this rule in their lives , may peace and mercy be with them—with them and with all of God's people !
48006017	To conclude : let no one give me any more trouble , because the scars I have on my body show that I am the slave of Jesus .
48006018	May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all , my friends . Amen .
49001001	From Paul , who by God's will is an apostle of Christ Jesus— To God's people in Ephesus , who are faithful in their life in union with Christ Jesus :
49001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
49001003	Let us give thanks to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! For in our union with Christ he has blessed us by giving us every spiritual blessing in the heavenly world .
49001004	Even before the world was made , God had already chosen us to be his through our union with Christ , so that we would be holy and without fault before him . Because of his love
49001005	God had already decided that through Jesus Christ he would make us his children—this was his pleasure and purpose .
49001006	Let us praise God for his glorious grace , for the free gift he gave us in his dear Son !
49001007	For by the blood of Christ we are set free , that is , our sins are forgiven . How great is the grace of God ,
49001008	which he gave to us in such large measure ! In all his wisdom and insight
49001009	God did what he had purposed , and made known to us the secret plan he had already decided to complete by means of Christ .
49001010	This plan , which God will complete when the time is right , is to bring all creation together , everything in heaven and on earth , with Christ as head .
49001011	All things are done according to God's plan and decision ; and God chose us to be his own people in union with Christ because of his own purpose , based on what he had decided from the very beginning .
49001012	Let us , then , who were the first to hope in Christ , praise God's glory !
49001013	And you also became God's people when you heard the true message , the Good News that brought you salvation . You believed in Christ , and God put his stamp of ownership on you by giving you the Holy Spirit he had promised .
49001014	The Spirit is the guarantee that we shall receive what God has promised his people , and this assures us that God will give complete freedom to those who are his . Let us praise his glory !
49001015	For this reason , ever since I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus and your love for all of God's people ,
49001016	I have not stopped giving thanks to God for you . I remember you in my prayers
49001017	and ask the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the glorious Father , to give you the Spirit , who will make you wise and reveal God to you , so that you will know him .
49001018	I ask that your minds may be opened to see his light , so that you will know what is the hope to which he has called you , how rich are the wonderful blessings he promises his people ,
49001019	and how very great is his power at work in us who believe . This power working in us is the same as the mighty strength
49001020	which he used when he raised Christ from death and seated him at his right side in the heavenly world .
49001021	Christ rules there above all heavenly rulers , authorities , powers , and lords ; he has a title superior to all titles of authority in this world and in the next .
49001022	God put all things under Christ's feet and gave him to the church as supreme Lord over all things .
49001023	The church is Christ's body , the completion of him who himself completes all things everywhere .
49002001	In the past you were spiritually dead because of your disobedience and sins .
49002002	At that time you followed the world's evil way ; you obeyed the ruler of the spiritual powers in space , the spirit who now controls the people who disobey God .
49002003	Actually all of us were like them and lived according to our natural desires , doing whatever suited the wishes of our own bodies and minds . In our natural condition we , like everyone else , were destined to suffer God's anger .
49002004	But God's mercy is so abundant , and his love for us is so great ,
49002005	that while we were spiritually dead in our disobedience he brought us to life with Christ . It is by God's grace that you have been saved .
49002006	In our union with Christ Jesus he raised us up with him to rule with him in the heavenly world .
49002007	He did this to demonstrate for all time to come the extraordinary greatness of his grace in the love he showed us in Christ Jesus .
49002010	God has made us what we are , and in our union with Christ Jesus he has created us for a life of good deeds , which he has already prepared for us to do .
49002011	You Gentiles by birth—called “ the uncircumcised ” by the Jews , who call themselves the circumcised ( which refers to what men do to their bodies ) —remember what you were in the past .
49002012	At that time you were apart from Christ . You were foreigners and did not belong to God's chosen people . You had no part in the covenants , which were based on God's promises to his people , and you lived in this world without hope and without God .
49002013	But now , in union with Christ Jesus you , who used to be far away , have been brought near by the blood of Christ .
49002014	For Christ himself has brought us peace by making Jews and Gentiles one people . With his own body he broke down the wall that separated them and kept them enemies .
49002015	He abolished the Jewish Law with its commandments and rules , in order to create out of the two races one new people in union with himself , in this way making peace .
49002016	By his death on the cross Christ destroyed their enmity ; by means of the cross he united both races into one body and brought them back to God .
49002017	So Christ came and preached the Good News of peace to all—to you Gentiles , who were far away from God , and to the Jews , who were near to him .
49002018	It is through Christ that all of us , Jews and Gentiles , are able to come in the one Spirit into the presence of the Father .
49002019	So then , you Gentiles are not foreigners or strangers any longer ; you are now citizens together with God's people and members of the family of God .
49002020	You , too , are built upon the foundation laid by the apostles and prophets , the cornerstone being Christ Jesus himself .
49002021	He is the one who holds the whole building together and makes it grow into a sacred temple dedicated to the Lord .
49002022	In union with him you too are being built together with all the others into a place where God lives through his Spirit .
49003001	For this reason I , Paul , the prisoner of Christ Jesus for the sake of you Gentiles , pray to God .
49003002	Surely you have heard that God in his grace has given me this work to do for your good .
49003003	God revealed his secret plan and made it known to me . ( I have written briefly about this ,
49003004	and if you will read what I have written , you can learn about my understanding of the secret of Christ . )
49003005	In past times human beings were not told this secret , but God has revealed it now by the Spirit to his holy apostles and prophets .
49003006	The secret is that by means of the gospel the Gentiles have a part with the Jews in God's blessings ; they are members of the same body and share in the promise that God made through Christ Jesus .
49003007	I was made a servant of the gospel by God's special gift , which he gave me through the working of his power .
49003008	I am less than the least of all God's people ; yet God gave me this privilege of taking to the Gentiles the Good News about the infinite riches of Christ ,
49003009	and of making all people see how God's secret plan is to be put into effect . God , who is the Creator of all things , kept his secret hidden through all the past ages ,
49003010	in order that at the present time , by means of the church , the angelic rulers and powers in the heavenly world might learn of his wisdom in all its different forms .
49003011	God did this according to his eternal purpose , which he achieved through Christ Jesus our Lord .
49003012	In union with Christ and through our faith in him we have the boldness to go into God's presence with all confidence .
49003013	I beg you , then , not to be discouraged because I am suffering for you ; it is all for your benefit .
49003014	For this reason I fall on my knees before the Father ,
49003015	from whom every family in heaven and on earth receives its true name .
49003016	I ask God from the wealth of his glory to give you power through his Spirit to be strong in your inner selves ,
49003017	and I pray that Christ will make his home in your hearts through faith . I pray that you may have your roots and foundation in love ,
49003018	so that you , together with all God's people , may have the power to understand how broad and long , how high and deep , is Christ's love .
49003019	Yes , may you come to know his love—although it can never be fully known—and so be completely filled with the very nature of God .
49003020	To him who by means of his power working in us is able to do so much more than we can ever ask for , or even think of :
49003021	to God be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus for all time , forever and ever ! Amen .
49004001	I urge you , then—I who am a prisoner because I serve the Lord : live a life that measures up to the standard God set when he called you .
49004002	Be always humble , gentle , and patient . Show your love by being tolerant with one another .
49004003	Do your best to preserve the unity which the Spirit gives by means of the peace that binds you together .
49004004	There is one body and one Spirit , just as there is one hope to which God has called you .
49004005	There is one Lord , one faith , one baptism ;
49004006	there is one God and Father of all people , who is Lord of all , works through all , and is in all .
49004007	Each one of us has received a special gift in proportion to what Christ has given .
49004008	As the scripture says , “ When he went up to the very heights , he took many captives with him ; he gave gifts to people . ”
49004017	In the Lord's name , then , I warn you : do not continue to live like the heathen , whose thoughts are worthless
49004018	and whose minds are in the dark . They have no part in the life that God gives , for they are completely ignorant and stubborn .
49004019	They have lost all feeling of shame ; they give themselves over to vice and do all sorts of indecent things without restraint .
49004020	That was not what you learned about Christ !
49004021	You certainly heard about him , and as his followers you were taught the truth that is in Jesus .
49004022	So get rid of your old self , which made you live as you used to—the old self that was being destroyed by its deceitful desires .
49004023	Your hearts and minds must be made completely new ,
49004024	and you must put on the new self , which is created in God's likeness and reveals itself in the true life that is upright and holy .
49004025	No more lying , then ! Each of you must tell the truth to the other believer , because we are all members together in the body of Christ .
49004026	If you become angry , do not let your anger lead you into sin , and do not stay angry all day .
49004027	Don't give the Devil a chance .
49004028	If you used to rob , you must stop robbing and start working , in order to earn an honest living for yourself and to be able to help the poor .
49004029	Do not use harmful words , but only helpful words , the kind that build up and provide what is needed , so that what you say will do good to those who hear you .
49004030	And do not make God's Holy Spirit sad ; for the Spirit is God's mark of ownership on you , a guarantee that the Day will come when God will set you free .
49004031	Get rid of all bitterness , passion , and anger . No more shouting or insults , no more hateful feelings of any sort .
49004032	Instead , be kind and tender-hearted to one another , and forgive one another , as God has forgiven you through Christ .
49005001	Since you are God's dear children , you must try to be like him .
49005002	Your life must be controlled by love , just as Christ loved us and gave his life for us as a sweet-smelling offering and sacrifice that pleases God .
49005003	Since you are God's people , it is not right that any matters of sexual immorality or indecency or greed should even be mentioned among you .
49005004	Nor is it fitting for you to use language which is obscene , profane , or vulgar . Rather you should give thanks to God .
49005005	You may be sure that no one who is immoral , indecent , or greedy ( for greed is a form of idolatry ) will ever receive a share in the Kingdom of Christ and of God .
49005006	Do not let anyone deceive you with foolish words ; it is because of these very things that God's anger will come upon those who do not obey him .
49005007	So have nothing at all to do with such people .
49005008	You yourselves used to be in the darkness , but since you have become the Lord's people , you are in the light . So you must live like people who belong to the light ,
49005009	for it is the light that brings a rich harvest of every kind of goodness , righteousness , and truth .
49005010	Try to learn what pleases the Lord .
49005011	Have nothing to do with the worthless things that people do , things that belong to the darkness . Instead , bring them out to the light . (
49005012	It is really too shameful even to talk about the things they do in secret . )
49005013	And when all things are brought out to the light , then their true nature is clearly revealed ;
49005014	for anything that is clearly revealed becomes light . That is why it is said , “ Wake up , sleeper , and rise from death , and Christ will shine on you . ”
49005015	So be careful how you live . Don't live like ignorant people , but like wise people .
49005016	Make good use of every opportunity you have , because these are evil days .
49005017	Don't be fools , then , but try to find out what the Lord wants you to do .
49005018	Do not get drunk with wine , which will only ruin you ; instead , be filled with the Spirit .
49005019	Speak to one another with the words of psalms , hymns , and sacred songs ; sing hymns and psalms to the Lord with praise in your hearts .
49005020	In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , always give thanks for everything to God the Father .
49005021	Submit yourselves to one another because of your reverence for Christ .
49005022	Wives , submit yourselves to your husbands as to the Lord .
49005023	For a husband has authority over his wife just as Christ has authority over the church ; and Christ is himself the Savior of the church , his body .
49005024	And so wives must submit themselves completely to their husbands just as the church submits itself to Christ .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives just as Christ loved the church and gave his life for it .
49005026	He did this to dedicate the church to God by his word , after making it clean by washing it in water ,
49005027	in order to present the church to himself in all its beauty—pure and faultless , without spot or wrinkle or any other imperfection .
49005028	Men ought to love their wives just as they love their own bodies . A man who loves his wife loves himself . (
49005029	None of us ever hate our own bodies . Instead , we feed them , and take care of them , just as Christ does the church ;
49005030	for we are members of his body . )
49005031	As the scripture says , “ For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and unite with his wife , and the two will become one . ”
49005032	There is a deep secret truth revealed in this scripture , which I understand as applying to Christ and the church .
49005033	But it also applies to you : every husband must love his wife as himself , and every wife must respect her husband .
49006001	Children , it is your Christian duty to obey your parents , for this is the right thing to do .
49006002	“ Respect your father and mother ” is the first commandment that has a promise added :
49006003	“ so that all may go well with you , and you may live a long time in the land . ”
49006004	Parents , do not treat your children in such a way as to make them angry . Instead , raise them with Christian discipline and instruction .
49006005	Slaves , obey your human masters with fear and trembling ; and do it with a sincere heart , as though you were serving Christ .
49006006	Do this not only when they are watching you , because you want to gain their approval ; but with all your heart do what God wants , as slaves of Christ .
49006007	Do your work as slaves cheerfully , as though you served the Lord , and not merely human beings .
49006008	Remember that the Lord will reward each of us , whether slave or free , for the good work we do .
49006009	Masters , behave in the same way toward your slaves and stop using threats . Remember that you and your slaves belong to the same Master in heaven , who judges everyone by the same standard .
49006010	Finally , build up your strength in union with the Lord and by means of his mighty power .
49006011	Put on all the armor that God gives you , so that you will be able to stand up against the Devil's evil tricks .
49006012	For we are not fighting against human beings but against the wicked spiritual forces in the heavenly world , the rulers , authorities , and cosmic powers of this dark age .
49006013	So put on God's armor now ! Then when the evil day comes , you will be able to resist the enemy's attacks ; and after fighting to the end , you will still hold your ground .
49006014	So stand ready , with truth as a belt tight around your waist , with righteousness as your breastplate ,
49006015	and as your shoes the readiness to announce the Good News of peace .
49006016	At all times carry faith as a shield ; for with it you will be able to put out all the burning arrows shot by the Evil One .
49006017	And accept salvation as a helmet , and the word of God as the sword which the Spirit gives you .
49006018	Do all this in prayer , asking for God's help . Pray on every occasion , as the Spirit leads . For this reason keep alert and never give up ; pray always for all God's people .
49006019	And pray also for me , that God will give me a message when I am ready to speak , so that I may speak boldly and make known the gospel's secret .
49006020	For the sake of this gospel I am an ambassador , though now I am in prison . Pray that I may be bold in speaking about the gospel as I should .
49006021	Tychicus , our dear brother and faithful servant in the Lord's work , will give you all the news about me , so that you may know how I am getting along .
49006022	That is why I am sending him to you—to tell you how all of us are getting along and to encourage you .
49006023	May God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give to all Christians peace and love with faith .
49006024	May God's grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ with undying love .
50001001	From Paul and Timothy , servants of Christ Jesus— To all God's people in Philippi who are in union with Christ Jesus , including the church leaders and helpers :
50001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
50001003	I thank my God for you every time I think of you ;
50001004	and every time I pray for you all , I pray with joy
50001005	because of the way in which you have helped me in the work of the gospel from the very first day until now .
50001006	And so I am sure that God , who began this good work in you , will carry it on until it is finished on the Day of Christ Jesus .
50001007	You are always in my heart ! And so it is only right for me to feel as I do about you . For you have all shared with me in this privilege that God has given me , both now that I am in prison and also while I was free to defend the gospel and establish it firmly .
50001008	God is my witness that I tell the truth when I say that my deep feeling for you all comes from the heart of Christ Jesus himself .
50001009	I pray that your love will keep on growing more and more , together with true knowledge and perfect judgment ,
50001010	so that you will be able to choose what is best . Then you will be free from all impurity and blame on the Day of Christ .
50001011	Your lives will be filled with the truly good qualities which only Jesus Christ can produce , for the glory and praise of God .
50001012	I want you to know , my friends , that the things that have happened to me have really helped the progress of the gospel .
50001013	As a result , the whole palace guard and all the others here know that I am in prison because I am a servant of Christ .
50001014	And my being in prison has given most of the believers more confidence in the Lord , so that they grow bolder all the time to preach the message fearlessly .
50001015	Of course some of them preach Christ because they are jealous and quarrelsome , but others from genuine good will .
50001016	These do so from love , because they know that God has given me the work of defending the gospel .
50001017	The others do not proclaim Christ sincerely , but from a spirit of selfish ambition ; they think that they will make more trouble for me while I am in prison .
50001018	It does not matter ! I am happy about it—just so Christ is preached in every way possible , whether from wrong or right motives . And I will continue to be happy ,
50001019	because I know that by means of your prayers and the help which comes from the Spirit of Jesus Christ I shall be set free .
50001020	My deep desire and hope is that I shall never fail in my duty , but that at all times , and especially right now , I shall be full of courage , so that with my whole being I shall bring honor to Christ , whether I live or die .
50001021	For what is life ? To me , it is Christ . Death , then , will bring more .
50001022	But if by continuing to live I can do more worthwhile work , then I am not sure which I should choose .
50001023	I am pulled in two directions . I want very much to leave this life and be with Christ , which is a far better thing ;
50001024	but for your sake it is much more important that I remain alive .
50001025	I am sure of this , and so I know that I will stay . I will stay on with you all , to add to your progress and joy in the faith ,
50001026	so that when I am with you again , you will have even more reason to be proud of me in your life in union with Christ Jesus .
50001027	Now , the important thing is that your way of life should be as the gospel of Christ requires , so that , whether or not I am able to go and see you , I will hear that you are standing firm with one common purpose and that with only one desire you are fighting together for the faith of the gospel .
50001028	Don't be afraid of your enemies ; always be courageous , and this will prove to them that they will lose and that you will win , because it is God who gives you the victory .
50001029	For you have been given the privilege of serving Christ , not only by believing in him , but also by suffering for him .
50001030	Now you can take part with me in the battle . It is the same battle you saw me fighting in the past , and as you hear , the one I am fighting still .
50002001	Your life in Christ makes you strong , and his love comforts you . You have fellowship with the Spirit , and you have kindness and compassion for one another .
50002002	I urge you , then , to make me completely happy by having the same thoughts , sharing the same love , and being one in soul and mind .
50002003	Don't do anything from selfish ambition or from a cheap desire to boast , but be humble toward one another , always considering others better than yourselves .
50002004	And look out for one another's interests , not just for your own .
50002005	The attitude you should have is the one that Christ Jesus had :
50002006	He always had the nature of God , but he did not think that by force he should try to remain equal with God .
50002007	Instead of this , of his own free will he gave up all he had , and took the nature of a servant . He became like a human being and appeared in human likeness .
50002008	He was humble and walked the path of obedience all the way to death— his death on the cross .
50002009	For this reason God raised him to the highest place above and gave him the name that is greater than any other name .
50002010	And so , in honor of the name of Jesus all beings in heaven , on earth , and in the world below will fall on their knees ,
50002011	and all will openly proclaim that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
50002012	So then , dear friends , as you always obeyed me when I was with you , it is even more important that you obey me now while I am away from you . Keep on working with fear and trembling to complete your salvation ,
50002013	because God is always at work in you to make you willing and able to obey his own purpose .
50002014	Do everything without complaining or arguing ,
50002015	so that you may be innocent and pure as God's perfect children , who live in a world of corrupt and sinful people . You must shine among them like stars lighting up the sky ,
50002016	as you offer them the message of life . If you do so , I shall have reason to be proud of you on the Day of Christ , because it will show that all my effort and work have not been wasted .
50002017	Perhaps my life's blood is to be poured out like an offering on the sacrifice that your faith offers to God . If that is so , I am glad and share my joy with you all .
50002018	In the same way , you too must be glad and share your joy with me .
50002019	If it is the Lord's will , I hope that I will be able to send Timothy to you soon , so that I may be encouraged by news about you .
50002020	He is the only one who shares my feelings and who really cares about you .
50002021	Everyone else is concerned only with their own affairs , not with the cause of Jesus Christ .
50002022	And you yourselves know how he has proved his worth , how he and I , like a son and his father , have worked together for the sake of the gospel .
50002023	So I hope to send him to you as soon as I know how things are going to turn out for me .
50002024	And I trust in the Lord that I myself will be able to come to you soon .
50002025	I have thought it necessary to send to you our brother Epaphroditus , who has worked and fought by my side and who has served as your messenger in helping me .
50002026	He is anxious to see you all and is very upset because you had heard that he was sick .
50002027	Indeed he was sick and almost died . But God had pity on him , and not only on him but on me , too , and spared me an even greater sorrow .
50002028	I am all the more eager , then , to send him to you , so that you will be glad again when you see him , and my own sorrow will disappear .
50002029	Receive him , then , with joy , as a believer in the Lord . Show respect to all such people as he ,
50002030	because he risked his life and nearly died for the sake of the work of Christ , in order to give me the help that you yourselves could not give .
50003001	In conclusion , my friends , be joyful in your union with the Lord . I don't mind repeating what I have written before , and you will be safer if I do so .
50003002	Watch out for those who do evil things , those dogs , those who insist on cutting the body .
50003003	It is we , not they , who have received the true circumcision , for we worship God by means of his Spirit and rejoice in our life in union with Christ Jesus . We do not put any trust in external ceremonies .
50003004	I could , of course , put my trust in such things . If any of you think you can trust in external ceremonies , I have even more reason to feel that way .
50003005	I was circumcised when I was a week old . I am an Israelite by birth , of the tribe of Benjamin , a pure-blooded Hebrew . As far as keeping the Jewish Law is concerned , I was a Pharisee ,
50003006	and I was so zealous that I persecuted the church . As far as a person can be righteous by obeying the commands of the Law , I was without fault .
50003007	But all those things that I might count as profit I now reckon as loss for Christ's sake .
50003008	Not only those things ; I reckon everything as complete loss for the sake of what is so much more valuable , the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord . For his sake I have thrown everything away ; I consider it all as mere garbage , so that I may gain Christ
50003009	and be completely united with him . I no longer have a righteousness of my own , the kind that is gained by obeying the Law . I now have the righteousness that is given through faith in Christ , the righteousness that comes from God and is based on faith .
50003010	All I want is to know Christ and to experience the power of his resurrection , to share in his sufferings and become like him in his death ,
50003011	in the hope that I myself will be raised from death to life .
50003012	I do not claim that I have already succeeded or have already become perfect . I keep striving to win the prize for which Christ Jesus has already won me to himself .
50003013	Of course , my friends , I really do not think that I have already won it ; the one thing I do , however , is to forget what is behind me and do my best to reach what is ahead .
50003014	So I run straight toward the goal in order to win the prize , which is God's call through Christ Jesus to the life above .
50003015	All of us who are spiritually mature should have this same attitude . But if some of you have a different attitude , God will make this clear to you .
50003016	However that may be , let us go forward according to the same rules we have followed until now .
50003017	Keep on imitating me , my friends . Pay attention to those who follow the right example that we have set for you .
50003018	I have told you this many times before , and now I repeat it with tears : there are many whose lives make them enemies of Christ's death on the cross .
50003019	They are going to end up in hell , because their god is their bodily desires . They are proud of what they should be ashamed of , and they think only of things that belong to this world .
50003020	We , however , are citizens of heaven , and we eagerly wait for our Savior , the Lord Jesus Christ , to come from heaven .
50003021	He will change our weak mortal bodies and make them like his own glorious body , using that power by which he is able to bring all things under his rule .
50004001	So then , my friends , how dear you are to me and how I miss you ! How happy you make me , and how proud I am of you ! —this , dear friends , is how you should stand firm in your life in the Lord .
50004002	Euodia and Syntyche , please , I beg you , try to agree as sisters in the Lord .
50004003	And you too , my faithful partner , I want you to help these women ; for they have worked hard with me to spread the gospel , together with Clement and all my other fellow workers , whose names are in God's book of the living .
50004004	May you always be joyful in your union with the Lord . I say it again : rejoice !
50004005	Show a gentle attitude toward everyone . The Lord is coming soon .
50004006	Don't worry about anything , but in all your prayers ask God for what you need , always asking him with a thankful heart .
50004007	And God's peace , which is far beyond human understanding , will keep your hearts and minds safe in union with Christ Jesus .
50004008	In conclusion , my friends , fill your minds with those things that are good and that deserve praise : things that are true , noble , right , pure , lovely , and honorable .
50004009	Put into practice what you learned and received from me , both from my words and from my actions . And the God who gives us peace will be with you .
50004010	In my life in union with the Lord it is a great joy to me that after so long a time you once more had the chance of showing that you care for me . I don't mean that you had stopped caring for me—you just had no chance to show it .
50004011	And I am not saying this because I feel neglected , for I have learned to be satisfied with what I have .
50004012	I know what it is to be in need and what it is to have more than enough . I have learned this secret , so that anywhere , at any time , I am content , whether I am full or hungry , whether I have too much or too little .
50004013	I have the strength to face all conditions by the power that Christ gives me .
50004014	But it was very good of you to help me in my troubles .
50004015	You Philippians know very well that when I left Macedonia in the early days of preaching the Good News , you were the only church to help me ; you were the only ones who shared my profits and losses .
50004016	More than once when I needed help in Thessalonica , you sent it to me .
50004017	It is not that I just want to receive gifts ; rather , I want to see profit added to your account .
50004018	Here , then , is my receipt for everything you have given me—and it has been more than enough ! I have all I need now that Epaphroditus has brought me all your gifts . They are like a sweet-smelling offering to God , a sacrifice which is acceptable and pleasing to him .
50004019	And with all his abundant wealth through Christ Jesus , my God will supply all your needs .
50004020	To our God and Father be the glory forever and ever ! Amen .
50004021	Greetings to each one of God's people who belong to Christ Jesus . The believers here with me send you their greetings .
50004022	All God's people here send greetings , especially those who belong to the Emperor's palace .
50004023	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
51001001	From Paul , who by God's will is an apostle of Christ Jesus , and from our brother Timothy—
51001002	To God's people in Colossae , who are our faithful friends in union with Christ : May God our Father give you grace and peace .
51001003	We always give thanks to God , the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , when we pray for you .
51001004	For we have heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of your love for all God's people .
51001005	When the true message , the Good News , first came to you , you heard about the hope it offers . So your faith and love are based on what you hope for , which is kept safe for you in heaven .
51001006	The gospel keeps bringing blessings and is spreading throughout the world , just as it has among you ever since the day you first heard about the grace of God and came to know it as it really is .
51001007	You learned of God's grace from Epaphras , our dear fellow servant , who is Christ's faithful worker on our behalf .
51001008	He has told us of the love that the Spirit has given you .
51001009	For this reason we have always prayed for you , ever since we heard about you . We ask God to fill you with the knowledge of his will , with all the wisdom and understanding that his Spirit gives .
51001010	Then you will be able to live as the Lord wants and will always do what pleases him . Your lives will produce all kinds of good deeds , and you will grow in your knowledge of God .
51001013	He rescued us from the power of darkness and brought us safe into the kingdom of his dear Son ,
51001014	by whom we are set free , that is , our sins are forgiven .
51001015	Christ is the visible likeness of the invisible God . He is the first-born Son , superior to all created things .
51001016	For through him God created everything in heaven and on earth , the seen and the unseen things , including spiritual powers , lords , rulers , and authorities . God created the whole universe through him and for him .
51001017	Christ existed before all things , and in union with him all things have their proper place .
51001018	He is the head of his body , the church ; he is the source of the body's life . He is the first-born Son , who was raised from death , in order that he alone might have the first place in all things .
51001019	For it was by God's own decision that the Son has in himself the full nature of God .
51001020	Through the Son , then , God decided to bring the whole universe back to himself . God made peace through his Son's blood on the cross and so brought back to himself all things , both on earth and in heaven .
51001021	At one time you were far away from God and were his enemies because of the evil things you did and thought .
51001022	But now , by means of the physical death of his Son , God has made you his friends , in order to bring you , holy , pure , and faultless , into his presence .
51001023	You must , of course , continue faithful on a firm and sure foundation , and must not allow yourselves to be shaken from the hope you gained when you heard the gospel . It is of this gospel that I , Paul , became a servant—this gospel which has been preached to everybody in the world .
51001024	And now I am happy about my sufferings for you , for by means of my physical sufferings I am helping to complete what still remains of Christ's sufferings on behalf of his body , the church .
51001025	And I have been made a servant of the church by God , who gave me this task to perform for your good . It is the task of fully proclaiming his message ,
51001026	which is the secret he hid through all past ages from all human beings but has now revealed to his people .
51001027	God's plan is to make known his secret to his people , this rich and glorious secret which he has for all peoples . And the secret is that Christ is in you , which means that you will share in the glory of God .
51001028	So we preach Christ to everyone . With all possible wisdom we warn and teach them in order to bring each one into God's presence as a mature individual in union with Christ .
51001029	To get this done I toil and struggle , using the mighty strength which Christ supplies and which is at work in me .
51002001	Let me tell you how hard I have worked for you and for the people in Laodicea and for all others who do not know me personally .
51002002	I do this in order that they may be filled with courage and may be drawn together in love , and so have the full wealth of assurance which true understanding brings . In this way they will know God's secret , which is Christ himself .
51002003	He is the key that opens all the hidden treasures of God's wisdom and knowledge .
51002004	I tell you , then , do not let anyone deceive you with false arguments , no matter how good they seem to be .
51002005	For even though I am absent in body , yet I am with you in spirit , and I am glad as I see the resolute firmness with which you stand together in your faith in Christ .
51002006	Since you have accepted Christ Jesus as Lord , live in union with him .
51002007	Keep your roots deep in him , build your lives on him , and become stronger in your faith , as you were taught . And be filled with thanksgiving .
51002008	See to it , then , that no one enslaves you by means of the worthless deceit of human wisdom , which comes from the teachings handed down by human beings and from the ruling spirits of the universe , and not from Christ .
51002009	For the full content of divine nature lives in Christ , in his humanity ,
51002010	and you have been given full life in union with him . He is supreme over every spiritual ruler and authority .
51002011	In union with Christ you were circumcised , not with the circumcision that is made by human beings , but with the circumcision made by Christ , which consists of being freed from the power of this sinful self .
51002012	For when you were baptized , you were buried with Christ , and in baptism you were also raised with Christ through your faith in the active power of God , who raised him from death .
51002013	You were at one time spiritually dead because of your sins and because you were Gentiles without the Law . But God has now brought you to life with Christ . God forgave us all our sins ;
51002014	he canceled the unfavorable record of our debts with its binding rules and did away with it completely by nailing it to the cross .
51002015	And on that cross Christ freed himself from the power of the spiritual rulers and authorities ; he made a public spectacle of them by leading them as captives in his victory procession .
51002016	So let no one make rules about what you eat or drink or about holy days or the New Moon Festival or the Sabbath .
51002017	All such things are only a shadow of things in the future ; the reality is Christ .
51002018	Do not allow yourselves to be condemned by anyone who claims to be superior because of special visions and who insists on false humility and the worship of angels . For no reason at all , such people are all puffed up by their human way of thinking
51002019	and have stopped holding on to Christ , who is the head of the body . Under Christ's control the whole body is nourished and held together by its joints and ligaments , and it grows as God wants it to grow .
51002020	You have died with Christ and are set free from the ruling spirits of the universe . Why , then , do you live as though you belonged to this world ? Why do you obey such rules as
51002021	“ Don't handle this , ” “ Don't taste that , ” “ Don't touch the other ” ?
51002022	All these refer to things which become useless once they are used ; they are only human rules and teachings .
