51002023	Of course such rules appear to be based on wisdom in their forced worship of angels , and false humility , and severe treatment of the body ; but they have no real value in controlling physical passions .
51003001	You have been raised to life with Christ , so set your hearts on the things that are in heaven , where Christ sits on his throne at the right side of God .
51003002	Keep your minds fixed on things there , not on things here on earth .
51003003	For you have died , and your life is hidden with Christ in God .
51003004	Your real life is Christ and when he appears , then you too will appear with him and share his glory !
51003005	You must put to death , then , the earthly desires at work in you , such as sexual immorality , indecency , lust , evil passions , and greed ( for greed is a form of idolatry ) .
51003006	Because of such things God's anger will come upon those who do not obey him .
51003007	At one time you yourselves used to live according to such desires , when your life was dominated by them .
51003008	But now you must get rid of all these things : anger , passion , and hateful feelings . No insults or obscene talk must ever come from your lips .
51003009	Do not lie to one another , for you have put off the old self with its habits
51003010	and have put on the new self . This is the new being which God , its Creator , is constantly renewing in his own image , in order to bring you to a full knowledge of himself .
51003011	As a result , there is no longer any distinction between Gentiles and Jews , circumcised and uncircumcised , barbarians , savages , slaves , and free , but Christ is all , Christ is in all .
51003012	You are the people of God ; he loved you and chose you for his own . So then , you must clothe yourselves with compassion , kindness , humility , gentleness , and patience .
51003013	Be tolerant with one another and forgive one another whenever any of you has a complaint against someone else . You must forgive one another just as the Lord has forgiven you .
51003014	And to all these qualities add love , which binds all things together in perfect unity .
51003015	The peace that Christ gives is to guide you in the decisions you make ; for it is to this peace that God has called you together in the one body . And be thankful .
51003016	Christ's message in all its richness must live in your hearts . Teach and instruct one another with all wisdom . Sing psalms , hymns , and sacred songs ; sing to God with thanksgiving in your hearts .
51003017	Everything you do or say , then , should be done in the name of the Lord Jesus , as you give thanks through him to God the Father .
51003018	Wives , submit yourselves to your husbands , for that is what you should do as Christians .
51003019	Husbands , love your wives and do not be harsh with them .
51003020	Children , it is your Christian duty to obey your parents always , for that is what pleases God .
51003021	Parents , do not irritate your children , or they will become discouraged .
51003022	Slaves , obey your human masters in all things , not only when they are watching you because you want to gain their approval ; but do it with a sincere heart because of your reverence for the Lord .
51003023	Whatever you do , work at it with all your heart , as though you were working for the Lord and not for people .
51003024	Remember that the Lord will give you as a reward what he has kept for his people . For Christ is the real Master you serve .
51003025	And all wrongdoers will be repaid for the wrong things they do , because God judges everyone by the same standard .
51004001	Masters , be fair and just in the way you treat your slaves . Remember that you too have a Master in heaven .
51004002	Be persistent in prayer , and keep alert as you pray , giving thanks to God .
51004003	At the same time pray also for us , so that God will give us a good opportunity to preach his message about the secret of Christ . For that is why I am now in prison .
51004004	Pray , then , that I may speak , as I should , in such a way as to make it clear .
51004005	Be wise in the way you act toward those who are not believers , making good use of every opportunity you have .
51004006	Your speech should always be pleasant and interesting , and you should know how to give the right answer to everyone .
51004007	Our dear friend Tychicus , who is a faithful worker and fellow servant in the Lord's work , will give you all the news about me .
51004008	That is why I am sending him to you , in order to cheer you up by telling you how all of us are getting along .
51004009	With him goes Onesimus , that dear and faithful friend , who belongs to your group . They will tell you everything that is happening here .
51004010	Aristarchus , who is in prison with me , sends you greetings , and so does Mark , the cousin of Barnabas . ( You have already received instructions to welcome Mark if he comes your way . )
51004011	Joshua , also called Justus , sends greetings too . These three are the only Jewish believers who work with me for the Kingdom of God , and they have been a great help to me .
51004012	Greetings from Epaphras , another member of your group and a servant of Christ Jesus . He always prays fervently for you , asking God to make you stand firm , as mature and fully convinced Christians , in complete obedience to God's will .
51004013	I can personally testify to his hard work for you and for the people in Laodicea and Hierapolis .
51004014	Luke , our dear doctor , and Demas send you their greetings .
51004015	Give our best wishes to the believers in Laodicea and to Nympha and the church that meets in her house .
51004016	After you read this letter , make sure that it is read also in the church at Laodicea . At the same time , you are to read the letter that the believers in Laodicea will send you .
51004017	And tell Archippus , “ Be sure to finish the task you were given in the Lord's service . ”
51004018	With my own hand I write this : Greetings from Paul Do not forget my chains ! May God's grace be with you .
52001001	From Paul , Silas , and Timothy— To the people of the church in Thessalonica , who belong to God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ : May grace and peace be yours .
52001002	We always thank God for you all and always mention you in our prayers .
52001003	For we remember before our God and Father how you put your faith into practice , how your love made you work so hard , and how your hope in our Lord Jesus Christ is firm .
52001004	Our friends , we know that God loves you and has chosen you to be his own .
52001005	For we brought the Good News to you , not with words only , but also with power and the Holy Spirit , and with complete conviction of its truth . You know how we lived when we were with you ; it was for your own good .
52001006	You imitated us and the Lord ; and even though you suffered much , you received the message with the joy that comes from the Holy Spirit .
52001007	So you became an example to all believers in Macedonia and Achaia .
52001008	For not only did the message about the Lord go out from you throughout Macedonia and Achaia , but the news about your faith in God has gone everywhere . There is nothing , then , that we need to say .
52001009	All those people speak about how you received us when we visited you , and how you turned away from idols to God , to serve the true and living God
52001010	and to wait for his Son to come from heaven—his Son Jesus , whom he raised from death and who rescues us from God's anger that is coming .
52002001	Our friends , you yourselves know that our visit to you was not a failure .
52002002	You know how we had already been mistreated and insulted in Philippi before we came to you in Thessalonica . And even though there was much opposition , our God gave us courage to tell you the Good News that comes from him .
52002003	Our appeal to you is not based on error or impure motives , nor do we try to trick anyone .
52002004	Instead , we always speak as God wants us to , because he has judged us worthy to be entrusted with the Good News . We do not try to please people , but to please God , who tests our motives .
52002005	You know very well that we did not come to you with flattering talk , nor did we use words to cover up greed—God is our witness !
52002006	We did not try to get praise from anyone , either from you or from others ,
52002007	even though as apostles of Christ we could have made demands on you . But we were gentle when we were with you , like a mother taking care of her children .
52002008	Because of our love for you we were ready to share with you not only the Good News from God but even our own lives . You were so dear to us !
52002009	Surely you remember , our friends , how we worked and toiled ! We worked day and night so that we would not be any trouble to you as we preached to you the Good News from God .
52002010	You are our witnesses , and so is God , that our conduct toward you who believe was pure , right , and without fault .
52002011	You know that we treated each one of you just as parents treat their own children .
52002012	We encouraged you , we comforted you , and we kept urging you to live the kind of life that pleases God , who calls you to share in his own Kingdom and glory .
52002013	And there is another reason why we always give thanks to God . When we brought you God's message , you heard it and accepted it , not as a message from human beings but as God's message , which indeed it is . For God is at work in you who believe .
52002014	Our friends , the same things happened to you that happened to the churches of God in Judea , to the people there who belong to Christ Jesus . You suffered the same persecutions from your own people that they suffered from the Jews ,
52002015	who killed the Lord Jesus and the prophets , and persecuted us . How displeasing they are to God ! How hostile they are to everyone !
52002016	They even tried to stop us from preaching to the Gentiles the message that would bring them salvation . In this way they have brought to completion all the sins they have always committed . And now God's anger has at last come down on them !
52002017	As for us , friends , when we were separated from you for a little while—not in our thoughts , of course , but only in body—how we missed you and how hard we tried to see you again !
52002018	We wanted to return to you . I myself tried to go back more than once , but Satan would not let us .
52002019	After all , it is you—you , no less than others ! —who are our hope , our joy , and our reason for boasting of our victory in the presence of our Lord Jesus when he comes .
52002020	Indeed , you are our pride and our joy !
52003001	Finally , we could not bear it any longer . So we decided to stay on alone in Athens
52003002	while we sent Timothy , our brother who works with us for God in preaching the Good News about Christ . We sent him to strengthen you and help your faith ,
52003003	so that none of you should turn back because of these persecutions . You yourselves know that such persecutions are part of God's will for us .
52003004	For while we were still with you , we told you ahead of time that we were going to be persecuted ; and as you well know , that is exactly what happened .
52003005	That is why I had to send Timothy . I could not bear it any longer , so I sent him to find out about your faith . Surely it could not be that the Devil had tempted you and all our work had been for nothing !
52003006	Now Timothy has come back , and he has brought us the welcome news about your faith and love . He has told us that you always think well of us and that you want to see us just as much as we want to see you .
52003007	So , in all our trouble and suffering we have been encouraged about you , friends . It was your faith that encouraged us ,
52003008	because now we really live if you stand firm in your life in union with the Lord .
52003009	Now we can give thanks to our God for you . We thank him for the joy we have in his presence because of you .
52003010	Day and night we ask him with all our heart to let us see you personally and supply what is needed in your faith .
52003011	May our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus prepare the way for us to come to you !
52003012	May the Lord make your love for one another and for all people grow more and more and become as great as our love for you .
52003013	In this way he will strengthen you , and you will be perfect and holy in the presence of our God and Father when our Lord Jesus comes with all who belong to him .
52004001	Finally , our friends , you learned from us how you should live in order to please God . This is , of course , the way you have been living . And now we beg and urge you in the name of the Lord Jesus to do even more .
52004002	For you know the instructions we gave you by the authority of the Lord Jesus .
52004003	God wants you to be holy and completely free from sexual immorality .
52004004	Each of you should know how to live with your wife in a holy and honorable way ,
52004005	not with a lustful desire , like the heathen who do not know God .
52004006	In this matter , then , none of you should do wrong to other Christians or take advantage of them . We have told you this before , and we strongly warned you that the Lord will punish those who do that .
52004007	God did not call us to live in immorality , but in holiness .
52004008	So then , whoever rejects this teaching is not rejecting a human being , but God , who gives you his Holy Spirit .
52004009	There is no need to write you about love for each other . You yourselves have been taught by God how you should love one another .
52004010	And you have , in fact , behaved like this toward all the believers in all of Macedonia . So we beg you , our friends , to do even more .
52004011	Make it your aim to live a quiet life , to mind your own business , and to earn your own living , just as we told you before .
52004012	In this way you will win the respect of those who are not believers , and you will not have to depend on anyone for what you need .
52004013	Our friends , we want you to know the truth about those who have died , so that you will not be sad , as are those who have no hope .
52004014	We believe that Jesus died and rose again , and so we believe that God will take back with Jesus those who have died believing in him .
52004015	What we are teaching you now is the Lord's teaching : we who are alive on the day the Lord comes will not go ahead of those who have died .
52004016	There will be the shout of command , the archangel's voice , the sound of God's trumpet , and the Lord himself will come down from heaven . Those who have died believing in Christ will rise to life first ;
52004017	then we who are living at that time will be gathered up along with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air . And so we will always be with the Lord .
52004018	So then , encourage one another with these words .
52005001	There is no need to write you , friends , about the times and occasions when these things will happen .
52005002	For you yourselves know very well that the Day of the Lord will come as a thief comes at night .
52005003	When people say , “ Everything is quiet and safe , ” then suddenly destruction will hit them ! It will come as suddenly as the pains that come upon a woman in labor , and people will not escape .
52005004	But you , friends , are not in the darkness , and the Day should not take you by surprise like a thief .
52005005	All of you are people who belong to the light , who belong to the day . We do not belong to the night or to the darkness .
52005006	So then , we should not be sleeping like the others ; we should be awake and sober .
52005007	It is at night when people sleep ; it is at night when they get drunk .
52005008	But we belong to the day , and we should be sober . We must wear faith and love as a breastplate , and our hope of salvation as a helmet .
52005009	God did not choose us to suffer his anger , but to possess salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ ,
52005010	who died for us in order that we might live together with him , whether we are alive or dead when he comes .
52005011	And so encourage one another and help one another , just as you are now doing .
52005012	We beg you , our friends , to pay proper respect to those who work among you , who guide and instruct you in the Christian life .
52005013	Treat them with the greatest respect and love because of the work they do . Be at peace among yourselves .
52005014	We urge you , our friends , to warn the idle , encourage the timid , help the weak , be patient with everyone .
52005015	See that no one pays back wrong for wrong , but at all times make it your aim to do good to one another and to all people .
52005016	Be joyful always ,
52005017	pray at all times ,
52005018	be thankful in all circumstances . This is what God wants from you in your life in union with Christ Jesus .
52005019	Do not restrain the Holy Spirit ;
52005020	do not despise inspired messages .
52005021	Put all things to the test : keep what is good
52005022	and avoid every kind of evil .
52005023	May the God who gives us peace make you holy in every way and keep your whole being—spirit , soul , and body—free from every fault at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
52005024	He who calls you will do it , because he is faithful .
52005025	Pray also for us , friends .
52005026	Greet all the believers with the kiss of peace .
52005027	I urge you by the authority of the Lord to read this letter to all the believers .
52005028	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
53001001	From Paul , Silas , and Timothy— To the people of the church in Thessalonica , who belong to God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
53001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
53001003	Our friends , we must thank God at all times for you . It is right for us to do so , because your faith is growing so much and the love each of you has for the others is becoming greater .
53001004	That is why we ourselves boast about you in the churches of God . We boast about the way you continue to endure and believe through all the persecutions and sufferings you are experiencing .
53001005	All of this proves that God's judgment is just and as a result you will become worthy of his Kingdom , for which you are suffering .
53001006	God will do what is right : he will bring suffering on those who make you suffer ,
53001007	and he will give relief to you who suffer and to us as well . He will do this when the Lord Jesus appears from heaven with his mighty angels ,
53001008	with a flaming fire , to punish those who reject God and who do not obey the Good News about our Lord Jesus .
53001009	They will suffer the punishment of eternal destruction , separated from the presence of the Lord and from his glorious might ,
53001010	when he comes on that Day to receive glory from all his people and honor from all who believe . You too will be among them , because you have believed the message that we told you .
53001011	That is why we always pray for you . We ask our God to make you worthy of the life he has called you to live . May he fulfill by his power all your desire for goodness and complete your work of faith .
53001012	In this way the name of our Lord Jesus will receive glory from you , and you from him , by the grace of our God and of the Lord Jesus Christ .
53002001	Concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered together to be with him : I beg you , my friends ,
53002002	not to be so easily confused in your thinking or upset by the claim that the Day of the Lord has come . Perhaps it is thought that we said this while prophesying or preaching , or that we wrote it in a letter .
53002003	Do not let anyone deceive you in any way . For the Day will not come until the final Rebellion takes place and the Wicked One appears , who is destined to hell .
53002004	He will oppose every so-called god or object of worship and will put himself above them all . He will even go in and sit down in God's Temple and claim to be God .
53002005	Don't you remember ? I told you all this while I was with you .
53002006	Yet there is something that keeps this from happening now , and you know what it is . At the proper time , then , the Wicked One will appear .
53002007	The Mysterious Wickedness is already at work , but what is going to happen will not happen until the one who holds it back is taken out of the way .
53002008	Then the Wicked One will be revealed , but when the Lord Jesus comes , he will kill him with the breath from his mouth and destroy him with his dazzling presence .
53002009	The Wicked One will come with the power of Satan and perform all kinds of false miracles and wonders ,
53002010	and use every kind of wicked deceit on those who will perish . They will perish because they did not welcome and love the truth so as to be saved .
53002011	And so God sends the power of error to work in them so that they believe what is false .
53002012	The result is that all who have not believed the truth , but have taken pleasure in sin , will be condemned .
53002013	We must thank God at all times for you , friends , you whom the Lord loves . For God chose you as the first to be saved by the Spirit's power to make you his holy people and by your faith in the truth .
53002014	God called you to this through the Good News we preached to you ; he called you to possess your share of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
53002015	So then , our friends , stand firm and hold on to those truths which we taught you , both in our preaching and in our letter .
53002016	May our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father , who loved us and in his grace gave us unfailing courage and a firm hope ,
53002017	encourage you and strengthen you to always do and say what is good .
53003001	Finally , our friends , pray for us that the Lord's message may continue to spread rapidly and be received with honor , just as it was among you .
53003002	Pray also that God will rescue us from wicked and evil people ; for not everyone believes the message .
53003003	But the Lord is faithful , and he will strengthen you and keep you safe from the Evil One .
53003004	And the Lord gives us confidence in you , and we are sure that you are doing and will continue to do what we tell you .
53003005	May the Lord lead you into a greater understanding of God's love and the endurance that is given by Christ .
53003006	Our friends , we command you in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ to keep away from all believers who are living a lazy life and who do not follow the instructions that we gave them .
53003007	You yourselves know very well that you should do just what we did . We were not lazy when we were with you .
53003008	We did not accept anyone's support without paying for it . Instead , we worked and toiled ; we kept working day and night so as not to be an expense to any of you .
53003009	We did this , not because we do not have the right to demand our support ; we did it to be an example for you to follow .
53003010	While we were with you , we used to tell you , “ Whoever refuses to work is not allowed to eat . ”
53003011	We say this because we hear that there are some people among you who live lazy lives and who do nothing except meddle in other people's business .
53003012	In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ we command these people and warn them to lead orderly lives and work to earn their own living .
53003013	But you , friends , must not become tired of doing good .
53003014	It may be that some there will not obey the message we send you in this letter . If so , take note of them and have nothing to do with them , so that they will be ashamed .
53003015	But do not treat them as enemies ; instead , warn them as believers .
53003016	May the Lord himself , who is our source of peace , give you peace at all times and in every way . The Lord be with you all .
53003017	With my own hand I write this : Greetings from Paul This is the way I sign every letter ; this is how I write .
53003018	May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
54001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by order of God our Savior and Christ Jesus our hope—
54001002	To Timothy , my true son in the faith : May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord give you grace , mercy , and peace .
54001003	I want you to stay in Ephesus , just as I urged you when I was on my way to Macedonia . Some people there are teaching false doctrines , and you must order them to stop .
54001004	Tell them to give up those legends and those long lists of ancestors , which only produce arguments ; they do not serve God's plan , which is known by faith .
54001005	The purpose of this order is to arouse the love that comes from a pure heart , a clear conscience , and a genuine faith .
54001006	Some people have turned away from these and have lost their way in foolish discussions .
54001007	They want to be teachers of God's law , but they do not understand their own words or the matters about which they speak with so much confidence .
54001008	We know that the Law is good if it is used as it should be used .
54001009	It must be remembered , of course , that laws are made , not for good people , but for lawbreakers and criminals , for the godless and sinful , for those who are not religious or spiritual , for those who kill their fathers or mothers , for murderers ,
54001010	for the immoral , for sexual perverts , for kidnappers , for those who lie and give false testimony or who do anything else contrary to sound doctrine .
54001011	That teaching is found in the gospel that was entrusted to me to announce , the Good News from the glorious and blessed God .
54001012	I give thanks to Christ Jesus our Lord , who has given me strength for my work . I thank him for considering me worthy and appointing me to serve him ,
54001013	even though in the past I spoke evil of him and persecuted and insulted him . But God was merciful to me because I did not yet have faith and so did not know what I was doing .
54001014	And our Lord poured out his abundant grace on me and gave me the faith and love which are ours in union with Christ Jesus .
54001015	This is a true saying , to be completely accepted and believed : Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners . I am the worst of them ,
54001016	but God was merciful to me in order that Christ Jesus might show his full patience in dealing with me , the worst of sinners , as an example for all those who would later believe in him and receive eternal life .
54001017	To the eternal King , immortal and invisible , the only God—to him be honor and glory forever and ever ! Amen .
54001018	Timothy , my child , I entrust to you this command , which is in accordance with the words of prophecy spoken in the past about you . Use those words as weapons in order to fight well ,
54001019	and keep your faith and a clear conscience . Some people have not listened to their conscience and have made a ruin of their faith .
54001020	Among them are Hymenaeus and Alexander , whom I have punished by handing them over to the power of Satan ; this will teach them to stop their blasphemy .
54002001	First of all , then , I urge that petitions , prayers , requests , and thanksgivings be offered to God for all people ;
54002002	for kings and all others who are in authority , that we may live a quiet and peaceful life with all reverence toward God and with proper conduct .
54002003	This is good and it pleases God our Savior ,
54002004	who wants everyone to be saved and to come to know the truth .
54002005	For there is one God , and there is one who brings God and human beings together , the man Christ Jesus ,
54002006	who gave himself to redeem the whole human race . That was the proof at the right time that God wants everyone to be saved ,
54002007	and that is why I was sent as an apostle and teacher of the Gentiles , to proclaim the message of faith and truth . I am not lying ; I am telling the truth !
54002008	In every church service I want the men to pray , men who are dedicated to God and can lift up their hands in prayer without anger or argument .
54002009	I also want the women to be modest and sensible about their clothes and to dress properly ; not with fancy hair styles or with gold ornaments or pearls or expensive dresses ,
54002010	but with good deeds , as is proper for women who claim to be religious .
54002011	Women should learn in silence and all humility .
54002012	I do not allow them to teach or to have authority over men ; they must keep quiet .
54002013	For Adam was created first , and then Eve .
54002014	And it was not Adam who was deceived ; it was the woman who was deceived and broke God's law .
54002015	But a woman will be saved through having children , if she perseveres in faith and love and holiness , with modesty .
54003001	This is a true saying : If a man is eager to be a church leader , he desires an excellent work .
54003002	A church leader must be without fault ; he must have only one wife , be sober , self-controlled , and orderly ; he must welcome strangers in his home ; he must be able to teach ;
54003003	he must not be a drunkard or a violent man , but gentle and peaceful ; he must not love money ;
54003004	he must be able to manage his own family well and make his children obey him with all respect .
54003005	For if a man does not know how to manage his own family , how can he take care of the church of God ?
54003006	He must be mature in the faith , so that he will not swell up with pride and be condemned , as the Devil was .
54003007	He should be a man who is respected by the people outside the church , so that he will not be disgraced and fall into the Devil's trap .
54003008	Church helpers must also have a good character and be sincere ; they must not drink too much wine or be greedy for money ;
54003009	they should hold to the revealed truth of the faith with a clear conscience .
54003010	They should be tested first , and then , if they pass the test , they are to serve .
54003011	Their wives also must be of good character and must not gossip ; they must be sober and honest in everything .
54003012	A church helper must have only one wife , and be able to manage his children and family well .
54003013	Those helpers who do their work well win for themselves a good standing and are able to speak boldly about their faith in Christ Jesus .
54003014	As I write this letter to you , I hope to come and see you soon .
54003015	But if I delay , this letter will let you know how we should conduct ourselves in God's household , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and support of the truth .
54003016	No one can deny how great is the secret of our religion : He appeared in human form , was shown to be right by the Spirit , and was seen by angels . He was preached among the nations , was believed in throughout the world , and was taken up to heaven .
54004001	The Spirit says clearly that some people will abandon the faith in later times ; they will obey lying spirits and follow the teachings of demons .
54004002	Such teachings are spread by deceitful liars , whose consciences are dead , as if burnt with a hot iron .
54004003	Such people teach that it is wrong to marry and to eat certain foods . But God created those foods to be eaten , after a prayer of thanks , by those who are believers and have come to know the truth .
54004004	Everything that God has created is good ; nothing is to be rejected , but everything is to be received with a prayer of thanks ,
54004005	because the word of God and the prayer make it acceptable to God .
54004006	If you give these instructions to the believers , you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus , as you feed yourself spiritually on the words of faith and of the true teaching which you have followed .
54004007	But keep away from those godless legends , which are not worth telling . Keep yourself in training for a godly life .
54004008	Physical exercise has some value , but spiritual exercise is valuable in every way , because it promises life both for the present and for the future .
54004009	This is a true saying , to be completely accepted and believed .
54004010	We struggle and work hard , because we have placed our hope in the living God , who is the Savior of all and especially of those who believe .
54004011	Give them these instructions and these teachings .
54004012	Do not let anyone look down on you because you are young , but be an example for the believers in your speech , your conduct , your love , faith , and purity .
54004013	Until I come , give your time and effort to the public reading of the Scriptures and to preaching and teaching .
54004014	Do not neglect the spiritual gift that is in you , which was given to you when the prophets spoke and the elders laid their hands on you .
54004015	Practice these things and devote yourself to them , in order that your progress may be seen by all .
54004016	Watch yourself and watch your teaching . Keep on doing these things , because if you do , you will save both yourself and those who hear you .
54005001	Do not rebuke an older man , but appeal to him as if he were your father . Treat the younger men as your brothers ,
54005002	the older women as mothers , and the younger women as sisters , with all purity .
54005003	Show respect for widows who really are all alone .
54005004	But if a widow has children or grandchildren , they should learn first to carry out their religious duties toward their own family and in this way repay their parents and grandparents , because that is what pleases God .
54005005	A widow who is all alone , with no one to take care of her , has placed her hope in God and continues to pray and ask him for his help night and day .
54005006	But a widow who gives herself to pleasure has already died , even though she lives .
54005007	Give them these instructions , so that no one will find fault with them .
54005008	But if any do not take care of their relatives , especially the members of their own family , they have denied the faith and are worse than an unbeliever .
54005009	Do not add any widow to the list of widows unless she is over sixty years of age . In addition , she must have been married only once
54005010	and have a reputation for good deeds : a woman who brought up her children well , received strangers in her home , performed humble duties for other Christians , helped people in trouble , and devoted herself to doing good .
54005011	But do not include younger widows in the list ; because when their desires make them want to marry , they turn away from Christ ,
54005012	and so become guilty of breaking their earlier promise to him .
54005013	They also learn to waste their time in going around from house to house ; but even worse , they learn to be gossips and busybodies , talking of things they should not .
54005014	So I would prefer that the younger widows get married , have children , and take care of their homes , so as to give our enemies no chance of speaking evil of us .
54005015	For some widows have already turned away to follow Satan .
54005016	But if any Christian woman has widows in her family , she must take care of them and not put the burden on the church , so that it may take care of the widows who are all alone .
54005017	The elders who do good work as leaders should be considered worthy of receiving double pay , especially those who work hard at preaching and teaching .
54005018	For the scripture says , “ Do not muzzle an ox when you are using it to thresh grain ” and “ Workers should be given their pay . ”
54005019	Do not listen to an accusation against an elder unless it is brought by two or more witnesses .
54005020	Rebuke publicly all those who commit sins , so that the rest may be afraid .
54005021	In the presence of God and of Christ Jesus and of the holy angels I solemnly call upon you to obey these instructions without showing any prejudice or favor to anyone in anything you do .
54005022	Be in no hurry to lay hands on people to dedicate them to the Lord's service . Take no part in the sins of others ; keep yourself pure .
54005023	Do not drink water only , but take a little wine to help your digestion , since you are sick so often .
54005024	The sins of some people are plain to see , and their sins go ahead of them to judgment ; but the sins of others are seen only later .
54005025	In the same way good deeds are plainly seen , and even those that are not so plain cannot be hidden .
54006001	Those who are slaves must consider their masters worthy of all respect , so that no one will speak evil of the name of God and of our teaching .
54006002	Slaves belonging to Christian masters must not despise them , for they are believers too . Instead , they are to serve them even better , because those who benefit from their work are believers whom they love . You must teach and preach these things .
54006003	Whoever teaches a different doctrine and does not agree with the true words of our Lord Jesus Christ and with the teaching of our religion
54006004	is swollen with pride and knows nothing . He has an unhealthy desire to argue and quarrel about words , and this brings on jealousy , disputes , insults , evil suspicions ,
54006005	and constant arguments from people whose minds do not function and who no longer have the truth . They think that religion is a way to become rich .
54006006	Well , religion does make us very rich , if we are satisfied with what we have .
54006007	What did we bring into the world ? Nothing ! What can we take out of the world ? Nothing !
54006008	So then , if we have food and clothes , that should be enough for us .
54006009	But those who want to get rich fall into temptation and are caught in the trap of many foolish and harmful desires , which pull them down to ruin and destruction .
54006010	For the love of money is a source of all kinds of evil . Some have been so eager to have it that they have wandered away from the faith and have broken their hearts with many sorrows .
54006011	But you , man of God , avoid all these things . Strive for righteousness , godliness , faith , love , endurance , and gentleness .
54006012	Run your best in the race of faith , and win eternal life for yourself ; for it was to this life that God called you when you firmly professed your faith before many witnesses .
54006013	Before God , who gives life to all things , and before Christ Jesus , who firmly professed his faith before Pontius Pilate , I command you
54006014	to obey your orders and keep them faithfully until the Day when our Lord Jesus Christ will appear .
54006015	His appearing will be brought about at the right time by God , the blessed and only Ruler , the King of kings and the Lord of lords .
54006016	He alone is immortal ; he lives in the light that no one can approach . No one has ever seen him ; no one can ever see him . To him be honor and eternal power ! Amen .
54006017	Command those who are rich in the things of this life not to be proud , but to place their hope , not in such an uncertain thing as riches , but in God , who generously gives us everything for our enjoyment .
54006018	Command them to do good , to be rich in good works , to be generous and ready to share with others .
54006019	In this way they will store up for themselves a treasure which will be a solid foundation for the future . And then they will be able to win the life which is true life .
54006020	Timothy , keep safe what has been entrusted to your care . Avoid the profane talk and foolish arguments of what some people wrongly call “ Knowledge . ”
54006021	For some have claimed to possess it , and as a result they have lost the way of faith . God's grace be with you all .
55001001	From Paul , an apostle of Christ Jesus by God's will , sent to proclaim the promised life which we have in union with Christ Jesus—
55001002	To Timothy , my dear son : May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord give you grace , mercy , and peace .
55001003	I give thanks to God , whom I serve with a clear conscience , as my ancestors did . I thank him as I remember you always in my prayers night and day .
55001004	I remember your tears , and I want to see you very much , so that I may be filled with joy .
55001005	I remember the sincere faith you have , the kind of faith that your grandmother Lois and your mother Eunice also had . I am sure that you have it also .
55001006	For this reason I remind you to keep alive the gift that God gave you when I laid my hands on you .
55001007	For the Spirit that God has given us does not make us timid ; instead , his Spirit fills us with power , love , and self-control .
55001008	Do not be ashamed , then , of witnessing for our Lord ; neither be ashamed of me , a prisoner for Christ's sake . Instead , take your part in suffering for the Good News , as God gives you the strength for it .
55001009	He saved us and called us to be his own people , not because of what we have done , but because of his own purpose and grace . He gave us this grace by means of Christ Jesus before the beginning of time ,
55001010	but now it has been revealed to us through the coming of our Savior , Christ Jesus . He has ended the power of death and through the gospel has revealed immortal life .
55001011	God has appointed me as an apostle and teacher to proclaim the Good News ,
55001012	and it is for this reason that I suffer these things . But I am still full of confidence , because I know whom I have trusted , and I am sure that he is able to keep safe until that Day what he has entrusted to me .
55001013	Hold firmly to the true words that I taught you , as the example for you to follow , and remain in the faith and love that are ours in union with Christ Jesus .
55001014	Through the power of the Holy Spirit , who lives in us , keep the good things that have been entrusted to you .
55001015	You know that everyone in the province of Asia , including Phygelus and Hermogenes , has deserted me .
55001016	May the Lord show mercy to the family of Onesiphorus , because he cheered me up many times . He was not ashamed that I am in prison ,
55001017	but as soon as he arrived in Rome , he started looking for me until he found me .
55001018	May the Lord grant him his mercy on that Day ! And you know very well how much he did for me in Ephesus .
55002001	As for you , my son , be strong through the grace that is ours in union with Christ Jesus .
55002002	Take the teachings that you heard me proclaim in the presence of many witnesses , and entrust them to reliable people , who will be able to teach others also .
55002003	Take your part in suffering , as a loyal soldier of Christ Jesus .
55002004	A soldier on active duty wants to please his commanding officer and so does not get mixed up in the affairs of civilian life .
55002005	An athlete who runs in a race cannot win the prize unless he obeys the rules .
55002006	The farmer who has done the hard work should have the first share of the harvest .
55002007	Think about what I am saying , because the Lord will enable you to understand it all .
55002008	Remember Jesus Christ , who was raised from death , who was a descendant of David , as is taught in the Good News I preach .
55002009	Because I preach the Good News , I suffer and I am even chained like a criminal . But the word of God is not in chains ,
55002010	and so I endure everything for the sake of God's chosen people , in order that they too may obtain the salvation that comes through Christ Jesus and brings eternal glory .
55002011	This is a true saying : “ If we have died with him , we shall also live with him .
55002012	If we continue to endure , we shall also rule with him . If we deny him , he also will deny us .
55002013	If we are not faithful , he remains faithful , because he cannot be false to himself . ”
55002014	Remind your people of this , and give them a solemn warning in God's presence not to fight over words . It does no good , but only ruins the people who listen .
55002015	Do your best to win full approval in God's sight , as a worker who is not ashamed of his work , one who correctly teaches the message of God's truth .
55002016	Keep away from profane and foolish discussions , which only drive people farther away from God .
55002017	Such teaching is like an open sore that eats away the flesh . Two men who have taught such things are Hymenaeus and Philetus .
55002018	They have left the way of truth and are upsetting the faith of some believers by saying that our resurrection has already taken place .
55002019	But the solid foundation that God has laid cannot be shaken ; and on it are written these words : “ The Lord knows those who are his ” and “ Those who say that they belong to the Lord must turn away from wrongdoing . ”
55002020	In a large house there are dishes and bowls of all kinds : some are made of silver and gold , others of wood and clay ; some are for special occasions , others for ordinary use .
55002021	Those who make themselves clean from all those evil things , will be used for special purposes , because they are dedicated and useful to their Master , ready to be used for every good deed .
55002022	Avoid the passions of youth , and strive for righteousness , faith , love , and peace , together with those who with a pure heart call out to the Lord for help .
55002023	But keep away from foolish and ignorant arguments ; you know that they end up in quarrels .
55002024	As the Lord's servant , you must not quarrel . You must be kind toward all , a good and patient teacher ,
55002025	who is gentle as you correct your opponents , for it may be that God will give them the opportunity to repent and come to know the truth .
55002026	And then they will come to their senses and escape from the trap of the Devil , who had caught them and made them obey his will .
55003001	Remember that there will be difficult times in the last days .
55003002	People will be selfish , greedy , boastful , and conceited ; they will be insulting , disobedient to their parents , ungrateful , and irreligious ;
55003003	they will be unkind , merciless , slanderers , violent , and fierce ; they will hate the good ;
55003004	they will be treacherous , reckless , and swollen with pride ; they will love pleasure rather than God ;
55003005	they will hold to the outward form of our religion , but reject its real power . Keep away from such people .
55003006	Some of them go into people's houses and gain control over weak women who are burdened by the guilt of their sins and driven by all kinds of desires ,
55003007	women who are always trying to learn but who can never come to know the truth .
55003008	As Jannes and Jambres were opposed to Moses , so also these people are opposed to the truth—people whose minds do not function and who are failures in the faith .
55003009	But they will not get very far , because everyone will see how stupid they are . That is just what happened to Jannes and Jambres .
55003010	But you have followed my teaching , my conduct , and my purpose in life ; you have observed my faith , my patience , my love , my endurance ,
55003011	my persecutions , and my sufferings . You know all that happened to me in Antioch , Iconium , and Lystra , the terrible persecutions I endured ! But the Lord rescued me from them all .
55003012	Everyone who wants to live a godly life in union with Christ Jesus will be persecuted ;
55003013	and evil persons and impostors will keep on going from bad to worse , deceiving others and being deceived themselves .
55003014	But as for you , continue in the truths that you were taught and firmly believe . You know who your teachers were ,
55003015	and you remember that ever since you were a child , you have known the Holy Scriptures , which are able to give you the wisdom that leads to salvation through faith in Christ Jesus .
55003016	All Scripture is inspired by God and is useful for teaching the truth , rebuking error , correcting faults , and giving instruction for right living ,
55003017	so that the person who serves God may be fully qualified and equipped to do every kind of good deed .
55004001	In the presence of God and of Christ Jesus , who will judge the living and the dead , and because he is coming to rule as King , I solemnly urge you
55004002	to preach the message , to insist upon proclaiming it ( whether the time is right or not ) , to convince , reproach , and encourage , as you teach with all patience .
55004003	The time will come when people will not listen to sound doctrine , but will follow their own desires and will collect for themselves more and more teachers who will tell them what they are itching to hear .
55004004	They will turn away from listening to the truth and give their attention to legends .
55004005	But you must keep control of yourself in all circumstances ; endure suffering , do the work of a preacher of the Good News , and perform your whole duty as a servant of God .
55004006	As for me , the hour has come for me to be sacrificed ; the time is here for me to leave this life .
55004007	I have done my best in the race , I have run the full distance , and I have kept the faith .
55004008	And now there is waiting for me the victory prize of being put right with God , which the Lord , the righteous Judge , will give me on that Day—and not only to me , but to all those who wait with love for him to appear .
55004009	Do your best to come to me soon .
55004010	Demas fell in love with this present world and has deserted me , going off to Thessalonica . Crescens went to Galatia , and Titus to Dalmatia .
55004011	Only Luke is with me . Get Mark and bring him with you , because he can help me in the work .
55004012	I sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When you come , bring my coat that I left in Troas with Carpus ; bring the books too , and especially the ones made of parchment .
55004014	Alexander the metalworker did me great harm ; the Lord will reward him according to what he has done .
55004015	Be on your guard against him yourself , because he was violently opposed to our message .
55004016	No one stood by me the first time I defended myself ; all deserted me . May God not count it against them !
55004017	But the Lord stayed with me and gave me strength , so that I was able to proclaim the full message for all the Gentiles to hear ; and I was rescued from being sentenced to death .
55004018	And the Lord will rescue me from all evil and take me safely into his heavenly Kingdom . To him be the glory forever and ever ! Amen .
55004019	I send greetings to Priscilla and Aquila and to the family of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in Corinth , and I left Trophimus in Miletus , because he was sick .
55004021	Do your best to come before winter . Eubulus , Pudens , Linus , and Claudia send their greetings , and so do all the other Christians .
55004022	The Lord be with your spirit . God's grace be with you all .
56001001	From Paul , a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ . I was chosen and sent to help the faith of God's chosen people and to lead them to the truth taught by our religion ,
56001002	which is based on the hope for eternal life . God , who does not lie , promised us this life before the beginning of time ,
56001003	and at the right time he revealed it in his message . This was entrusted to me , and I proclaim it by order of God our Savior .
56001004	I write to Titus , my true son in the faith that we have in common . May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior give you grace and peace .
56001005	I left you in Crete , so that you could put in order the things that still needed doing and appoint church elders in every town . Remember my instructions :
56001006	an elder must be without fault ; he must have only one wife , and his children must be believers and not have the reputation of being wild or disobedient .
56001007	For since a church leader is in charge of God's work , he should be without fault . He must not be arrogant or quick-tempered , or a drunkard or violent or greedy for money .
56001008	He must be hospitable and love what is good . He must be self-controlled , upright , holy , and disciplined .
56001009	He must hold firmly to the message which can be trusted and which agrees with the doctrine . In this way he will be able to encourage others with the true teaching and also to show the error of those who are opposed to it .
56001010	For there are many , especially the converts from Judaism , who rebel and deceive others with their nonsense .
56001011	It is necessary to stop their talk , because they are upsetting whole families by teaching what they should not , and all for the shameful purpose of making money .
56001014	and no longer hold on to Jewish legends and to human commandments which come from people who have rejected the truth .
56001015	Everything is pure to those who are themselves pure ; but nothing is pure to those who are defiled and unbelieving , for their minds and consciences have been defiled .
56001016	They claim that they know God , but their actions deny it . They are hateful and disobedient , not fit to do anything good .
56002001	But you must teach what agrees with sound doctrine .
56002002	Instruct the older men to be sober , sensible , and self-controlled ; to be sound in their faith , love , and endurance .
56002003	In the same way instruct the older women to behave as women should who live a holy life . They must not be slanderers or slaves to wine . They must teach what is good ,
56002004	in order to train the younger women to love their husbands and children ,
56002005	to be self-controlled and pure , and to be good housewives who submit themselves to their husbands , so that no one will speak evil of the message that comes from God .
56002006	In the same way urge the young men to be self-controlled .
56002007	In all things you yourself must be an example of good behavior . Be sincere and serious in your teaching .
56002008	Use sound words that cannot be criticized , so that your enemies may be put to shame by not having anything bad to say about us .
56002009	Slaves are to submit themselves to their masters and please them in all things . They must not talk back to them
56002010	or steal from them . Instead , they must show that they are always good and faithful , so as to bring credit to the teaching about God our Savior in all they do .
56002011	For God has revealed his grace for the salvation of all people .
56002012	That grace instructs us to give up ungodly living and worldly passions , and to live self-controlled , upright , and godly lives in this world ,
56002013	as we wait for the blessed Day we hope for , when the glory of our great God and Savior Jesus Christ will appear .
56002014	He gave himself for us , to rescue us from all wickedness and to make us a pure people who belong to him alone and are eager to do good .
56002015	Teach these things and use your full authority as you encourage and rebuke your hearers . Let none of them look down on you .
56003001	Remind your people to submit to rulers and authorities , to obey them , and to be ready to do good in every way .
56003002	Tell them not to speak evil of anyone , but to be peaceful and friendly , and always to show a gentle attitude toward everyone .
56003003	For we ourselves were once foolish , disobedient , and wrong . We were slaves to passions and pleasures of all kinds . We spent our lives in malice and envy ; others hated us and we hated them .
56003004	But when the kindness and love of God our Savior was revealed ,
56003005	he saved us . It was not because of any good deeds that we ourselves had done , but because of his own mercy that he saved us , through the Holy Spirit , who gives us new birth and new life by washing us .
56003006	God poured out the Holy Spirit abundantly on us through Jesus Christ our Savior ,
56003007	so that by his grace we might be put right with God and come into possession of the eternal life we hope for .
56003008	This is a true saying . I want you to give special emphasis to these matters , so that those who believe in God may be concerned with giving their time to doing good deeds , which are good and useful for everyone .
56003009	But avoid stupid arguments , long lists of ancestors , quarrels , and fights about the Law . They are useless and worthless .
56003010	Give at least two warnings to those who cause divisions , and then have nothing more to do with them .
56003011	You know that such people are corrupt , and their sins prove that they are wrong .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , do your best to come to me in Nicopolis , because I have decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Do your best to help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos to get started on their travels , and see to it that they have everything they need .
56003014	Our people must learn to spend their time doing good , in order to provide for real needs ; they should not live useless lives .
56003015	All who are with me send you greetings . Give our greetings to our friends in the faith . God's grace be with you all .
57001001	From Paul , a prisoner for the sake of Christ Jesus , and from our brother Timothy— To our friend and fellow worker Philemon ,
57001002	and the church that meets in your house , and our sister Apphia , and our fellow soldier Archippus :
57001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
57001004	Brother Philemon , every time I pray , I mention you and give thanks to my God .
57001005	For I hear of your love for all of God's people and the faith you have in the Lord Jesus .
57001006	My prayer is that our fellowship with you as believers will bring about a deeper understanding of every blessing which we have in our life in union with Christ .
57001007	Your love , dear brother , has brought me great joy and much encouragement ! You have cheered the hearts of all of God's people .
57001008	For this reason I could be bold enough , as your brother in Christ , to order you to do what should be done .
57001009	But because I love you , I make a request instead . I do this even though I am Paul , the ambassador of Christ Jesus , and at present also a prisoner for his sake .
57001010	So I make a request to you on behalf of Onesimus , who is my own son in Christ ; for while in prison I have become his spiritual father .
57001011	At one time he was of no use to you , but now he is useful both to you and to me .
57001012	I am sending him back to you now , and with him goes my heart .
57001013	I would like to keep him here with me , while I am in prison for the gospel's sake , so that he could help me in your place .
57001014	However , I do not want to force you to help me ; rather , I would like for you to do it of your own free will . So I will not do anything unless you agree .
57001015	It may be that Onesimus was away from you for a short time so that you might have him back for all time .
57001016	And now he is not just a slave , but much more than a slave : he is a dear brother in Christ . How much he means to me ! And how much more he will mean to you , both as a slave and as a brother in the Lord !
57001017	So , if you think of me as your partner , welcome him back just as you would welcome me .
57001018	If he has done you any wrong or owes you anything , charge it to my account .
57001019	Here , I will write this with my own hand : I , Paul , will pay you back ( I should not have to remind you , of course , that you owe your very self to me . )
57001020	So , my brother , please do me this favor for the Lord's sake ; as a brother in Christ , cheer me up !
57001021	I am sure , as I write this , that you will do what I ask—in fact I know that you will do even more .
57001022	At the same time , get a room ready for me , because I hope that God will answer the prayers of all of you and give me back to you .
57001023	Epaphras , who is in prison with me for the sake of Christ Jesus , sends you his greetings ,
57001024	and so do my co-workers Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke .
57001025	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you all .
58001001	In the past God spoke to our ancestors many times and in many ways through the prophets ,
58001002	but in these last days he has spoken to us through his Son . He is the one through whom God created the universe , the one whom God has chosen to possess all things at the end .
58001003	He reflects the brightness of God's glory and is the exact likeness of God's own being , sustaining the universe with his powerful word . After achieving forgiveness for the sins of all human beings , he sat down in heaven at the right side of God , the Supreme Power .
58001004	The Son was made greater than the angels , just as the name that God gave him is greater than theirs .
58001005	For God never said to any of his angels , “ You are my Son ; today I have become your Father . ” “ I will be his Father , and he will be my Son . ” “ All of God's angels must worship him . ”
58001007	But about the angels God said , “ God makes his angels winds , and his servants flames of fire . ” “ Your kingdom , O God , will last forever and ever ! You rule over your people with justice .
58001009	You love what is right and hate what is wrong . That is why God , your God , has chosen you and has given you the joy of an honor far greater than he gave to your companions . ” “ You , Lord , in the beginning created the earth , and with your own hands you made the heavens .
58001011	They will disappear , but you will remain ; they will all wear out like clothes .
58001012	You will fold them up like a coat , and they will be changed like clothes . But you are always the same , and your life never ends . ” “ Sit here at my right side until I put your enemies as a footstool under your feet . ”
58001014	What are the angels , then ? They are spirits who serve God and are sent by him to help those who are to receive salvation .
58002001	That is why we must hold on all the more firmly to the truths we have heard , so that we will not be carried away .
58002002	The message given to our ancestors by the angels was shown to be true , and those who did not follow it or obey it received the punishment they deserved .
58002003	How , then , shall we escape if we pay no attention to such a great salvation ? The Lord himself first announced this salvation , and those who heard him proved to us that it is true .
58002004	At the same time God added his witness to theirs by performing all kinds of miracles and wonders and by distributing the gifts of the Holy Spirit according to his will .
58002005	God has not placed the angels as rulers over the new world to come—the world of which we speak .
58002006	Instead , as it is said somewhere in the Scriptures : “ What are human beings , O God , that you should think of them ; mere human beings , that you should care for them ?
58002007	You made them for a little while lower than the angels ; you crowned them with glory and honor ,
58002008	and made them rulers over all things . ”
58002011	He purifies people from their sins , and both he and those who are made pure all have the same Father . That is why Jesus is not ashamed to call them his family .
58002012	He says to God , “ I will tell my people what you have done ; I will praise you in their meeting . ”
58002014	Since the children , as he calls them , are people of flesh and blood , Jesus himself became like them and shared their human nature . He did this so that through his death he might destroy the Devil , who has the power over death ,
58002015	and in this way set free those who were slaves all their lives because of their fear of death .
58002016	For it is clear that it is not the angels that he helps . Instead , he helps the descendants of Abraham .
58002017	This means that he had to become like his people in every way , in order to be their faithful and merciful High Priest in his service to God , so that the people's sins would be forgiven .
58002018	And now he can help those who are tempted , because he himself was tempted and suffered .
58003001	My Christian friends , who also have been called by God ! Think of Jesus , whom God sent to be the High Priest of the faith we profess .
58003002	He was faithful to God , who chose him to do this work , just as Moses was faithful in his work in God's house .
58003003	A man who builds a house receives more honor than the house itself . In the same way Jesus is worthy of much greater honor than Moses .
58003004	Every house , of course , is built by someone—and God is the one who has built all things .
58003005	Moses was faithful in God's house as a servant , and he spoke of the things that God would say in the future .
58003006	But Christ is faithful as the Son in charge of God's house . We are his house if we keep up our courage and our confidence in what we hope for .
58003007	So then , as the Holy Spirit says , “ If you hear God's voice today ,
58003008	do not be stubborn , as your ancestors were when they rebelled against God , as they were that day in the desert when they put him to the test .
58003009	There they put me to the test and tried me , says God , although they had seen what I did for forty years .
58003010	And so I was angry with those people and said , ‘ They are always disloyal and refuse to obey my commands . ’
58003011	I was angry and made a solemn promise : ‘ They will never enter the land where I would have given them rest ! ’ ”
58003012	My friends , be careful that none of you have a heart so evil and unbelieving that you will turn away from the living God .
58003013	Instead , in order that none of you be deceived by sin and become stubborn , you must help one another every day , as long as the word “ Today ” in the scripture applies to us .
58003014	For we are all partners with Christ if we hold firmly to the end the confidence we had at the beginning .
58003015	This is what the scripture says : “ If you hear God's voice today , do not be stubborn , as your ancestors were when they rebelled against God . ”
58003016	Who were the people who heard God's voice and rebelled against him ? All those who were led out of Egypt by Moses .
58003017	With whom was God angry for forty years ? With the people who sinned , who fell down dead in the desert .
58003018	When God made his solemn promise , “ They will never enter the land where I would have given them rest ” —of whom was he speaking ? Of those who rebelled .
58003019	We see , then , that they were not able to enter the land , because they did not believe .
58004001	Now , God has offered us the promise that we may receive that rest he spoke about . Let us take care , then , that none of you will be found to have failed to receive that promised rest .
58004002	For we have heard the Good News , just as they did . They heard the message , but it did them no good , because when they heard it , they did not accept it with faith .
58004003	We who believe , then , do receive that rest which God promised . It is just as he said , “ I was angry and made a solemn promise : ‘ They will never enter the land where I would have given them rest ! ’ ” “ If you hear God's voice today , do not be stubborn . ”
58004008	If Joshua had given the people the rest that God had promised , God would not have spoken later about another day .
58004009	As it is , however , there still remains for God's people a rest like God's resting on the seventh day .
58004010	For those who receive that rest which God promised will rest from their own work , just as God rested from his .
58004011	Let us , then , do our best to receive that rest , so that no one of us will fail as they did because of their lack of faith .
58004012	The word of God is alive and active , sharper than any double-edged sword . It cuts all the way through , to where soul and spirit meet , to where joints and marrow come together . It judges the desires and thoughts of the heart .
58004013	There is nothing that can be hid from God ; everything in all creation is exposed and lies open before his eyes . And it is to him that we must all give an account of ourselves .
58004014	Let us , then , hold firmly to the faith we profess . For we have a great High Priest who has gone into the very presence of God—Jesus , the Son of God .
58004015	Our High Priest is not one who cannot feel sympathy for our weaknesses . On the contrary , we have a High Priest who was tempted in every way that we are , but did not sin .
58004016	Let us have confidence , then , and approach God's throne , where there is grace . There we will receive mercy and find grace to help us just when we need it .
58005001	Every high priest is chosen from his fellow-men and appointed to serve God on their behalf , to offer sacrifices and offerings for sins .
58005002	Since he himself is weak in many ways , he is able to be gentle with those who are ignorant and make mistakes .
58005003	And because he is himself weak , he must offer sacrifices not only for the sins of the people but also for his own sins .
58005004	No one chooses for himself the honor of being a high priest . It is only by God's call that a man is made a high priest—just as Aaron was .
58005005	In the same way , Christ did not take upon himself the honor of being a high priest . Instead , God said to him , “ You are my Son ; today I have become your Father . ” “ You will be a priest forever , in the priestly order of Melchizedek . ”
58005007	In his life on earth Jesus made his prayers and requests with loud cries and tears to God , who could save him from death . Because he was humble and devoted , God heard him .
58005008	But even though he was God's Son , he learned through his sufferings to be obedient .
58005009	When he was made perfect , he became the source of eternal salvation for all those who obey him ,
58005010	and God declared him to be high priest , in the priestly order of Melchizedek .
58005011	There is much we have to say about this matter , but it is hard to explain to you , because you are so slow to understand .
58005012	There has been enough time for you to be teachers—yet you still need someone to teach you the first lessons of God's message . Instead of eating solid food , you still have to drink milk .
58005013	Anyone who has to drink milk is still a child , without any experience in the matter of right and wrong .
58005014	Solid food , on the other hand , is for adults , who through practice are able to distinguish between good and evil .
58006001	Let us go forward , then , to mature teaching and leave behind us the first lessons of the Christian message . We should not lay again the foundation of turning away from useless works and believing in God ;
58006002	of the teaching about baptisms and the laying on of hands ; of the resurrection of the dead and the eternal judgment .
58006003	Let us go forward ! And this is what we will do , if God allows .
58006004	For how can those who abandon their faith be brought back to repent again ? They were once in God's light ; they tasted heaven's gift and received their share of the Holy Spirit ;
58006005	they knew from experience that God's word is good , and they had felt the powers of the coming age .
58006006	And then they abandoned their faith ! It is impossible to bring them back to repent again , because they are again crucifying the Son of God and exposing him to public shame .
58006007	God blesses the soil which drinks in the rain that often falls on it and which grows plants that are useful to those for whom it is cultivated .
58006008	But if it grows thorns and weeds , it is worth nothing ; it is in danger of being cursed by God and will be destroyed by fire .
58006009	But even if we speak like this , dear friends , we feel sure about you . We know that you have the better blessings that belong to your salvation .
58006010	God is not unfair . He will not forget the work you did or the love you showed for him in the help you gave and are still giving to other Christians .
58006011	Our great desire is that each of you keep up your eagerness to the end , so that the things you hope for will come true .
58006012	We do not want you to become lazy , but to be like those who believe and are patient , and so receive what God has promised .
58006013	When God made his promise to Abraham , he made a vow to do what he had promised . Since there was no one greater than himself , he used his own name when he made his vow .
58006014	He said , “ I promise you that I will bless you and give you many descendants . ”
58006015	Abraham was patient , and so he received what God had promised .
58006016	When we make a vow , we use the name of someone greater than ourselves , and the vow settles all arguments .
58006017	To those who were to receive what he promised , God wanted to make it very clear that he would never change his purpose ; so he added his vow to the promise .
58006018	There are these two things , then , that cannot change and about which God cannot lie . So we who have found safety with him are greatly encouraged to hold firmly to the hope placed before us .
58006019	We have this hope as an anchor for our lives . It is safe and sure , and goes through the curtain of the heavenly temple into the inner sanctuary .
58006020	On our behalf Jesus has gone in there before us and has become a high priest forever , in the priestly order of Melchizedek .
58007001	This Melchizedek was king of Salem and a priest of the Most High God . As Abraham was coming back from the battle in which he defeated the four kings , Melchizedek met him and blessed him ,
58007002	and Abraham gave him one tenth of all he had taken . ( The first meaning of Melchizedek's name is “ King of Righteousness ” ; and because he was king of Salem , his name also means “ King of Peace . ” )
58007003	There is no record of Melchizedek's father or mother or of any of his ancestors ; no record of his birth or of his death . He is like the Son of God ; he remains a priest forever .
58007004	You see , then , how great he was . Abraham , our famous ancestor , gave him one tenth of all he got in the battle .
58007005	And those descendants of Levi who are priests are commanded by the Law to collect one tenth from the people of Israel , that is , from their own people , even though they are also descendants of Abraham .
58007006	Melchizedek was not descended from Levi , but he collected one tenth from Abraham and blessed him , the man who received God's promises .
58007007	There is no doubt that the one who blesses is greater than the one who is blessed .
58007008	In the case of the priests the tenth is collected by men who die ; but as for Melchizedek the tenth was collected by one who lives , as the scripture says .
58007009	And , so to speak , when Abraham paid the tenth , Levi ( whose descendants collect the tenth ) also paid it .
58007010	For Levi had not yet been born , but was , so to speak , in the body of his ancestor Abraham when Melchizedek met him .
58007011	It was on the basis of the levitical priesthood that the Law was given to the people of Israel . Now , if the work of the levitical priests had been perfect , there would have been no need for a different kind of priest to appear , one who is in the priestly order of Melchizedek , not of Aaron .
58007012	For when the priesthood is changed , there also has to be a change in the law .
58007013	And our Lord , of whom these things are said , belonged to a different tribe , and no member of his tribe ever served as a priest .
58007014	It is well known that he was born a member of the tribe of Judah ; and Moses did not mention this tribe when he spoke of priests .
58007015	The matter becomes even plainer ; a different priest has appeared , who is like Melchizedek .
58007016	He was made a priest , not by human rules and regulations , but through the power of a life which has no end .
58007017	For the scripture says , “ You will be a priest forever , in the priestly order of Melchizedek . ”
58007018	The old rule , then , is set aside , because it was weak and useless .
58007019	For the Law of Moses could not make anything perfect . And now a better hope has been provided through which we come near to God .
58007020	In addition , there is also God's vow . There was no such vow when the others were made priests .
58007021	But Jesus became a priest by means of a vow when God said to him , “ The Lord has made a solemn promise and will not take it back : ‘ You will be a priest forever . ’ ”
58007023	There is another difference : there were many of those other priests , because they died and could not continue their work .
58007024	But Jesus lives on forever , and his work as priest does not pass on to someone else .
58007025	And so he is able , now and always , to save those who come to God through him , because he lives forever to plead with God for them .
58007026	Jesus , then , is the High Priest that meets our needs . He is holy ; he has no fault or sin in him ; he has been set apart from sinners and raised above the heavens .
58007027	He is not like other high priests ; he does not need to offer sacrifices every day for his own sins first and then for the sins of the people . He offered one sacrifice , once and for all , when he offered himself .
58007028	The Law of Moses appoints men who are imperfect to be high priests ; but God's promise made with the vow , which came later than the Law , appoints the Son , who has been made perfect forever .
58008001	The whole point of what we are saying is that we have such a High Priest , who sits at the right of the throne of the Divine Majesty in heaven .
58008002	He serves as high priest in the Most Holy Place , that is , in the real tent which was put up by the Lord , not by human hands .
58008003	Every high priest is appointed to present offerings and animal sacrifices to God , and so our High Priest must also have something to offer .
58008004	If he were on earth , he would not be a priest at all , since there are priests who offer the gifts required by the Jewish Law .
58008005	The work they do as priests is really only a copy and a shadow of what is in heaven . It is the same as it was with Moses . When he was about to build the Sacred Tent , God told him , “ Be sure to make everything according to the pattern you were shown on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now , Jesus has been given priestly work which is superior to theirs , just as the covenant which he arranged between God and his people is a better one , because it is based on promises of better things .
58008007	If there had been nothing wrong with the first covenant , there would have been no need for a second one .
58008008	But God finds fault with his people when he says , “ The days are coming , says the Lord , when I will draw up a new covenant with the people of Israel and with the people of Judah .
58008009	It will not be like the covenant that I made with their ancestors on the day I took them by the hand and led them out of Egypt . They were not faithful to the covenant I made with them , and so I paid no attention to them .
58008010	Now , this is the covenant that I will make with the people of Israel in the days to come , says the Lord : I will put my laws in their minds and write them on their hearts . I will be their God , and they will be my people .
58008011	None of them will have to teach their friends or tell their neighbors , ‘ Know the Lord . ’ For they will all know me , from the least to the greatest .
58008012	I will forgive their sins and will no longer remember their wrongs . ”
58009001	The first covenant had rules for worship and a place made for worship as well .
