58009002	A tent was put up , the outer one , which was called the Holy Place . In it were the lampstand and the table with the bread offered to God .
58009003	Behind the second curtain was the tent called the Most Holy Place .
58009004	In it were the gold altar for the burning of incense and the Covenant Box all covered with gold and containing the gold jar with the manna in it , Aaron's stick that had sprouted leaves , and the two stone tablets with the commandments written on them .
58009005	Above the Box were the winged creatures representing God's presence , with their wings spread over the place where sins were forgiven . But now is not the time to explain everything in detail .
58009006	This is how those things have been arranged . The priests go into the outer tent every day to perform their duties ,
58009007	but only the high priest goes into the inner tent , and he does so only once a year . He takes with him blood which he offers to God on behalf of himself and for the sins which the people have committed without knowing they were sinning .
58009008	The Holy Spirit clearly teaches from all these arrangements that the way into the Most Holy Place has not yet been opened as long as the outer tent still stands .
58009009	This is a symbol which points to the present time . It means that the offerings and animal sacrifices presented to God cannot make the worshiper's heart perfect ,
58009010	since they have to do only with food , drink , and various purification ceremonies . These are all outward rules , which apply only until the time when God will establish the new order .
58009011	But Christ has already come as the High Priest of the good things that are already here . The tent in which he serves is greater and more perfect ; it is not a tent made by human hands , that is , it is not a part of this created world .
58009012	When Christ went through the tent and entered once and for all into the Most Holy Place , he did not take the blood of goats and bulls to offer as a sacrifice ; rather , he took his own blood and obtained eternal salvation for us .
58009013	The blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a burnt calf are sprinkled on the people who are ritually unclean , and this purifies them by taking away their ritual impurity .
58009014	Since this is true , how much more is accomplished by the blood of Christ ! Through the eternal Spirit he offered himself as a perfect sacrifice to God . His blood will purify our consciences from useless rituals , so that we may serve the living God .
58009015	For this reason Christ is the one who arranges a new covenant , so that those who have been called by God may receive the eternal blessings that God has promised . This can be done because there has been a death which sets people free from the wrongs they did while the first covenant was in effect .
58009016	In the case of a will it is necessary to prove that the person who made it has died ,
58009017	for a will means nothing while the person who made it is alive ; it goes into effect only after his death .
58009018	That is why even the first covenant went into effect only with the use of blood .
58009019	First , Moses proclaimed to the people all the commandments as set forth in the Law . Then he took the blood of bulls and goats , mixed it with water , and sprinkled it on the book of the Law and all the people , using a sprig of hyssop and some red wool .
58009020	He said , “ This is the blood which seals the covenant that God has commanded you to obey . ”
58009021	In the same way Moses also sprinkled the blood on the Sacred Tent and over all the things used in worship .
58009022	Indeed , according to the Law almost everything is purified by blood , and sins are forgiven only if blood is poured out .
58009023	Those things , which are copies of the heavenly originals , had to be purified in that way . But the heavenly things themselves require much better sacrifices .
58009024	For Christ did not go into a Holy Place made by human hands , which was a copy of the real one . He went into heaven itself , where he now appears on our behalf in the presence of God .
58009025	The Jewish high priest goes into the Most Holy Place every year with the blood of an animal . But Christ did not go in to offer himself many times ,
58009026	for then he would have had to suffer many times ever since the creation of the world . Instead , now when all ages of time are nearing the end , he has appeared once and for all , to remove sin through the sacrifice of himself .
58009027	Everyone must die once , and after that be judged by God .
58009028	In the same manner Christ also was offered in sacrifice once to take away the sins of many . He will appear a second time , not to deal with sin , but to save those who are waiting for him .
58010001	The Jewish Law is not a full and faithful model of the real things ; it is only a faint outline of the good things to come . The same sacrifices are offered forever , year after year . How can the Law , then , by means of these sacrifices make perfect the people who come to God ?
58010002	If the people worshiping God had really been purified from their sins , they would not feel guilty of sin any more , and all sacrifices would stop .
58010003	As it is , however , the sacrifices serve year after year to remind people of their sins .
58010004	For the blood of bulls and goats can never take away sins .
58010005	For this reason , when Christ was about to come into the world , he said to God : “ You do not want sacrifices and offerings , but you have prepared a body for me .
58010006	You are not pleased with animals burned whole on the altar or with sacrifices to take away sins .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Here I am , to do your will , O God , just as it is written of me in the book of the Law . ’ ”
58010011	Every Jewish priest performs his services every day and offers the same sacrifices many times ; but these sacrifices can never take away sins .
58010012	Christ , however , offered one sacrifice for sins , an offering that is effective forever , and then he sat down at the right side of God .
58010013	There he now waits until God puts his enemies as a footstool under his feet .
58010014	With one sacrifice , then , he has made perfect forever those who are purified from sin .
58010015	And the Holy Spirit also gives us his witness . First he says ,
58010016	“ This is the covenant that I will make with them in the days to come , says the Lord : I will put my laws in their hearts and write them on their minds . ”
58010019	We have , then , my friends , complete freedom to go into the Most Holy Place by means of the death of Jesus .
58010020	He opened for us a new way , a living way , through the curtain—that is , through his own body .
58010021	We have a great priest in charge of the house of God .
58010022	So let us come near to God with a sincere heart and a sure faith , with hearts that have been purified from a guilty conscience and with bodies washed with clean water .
58010023	Let us hold on firmly to the hope we profess , because we can trust God to keep his promise .
58010024	Let us be concerned for one another , to help one another to show love and to do good .
58010025	Let us not give up the habit of meeting together , as some are doing . Instead , let us encourage one another all the more , since you see that the Day of the Lord is coming nearer .
58010026	For there is no longer any sacrifice that will take away sins if we purposely go on sinning after the truth has been made known to us .
58010027	Instead , all that is left is to wait in fear for the coming Judgment and the fierce fire which will destroy those who oppose God !
58010028	Anyone who disobeys the Law of Moses is put to death without any mercy when judged guilty from the evidence of two or more witnesses .
58010029	What , then , of those who despise the Son of God ? who treat as a cheap thing the blood of God's covenant which purified them from sin ? who insult the Spirit of grace ? Just think how much worse is the punishment they will deserve !
58010030	For we know who said , “ I will take revenge , I will repay ” ; and who also said , “ The Lord will judge his people . ”
58010031	It is a terrifying thing to fall into the hands of the living God !
58010032	Remember how it was with you in the past . In those days , after God's light had shone on you , you suffered many things , yet were not defeated by the struggle .
58010033	You were at times publicly insulted and mistreated , and at other times you were ready to join those who were being treated in this way .
58010034	You shared the sufferings of prisoners , and when all your belongings were seized , you endured your loss gladly , because you knew that you still possessed something much better , which would last forever .
58010035	Do not lose your courage , then , because it brings with it a great reward .
58010036	You need to be patient , in order to do the will of God and receive what he promises .
58010037	For , as the scripture says , “ Just a little while longer , and he who is coming will come ; he will not delay .
58010038	My righteous people , however , will believe and live ; but if any of them turns back , I will not be pleased with them . ”
58011001	To have faith is to be sure of the things we hope for , to be certain of the things we cannot see .
58011002	It was by their faith that people of ancient times won God's approval .
58011003	It is by faith that we understand that the universe was created by God's word , so that what can be seen was made out of what cannot be seen .
58011004	It was faith that made Abel offer to God a better sacrifice than Cain's . Through his faith he won God's approval as a righteous man , because God himself approved of his gifts . By means of his faith Abel still speaks , even though he is dead .
58011005	It was faith that kept Enoch from dying . Instead , he was taken up to God , and nobody could find him , because God had taken him up . The scripture says that before Enoch was taken up , he had pleased God .
58011006	No one can please God without faith , for whoever comes to God must have faith that God exists and rewards those who seek him .
58011007	It was faith that made Noah hear God's warnings about things in the future that he could not see . He obeyed God and built a boat in which he and his family were saved . As a result , the world was condemned , and Noah received from God the righteousness that comes by faith .
58011008	It was faith that made Abraham obey when God called him to go out to a country which God had promised to give him . He left his own country without knowing where he was going .
58011009	By faith he lived as a foreigner in the country that God had promised him . He lived in tents , as did Isaac and Jacob , who received the same promise from God .
58011010	For Abraham was waiting for the city which God has designed and built , the city with permanent foundations .
58011011	It was faith that made Abraham able to become a father , even though he was too old and Sarah herself could not have children . He trusted God to keep his promise .
58011012	Though Abraham was practically dead , from this one man came as many descendants as there are stars in the sky , as many as the numberless grains of sand on the seashore .
58011013	It was in faith that all these persons died . They did not receive the things God had promised , but from a long way off they saw them and welcomed them , and admitted openly that they were foreigners and refugees on earth .
58011014	Those who say such things make it clear that they are looking for a country of their own .
58011015	They did not keep thinking about the country they had left ; if they had , they would have had the chance to return .
58011016	Instead , it was a better country they longed for , the heavenly country . And so God is not ashamed for them to call him their God , because he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	It was faith that made Abraham offer his son Isaac as a sacrifice when God put Abraham to the test . Abraham was the one to whom God had made the promise , yet he was ready to offer his only son as a sacrifice .
58011018	God had said to him , “ It is through Isaac that you will have the descendants I promised . ”
58011019	Abraham reckoned that God was able to raise Isaac from death—and , so to speak , Abraham did receive Isaac back from death .
58011020	It was faith that made Isaac promise blessings for the future to Jacob and Esau .
58011021	It was faith that made Jacob bless each of the sons of Joseph just before he died . He leaned on the top of his walking stick and worshiped God .
58011022	It was faith that made Joseph , when he was about to die , speak of the departure of the Israelites from Egypt , and leave instructions about what should be done with his body .
58011023	It was faith that made the parents of Moses hide him for three months after he was born . They saw that he was a beautiful child , and they were not afraid to disobey the king's order .
58011024	It was faith that made Moses , when he had grown up , refuse to be called the son of the king's daughter .
58011025	He preferred to suffer with God's people rather than to enjoy sin for a little while .
58011026	He reckoned that to suffer scorn for the Messiah was worth far more than all the treasures of Egypt , for he kept his eyes on the future reward .
58011027	It was faith that made Moses leave Egypt without being afraid of the king's anger . As though he saw the invisible God , he refused to turn back .
58011028	It was faith that made him establish the Passover and order the blood to be sprinkled on the doors , so that the Angel of Death would not kill the first-born sons of the Israelites .
58011029	It was faith that made the Israelites able to cross the Red Sea as if on dry land ; when the Egyptians tried to do it , the water swallowed them up .
58011030	It was faith that made the walls of Jericho fall down after the Israelites had marched around them for seven days .
58011031	It was faith that kept the prostitute Rahab from being killed with those who disobeyed God , for she gave the Israelite spies a friendly welcome .
58011032	Should I go on ? There isn't enough time for me to speak of Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , David , Samuel , and the prophets .
58011033	Through faith they fought whole countries and won . They did what was right and received what God had promised . They shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	put out fierce fires , escaped being killed by the sword . They were weak , but became strong ; they were mighty in battle and defeated the armies of foreigners .
58011035	Through faith women received their dead relatives raised back to life . Others , refusing to accept freedom , died under torture in order to be raised to a better life .
58011036	Some were mocked and whipped , and others were put in chains and taken off to prison .
58011037	They were stoned , they were sawed in two , they were killed by the sword . They went around clothed in skins of sheep or goats—poor , persecuted , and mistreated .
58011038	The world was not good enough for them ! They wandered like refugees in the deserts and hills , living in caves and holes in the ground .
58011039	What a record all of these have won by their faith ! Yet they did not receive what God had promised ,
58011040	because God had decided on an even better plan for us . His purpose was that only in company with us would they be made perfect .
58012001	As for us , we have this large crowd of witnesses around us . So then , let us rid ourselves of everything that gets in the way , and of the sin which holds on to us so tightly , and let us run with determination the race that lies before us .
58012002	Let us keep our eyes fixed on Jesus , on whom our faith depends from beginning to end . He did not give up because of the cross ! On the contrary , because of the joy that was waiting for him , he thought nothing of the disgrace of dying on the cross , and he is now seated at the right side of God's throne .
58012003	Think of what he went through ; how he put up with so much hatred from sinners ! So do not let yourselves become discouraged and give up .
58012004	For in your struggle against sin you have not yet had to resist to the point of being killed .
58012005	Have you forgotten the encouraging words which God speaks to you as his children ? “ My child , pay attention when the Lord corrects you , and do not be discouraged when he rebukes you .
58012006	Because the Lord corrects everyone he loves , and punishes everyone he accepts as a child . ”
58012012	Lift up your tired hands , then , and strengthen your trembling knees !
58012013	Keep walking on straight paths , so that the lame foot may not be disabled , but instead be healed .
58012014	Try to be at peace with everyone , and try to live a holy life , because no one will see the Lord without it .
58012015	Guard against turning back from the grace of God . Let no one become like a bitter plant that grows up and causes many troubles with its poison .
58012016	Let no one become immoral or unspiritual like Esau , who for a single meal sold his rights as the older son .
58012017	Afterward , you know , he wanted to receive his father's blessing ; but he was turned back , because he could not find any way to change what he had done , even though in tears he looked for it .
58012018	You have not come , as the people of Israel came , to what you can feel , to Mount Sinai with its blazing fire , the darkness and the gloom , the storm ,
58012019	the blast of a trumpet , and the sound of a voice . When the people heard the voice , they begged not to hear another word ,
58012020	because they could not bear the order which said , “ If even an animal touches the mountain , it must be stoned to death . ”
58012021	The sight was so terrifying that Moses said , “ I am trembling and afraid ! ”
58012022	Instead , you have come to Mount Zion and to the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , with its thousands of angels .
58012023	You have come to the joyful gathering of God's first-born , whose names are written in heaven . You have come to God , who is the judge of all people , and to the spirits of good people made perfect .
58012024	You have come to Jesus , who arranged the new covenant , and to the sprinkled blood that promises much better things than does the blood of Abel .
58012025	Be careful , then , and do not refuse to hear him who speaks . Those who refused to hear the one who gave the divine message on earth did not escape . How much less shall we escape , then , if we turn away from the one who speaks from heaven !
58012026	His voice shook the earth at that time , but now he has promised , “ I will once more shake not only the earth but heaven as well . ”
58012027	The words “ once more ” plainly show that the created things will be shaken and removed , so that the things that cannot be shaken will remain .
58012028	Let us be thankful , then , because we receive a kingdom that cannot be shaken . Let us be grateful and worship God in a way that will please him , with reverence and awe ;
58012029	because our God is indeed a destroying fire .
58013001	Keep on loving one another as Christians .
58013002	Remember to welcome strangers in your homes . There were some who did that and welcomed angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember those who are in prison , as though you were in prison with them . Remember those who are suffering , as though you were suffering as they are .
58013004	Marriage is to be honored by all , and husbands and wives must be faithful to each other . God will judge those who are immoral and those who commit adultery .
58013005	Keep your lives free from the love of money , and be satisfied with what you have . For God has said , “ I will never leave you ; I will never abandon you . ”
58013006	Let us be bold , then , and say , “ The Lord is my helper , I will not be afraid . What can anyone do to me ? ”
58013007	Remember your former leaders , who spoke God's message to you . Think back on how they lived and died , and imitate their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Do not let all kinds of strange teachings lead you from the right way . It is good to receive inner strength from God's grace , and not by obeying rules about foods ; those who obey these rules have not been helped by them .
58013010	The priests who serve in the Jewish place of worship have no right to eat any of the sacrifice on our altar .
58013011	The Jewish high priest brings the blood of the animals into the Most Holy Place to offer it as a sacrifice for sins ; but the bodies of the animals are burned outside the camp .
58013012	For this reason Jesus also died outside the city , in order to purify the people from sin with his own blood .
58013013	Let us , then , go to him outside the camp and share his shame .
58013014	For there is no permanent city for us here on earth ; we are looking for the city which is to come .
58013015	Let us , then , always offer praise to God as our sacrifice through Jesus , which is the offering presented by lips that confess him as Lord .
58013016	Do not forget to do good and to help one another , because these are the sacrifices that please God .
58013017	Obey your leaders and follow their orders . They watch over your souls without resting , since they must give to God an account of their service . If you obey them , they will do their work gladly ; if not , they will do it with sadness , and that would be of no help to you .
58013018	Keep on praying for us . We are sure we have a clear conscience , because we want to do the right thing at all times .
58013019	And I beg you even more earnestly to pray that God will send me back to you soon .
58013022	I beg you , my friends , to listen patiently to this message of encouragement ; for this letter I have written you is not very long .
58013023	I want you to know that our brother Timothy has been let out of prison . If he comes soon enough , I will have him with me when I see you .
58013024	Give our greetings to all your leaders and to all God's people . The believers from Italy send you their greetings .
58013025	May God's grace be with you all .
59001001	From James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ : Greetings to all God's people scattered over the whole world .
59001002	My friends , consider yourselves fortunate when all kinds of trials come your way ,
59001003	for you know that when your faith succeeds in facing such trials , the result is the ability to endure .
59001004	Make sure that your endurance carries you all the way without failing , so that you may be perfect and complete , lacking nothing .
59001005	But if any of you lack wisdom , you should pray to God , who will give it to you ; because God gives generously and graciously to all .
59001006	But when you pray , you must believe and not doubt at all . Whoever doubts is like a wave in the sea that is driven and blown about by the wind .
59001009	Those Christians who are poor must be glad when God lifts them up ,
59001010	and the rich Christians must be glad when God brings them down . For the rich will pass away like the flower of a wild plant .
59001011	The sun rises with its blazing heat and burns the plant ; its flower falls off , and its beauty is destroyed . In the same way the rich will be destroyed while they go about their business .
59001012	Happy are those who remain faithful under trials , because when they succeed in passing such a test , they will receive as their reward the life which God has promised to those who love him .
59001013	If we are tempted by such trials , we must not say , “ This temptation comes from God . ” For God cannot be tempted by evil , and he himself tempts no one .
59001014	But we are tempted when we are drawn away and trapped by our own evil desires .
59001015	Then our evil desires conceive and give birth to sin ; and sin , when it is full-grown , gives birth to death .
59001016	Do not be deceived , my dear friends !
59001017	Every good gift and every perfect present comes from heaven ; it comes down from God , the Creator of the heavenly lights , who does not change or cause darkness by turning .
59001018	By his own will he brought us into being through the word of truth , so that we should have first place among all his creatures .
59001019	Remember this , my dear friends ! Everyone must be quick to listen , but slow to speak and slow to become angry .
59001020	Human anger does not achieve God's righteous purpose .
59001021	So get rid of every filthy habit and all wicked conduct . Submit to God and accept the word that he plants in your hearts , which is able to save you .
59001022	Do not deceive yourselves by just listening to his word ; instead , put it into practice .
59001023	If you listen to the word , but do not put it into practice you are like people who look in a mirror and see themselves as they are .
59001024	They take a good look at themselves and then go away and at once forget what they look like .
59001025	But if you look closely into the perfect law that sets people free , and keep on paying attention to it and do not simply listen and then forget it , but put it into practice—you will be blessed by God in what you do .
59001026	Do any of you think you are religious ? If you do not control your tongue , your religion is worthless and you deceive yourself .
59001027	What God the Father considers to be pure and genuine religion is this : to take care of orphans and widows in their suffering and to keep oneself from being corrupted by the world .
59002001	My friends , as believers in our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , you must never treat people in different ways according to their outward appearance .
59002002	Suppose a rich man wearing a gold ring and fine clothes comes to your meeting , and a poor man in ragged clothes also comes .
59002003	If you show more respect to the well-dressed man and say to him , “ Have this best seat here , ” but say to the poor man , “ Stand over there , or sit here on the floor by my feet , ”
59002004	then you are guilty of creating distinctions among yourselves and of making judgments based on evil motives .
59002005	Listen , my dear friends ! God chose the poor people of this world to be rich in faith and to possess the kingdom which he promised to those who love him .
59002006	But you dishonor the poor ! Who are the ones who oppress you and drag you before the judges ? The rich !
59002007	They are the ones who speak evil of that good name which has been given to you .
59002008	You will be doing the right thing if you obey the law of the Kingdom , which is found in the scripture , “ Love your neighbor as you love yourself . ”
59002009	But if you treat people according to their outward appearance , you are guilty of sin , and the Law condemns you as a lawbreaker .
59002010	Whoever breaks one commandment is guilty of breaking them all .
59002011	For the same one who said , “ Do not commit adultery , ” also said , “ Do not commit murder . ” Even if you do not commit adultery , you have become a lawbreaker if you commit murder .
59002012	Speak and act as people who will be judged by the law that sets us free .
59002013	For God will not show mercy when he judges the person who has not been merciful ; but mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	My friends , what good is it for one of you to say that you have faith if your actions do not prove it ? Can that faith save you ?
59002015	Suppose there are brothers or sisters who need clothes and don't have enough to eat .
59002016	What good is there in your saying to them , “ God bless you ! Keep warm and eat well ! ” —if you don't give them the necessities of life ?
59002017	So it is with faith : if it is alone and includes no actions , then it is dead .
59002018	But someone will say , “ One person has faith , another has actions . ” My answer is , “ Show me how anyone can have faith without actions . I will show you my faith by my actions . ”
59002019	Do you believe that there is only one God ? Good ! The demons also believe—and tremble with fear .
59002020	You fool ! Do you want to be shown that faith without actions is useless ?
59002021	How was our ancestor Abraham put right with God ? It was through his actions , when he offered his son Isaac on the altar .
59002022	Can't you see ? His faith and his actions worked together ; his faith was made perfect through his actions .
59002023	And the scripture came true that said , “ Abraham believed God , and because of his faith God accepted him as righteous . ” And so Abraham was called God's friend .
59002024	You see , then , that it is by our actions that we are put right with God , and not by our faith alone .
59002025	It was the same with the prostitute Rahab . She was put right with God through her actions , by welcoming the Israelite spies and helping them to escape by a different road .
59002026	So then , as the body without the spirit is dead , also faith without actions is dead .
59003001	My friends , not many of you should become teachers . As you know , we teachers will be judged with greater strictness than others .
59003002	All of us often make mistakes . But if a person never makes a mistake in what he says , he is perfect and is also able to control his whole being .
59003003	We put a bit into the mouth of a horse to make it obey us , and we are able to make it go where we want .
59003004	Or think of a ship : big as it is and driven by such strong winds , it can be steered by a very small rudder , and it goes wherever the pilot wants it to go .
59003005	So it is with the tongue : small as it is , it can boast about great things . Just think how large a forest can be set on fire by a tiny flame !
59003006	And the tongue is like a fire . It is a world of wrong , occupying its place in our bodies and spreading evil through our whole being . It sets on fire the entire course of our existence with the fire that comes to it from hell itself .
59003007	We humans are able to tame and have tamed all other creatures—wild animals and birds , reptiles and fish .
59003008	But no one has ever been able to tame the tongue . It is evil and uncontrollable , full of deadly poison .
59003009	We use it to give thanks to our Lord and Father and also to curse other people , who are created in the likeness of God .
59003010	Words of thanksgiving and cursing pour out from the same mouth . My friends , this should not happen !
59003011	No spring of water pours out sweet water and bitter water from the same opening .
59003012	A fig tree , my friends , cannot bear olives ; a grapevine cannot bear figs , nor can a salty spring produce sweet water .
59003013	Are there any of you who are wise and understanding ? You are to prove it by your good life , by your good deeds performed with humility and wisdom .
59003014	But if in your heart you are jealous , bitter , and selfish , don't sin against the truth by boasting of your wisdom .
59003015	Such wisdom does not come down from heaven ; it belongs to the world , it is unspiritual and demonic .
59003016	Where there is jealousy and selfishness , there is also disorder and every kind of evil .
59003017	But the wisdom from above is pure first of all ; it is also peaceful , gentle , and friendly ; it is full of compassion and produces a harvest of good deeds ; it is free from prejudice and hypocrisy .
59003018	And goodness is the harvest that is produced from the seeds the peacemakers plant in peace .
59004001	Where do all the fights and quarrels among you come from ? They come from your desires for pleasure , which are constantly fighting within you .
59004002	You want things , but you cannot have them , so you are ready to kill ; you strongly desire things , but you cannot get them , so you quarrel and fight . You do not have what you want because you do not ask God for it .
59004003	And when you ask , you do not receive it , because your motives are bad ; you ask for things to use for your own pleasures .
59004004	Unfaithful people ! Don't you know that to be the world's friend means to be God's enemy ? If you want to be the world's friend , you make yourself God's enemy .
59004005	Don't think that there is no truth in the scripture that says , “ The spirit that God placed in us is filled with fierce desires . ”
59004006	But the grace that God gives is even stronger . As the scripture says , “ God resists the proud , but gives grace to the humble . ”
59004007	So then , submit yourselves to God . Resist the Devil , and he will run away from you .
59004008	Come near to God , and he will come near to you . Wash your hands , you sinners ! Purify your hearts , you hypocrites !
59004009	Be sorrowful , cry , and weep ; change your laughter into crying , your joy into gloom !
59004010	Humble yourselves before the Lord , and he will lift you up .
59004011	Do not criticize one another , my friends . If you criticize or judge another Christian , you criticize and judge the Law . If you judge the Law , then you are no longer one who obeys the Law , but one who judges it .
59004012	God is the only lawgiver and judge . He alone can save and destroy . Who do you think you are , to judge someone else ?
59004013	Now listen to me , you that say , “ Today or tomorrow we will travel to a certain city , where we will stay a year and go into business and make a lot of money . ”
59004014	You don't even know what your life tomorrow will be ! You are like a puff of smoke , which appears for a moment and then disappears .
59004015	What you should say is this : “ If the Lord is willing , we will live and do this or that . ”
59004016	But now you are proud , and you boast ; all such boasting is wrong .
59004017	So then , if we do not do the good we know we should do , we are guilty of sin .
59005001	And now , you rich people , listen to me ! Weep and wail over the miseries that are coming upon you !
59005002	Your riches have rotted away , and your clothes have been eaten by moths .
59005003	Your gold and silver are covered with rust , and this rust will be a witness against you and will eat up your flesh like fire . You have piled up riches in these last days .
59005004	You have not paid any wages to those who work in your fields . Listen to their complaints ! The cries of those who gather in your crops have reached the ears of God , the Lord Almighty .
59005005	Your life here on earth has been full of luxury and pleasure . You have made yourselves fat for the day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned and murdered innocent people , and they do not resist you .
59005007	Be patient , then , my friends , until the Lord comes . See how patient farmers are as they wait for their land to produce precious crops . They wait patiently for the autumn and spring rains .
59005008	You also must be patient . Keep your hopes high , for the day of the Lord's coming is near .
59005009	Do not complain against one another , my friends , so that God will not judge you . The Judge is near , ready to appear .
59005010	My friends , remember the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord . Take them as examples of patient endurance under suffering .
59005011	We call them happy because they endured . You have heard of Job's patience , and you know how the Lord provided for him in the end . For the Lord is full of mercy and compassion .
59005012	Above all , my friends , do not use an oath when you make a promise . Do not swear by heaven or by earth or by anything else . Say only “ Yes ” when you mean yes , and “ No ” when you mean no , and then you will not come under God's judgment .
59005013	Are any among you in trouble ? They should pray . Are any among you happy ? They should sing praises .
59005014	Are any among you sick ? They should send for the church elders , who will pray for them and rub olive oil on them in the name of the Lord .
59005015	This prayer made in faith will heal the sick ; the Lord will restore them to health , and the sins they have committed will be forgiven .
59005016	So then , confess your sins to one another and pray for one another , so that you will be healed . The prayer of a good person has a powerful effect .
59005017	Elijah was the same kind of person as we are . He prayed earnestly that there would be no rain , and no rain fell on the land for three and a half years .
59005018	Once again he prayed , and the sky poured out its rain and the earth produced its crops .
59005019	My friends , if any of you wander away from the truth and another one brings you back again ,
59005020	remember this : whoever turns a sinner back from the wrong way will save that sinner's soul from death and bring about the forgiveness of many sins .
60001001	From Peter , apostle of Jesus Christ— To God's chosen people who live as refugees scattered throughout the provinces of Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia .
60001002	You were chosen according to the purpose of God the Father and were made a holy people by his Spirit , to obey Jesus Christ and be purified by his blood . May grace and peace be yours in full measure .
60001003	Let us give thanks to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! Because of his great mercy he gave us new life by raising Jesus Christ from death . This fills us with a living hope ,
60001004	and so we look forward to possessing the rich blessings that God keeps for his people . He keeps them for you in heaven , where they cannot decay or spoil or fade away .
60001005	They are for you , who through faith are kept safe by God's power for the salvation which is ready to be revealed at the end of time .
60001006	Be glad about this , even though it may now be necessary for you to be sad for a while because of the many kinds of trials you suffer .
60001007	Their purpose is to prove that your faith is genuine . Even gold , which can be destroyed , is tested by fire ; and so your faith , which is much more precious than gold , must also be tested , so that it may endure . Then you will receive praise and glory and honor on the Day when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60001008	You love him , although you have not seen him , and you believe in him , although you do not now see him . So you rejoice with a great and glorious joy which words cannot express ,
60001009	because you are receiving the salvation of your souls , which is the purpose of your faith in him .
60001010	It was concerning this salvation that the prophets made careful search and investigation , and they prophesied about this gift which God would give you .
60001011	They tried to find out when the time would be and how it would come . This was the time to which Christ's Spirit in them was pointing , in predicting the sufferings that Christ would have to endure and the glory that would follow .
60001012	God revealed to these prophets that their work was not for their own benefit , but for yours , as they spoke about those things which you have now heard from the messengers who announced the Good News by the power of the Holy Spirit sent from heaven . These are things which even the angels would like to understand .
60001013	So then , have your minds ready for action . Keep alert and set your hope completely on the blessing which will be given you when Jesus Christ is revealed .
60001014	Be obedient to God , and do not allow your lives to be shaped by those desires you had when you were still ignorant .
60001015	Instead , be holy in all that you do , just as God who called you is holy .
60001016	The scripture says , “ Be holy because I am holy . ”
60001017	You call him Father , when you pray to God , who judges all people by the same standard , according to what each one has done ; so then , spend the rest of your lives here on earth in reverence for him .
60001018	For you know what was paid to set you free from the worthless manner of life handed down by your ancestors . It was not something that can be destroyed , such as silver or gold ;
60001019	it was the costly sacrifice of Christ , who was like a lamb without defect or flaw .
60001020	He had been chosen by God before the creation of the world and was revealed in these last days for your sake .
60001021	Through him you believe in God , who raised him from death and gave him glory ; and so your faith and hope are fixed on God .
60001022	Now that by your obedience to the truth you have purified yourselves and have come to have a sincere love for other believers , love one another earnestly with all your heart .
60001023	For through the living and eternal word of God you have been born again as the children of a parent who is immortal , not mortal .
60001024	As the scripture says , “ All human beings are like grass , and all their glory is like wild flowers . The grass withers , and the flowers fall ,
60001025	but the word of the Lord remains forever . ”
60002001	Rid yourselves , then , of all evil ; no more lying or hypocrisy or jealousy or insulting language .
60002002	Be like newborn babies , always thirsty for the pure spiritual milk , so that by drinking it you may grow up and be saved .
60002003	As the scripture says , “ You have found out for yourselves how kind the Lord is . ”
60002004	Come to the Lord , the living stone rejected by people as worthless but chosen by God as valuable .
60002005	Come as living stones , and let yourselves be used in building the spiritual temple , where you will serve as holy priests to offer spiritual and acceptable sacrifices to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	For the scripture says , “ I chose a valuable stone , which I am placing as the cornerstone in Zion ; and whoever believes in him will never be disappointed . ” “ The stone which the builders rejected as worthless turned out to be the most important of all . ” “ This is the stone that will make people stumble , the rock that will make them fall . ”
60002009	But you are the chosen race , the King's priests , the holy nation , God's own people , chosen to proclaim the wonderful acts of God , who called you out of darkness into his own marvelous light .
60002010	At one time you were not God's people , but now you are his people ; at one time you did not know God's mercy , but now you have received his mercy .
60002011	I appeal to you , my friends , as strangers and refugees in this world ! Do not give in to bodily passions , which are always at war against the soul .
60002012	Your conduct among the heathen should be so good that when they accuse you of being evildoers , they will have to recognize your good deeds and so praise God on the Day of his coming .
60002013	For the sake of the Lord submit yourselves to every human authority : to the Emperor , who is the supreme authority ,
60002014	and to the governors , who have been appointed by him to punish the evildoers and to praise those who do good .
60002015	For God wants you to silence the ignorant talk of foolish people by the good things you do .
60002016	Live as free people ; do not , however , use your freedom to cover up any evil , but live as God's slaves .
60002017	Respect everyone , love other believers , honor God , and respect the Emperor .
60002018	You servants must submit yourselves to your masters and show them complete respect , not only to those who are kind and considerate , but also to those who are harsh .
60002019	God will bless you for this , if you endure the pain of undeserved suffering because you are conscious of his will .
60002020	For what credit is there if you endure the beatings you deserve for having done wrong ? But if you endure suffering even when you have done right , God will bless you for it .
60002021	It was to this that God called you , for Christ himself suffered for you and left you an example , so that you would follow in his steps .
60002022	He committed no sin , and no one ever heard a lie come from his lips .
60002023	When he was insulted , he did not answer back with an insult ; when he suffered , he did not threaten , but placed his hopes in God , the righteous Judge .
60002024	Christ himself carried our sins in his body to the cross , so that we might die to sin and live for righteousness . It is by his wounds that you have been healed .
60002025	You were like sheep that had lost their way , but now you have been brought back to follow the Shepherd and Keeper of your souls .
60003001	In the same way you wives must submit yourselves to your husbands , so that if any of them do not believe God's word , your conduct will win them over to believe . It will not be necessary for you to say a word ,
60003002	because they will see how pure and reverent your conduct is .
60003003	You should not use outward aids to make yourselves beautiful , such as the way you fix your hair , or the jewelry you put on , or the dresses you wear .
60003004	Instead , your beauty should consist of your true inner self , the ageless beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is of the greatest value in God's sight .
60003005	For the devout women of the past who placed their hope in God used to make themselves beautiful by submitting themselves to their husbands .
60003006	Sarah was like that ; she obeyed Abraham and called him her master . You are now her daughters if you do good and are not afraid of anything .
60003007	In the same way you husbands must live with your wives with the proper understanding that they are more delicate than you . Treat them with respect , because they also will receive , together with you , God's gift of life . Do this so that nothing will interfere with your prayers .
60003008	To conclude : you must all have the same attitude and the same feelings ; love one another , and be kind and humble with one another .
60003009	Do not pay back evil with evil or cursing with cursing ; instead , pay back with a blessing , because a blessing is what God promised to give you when he called you .
60003010	As the scripture says , “ If you want to enjoy life and wish to see good times , you must keep from speaking evil and stop telling lies .
60003011	You must turn away from evil and do good ; you must strive for peace with all your heart .
60003012	For the Lord watches over the righteous and listens to their prayers ; but he opposes those who do evil . ”
60003013	Who will harm you if you are eager to do what is good ?
60003014	But even if you should suffer for doing what is right , how happy you are ! Do not be afraid of anyone , and do not worry .
60003015	But have reverence for Christ in your hearts , and honor him as Lord . Be ready at all times to answer anyone who asks you to explain the hope you have in you ,
60003016	but do it with gentleness and respect . Keep your conscience clear , so that when you are insulted , those who speak evil of your good conduct as followers of Christ will become ashamed of what they say .
60003017	For it is better to suffer for doing good , if this should be God's will , than for doing evil .
60003018	For Christ died for sins once and for all , a good man on behalf of sinners , in order to lead you to God . He was put to death physically , but made alive spiritually ,
60003019	and in his spiritual existence he went and preached to the imprisoned spirits .
60003020	These were the spirits of those who had not obeyed God when he waited patiently during the days that Noah was building his boat . The few people in the boat—eight in all—were saved by the water ,
60003021	which was a symbol pointing to baptism , which now saves you . It is not the washing off of bodily dirt , but the promise made to God from a good conscience . It saves you through the resurrection of Jesus Christ ,
60003022	who has gone to heaven and is at the right side of God , ruling over all angels and heavenly authorities and powers .
60004001	Since Christ suffered physically , you too must strengthen yourselves with the same way of thinking that he had ; because whoever suffers physically is no longer involved with sin .
60004002	From now on , then , you must live the rest of your earthly lives controlled by God's will and not by human desires .
60004003	You have spent enough time in the past doing what the heathen like to do . Your lives were spent in indecency , lust , drunkenness , orgies , drinking parties , and the disgusting worship of idols .
60004004	And now the heathen are surprised when you do not join them in the same wild and reckless living , and so they insult you .
60004005	But they will have to give an account of themselves to God , who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	That is why the Good News was preached also to the dead , to those who had been judged in their physical existence as everyone is judged ; it was preached to them so that in their spiritual existence they may live as God lives .
60004007	The end of all things is near . You must be self-controlled and alert , to be able to pray .
60004008	Above everything , love one another earnestly , because love covers over many sins .
60004009	Open your homes to each other without complaining .
60004010	Each one , as a good manager of God's different gifts , must use for the good of others the special gift he has received from God .
60004011	Those who preach must preach God's messages ; those who serve must serve with the strength that God gives them , so that in all things praise may be given to God through Jesus Christ , to whom belong glory and power forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	My dear friends , do not be surprised at the painful test you are suffering , as though something unusual were happening to you .
60004013	Rather be glad that you are sharing Christ's sufferings , so that you may be full of joy when his glory is revealed .
60004014	Happy are you if you are insulted because you are Christ's followers ; this means that the glorious Spirit , the Spirit of God , is resting on you .
60004015	If you suffer , it must not be because you are a murderer or a thief or a criminal or a meddler in other people's affairs .
60004016	However , if you suffer because you are a Christian , don't be ashamed of it , but thank God that you bear Christ's name .
60004017	The time has come for judgment to begin , and God's own people are the first to be judged . If it starts with us , how will it end with those who do not believe the Good News from God ?
60004018	As the scripture says , “ It is difficult for good people to be saved ; what , then , will become of godless sinners ? ”
60005001	I , who am an elder myself , appeal to the church elders among you . I am a witness of Christ's sufferings , and I will share in the glory that will be revealed . I appeal to you
60005002	to be shepherds of the flock that God gave you and to take care of it willingly , as God wants you to , and not unwillingly . Do your work , not for mere pay , but from a real desire to serve .
60005003	Do not try to rule over those who have been put in your care , but be examples to the flock .
60005004	And when the Chief Shepherd appears , you will receive the glorious crown which will never lose its brightness .
60005005	In the same way you younger people must submit yourselves to your elders . And all of you must put on the apron of humility , to serve one another ; for the scripture says , “ God resists the proud , but shows favor to the humble . ”
60005006	Humble yourselves , then , under God's mighty hand , so that he will lift you up in his own good time .
60005007	Leave all your worries with him , because he cares for you .
60005008	Be alert , be on watch ! Your enemy , the Devil , roams around like a roaring lion , looking for someone to devour .
60005009	Be firm in your faith and resist him , because you know that other believers in all the world are going through the same kind of sufferings .
60005010	But after you have suffered for a little while , the God of all grace , who calls you to share his eternal glory in union with Christ , will himself perfect you and give you firmness , strength , and a sure foundation .
60005011	To him be the power forever ! Amen .
60005012	I write you this brief letter with the help of Silas , whom I regard as a faithful Christian . I want to encourage you and give my testimony that this is the true grace of God . Stand firm in it .
60005013	Your sister church in Babylon , also chosen by God , sends you greetings , and so does my son Mark .
60005014	Greet one another with the kiss of Christian love . May peace be with all of you who belong to Christ .
61001001	From Simon Peter , a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ— To those who through the righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ have been given a faith as precious as ours :
61001002	May grace and peace be yours in full measure through your knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord .
61001003	God's divine power has given us everything we need to live a truly religious life through our knowledge of the one who called us to share in his own glory and goodness .
61001004	In this way he has given us the very great and precious gifts he promised , so that by means of these gifts you may escape from the destructive lust that is in the world , and may come to share the divine nature .
61001005	For this very reason do your best to add goodness to your faith ; to your goodness add knowledge ;
61001006	to your knowledge add self-control ; to your self-control add endurance ; to your endurance add godliness ;
61001007	to your godliness add Christian affection ; and to your Christian affection add love .
61001008	These are the qualities you need , and if you have them in abundance , they will make you active and effective in your knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	But if you do not have them , you are so shortsighted that you cannot see and have forgotten that you have been purified from your past sins .
61001010	So then , my friends , try even harder to make God's call and his choice of you a permanent experience ; if you do so , you will never abandon your faith .
61001011	In this way you will be given the full right to enter the eternal Kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	And so I will always remind you of these matters , even though you already know them and are firmly grounded in the truth you have received .
61001013	I think it only right for me to stir up your memory of these matters as long as I am still alive .
61001014	I know that I shall soon put off this mortal body , as our Lord Jesus Christ plainly told me .
61001015	I will do my best , then , to provide a way for you to remember these matters at all times after my death .
61001016	We have not depended on made-up stories in making known to you the mighty coming of our Lord Jesus Christ . With our own eyes we saw his greatness .
61001017	We were there when he was given honor and glory by God the Father , when the voice came to him from the Supreme Glory , saying , “ This is my own dear Son , with whom I am pleased ! ”
61001018	We ourselves heard this voice coming from heaven , when we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	So we are even more confident of the message proclaimed by the prophets . You will do well to pay attention to it , because it is like a lamp shining in a dark place until the Day dawns and the light of the morning star shines in your hearts .
61001020	Above all else , however , remember that none of us can explain by ourselves a prophecy in the Scriptures .
61001021	For no prophetic message ever came just from the human will , but people were under the control of the Holy Spirit as they spoke the message that came from God .
61002001	False prophets appeared in the past among the people , and in the same way false teachers will appear among you . They will bring in destructive , untrue doctrines , and will deny the Master who redeemed them , and so they will bring upon themselves sudden destruction .
61002002	Even so , many will follow their immoral ways ; and because of what they do , others will speak evil of the Way of truth .
61002003	In their greed these false teachers will make a profit out of telling you made-up stories . For a long time now their Judge has been ready , and their Destroyer has been wide awake !
61002004	God did not spare the angels who sinned , but threw them into hell , where they are kept chained in darkness , waiting for the Day of Judgment .
61002005	God did not spare the ancient world , but brought the flood on the world of godless people ; the only ones he saved were Noah , who preached righteousness , and seven other people .
61002006	God condemned the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah , destroying them with fire , and made them an example of what will happen to the godless .
61002007	He rescued Lot , a good man , who was distressed by the immoral conduct of lawless people .
61002008	That good man lived among them , and day after day he suffered agony as he saw and heard their evil actions .
61002009	And so the Lord knows how to rescue godly people from their trials and how to keep the wicked under punishment for the Day of Judgment ,
61002010	especially those who follow their filthy bodily lusts and despise God's authority . These false teachers are bold and arrogant , and show no respect for the glorious beings above ; instead , they insult them .
61002011	Even the angels , who are so much stronger and mightier than these false teachers , do not accuse them with insults in the presence of the Lord .
61002012	But these people act by instinct , like wild animals born to be captured and killed ; they attack with insults anything they do not understand . They will be destroyed like wild animals ,
61002013	and they will be paid with suffering for the suffering they have caused . Pleasure for them is to do anything in broad daylight that will satisfy their bodily appetites ; they are a shame and a disgrace as they join you in your meals , all the while enjoying their deceitful ways !
61002014	They want to look for nothing but the chance to commit adultery ; their appetite for sin is never satisfied . They lead weak people into a trap . Their hearts are trained to be greedy . They are under God's curse !
61002015	They have left the straight path and have lost their way ; they have followed the path taken by Balaam son of Beor , who loved the money he would get for doing wrong
61002016	and was rebuked for his sin . His donkey spoke with a human voice and stopped the prophet's insane action .
61002017	These people are like dried-up springs , like clouds blown along by a storm ; God has reserved a place for them in the deepest darkness .
61002018	They make proud and stupid statements , and use immoral bodily lusts to trap those who are just beginning to escape from among people who live in error .
61002019	They promise them freedom while they themselves are slaves of destructive habits—for we are slaves of anything that has conquered us .
61002020	If people have escaped from the corrupting forces of the world through their knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , and then are again caught and conquered by them , such people are in worse condition at the end than they were at the beginning .
61002021	It would have been much better for them never to have known the way of righteousness than to know it and then turn away from the sacred command that was given them .
61002022	What happened to them shows that the proverbs are true : “ A dog goes back to what it has vomited ” and “ A pig that has been washed goes back to roll in the mud . ”
61003001	My dear friends , this is now the second letter I have written you . In both letters I have tried to arouse pure thoughts in your minds by reminding you of these things .
61003002	I want you to remember the words that were spoken long ago by the holy prophets , and the command from the Lord and Savior which was given you by your apostles .
61003003	First of all , you must understand that in the last days some people will appear whose lives are controlled by their own lusts . They will make fun of you
61003004	and will ask , “ He promised to come , didn't he ? Where is he ? Our ancestors have already died , but everything is still the same as it was since the creation of the world ! ”
61003005	They purposely ignore the fact that long ago God gave a command , and the heavens and earth were created . The earth was formed out of water and by water ,
61003006	and it was also by water , the water of the flood , that the old world was destroyed .
61003007	But the heavens and the earth that now exist are being preserved by the same command of God , in order to be destroyed by fire . They are being kept for the day when godless people will be judged and destroyed .
61003008	But do not forget one thing , my dear friends ! There is no difference in the Lord's sight between one day and a thousand years ; to him the two are the same .
61003009	The Lord is not slow to do what he has promised , as some think . Instead , he is patient with you , because he does not want anyone to be destroyed , but wants all to turn away from their sins .
61003010	But the Day of the Lord will come like a thief . On that Day the heavens will disappear with a shrill noise , the heavenly bodies will burn up and be destroyed , and the earth with everything in it will vanish .
61003011	Since all these things will be destroyed in this way , what kind of people should you be ? Your lives should be holy and dedicated to God ,
61003012	as you wait for the Day of God and do your best to make it come soon—the Day when the heavens will burn up and be destroyed , and the heavenly bodies will be melted by the heat .
61003013	But we wait for what God has promised : new heavens and a new earth , where righteousness will be at home .
61003014	And so , my friends , as you wait for that Day , do your best to be pure and faultless in God's sight and to be at peace with him .
61003015	Look on our Lord's patience as the opportunity he is giving you to be saved , just as our dear friend Paul wrote to you , using the wisdom that God gave him .
61003016	This is what he says in all his letters when he writes on the subject . There are some difficult things in his letters which ignorant and unstable people explain falsely , as they do with other passages of the Scriptures . So they bring on their own destruction .
61003017	But you , my friends , already know this . Be on your guard , then , so that you will not be led away by the errors of lawless people and fall from your safe position .
61003018	But continue to grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To him be the glory , now and forever ! Amen .
62001001	We write to you about the Word of life , which has existed from the very beginning . We have heard it , and we have seen it with our eyes ; yes , we have seen it , and our hands have touched it .
62001002	When this life became visible , we saw it ; so we speak of it and tell you about the eternal life which was with the Father and was made known to us .
62001003	What we have seen and heard we announce to you also , so that you will join with us in the fellowship that we have with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ .
62001004	We write this in order that our joy may be complete .
62001005	Now the message that we have heard from his Son and announce is this : God is light , and there is no darkness at all in him .
62001006	If , then , we say that we have fellowship with him , yet at the same time live in the darkness , we are lying both in our words and in our actions .
62001007	But if we live in the light—just as he is in the light—then we have fellowship with one another , and the blood of Jesus , his Son , purifies us from every sin .
62001008	If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and there is no truth in us .
62001009	But if we confess our sins to God , he will keep his promise and do what is right : he will forgive us our sins and purify us from all our wrongdoing .
62001010	If we say that we have not sinned , we make a liar out of God , and his word is not in us .
62002001	I am writing this to you , my children , so that you will not sin ; but if anyone does sin , we have someone who pleads with the Father on our behalf—Jesus Christ , the righteous one .
62002002	And Christ himself is the means by which our sins are forgiven , and not our sins only , but also the sins of everyone .
62002003	If we obey God's commands , then we are sure that we know him .
62002004	If we say that we know him , but do not obey his commands , we are liars and there is no truth in us .
62002005	But if we obey his word , we are the ones whose love for God has really been made perfect . This is how we can be sure that we are in union with God :
62002006	if we say that we remain in union with God , we should live just as Jesus Christ did .
62002007	My dear friends , this command I am writing you is not new ; it is the old command , the one you have had from the very beginning . The old command is the message you have already heard .
62002008	However , the command I now write you is new , because its truth is seen in Christ and also in you . For the darkness is passing away , and the real light is already shining .
62002009	If we say that we are in the light , yet hate others , we are in the darkness to this very hour .
62002010	If we love others , we live in the light , and so there is nothing in us that will cause someone else to sin .
62002011	But if we hate others , we are in the darkness ; we walk in it and do not know where we are going , because the darkness has made us blind .
62002012	I write to you , my children , because your sins are forgiven for the sake of Christ .
62002013	I write to you , fathers , because you know him who has existed from the beginning . I write to you , young people , because you have defeated the Evil One .
62002014	I write to you , my children , because you know the Father . I write to you , fathers , because you know him who has existed from the beginning . I write to you , young people , because you are strong ; the word of God lives in you , and you have defeated the Evil One .
62002015	Do not love the world or anything that belongs to the world . If you love the world , you do not love the Father .
62002016	Everything that belongs to the world—what the sinful self desires , what people see and want , and everything in this world that people are so proud of—none of this comes from the Father ; it all comes from the world .
62002017	The world and everything in it that people desire is passing away ; but those who do the will of God live forever .
62002018	My children , the end is near ! You were told that the Enemy of Christ would come ; and now many enemies of Christ have already appeared , and so we know that the end is near .
62002019	These people really did not belong to our fellowship , and that is why they left us ; if they had belonged to our fellowship , they would have stayed with us . But they left so that it might be clear that none of them really belonged to us .
62002020	But you have had the Holy Spirit poured out on you by Christ , and so all of you know the truth .
62002021	I write you , then , not because you do not know the truth ; instead , it is because you do know it , and you also know that no lie ever comes from the truth .
62002022	Who , then , is the liar ? It is those who say that Jesus is not the Messiah . Such people are the Enemy of Christ—they reject both the Father and the Son .
62002023	For those who reject the Son reject also the Father ; those who accept the Son have the Father also .
62002024	Be sure , then , to keep in your hearts the message you heard from the beginning . If you keep that message , then you will always live in union with the Son and the Father .
62002025	And this is what Christ himself promised to give us—eternal life .
62002026	I am writing this to you about those who are trying to deceive you .
62002027	But as for you , Christ has poured out his Spirit on you . As long as his Spirit remains in you , you do not need anyone to teach you . For his Spirit teaches you about everything , and what he teaches is true , not false . Obey the Spirit's teaching , then , and remain in union with Christ .
62002028	Yes , my children , remain in union with him , so that when he appears we may be full of courage and need not hide in shame from him on the Day he comes .
62002029	You know that Christ is righteous ; you should know , then , that everyone who does what is right is God's child .
62003001	See how much the Father has loved us ! His love is so great that we are called God's children—and so , in fact , we are . This is why the world does not know us : it has not known God .
62003002	My dear friends , we are now God's children , but it is not yet clear what we shall become . But we know that when Christ appears , we shall be like him , because we shall see him as he really is .
62003003	Everyone who has this hope in Christ keeps himself pure , just as Christ is pure .
62003004	Whoever sins is guilty of breaking God's law , because sin is a breaking of the law .
62003005	You know that Christ appeared in order to take away sins , and that there is no sin in him .
62003006	So everyone who lives in union with Christ does not continue to sin ; but whoever continues to sin has never seen him or known him .
62003007	Let no one deceive you , my children ! Whoever does what is right is righteous , just as Christ is righteous .
62003008	Whoever continues to sin belongs to the Devil , because the Devil has sinned from the very beginning . The Son of God appeared for this very reason , to destroy what the Devil had done .
62003009	Those who are children of God do not continue to sin , for God's very nature is in them ; and because God is their Father , they cannot continue to sin .
62003010	Here is the clear difference between God's children and the Devil's children : those who do not do what is right or do not love others are not God's children .
62003011	The message you heard from the very beginning is this : we must love one another .
62003012	We must not be like Cain ; he belonged to the Evil One and murdered his own brother Abel . Why did Cain murder him ? Because the things he himself did were wrong , and the things his brother did were right .
62003013	So do not be surprised , my friends , if the people of the world hate you .
62003014	We know that we have left death and come over into life ; we know it because we love others . Those who do not love are still under the power of death .
62003015	Those who hate others are murderers , and you know that murderers do not have eternal life in them .
62003016	This is how we know what love is : Christ gave his life for us . We too , then , ought to give our lives for others !
62003017	If we are rich and see others in need , yet close our hearts against them , how can we claim that we love God ?
62003018	My children , our love should not be just words and talk ; it must be true love , which shows itself in action .
62003019	This , then , is how we will know that we belong to the truth ; this is how we will be confident in God's presence .
62003020	If our conscience condemns us , we know that God is greater than our conscience and that he knows everything .
62003021	And so , my dear friends , if our conscience does not condemn us , we have courage in God's presence .
62003022	We receive from him whatever we ask , because we obey his commands and do what pleases him .
62003023	What he commands is that we believe in his Son Jesus Christ and love one another , just as Christ commanded us .
62003024	Those who obey God's commands live in union with God and God lives in union with them . And because of the Spirit that God has given us we know that God lives in union with us .
62004001	My dear friends , do not believe all who claim to have the Spirit , but test them to find out if the spirit they have comes from God . For many false prophets have gone out everywhere .
62004002	This is how you will be able to know whether it is God's Spirit : anyone who acknowledges that Jesus Christ came as a human being has the Spirit who comes from God .
62004003	But anyone who denies this about Jesus does not have the Spirit from God . The spirit that he has is from the Enemy of Christ ; you heard that it would come , and now it is here in the world already .
62004004	But you belong to God , my children , and have defeated the false prophets , because the Spirit who is in you is more powerful than the spirit in those who belong to the world .
62004005	Those false prophets speak about matters of the world , and the world listens to them because they belong to the world .
62004006	But we belong to God . Whoever knows God listens to us ; whoever does not belong to God does not listen to us . This , then , is how we can tell the difference between the Spirit of truth and the spirit of error .
62004007	Dear friends , let us love one another , because love comes from God . Whoever loves is a child of God and knows God .
62004008	Whoever does not love does not know God , for God is love .
62004009	And God showed his love for us by sending his only Son into the world , so that we might have life through him .
62004010	This is what love is : it is not that we have loved God , but that he loved us and sent his Son to be the means by which our sins are forgiven .
62004011	Dear friends , if this is how God loved us , then we should love one another .
62004012	No one has ever seen God , but if we love one another , God lives in union with us , and his love is made perfect in us .
62004013	We are sure that we live in union with God and that he lives in union with us , because he has given us his Spirit .
62004014	And we have seen and tell others that the Father sent his Son to be the Savior of the world .
62004015	If we declare that Jesus is the Son of God , we live in union with God and God lives in union with us .
62004016	And we ourselves know and believe the love which God has for us . God is love , and those who live in love live in union with God and God lives in union with them .
62004017	Love is made perfect in us in order that we may have courage on the Judgment Day ; and we will have it because our life in this world is the same as Christ's .
62004018	There is no fear in love ; perfect love drives out all fear . So then , love has not been made perfect in anyone who is afraid , because fear has to do with punishment .
62004019	We love because God first loved us .
62004020	If we say we love God , but hate others , we are liars . For we cannot love God , whom we have not seen , if we do not love others , whom we have seen .
62004021	The command that Christ has given us is this : whoever loves God must love others also .
62005001	Whoever believes that Jesus is the Messiah is a child of God ; and whoever loves a father loves his child also .
62005002	This is how we know that we love God's children : it is by loving God and obeying his commands .
62005003	For our love for God means that we obey his commands . And his commands are not too hard for us ,
62005004	because every child of God is able to defeat the world . And we win the victory over the world by means of our faith .
62005005	Who can defeat the world ? Only the person who believes that Jesus is the Son of God .
62005006	Jesus Christ is the one who came with the water of his baptism and the blood of his death . He came not only with the water , but with both the water and the blood . And the Spirit himself testifies that this is true , because the Spirit is truth .
62005007	There are three witnesses :
62005008	the Spirit , the water , and the blood ; and all three give the same testimony .
62005009	We believe human testimony ; but God's testimony is much stronger , and he has given this testimony about his Son .
62005010	So those who believe in the Son of God have this testimony in their own heart ; but those who do not believe God , have made a liar of him , because they have not believed what God has said about his Son .
62005011	The testimony is this : God has given us eternal life , and this life has its source in his Son .
62005012	Whoever has the Son has this life ; whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life .
62005013	I am writing this to you so that you may know that you have eternal life—you that believe in the Son of God .
62005014	We have courage in God's presence , because we are sure that he hears us if we ask him for anything that is according to his will .
62005015	He hears us whenever we ask him ; and since we know this is true , we know also that he gives us what we ask from him .
62005016	If you see a believer commit a sin that does not lead to death , you should pray to God , who will give that person life . This applies to those whose sins do not lead to death . But there is sin which leads to death , and I do not say that you should pray to God about that .
62005017	All wrongdoing is sin , but there is sin which does not lead to death .
62005018	We know that no children of God keep on sinning , for the Son of God keeps them safe , and the Evil One cannot harm them .
62005019	We know that we belong to God even though the whole world is under the rule of the Evil One .
62005020	We know that the Son of God has come and has given us understanding , so that we know the true God . We live in union with the true God—in union with his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and this is eternal life .
62005021	My children , keep yourselves safe from false gods !
63001001	From the Elder— To the dear Lady and to her children , whom I truly love . And I am not the only one , but all who know the truth love you ,
63001002	because the truth remains in us and will be with us forever .
63001003	May God the Father and Jesus Christ , the Father's Son , give us grace , mercy , and peace ; may they be ours in truth and love .
63001004	How happy I was to find that some of your children live in the truth , just as the Father commanded us .
63001005	And so I ask you , dear Lady : let us all love one another . This is no new command I am writing you ; it is the command which we have had from the beginning .
63001006	This love I speak of means that we must live in obedience to God's commands . The command , as you have all heard from the beginning , is that you must all live in love .
63001007	Many deceivers have gone out over the world , people who do not acknowledge that Jesus Christ came as a human being . Such a person is a deceiver and the Enemy of Christ .
63001008	Be on your guard , then , so that you will not lose what we have worked for , but will receive your reward in full .
63001009	Anyone who does not stay with the teaching of Christ , but goes beyond it , does not have God . Whoever does stay with the teaching has both the Father and the Son .
63001010	So then , if some come to you who do not bring this teaching , do not welcome them in your homes ; do not even say , “ Peace be with you . ”
63001011	For anyone who wishes them peace becomes their partner in the evil things they do .
63001012	I have so much to tell you , but I would rather not do it with paper and ink ; instead , I hope to visit you and talk with you personally , so that we shall be completely happy .
63001013	The children of your dear Sister send you their greetings .
64001001	From the Elder— To my dear Gaius , whom I truly love .
64001002	My dear friend , I pray that everything may go well with you and that you may be in good health—as I know you are well in spirit .
64001003	I was so happy when some Christians arrived and told me how faithful you are to the truth—just as you always live in the truth .
64001004	Nothing makes me happier than to hear that my children live in the truth .
